people try to bring them out into the periphery and they are very uncomfortable and back away. They 
back away because they are only interested in those people that are interested in their dogmatic view 
because that is what they need. They need people who pay attention to that. 

Moon in detriment. The power to lead others down a narrow path. Everybody that carries the 20 carries 
with them the possibility to lead people in their survival process. These are people that can guide you 
down a path but it is a very specific path. It is very narrow. By the way, narrow is not a pejorative. 
Narrow is not a bad word. To be led down a narrow path: if you have somebody who is teaching you how 
to be a neurophysiologist, you don't want somebody who teaches you Jimi Hendrix every half hour. You 
want this narrow path so that you can go down that road and learn from that. 

The gift through expression of leading others down a narrow path. "I know right now what is good for 
you. " Again, they may or may not. They may really know what is going on in the now or not because they 
can be a paper tiger. It is all a projection going out. Their favorite expression is, "My way or the 
highway". 

20.3 Self-awareness 

We are dealing with an individual process here, so we are not dealing with the collective process. We are 
not dealing with anything other than this deep empowerment to be individual. In the 12.3, there was this 
potential for exaggerated self-hatred due to the trial and error process. Here we have Self-awareness. 
These are people who are only conscious of themselves in the now. They are always seeing their own 
process going on, so they are very self conscious. They are really there, existentially watching their 
movie. Out of that can come great wisdom. If you really watch yourself, you see what happens to you, 
and what happens to you is your life. It is something very valuable. 

Understanding derived horn analysis of personal actions and effects. The proper attunement and 
development of the personality through self -consciousness. On the other side, we have: Self- 
consciousness in the extreme that hampers development. People are so concerned with what they are 
doing in the now that they don't function properly anymore. This is the other side. They are so concerned 
about what is going on around them in the now that they literally don't have the ability to maintain their 
individuality or individual integrity in those situations. 

The expression of self-conscious awareness in the now; or The expression of self-consciousness in the 
extreme. These people are very uncomfortable. You don't see yourself. After all, the individual is 
projecting out from inside of them, just like everybody else. What they are watching is the wave effect 
between themselves and the world. In doing so, individuals discover that most of the world does not want 
to have anything to do with them because they are strangers by their very nature. 

Page 2C 

So there is this inherent self -consciousness in all individuals. All individuality carries within it this self- 
consciousness, this concern that the world does not pay any attention, or the world will not notice you, or 
you are not able to give an explanation. These people can carry this to the extreme, constantly watching, 
constantly being on the alert in the now. I had one person with the 20.3 who told me, "I don't like what I 
see". There is nothing to do because this is a mechanic. I told him, "If you don't see what you like, also 
see there is nothing you can do about that. Anybody that is here in the now gets to see everything. " It is 
not that this makes life horrible. 

The trial and error in this process is that, while you are watching your own movie, you learn so many 
things because it does not always work. Every time you are trying to watch yourself, your whole self- 
analysis is going to come out of interaction with others. 

We are talking about the 20th gate alone. We are not talking about it being connected. It is always looking 
to the other side, yet it does not know that it is there, so it will always bump into it. When they meet 
somebody who rejects them because they are individual, they watch that in the movie. They take all that 
on themselves. They become uncomfortable. "Why didn't that work? Why was I made so 
uncomfortable?" and that restricts them the next time, or it adds to their experience and they learn to 
recognize who they can be "I am in the now" with. That is part of their learning process. It is a feedback 
process and you don't know it because you are not always connected to the rest of it. 

20.4 Application 

Here in the upper trigram, we are dealing with externalization. We are dealing with this one-track- 
process. We are also dealing with the nature of opportunity and this gate is going to meet the 10.4, the 
potential for awakening. That potential lies in recognizing the right opportunity. 

This line is called Application. Recognition and awareness that can only be transformed into action in 
cooperation with those who have the ability to act upon understanding. This is one of the keys to pure 
individuality. The pure individual says, "I know I can integrate with you only if you can follow my 
knowing. If you cannot understand my explanation, this is not going to work." This is the whole thing 
about the knower. The knower can have a wonderful relationship with those that can grasp the 
explanation of the knowing. This is the nature of what application is about. 

Again, here we have a gate in the throat that is open to all kinds of things and, in and of itself, it is still 
limited. The fourth line knows that there is a 57th gate that has the awareness, so it can say, "I know I am 
now". It knows that the 34th gate is there with its energy so it says, "I know I am doing now." When the 
10th gate is there, it can say, "I know what I am doing for myself now." Built into that mechanic is the 
recognition that all of those forces are there in various combinations, waiting. 

This application has two sides. The Jupiter side: The teacher whose students transcend him/her, and the 
Mercury side: The tendency to prefer theory to application. They are not very different because this is the 
knower that says, "I know but I need you to recognize that knowing and if you do so, it is a value for you. 
I may even give you enough value as a base so that you can transcend me, or that person, as a teacher." 

In the white book: Where the expression of awareness can only be turned into action through others. The 
teacher; or The expression of awareness as theory with little interest in its application. Well, it is not 
important for that knower who does not have his own energy. I know many people with the fourth line 
detriment; they are people who know things in the now and have all kinds of theories that have come out 
of that recognition in the now. But they don't care what anybody does with it. The exalted has the same 
experience, experiencing things in the now, knowing something about that and immediately wanting to be 
able to empower others with that knowledge. Both of these sides of the line are teachers. The exalted 

Page 3C 

teacher always gets exactly the right students, and the detriment teacher gets the students that they know 
can't really grasp it and who will never be able to transcend them. So, they are just happy enough to offer 
the theory. 

20.5 Realism 

The fifth line is called Realism. This is a line of universalization. It is a line that gets projected on, and it 
is a very difficult line. Everybody is projecting on this line that these people know. Everybody is 
projecting on them that they are the ones that know what is really going on in the now. They may or may 
not. 

The first thing that the fifth line of the 20 knows is that Contemplation, in and of itself, is no guarantee of 
success. It is not enough to be existential. If you don't have any power, what will you do with what you 
recognize in the now? If you don't have any awareness, what can you make of it? And if you don't have 
any identity, who are you in the now? These are three other gates that the 20 points towards. The fifth line 
recognizes, because it is deeply aware, that there is the other side. They know that all three of those gates 
are out there and know that being in the now is not enough. You can be in the now. You can stand there 
and say, "Oh, there is a car coming towards me," but if you don't have a motor, you will die. It is not 
going to help you to be conscious of that in the now. It does not help you to be existential if you can't get 
out of the way. 

The fifth line understands the cold, hard reality of what life is and there is nobody else in this life that you 
are going to meet that will point to life and show you all of its beauty and all of its ugliness. That is what 
they see. They see the reality of what things are. This is not necessarily pleasing. 

Saturn exalted. Where concentration on details results in a perfected form. Perfected form is part of the 
whole Integration process. These people recognize after a while that it is not enough to be existential. "I 
have to find out where all these other sources of energy and power and awareness are so that I can access 
them in order to get to the perfected form of survival. " 

Uranus in detriment. Where reality creates dissatisfaction and adds to instability. Uranus stands for 
suddenness and unexpectedness. These are people that walk out of their house in the morning and they 
see everything that is ugly. They see the garbage that was not put in the garbage can. They see the drunk 
that is sitting in the doorway. They see the rust eating away at the bottom of a car. They see what needs to 
be repaired. They see the grayness in people's faces, the coldness in their eyes. They get the whole movie 
with one breath. It is a real gift that these people have. But, unless they are connected to awareness, unless 
they are connected to the motor, unless they are connected to the identity, they are deeply uncomfortable 
with this capacity to see the world as it is. They are not believers. These are not abstract people. They 
don't have any faith. They are not logical people trying to find a pattern and project into the future. They 
just look around and see what they see. 

The success of expressing awareness through detail; or The expression of awareness in the now through 
dissatisfaction with the reality one sees. These people sound like whiners but they are not. They really do 
see what is ugly. For them, that is quite a burden in their life because it is very hard for them unless they 
are integrated to the rest of this Integration system. It is hard for them to see why life is worth surviving. 

20.6 Wisdom 

Like all sixth lines, there is something else that is at work here. This line is called Wisdom. 
Contemplation which results in the ability to apply understanding. That may or may not be the case.

This is a deeply individual line. Any individual line says, "I am now." I have this line and I have the 
Venus exalted, so I am very fortunate in that. This line does not care about the world and this line can be 
misread that way. I certainly never cared about the world, nor did I ever have the idea for even a fraction 
of a moment that what I was going through in the now could be of value to anybody. This is typical of the 
sixth line. What is there for me to say to the collective if I don't know anything myself? And all knowers 
are like that. They know things and they don't know things and they go through their life. 

This line is about the individual staying with their individual process. There is within it The ability to 
transform individual awareness for general application and understanding. Don't stand in line and wait for 
that. The fact that there is the ability does not mean, like all sixth lines, that that is going to come out, and 
very often that wisdom looks very dumb. 

This is one of the jokes about all of these things because these people are not necessarily going to put that 
energy out on you and take their individual experience and try to turn that into a direction for you. It is 
very difficult for the individual to do that. They have to know; they have to be able to explain it. They

certainty in any of that. Venus exalted. The establishment for the benefit of society, values, ideals and 
their patterns, and how they can be understood and applied. 

The Mercury in detriment is not any different. It is the theoretical. The same as above, but motivated by 
the self satisfying mental challenge rather than altruism. These are very individual people living out a 
very individual process. Because there is no such thing as personal karma, these people can be pulled into 
the needs of others and, if they live long enough and their existential process has been broad enough, they 
may be able to make a contribution to the totality. But all sixth lines wait for some kind of force that 
projects that on them. I got that in a very clear way in my confrontation with the Voice. I had to deal with 
something that imposed upon me something that was not there naturally. The mutation was brought to 
me. Otherwise, none of that stuff would have had any value. It is true for all sixth lines. 

I am not saying that you can't experience a sixth line unless you have some kind of science fiction event. 
That is not true. What I'm saying is that there are only very special circumstances in your life that are 
going to bring out the potential of any sixth line. When you have children (that is my concern) that have a 
lot of sixth lines, or they have a Sun/Earth configuration that is in the sixth line, you have to recognize 
that you may never see their potential. You can never allow these children to feel uncomfortable because 
of that. The reality is that they are gifted, but it is up to life whether or not that gift has any real value. 

Wye all have special attributes, but it is a question of what life demands and not what we have. So many 
people are deeply frustrated because what they have they want to push out into the world, but if the world 
is not ready for it and the world doesn't want it, the world will not take it. This is just the way things 
work. All sixth lines, in that sense, are waiting for a sign from the gods, whatever that sign happens to be. 
It does not have to be spiritual or mystical. It can be a car accident. It can be all kinds of things that 
trigger the potential that lies inside all of these sixth lines.

HEXAGRAM 21 BITING THROUGH 

We come to a gate that has enormous significance in our lives. It is a gate that often creates a lot of 
problems because it is the only gate that is designed to be a controlling gate. It can only be a controlling 
gate because it has the most powerful ego. 

The fact that it is a controlling gate, the fact that it is a powerful ego is legitimate. In other words, this 
controlling force is necessary in order to be able to serve and protect the tribe. The 21 is here to serve the 
community. It is here to establish for the community what is viable and what works. It is here to make 
sure that the community has what it needs: the food and shelter that it needs and the work that it needs. 

It is here to make sure that there is reward for those efforts, that society not only works but has time for 
leisure. In other words, it is there to look after the needs of humanity living together on the material plane. 
It is the channel of Materialism. Because the 21 is a control gate, it is also very difficult for people and 
often extremely difficult for the 21's themselves. 

Above the lines it says: The justified and necessary use of power in overcoming deliberate and persistent 
interference. 'The justified and necessary use of power...' These are very strong words. You will not hear 
that kind of language in any other gate, '...in overcoming deliberate and persistent interference.' In other 
words, it is not there to overcome unintentional interference. It is not there to overcome interference that 
is not non-persistent. 

But it is there to be in control. It is justified in the use of its power. This is the ego that must strike out. 
That is why it is an ego that is very uncomfortable for those who have it and those who have to 
experience it. 

The way in which a 21 operates has to do with the nature of their design. An undefined heart center with 
the 21 is very different from a defined one. A 21 with a defined heart center is very different as a 
generator, a manifestor or a projector. In other words, there are a lot of complexities in how the gate 
actually can operate. 

If you have the 21 and you are a projector, people in your life have to recognize that you have to be in 
control. Otherwise, you are not meeting the right people. If you are a generator with the 21, you can only 
take control when somebody asks you and you respond to it. If you are a 21 that is a manifestor, you have 
to ask their permission before you control them. If you are a 21 in an undefined heart center, all you can 
do is wait to be offered control because the moment that you claim control, you will break your heart. 

This is where the heart sits. Everybody who has the 21 who is not allowed to exercise their power to be in 
control, those people in their lives who do not allow that are killing them, literally. This is a deeply 
misunderstood hexagram. The 21 has a right to be in control. It has a justified and proper right to be in 
control, but depending on the design, the control will be allowed and will come out in different ways. The 
moment it is there, the 21 has to be trusted and allowed to do its job of serving the community. This is an 
ego that truly will serve the community as long as it is recognized in its power.

OUTER PLANET TRANSITS 

Detriments and Exaltations Affected by Pluto and Neptune 

Two outer planets, Neptune and Pluto, have cycles that greatly exceed the span of a single human life. 
Neptune's cycle around the wheel requires approximately 165 years and Pluto's cycle is about 284 years. 
Consequently, depending upon the position of these planets in their transit around the wheel, 
periodically, the exalted or the detriment of certain lines that are fixed by these planets may be inactive, 
i.e. not present in the world in the human population. This means that, at any given time, these particular 
aspects of design may or may not be present, genetically in the world and therefore, these qualities are 
not accessible to human beings until the planet re-activates that gate or its harmonic. 

Something to keep in mind, also, is that the period of time that these detriments or exaltations remain 
inactive after there are no people alive carrying these activations will be shortened somewhat by Pluto or 
Neptune's transit to the harmonic gate within the channel. How much shorter is determined by the 
relative positions of the harmonic gates within the wheel. 

For example, gates 25 and 51 that form the channel of Initiation are both positioned in Aries. Pluto has 
not been in Aries, and therefore in either gate 25 or gate 51, since the beginning of the 19th century. 
Thus, there has been no activation of the 25.3 in detriment, the 51.1 exalted or the 51.6 in detriment for a 
very long time, and it will still be a number of years before Pluto re-enters Aries. With Neptune's absence 
from the 25. 1 and Pluto from the 5 neither of the exaltations is active, which means that the whole 
foundation for Initiation during this time has operated through the detriments. 

At the time of this publication, Neptune is transiting Aquarius, having recently moved through the 41st 
gate, activating the Al. 1, Reasonableness, in the exaltation and bringing that genetic material back out 
into the world. Pluto is moving through Sagittarius, finishing its transit through the 5th gate and thereby 
re-activating the qualities of the detriments of Inner Peace and Joy (the 5.2 and the 5.5) within our gene 
pool. These qualities that have been absent genetically for so many years are now being carried by those 
children born under these transits. 

The following is a list of lines currently affected by Pluto or Neptune in which these lines have an aspect 
that is not functioning as of now. When doing readings for clients, when you get to these lines, you can 
only read the one aspect of the line, the exaltation or the detriment, that is still operating.

21.1 Warning 

All first lines speak for the nature of the hexagram. Warning is the basis of the 21 and its control. "Don't 
interferel Attention." The use of force as a last resort. In other words, in the use of power to be in control, 
the worst thing is to start with force first. I learned this many years ago as a teacher. In public teaching 
institutions, there were always those teachers who can never, ever control their students. They will 
threaten them. When that does not work, they will use force and the moment you use force, you cannot go 
any further. The moment that I had a teacher that would strap and punish me, I knew that I had taken 
them to their limitation. What else could they do? Kill me? 

Warning. The use of force as a last resort. It does not say that you don't use force. If you keep on saying, 
"Hey, look, this is what you have to do," and they still do not listen, then you can use force. 

Mars exalted. The fierceness to be respected without recourse to action. This is an overview line. It takes 
a long time to get that respect. It is not that you have it right away. This is a deeply painful gate to have if 
you are a child. You are here to be in control but you are being dictated by your parents, your school, by 
your siblings, by friends. What usually happens is that these people live with nothing but tension. The 
cross of Tension is rooted in the polarity between the 21 and the 48. The 21st gate can bring an enormous 
tension which becomes a strain on the heart, simply because these people are not allowed to be in control. 

The Moon in detriment. An inherent peacefulness that all too often turns a necessary warning into a plea. 
In the white book: The willpower and ego to ensure respect; or A lack of willpower that is forced to ask 
for respect. These are the 21 's who say, "Look, please let me be in control. I know what I am doing. 
Please stop interfering. Please." That is not a very powerful way of dealing with things. In that moment, 
the 21 is asking for the other not to interfere when, in fact, they are here to insist that there is no 
interference. 

This is the great dilemma of the 21. That dilemma is written in the genetic continuity of the chart. The 21 
in an undefined heart center is dependent on the other person as to whether they can bring out their 
control or not and they may have to ask. When it is defined to the throat, it is a different process but 
always, the dilemma for the 21 is to find a way to get the respect so that they are not interfered with. They 
cannot get that until they learn how to control things. If you have a child with the 21, give them 
responsibilities. Give them things that they control (their schedule or whatever) so they learn what it is to 
be in control and they get respect for their ability to be in control of things. 

21.2 Might is right 

The second line is called Might is right and it has Neptune in detriment, which means that this side is not 
operating in our time. 

It is an overview line: The legitimacy of action in response to flagrant and persistent interference. 
Remember, to be in control means that you don't deal with any kind of interference because it will show 
that you are not really in control. This is the ego, after all. You release that control when you are 
constantly being interfered with; that is the moment that you have to stop the interference. 

Think about the second line, which does not know any of that. It does not even realize that it is being in 
control. Because it does not have that realization (lower trigram, not transpersonal), it is simply in its own 
thing and then somebody comes along and, because they can look in the window, they say, "These people 
are being in control of that. I will interfere with that." Boy, do they get a surprise! 

What comes out immediately is Mars exalted; there is no detriment. Powerful and extreme reaction. Here, 
the severest action will be the most successful. You see somebody sitting at a desk and they are doing 
something. They are in control of what they are doing and somebody comes up to them and says, "You 
really shouldn't." The legitimate rejection of interference on the material plane. This can be very shocking 
to people. 

21.3 Powerlessness 

The third line is a line that is often totally misunderstood and misinterpreted. Whenever I meet 21.3's, I do 
the best I can to correct them immediately about the nature of what this line is. Because of the keynote, 
Powerlessness, there is a false assumption connected to this. This is not about being without power. This 
is about the possibility of being powerless. 

An overview line, trial and error: Where the just are condemned to a futile confrontation with superior 
forces. This is the way logic works: if you break down what this sentence is actually saying, it says that 
the just are condemned to a futile confrontation with superior forces, not with inferior forces. When 
somebody has the 21.3, they can never ever work for somebody else. It is hard for 21's to work for 
anybody else anyway and I always tell 21's the same thing: you have to be your own boss and if that 
means that you have to work in a corporation, then you have a separate contract which states that you are 
an outsider that is contracted in so you can be in control of your material life and not be dependent. 

What happens to these people in their trial and error process is that, for example, they try to get into a 
corporation and they get in at a lower level. These 21.3's go through hell with that because every step and 
layer above them, every layer of management and control that is above them, is absolutely infuriating to

There is an advantage to that. The Neptunian field is not at work. The advantage is because this exalted is 
Defeat as a survivable humiliation, often acceptable through the abuse of drugs and alcohol. This is not

In the white book you can see that it is: A lack of will for the material path in order to protect the ego. 
These are people that do not want to work, do not want to leave school. These are people that do not want

Again, the dilemma of being an ego-child: ego children, like emotional children, have enormous problems

It is very important to recognize that 21 children have to be treated with respect. They have to. They have

So many 21.3's that I meet are so angry at the world, so uncomfortable with having been directed all of 
their lives. For them it is so easy: do not have a boss. Do not have a boss in your relationships; do not 

have a boss at work. Do not have a superior force in your life, unless you are a masochist and you love to

Regarding their approach to the material plane: this line does not mean that the 21.3 has to withdraw.

The advantage we can give them in letting them know what that line means for them is to understand that

21.4 Strategy 

When you come to the upper trigram, particularly in the 21st gate, you are dealing with something very 
different: the capacity to bring control to the transpersonal experience. The fourth and fifth lines are 
extremely well equipped in the 21 to be able to control what they have to control, which is manifestation. 
Everything about the tribe is desperate to get to the throat. For the tribe, there is only one way: the 21/45. 
The throat itself is dependent on having that ego do the work, do the serving. The only way the throat gets

things manifested. 21.4's and 21.5's make very powerful leaders, good presidents of companies. The 
fourth line is called Strategy. 

Overview line: Careful appraisal of opposing forces to establish a proper response. This is not simply 
recognizing that one has the capacity to be in control and the ego that says, "I have to be in control." This 
is an ego that says, "Wait a second. How do I exercise my control?" In other words, this is an aspect that 
works the strategy for getting to manifestation. You have to control some people tightly if you are a 21. 
Some others have to be given space. It varies. The question of what kind of control to use, who to control 
and when to control, becomes a transpersonal strategy. 

We have Jupiter exalted. Success in action through clarity, which means control as the result of 
investigation: looking at things and seeing how they can be done. But remember, this is a one-tracked 
process, so strategy is everything. These are very strategic people and they are often accused of being

rarely accuse them of that because they tend to be dependent on their manipulation to have what they 
need in this life. 

Earth in detriment. A tendency, when in the right, to misjudge the power of one's opponents. This is 
always a dilemma for the ego: just because it is right does not mean that it is going to work. Here in the 
fourth line, just because you have the right strategy does not mean that it is going to work. There are a lot 
of businesses everywhere in the world that design strategies every year of how they will make millions. 
Yes, strategies are nice, but they do not always work. 

In the white book: The ego to succeed on the material plane and the instinct to use willpower effectively 
in response to conditions. This is the gift of being able to see where you use your control. The Earth 
detriment. The drive when in the right to follow one's ego rather than one's instincts. This is the ego 
saying, "This is my strategy. I made it up and I will not give it up. It will work," even though you know 
that it will crash. 

The 'opposing forces' are forces which interfere. In this line, it does not matter whether they are inferior or 
superior. Only the third line is particularly about superior forces. The third line is the pathway that leads

This is a classic fifth line and even more so because of the impact of not having Pluto being active, so

Here we have an overview line. The use of force must be based on impartiality and not emotionally 
motivated. When you read a line that says it must be impartial and not based on emotions, you know that,

power properly. Remember, it is an ongoing process. 

I have a very powerful ego and it is the only motor in my design, so I manifest out of the power of the

The whole thing about the nature of this fifth line is that objectivity is what the totality wants from its

Just because somebody does not like you for what you did does not mean that they will throw you out

impartial and non-emotional. 

As a learning curve, the fifth line will be both partially prejudiced and emotional and it learns by the price

forces. "I will not let you control me because you do not control fairly. You don't control Johnny as much 
as you control me." They lose the respect that way and, in order for them to gain that back, it iss an 
objective process that has to be at work. 

Here you have Jupiter exalted. A principled and legal character that ensures objectivity. Those principles 
have to come by. One has to learn how to use power. Because power does not belong to us, it is 
something you have to learn to work with, to learn how to use. 

In the white book: The balanced ego... (But it will start off imbalanced, please understand that.l ...whose

of the 21. Let's do our best-to nurture the 211.5s. If you project onto the 21.5 child that It has to be in

When you think about it, all the 110th gates together condition our behavior iim'the'world. All the 2nd

21.6 Chaos 

The thing to recognize about the nature of the materialism that is inherent in the 21 is that, built into the

21.6 is not very likely to be material and, when they are young, they get involved with it and they 
discover that it can be disastrous for them. 

Chaos. Where ineffective action leads to disorder. The moment that you see a line like that and you are 
dealing with a sixth line, you really know that this line is going to spend most of its life judging whether 
something could be an effective action or not. "Well, I don't know if I should really take control because I 
don't know if it is really going to work and I don't know if I'll really get what I want to get and I don't 
know whether I will be interfered with and I'll have all these problems." They learn that very early 
because a 21.6 is like a bull in a china shop. They will go in there and, all of a sudden, everything is 
flying and they never go into that shop again after that. "Why should I go in there? If I do the wrong 
thing, everything is going to explode." 

The other thing about this line is that the Pluto exalted is not there, so you are dealing with only the 
Venus in detriment. Withdrawal and reliance on inner order in a chaotic situation. This is the greatest 
fence sitter of all the sixth lines. The 21.6 sits there on that fence and it does not want to do anything else

nothing will result of it but chaos. 

In the white book: Where the material direction is chaotic, the ego will withdraw and use its power to find 
an inner order. But the moment a 21.6 knows what material path is for it and is in control of that material 
path, you have somebody who can be an enormous success. Sixth lines have this inherent capacity to be

give up; but if it finds the right relationship, it will display a quality of intimacy that we call soul mate,

other words, there is the potential in the sixth line for quite a transition experience, something that is 
really beyond the capacity of the hexagram. However, this is not a very good age for that because the 21.6 
goes to the 51.1. 

The reality is that the 21 and the 51 are next to each other, so that you have these two very expressive 
gates of the ego system: one going the material way and one going the initiative and potentially mystical

But it is a very long process for the 21.6 to find their way. It is going to take time in their life before 
something is really of value to them to be in control of because the thing for them is that it has to be able 
to come out in the action. If it can't, it is not worth doing. 

The actions have to be correct; otherwise there is nothing but chaos. The actions can only be correct if the 
material path is correct. The 21.6 is not just looking to be in control, it has to be in control of the right

actions were ineffective. 

HEXAGRAM 22 GRACE 

The channel of Openness, the design of a social or an anti-social being, and the 22nd gate, the gate of 
Grace. In English, there is a nice play on this: the gate of grace and the gate of disgrace. It can be both, 
depending on the nature of the wave. 

This channel is deeply mutative. It is only out of this channel that mutation can actually spread. It gives 
this channel an unusual quality. All mutation moves out into the general population through the 12/22. 
The 12th gate has already been responsible for the mutation in our larynx which allows us to articulate 
through language. The 55th gate will be the mutation that takes place to allow the nature of the spirit to 
come out, and the pressure is on the 22 to recognize when to be socially open to release the mutation. 

This is the great gift of the 22, to know exactly when to release the mutation. If it doesn't, there is disgrace 
because it does not work. Timing is in the nature of the moods. The 22nd gate: the gate of openness, the 
possibility to provoke social openness or not. They can provoke it. 

Remember the nature of the 39 that teases the 55. They can be deeply anti-social in the same way that the 
55th gate can not only show the highest level of emotion, it can be absolutely icy cold in not releasing any 
emotion whatsoever. The awareness possibility is the openness to eating. 

One of the things that are very good for individuals is to speak to people while they are eating. This is 
something I learned a long time ago as a teacher. I spent about ten years of my life teaching in formal 
institutions at many different levels. I was always in institutions that enforced the no-eating process, for 
decor, I assume. But students were not allowed to eat, other than when I was teaching in university. In the 
early 1980's, I ran an experimental school in Ibiza. I took children who were having a hard time and that, 
according to authorities, were not traditionally educational. I brought them together and taught them the 
history of the universe in four months. I loaded them up with all kinds of information, just as memory 
techniques. After one hour with me, they were hungry. 

This is one of the things to recognize about the nature of the mind: the moment that you are truly using 
your mind, if you are not getting hungry, there is something wrong because you are using an enormous 
amount of energy. One of the things that kept my students brimming was that I allowed them to sit there 
and stuff their face the whole time that I was teaching them. It maintained their energy. The brain will 
deplete your energy very quickly and it is a very important thing to be able to eat while you are doing 
your most powerful thinking process. Speaking to people while they are eating is very good for 
individuals. It is the timing of those things. 

There is a funny thing in the nature of lines that I thought about for many years. One of them is the 
relationship between the 15 and the 22. The 15 is the love of humanity and it is the gate of extremism. It 
is called Modesty. Then you come over here to Grace and, at its best, Grace is the most modest of all 
gates as an incredible strategy. It truly deserves the name 'Modesty'. 'Grace' could be handed over to the 
15th gate quite easily. 

Everything about the individual is demanding attention. The nature of the individual process is trying to 
get the attention of others. The 22nd gate has a special capability. It is not the 12th gate, nor the 55th gate 
with its magic and mutation. It always has to take a backseat to the power of those two gates because the 
individual is always at risk in the larger society. The nature of 22nd gate in romance, when we look at it 
sexually, is the power to be attentive, to be open to listening. 

Listening is so important in romance: the capacity to hear out each other. The 22nd gate carries with it the 
power to empower attentiveness in others. This is its grace. 

When the 22nd gate is with others, it empowers them to be attentive; it empowers them to listen. This is 
important. In doing that, it has to wait to hear them out first before it will get its chance to speak. It is 
designed to be second and then it can bring out its response in its wave. The moment that the 22nd gate 
tries to be the gun-slinger instead of being the polite one, it fails. When you watch a 22 drive, they always 
allow others to go first, to get into the lane. This is their attentiveness. This is part of their power.

The essence, the foundation of the hexagram. Moon exalted. The ability to accept and enjoy a subordinate

In the Book of Letters: The emotional awareness to enjoy a subordinate position; or Where the emotional

22.2 Charm school 

The second lines rarely, if ever, deliver any kind of mutation. The nature of Charm school is that there is

The belief that style can mask nature. Sun exalted. The ability to successfully delude oneself and others.

Jupiter in detriment. The legalization of form over substance. The charm school people with the detriment

The 22.3 is one of those attributes that people write and sing about. It is an emotional type that, through

Saturn exalted. Form as a definition and actualization of substance. It is in the form: that is the Saturnian

Mars in detriment. Unconscious grace. In the Book of Letters, we have: The possibility for perfected

HEXAGRAM 23 SPLITTING APART 

There is a difference between the collective process in the throat, with its primary gates of 
communication, and the individual process. The collective process in the throat is the capacity to be able 
to translate the internal image or concept from the mind into language, into words: to get people in the 
abstract process to be able to see and make sense out of what you are telling them, or in the logical 
process to get people to recognize and understand the facts. 

When we come to the individual process, it operates differently because the individual mind is acoustic. 
Whenever you see individuality in a chart, what you are looking at is an aspect that operates at an acoustic 
level. So, rather than trying to translate an image and turn it into language so that you can get people to 
see what you are talking about, the 23rd gate acts as a legitimate translator, very much like what Jurgen 
does when he translates me. That is, you take the original inner sound, the inner voice, and find a way to 
translate that into a language that allows the individual to explain themselves. 

The channel 43/23, the channel of Structuring, is a design of individuality subtitled: 'from genius to freak.' 
The individual is always on the outside until they find a way to be able to explain themselves. Unless the 
individual can explain themselves, they are always going to be placed on the outside. The 23rd gate does 
not say, "I believe," like the abstract voice. It does not say, "I think," like the logical voice. It says, "I 
know," or "I don't know." When you say, "I know," you had better be able to explain yourself; if you 
can't, you will be rejected. 

Above the lines it says, Amorality. It is one of the things to recognize about the nature of the individual 
process that, contrary to the collective and the tribal processes, which are both moralistic, the individual 
process is not. Amorality is the key to the individual process. It is not about what is right or wrong. It is 
about what one knows or does not know. 

The awareness and understanding that leads to the acceptance of diversity. The difficulty with all 
individuality is that it seeks to be accepted. It will always attract attention. Because the individual is 
different and brings the potential for a mutative force, the individual can be easily rejected. When the 
individual becomes moralistic, they are the first to be rejected. The reality is that individuals are simply 
different. It is not about whether it is good or bad. 

23.1 Proselytization 

The first line of any hexagram describes the foundation. This is the introspective quality; this is the pure 
nature of a hexagram. The first line of the 23rd hexagram is called Proselytization. The attempt to 
undermine one set of values for another. This word describes a process in which you try to convince other 
people of what you know. 

Jupiter exalted. The sage who, in the extreme, can defend evil as a part of the greater good. Venus in 
detriment. The missionary whose very light will bring darkness. These are the two sides of the individual 
process. It is about bringing mutation. The 23rd hexagram is bringing the possibility of mutation as a 
description of a mental concept. For example: 

I am a pure individual. I have am individual mind. I bring the knowing that I have and do the-very best I 
canto explain iit. The reality its that that either leads to a mutative way in which we think or I will be 
rejected as a freak. These are the two sides of the same coin. 

The powerful expression of an insight which will undermine established values. The Human Design 
System undermines a great deal of dogma. On the other side: The powerful expression of an insight which 

wig produce negative effects. Something that can be mutative can be mutative in a positive or in a 
negative way. Thcit iis, this very mutafive force cam seem very offensive. If you are a black native in the 
heart df Africa and you have a white missionary coming to you and telling you, -NI know that Jesus will 
save you," this cam be ireal pain in the neck, even if the white person is really convinced that he/she does 
a very good job of explaining that. One person's knowing cam be very offensive to the collective or-to - 
the tribe. So, bath sides of these realities dlwnays exist in the 23, which means ilhatthe 23, when it opens 
its mouth and says, "I know," is always open to refection. This is the-other side of the coin. 

23.2 Self-defense 

When you are dealing with the first line, because you are dealing with a voice that says, "I'know," and 
explains itself, the first line recognizes that there is knowing within it, but it is looking into the nature of 
the knowing. When you get to the second line, you are always getting to a line of projection. We know 
that the second line is going to project out the quality of the gate. The second line is always the child in 
the classroom that goes, "I know," and that does not mean they do. 

The whole thing about the nature of the individual is that every aspect of individuality that you find in a 
chart, that aspect has a built-in resistance to interference. This is one of the keys to individual integrity. 
The key is: fall on your own face and do not take anybody else's advice. The reality is that when you have 
a child with the 23.2 that is four years old and is yelling at their parents, "I know," it can get them into a 
lot of trouble because they may not really know. They do not have the ability to look inward the way the 
first line does. They project this knowing out. 

This line is called Self-defense. This is the key to the defense of the individual and it will get its full 
quality when it resonates to the fifth line where the individual process can be universalized. It says: The 
need to abandon tolerance when survival is threatened. Survival is a very powerful word and it is talking 
about the nature of what it is to be an individual. If you are an individual and you know something and 
you swallow that in the face of the resistance from others, your survival as an individual comes to an end. 
That is, your capacity to maintain your individual nature deteriorates, and so many people who have the 
23rd gate never express their "I know" because they were slapped down when they were children. They 
were constantly being put in their place and being told, "You don't know." 

Jupiter exalted. The principle of preservation at its most acute. "I know, I know, I know," and they keep 
screaming it at the Moon in detriment: Where Jupiter will strike out to preserve its integrity, the Moon is 
often satisfied with just protecting itself by fending off hostility. This is the beginning of the individual 
deteriorating. The moment the individual is concerned about harmony is the moment that deterioration 
comes into their individuality. This is very difficult for people who have a lot of individual definition in 
their design because it is very hard for them, genetically speaking, to be able to accept the input from 
others. Yet, built into this, like all the dualities and the polarities in Design, is an inherent weakness 
within the individual: the fear of being rejected, the fear that their contribution to the totality cannot be 
made. 

In the white book it says: The abandonment of tolerance when individual expression is threatened. These 
are people that insist on getting out their "I know," on projecting that knowing out. 

On the other hand: The defense of individual expression in the face of hostility. This is the moment 
where, for example, in the process of a child who has a knowing inside of them, because they have been 
told in the past that they don't know, rather than saying what they do know, they are more concerned in 
keeping everybody happy around them. "I don't want to be treated like a freak so I'd better not tell them 
what I know." 

You notice, by the way, that when I make these references in how this is lived out, I am very often 
referring to children. It is very important to understand that, by the time you get to be an adult, you are 
already so deeply conditioned so far away from your nature. The reality is that this kind of knowledge, 
ultimately, is for children so that their process can be healthy and so the people that raise these children 
can have a deep recognition of the nature of what is there. 

Collective children do not have the same kind of difficulties in dealing with criticism because they are 
born to be critical themselves and they are born to share the nature of criticism. This is part of the process 
of being collective, through experience and experimentation. The tribal child has a contact with those 
around him that is very deep and supportive even when it is difficult because there is a much deeper bond 
in the relationship. But when you are dealing with an individual child or aspects of individuality in a 
child, because they are different and they do not function in those ways, they are deeply sensitive to 
criticism. The criticism at the child's level in the individual child is something that will inhibit their 
capacity and their security to be able to express their individuality. 

23.3 Individuality 

When you come to this third line, it is called Individuality. It is the nature of the individual process. It is, 
in this sense, the archetype of the individual process, that the individual knower cannot really be of value, 
cannot really bring wisdom, unless that knower makes a lot of mistakes. All third lines are about 
adaptation. Knowing can be a very fixed process and the reality is that the knower who goes through a 
mistake process and comes to grips with that process of trial and error and adaptation, that the nature of 
their individuality, the power of their ability to explain themselves, grows. 

Whenever I deal with individuals, I always remind them that it is very important for them to develop 
language skills. It is very important for them to develop the capability of being able to explain themselves 
because, if you can't explain yourself as an individual, it is so easy for others to reject you. 

Independent expression that is by its nature not detrimental to others. Sun exalted. Vitality and personal 
power that can engender jealousy but not threat. In the white book: Individual expression that attracts 
attention but not threat. Those individuals that go through the process of making mistakes learn how to 
couch their language in such a way that they are not threatened in their expression of "I know." 

Then you have the Pluto in detriment. An individual mysteriousness that attracts active suspicion and 
threat. In the white book: The Freak. Individual expression that attracts suspicion and threat. I am 
someone who has the 43.3/23.3. When Pluto was in the 43rd gate, which took place in 1990, I went 
through this process of having everybody deal with me as a black magician who is crazy and dangerous. 
It made a lot of people very uncomfortable. This is simply the nature of it. 

There is a whole generation of children being born with Pluto in that position and, when they grow up, 
they will not like me. What to do? By the way, the children that were born just after that generation have 
Neptune in 61 and I have my Design Sun in 6 Occult knowledge, and Neptune is exalted there. So the 
children that are a little bit younger than the other generation will like me. It balances out in the end. 

23.4 Fragmentation 

We are in the upper trigram, which is about externalizing. It is the recognition that there is something 
across the way. There is a recognition that one has to deal with it in a transpersonal way. It is about being 
fixed in the sense of being one-tracked and it says here, Fragmentation. Diversification without a 
perceived potential for synthesis. These are knowing-junkies. They move from one knowing to another 

and there is no way for them in which those disparate, diverse knowings add up to something. Due to the 
fact that there is no potential for synthesis, there is simply a collection of knowing. 

Sun exalted. Fatalism and egoism and damn the consequences. When these people get into their knowing 
trip, it is all they can externalize, even if it has nothing to do with anything else. These people simply 
want to get that knowing out and externalize it. They have a one-track mind. That is the resonance, by the 
way, to the 43.4, the One-track mind. 

The other side of this is the Earth in detriment. Atheism and paranoia. Individuals that simply put out 
knowing that is of no value to the collective, individual expression that has no collective value. If the 
collective is not interested in what the knower has to say, the knower is going to be shunned. So the 
knower then shifts to the next knowing, but it still has no value to the collective because it is an individual 
knowing process in which they are fixed. 

When you come to the detriment side, to the atheism and paranoia, to these kinds of knowers, knowing is 
all about three things: knowing what you can know, recognizing what is not worth knowing and being 
clear about what is unknowable. These people, because they are into so much knowing, they see that 
nothing really is of value. Because of that and because the outside world is going to appear to be cruel to 
them because they are going to be rejected by it, they can become very paranoid about releasing their 
knowing, very paranoid about the way that they see people coming towards them. The fear of that 
rejection and that paranoia becomes paranoia that there is no cosmic protection either, that there is no God 
to hear their prayer anymore than there is an individual or a person out there willing to hear and take in 
their knowing. 

Again, it is so easy for human beings to be moralistic, and the moment that you get a description of a line 
like that, it is so easy to jump on that. "Aha, this is not good." It is not about that. This, after all, is the gate 
of Amorality. It is not about the morality of the line. For every single line and for every single aspect, you 
will have a value. One of those bizarre funny knowings that the fourth line can get into in their one-track 
trip is that it can ultimately turn out to be of enormous value. It is just difficult for them to get that out and 
they are very uncomfortable inside because there is this deep fear of rejection. 

Remember, the individual process (to say, "I know"), always places you at risk because if you can't 
explain it, you are a fool or worse. So, here in the fourth line, with all of this movement and diversity, 
there is not enough depth for a real explanation, and the depth does not permit the synthesis. And so, out 
of that can come a great deal of anxiety. "They are never going to know what I mean." This is the real fear 
in the 23. The fourth line is the one that lives out pure individuality because they simply put their 
knowing out and do not pay any attention to the consequences. They just don't care. But they do. This is 
very disturbing for them. 

23.5 Assimilation 

Remember that the first line always gives you the basis or the nature of the hexagram but the fifth line 
always tells you the way the world looks at it. The fifth line is in resonance to the second line, which 
projects out, and the fifth line is projected on. What is projected onto the fifth line is that it is there to be 
assimilated and to assimilate. This is one of the keys to the individual and it also shows you the pressure 
that comes from the outside that is placed on the individual. "Yes, you are very interesting, but be like us. 
You might know something but you'd better behave the way we behave because, otherwise, you will have 
problems with us." The individual cannot survive in the world without some capacity for assimilation. 

The practical acceptance of the values of another path. Jupiter exalted. Expansion and contribution 
through assimilation. There is no way for the individual to survive and allow its gifts to penetrate into the 

world without this gift of being able to assimilate, without this gift of being able to find some way 
socially to integrate oneself into the community. 

The Moon in detriment. Motive -driven assimilation from an inferior position, i.e., for protection or 
nourishment. These are people that really trade off their knowing. This is the individual that will sell out 
their knowing because they recognize that the assimilation is so important. Remember that everybody is 
projecting onto the 23.5 that they know. Because of that, the outside also wants them to bring that 
knowing out, even if they can't explain themselves. The moment that they can't explain themselves, all 
that falls apart. 

So, here in the white book, the Jupiter side is: The gift of communicating individual insight to the 
collective. Here is the gift of reaching out to the collective through assimilation. On the other side, we 
have: Motive driven assimilation for acceptance and protection from the collective. "I will be nice to 
them. I am not going to tell them what I know. I want them to like me. I don't want them to throw me out. 
A couple of years from now, maybe, when they really do accept me I'll tell them what I know." 

This is what usually happens with the fifth line and again, the nature of how somebody can express their 
individuality is almost exclusively conditioned by their culture, by their family environment when they 
were young, usually within the first seven years. The impact of how you are conditioned by the outside 
world when you are an individual child has enormous impact for the rest of your life, whether or not you 
are going to have the courage to be able to express your "I know", or whether you spend all of your time 
being concerned about being accepted by the society around you. 

The vast majority of individuality on this planet is more concerned about being accepted and not being 
rejected by the totality' than they are aboutestablishingi their knowing in the world. As you can see from 
this projected pressure from the outside, theigreatest'presswre on the individual is to assimilate. Once you 
have established the value of your knowing,, after that, you have to be like everybody else. 

23.6 Fusion 

When you come to the sixth line, to the end of the process, you come to this place of transition.. As we. 
have seen already, it is rare fop the sixth line to be actively involved in the process of the hexagram 
because it is so interested) in what is going on in the whole circuit. When you are dealing with the 
circuitry of Individuality,, yow are dealing with an emormously complex circuitry. The! moment-you are 
looking owl towards all of that circuitry, what you are really looking owl towards is: Is any knowing of 
value if: it does not lead) to m iutatiomt This is the! nature of the sixth line here.. In order for knowing to 
lead to mutation, this is; a process that comes out of bringing the diversity into synthesis, as a fusion. 

This line is. called Fusion. It says: The! gradual attunement of diversity through synthesis. The! first thing 
to recognize is that these are indiMidualb that will take the longest time to express their "I know." Built 
into them is a genetic recognition that each knowing is a block that eventually )builds a structure a this is 
the channel of Structuring) in which the! knowing is so clear that the! mutation is then possible. 

Mars exalted. The exponential growth of energy and its power of assertion engendered by fusion. In the 
white book: Individual knowing which brings diversity through synthesis. But that takes time. These are 
not the kind of knowers that jump up and say, "I know, I know." There is this sense of knowing in them, 
but there is also this sense that the knowing is not complete. Knowing is about knowing who you are and 
why you are. That is the core of knowing. For the individual, that is the essence for them. That is a 
complex process because you have to live long enough to be able to get some kind of an impression of 
what it is to be in this world, in your own life. 

Jupiter in detriment. The principled but futile withdrawal from fusion that leads to atrophy. This is the 
sixth line saying, "I know a lot of things but I don't know what I really need to know and I have had 
enough. It is not possible. How can I find that knowing that will lead to mutation? I have been going 
through all of these knowings and I don't know how all of that can fit together." 

Individual knowing that holds on to diversity and loses its power in expression. The sixth line can only 
express a knowing that is mutative. Otherwise, it is not really going to bother. Of course, as a child, it will 
go through the "I know, I know" process, like all children that are individual in terms of the mental or 
throat process, but the reality is that, as they mature in life, they are going to hold back more and more 
and more until they have that opportunity to see the synthetic knowing. If not, they'll wait. We have been 
looking at how sixth lines move to the next hexagram. We saw how the abstract shifts over to the logic 
and how the logic jumps back over to the abstract, and here, in this individual process, we have this 
remarkable movement. VWte have this movement that goes from the 23.6 to the 8.1. 

The 8.1 is the very next hexagram and it is the mirror to the 23 because it is out of the 8 that its potential 
contribution can be made to society, not at a mental level, but in terms of identity and direction. 

HEXAGRAM 24 RETURNING 

Here, we have the individual acoustic process in the center. The individual mind resonates both to the 
splenic side, the awareness wave, and the emotional wave and it is always all over the place in time. It is 
not simply in the now. There is only one gate that is existential, the 20th gate, and even that is relative. 
The now is something that does not last very long. 

We are dealing with the relative present when we are dealing with individuality and that present is always 
both reflecting on what is past and projecting on what is in the future. But it is not doing this visually. 

This is an acoustic process and it has to do with what has been taken in, in terms of what has been heard. 
Part of what we hear, we hear very accurately in the now and other parts of what we hear, we don't hear 
well at all. We hear in waves. This means that we only remember parts of what has been said, not all of it. 

When you are dealing with the nature of the individual, you are dealing with the dilemma of knowing. To 
know what you can know, to know what you can know but what is not important for you to know, and to 
know what is unknowable. If you cannot distinguish between those three, you will never find silence in 
your mind. That is the one thing the individual mind is looking for: silence. In the same way that the 
abstract mind does not want any bad, old movies anymore, the individual mind would just like to have 
silence, quiet in there. 

We are looking at the channel of Awareness, a design of a thinker, and Returning, the gate of 
Rationalization: the awareness to struggle for knowing or mot. This is the whole thing. Can. it be known? 
This goes back to the: 28/38, the channel of Struggle, amd the 28, the fear of death.. Is it really 
worthwhile?' 16 life of value? Is itworth it? Its it something that can be known amd, if so, does it deserve 
struggle? Is itworthwhile to really know it? You can become a nudear physicist but it-does not mean that 
it is worthwhile for you to have that kind of knowledge. 

It is just not about recognizing what is knowable. It is about whether you should struggle for that 
kmowimg or not. The. awareness potential is the relentlessness, of the unresolved thinking. The return: 
you go back again and again because! yow cani t resolve it and,, until you can resolve it, you will not 
have silence. You have to resolve whether it is knowable, whether it is worth knowing and worth 
struggling for. 

Abowei the lines; it says:: The natural and spontaneous process of translorntwtufon and renewal. It is the 
pulse. One moment it is not there and the next moment you can know it. 

24.1 The Sin of omission 

First line, foundation: The. sin of omission. Transformation that requires retrogressive periods before 
renewal can take place. Sun exalted. The will to triumph and in this case the faith thatthe end jusfihes the 
means.. All of this is the result of inspiration. The 24 gets an inspiration and, as it says; in the white book: 
Inspiration that demands a reassessment of past thinking before a rational concept can be established. Is 
this really the knowing? Do I really know this? I have to go back and see if this is really correct. 

The Neptune in detriment. Self-delusion which unnaturally justifies periods of retrogression. In the white 
book: Inspiration that leads to an irrational focus on what is past. Everything about the individual is the 
potential for what is new. They live in a collective and tribal world and the whole thing for them is that 
they are always looking for the framework. "Is this something that I can make rational?" The only way to 
make it rational is: "What is it like?" so then they go back into their knowing system. "Is it like this or like 
this? Is it really different?" 

The whole foundation of the knowing process is to eliminate what is not original because the moment that 
you see that it is something from the past, the moment that you can reference it, is the moment you put it 
aside. 

The whole thing about the individual mind is that it has to generate something new. It is not there to 
produce something that is old. For example, you are working on a piece of music and you have a tune that 
is running through your head and you think, "I just came up with a nice tune. That is my tune." If you 
have the first line, there is immediately this, "Wait a minute, let's check it out. Is it really my tune? Did I 
hear this somewhere else before? Is it like another song that I heard?" In the detriment, you get so focused 
in that that you never sing your own tune because you are constantly going back and trying to figure out: 
"Did I borrow this from somebody? Did somebody influence me with this? Is it really mine?" If it is not 
really theirs, they cannot keep it. 

24.2 Recognition 

This line has no introspection. So, here we have Recognition. The Moon exalted. The proper and 
spontaneous adaptation to new forms. "I have this new melody." There is no checking in this line. Mars in 
detriment. The vanity to see transformation as a personal achievement rather than a socially supported or 
natural phenomenon. 

What you have here is: The potential gift of conceptualizing spontaneously. "I have this new melody." 
Because there is no introspection and because you just project that out, somebody will say to you, "That is 
not new." That is a big crash for the 24.2's. "What do you mean? It is my melody." "That song was 
recorded in 1972. I have it at home. This song of yours is plagiarism." All second lines get into trouble 
because they are always projecting, without the introspection to go with it. 

On the other side: The mental vanity that such a gift can produce. "I don't care what you say. It is my 
melody. I know that it is mine." 

24.3 The Addict 

This is the line of adaptation. Here, the resonance from both the emotional side and the splenic side is 
bonds made and broken. This becomes very difficult. It becomes a hooking into and a snapping out of the 
knowing process. This can be very difficult because, after all, this gate is called Returning. It is about 
going through the process of figuring out what is knowable, what you can know, and what is worth 
knowing. 

This line is called The Addict. The powerful attraction of regressive forms. Venus exalted. The ultimate 
though difficult triumph over regression. Jupiter in detriment. Addiction and regression legitimized by 
success. 

The third line has the capacity to reach out to the other side, though it can be very irresponsible in the way 
it does that. The 24.3 wants the 61. That is all. It keeps on hooking into the inspiration of the 61 and then 
breaks the bond with the inspiration. After a while, this becomes very irrational because there is no real 
work at making it rational. It is irresponsible, after all. It does not matter whether that "I know" is 
knowable or not. "I know the name of God." That can bring a lot of success to somebody. "I am the son of 
God. I will tell you about it." It is irrational because we cannot know that name. At the same time, success 
can legitimize that kind of illusion. "I know what is unknowable." That can be something that gets 
justified by success. 

These individuals have an enormously difficult time because when you meet a 24.3 and if they do get to 
the throat naturally through the 43/23, their ability to explain themselves is deeply limited and they end 
up sounding like abstract people. They end up asking you to believe them. They are just interested in the 
constant flow of inspiration. They are looking for the other side and they try to rationalize it for a moment 
and then they go over to the next thing. They can be very good at debunking people. When they are 
mature, they can recognize false knowers. They are very valuable for that. They know who is just making 
a show to get other people's attention. 

24.4 The Hermit 

The externalization process in this line is the most anti-social of all mental processes. The individual's 
primary goal is to preserve its integrity. The individual mind is not there to be influenced. That is why it 
is so obsessed with checking whether it has been influenced or not. It is there to be original and mutative 
as a force. When you get to the line of The Hermit, the fixedness of this line is, "Don't influence me." It is 
always trying to keep influences away and tends to be the kind of mind that works best when it is alone. 

Transformation that can only take place in isolation. Saturn exalted. The discipline and focus that assures 
renewal. Neptune in detriment. The tendency in isolation to live in a fantasy world. That living in a 
fantasy world is not a negative. It can be deeply creative. 

Aloneness enriches the potential for rational thought; and Aloneness encourages the potential of illusion 
or delusion. Aloneness is a keynote here. They are fixed on being alone. The only way that you can get to 
these people is through the brotherhood/sisterhood, through kindness that can end up as meanness. After a 
long time, they may tell you what they know and they may listen to what you say. For them to be able to 
come to a rational point in their process, they need to be alone. I always tell these people the same thing. 
"Be alone. Work out your knowing alone." 

24.5 Confession 

The fifth line is the penultimate of a hexagram. It is the part of the hexagram that is the universal element 
of whether the nature of the hexagram is really there to go into the world. 

Confession. The courage to admit the mistakes of the past. One thing to recognize about the nature of 
knowers is that what the knower knows at any given moment can mutate and a new knowing can replace 
it. That is either a natural process that is taken in stride, the knower getting a new knowing, or it can 
become full of all kinds of problems psychically: "I know this now but the reason that I did not know it 
before is that I had a problem before with this person. I was not trained properly. I was not given enough 
information." 

Moon exalted. The practical value of starting with a clean slate, symbolized by the new Moon. Mars in 
detriment. The tendency to try to minimize past mistakes through rationalization, turning confession into 
justification. The most important thing for a knower is to be able to say, "I made a mistake. I did not 
know. I thought I knew but I didn't. Now I know." This is very, very important for the knowing process. 
This is part of what the seduction is. 

The nature of this confession is: Rational correction that opens the way to new possibilities. "I did not 
know before but now I know." Now there is a new possibility that is waiting. 

On the other side: Irrational justification of past mistakes. Because the knower is always trying to attract 
attention, they always put their knowing out there. They come and tell you something and two weeks 

later, they come back to you and say, "This is wrong." Then they make up all these excuses why they did 
not know it in the first place. This can become obsessive. That knowing can be transformed. 

The moment that there is mutation, there is a new knowing that comes along. This is a natural process but 
it means that at the heart of every knower is the capacity to confess. This says a great deal about the fact 
that in the 20/10 and the 25/51, which are both mystical channels that are part of the individuality process, 
there is a need to confess that they did not know. I know; I have been in that process myself. I was an 
enormously arrogant man who denied all kinds of mystical and supernatural phenomena. I did not only 
debunk it, I defamed it. The reality is that I had to confess to myself that I did not know. I was ignorant. 
Now I know. Now I have a new possibility. 

This is one of the important things in the process of an individual: to accept that one did not know. Think 
about the resonance: the second line goes out and says, "I have a new melody." This fifth line will go out 
and say, "You were right. I made a mistake. It was not my melody. It was that old melody you told me 
about." This is what makes the knower acceptable. The moment that the knower cannot make the 
confession of not knowing, they are no longer acceptable. They will no longer be tolerated and these are 
the individuals that will really get hurt by the outside, being alienated from the outside. They will really 
be the freaks that get rejected. By the way, the fifth line of the abstract mind was The Saint, and here we 
have the Confession. 

24.6 The Gift Horse 

The sixth line is the line of transition which is moving towards the next step, to the 2. 1 , where the driver 
is. It goes directly into an individual process. 

This is the recognition of what is sterile and what is not. The Gift horse. The possibility of being deaf 
when opportunity knocks. For the sixth line, it is not important whether it can know something or not, or 
know something which is knowable or unknowable. What is important here is mutation. It is the only 
thing that is important to the sixth line. Mutation here goes directly to the magnetic monopole (from the 
24.6 to the 2.1). It goes directly to direction, to bringing the mutation out as a direction for life and the 
possibility is that they are going be deaf. They won't hear it. 

Jupiter exalted. The conscious participation in a process that prepares one for easy identification of 
opportunity. The other side is: Innate suspicion which leads inevitably to lost opportunities. The 24.6 can 
always work on the knowing and thus, they can be very good thinkers. None of that thinking is of any 
value to them unless there is something inside of them that says, "Aha, this can lead to mutation." Often, 
they look like they are missing something, that they do not really see it. The fact is: they do. They just 
know if something will not get to mutation. When I say they know that, remember that they may know in 
that moment and it may not be so, but nonetheless that is their knowing. 

Identification and focus with the rational thought process; or Ohen irrational suspicion that distorts the 
focus and can lead to missed opportunities. The suspicion is about whether the knowing will mutate. It is 
just not about whether it can be known. These are deep knowers. They are very clear people. What they 
are concerned about is the only thing that will make it worthwhile. Remember the 28.6, Blaze of glory. 
You can be suicidal in that. The only thing that makes it worthwhile, the only thing worth knowing is 
something that is really leading to mutation and a new direction. If they don't get it in their lives, they can 
be very depressed, constantly ignoring opportunities that are brought to them and of course, the moment 
that you see a line that talks about missed opportunities, you know it means that they have all kinds of 
opportunities in their life. Opportunities will always come. 

The nature in this sixth line is that it is looking for the mutation. What I tell these people is that only the 
things that they do click to are the things that are of value to them. I tell them not to worry about all those 
missed opportunities. They do. This is Returning. They go back and say, "Maybe that one could have 
mutated." 

There is a resonance here to the third line, The Addict. The addict gets an enormous amount of 
inspiration. They are always sucking it in and then they break the bond. What happens to the sixth line is 
that, early in their life, they jump a lot. They can because they know. They jump a lot and discover very 
quickly that it is not easy to get things into mutation. That leads them to take their distance. Once they 
have been burnt, they really back off and wait for their opportunity, for the one that really does it for 
them. 

HEXAGRAM 25 INNOCENCE 

We discussed the collective gates of love (see the discussion in the 15th gate and in the 46th gate) and I 
hope that the impression that you were left with is not about the way in which love is externalized, but 
internalized. Everything about the love rooted in the ego or the love rooted in electro-magnetic 
connections is all about the externalization of love, but it has nothing to do with the Higher Self. It has 
nothing to do with our connection to the totality. That has to do with the internalization of love. We saw 
in the love of humanity that, rather than it being the cliche, 'Love thy neighbor', it is to be oneself and to 
allow everybody else to be themselves. That generates a healthy aura. 

When it comes to the physical body, the greatest dilemma that people have in their life is that most human 
beings don't like the body they were given. It does not mean just the aesthetic values of the body. It has to 
do with what seem to be the potentials of that body, whether it is the nature of the brain, the type of 
metabolism, the shapes or the sizes, and it has to do with the fact that the body is a burden. 

In order for the body to be healthy, the experience of being in the body has to be accepted without 
question. That is the nature of what it is to love oneself in terms of loving what it is to be in the body: to 
love the flesh. To love the flesh is to accept that what one is and what one has is exactly what one is 
supposed to have and exactly the right thing for one's karma, for one's geometry in this life, and that the 
only way in which you are healthy is if you surrender to life. That is what the 46 is all about. It is about 
surrendering to life. 

The 44 is part of the mechanism that is rooted in the 46. That is, these splenic gates are guided by its 
prime gate 46, to surrender to what it is to be alive. The first thing to recognize about collective love is 
that it is not what you think that is. It is collective only in the sense that it becomes love in the world out 
of the collective, but out of each and every single one of the collective. Again, see clearly that the two
