collective gates of love are directly opposite two individual gates of love and this individual process, 
because we are individuated beings, is at the core of our experience. So it is not about one's capacities to 
bring love out into the world, it is about the inside. It is about accepting what it is to be oneself. 

The 25th gate is very complex because it is part of the centering circuit and therefore, it is an essential 
ingredient in turning everything towards individuality. The centering circuit, like the defense circuit, is a 
minor circuit. Minor circuits can always be added, or their influence can always be connected, to any 
other circuit. So the centering circuit, whenever it is present, always brings things towards their 
individuality. That is the first thing. 

The second thing about the 25th gate: you can see that the gates of love are constructed out of circuitry 
that is both individual and collective, and there is no tribal possibility. The tribal possibility to connect to 
love is through the 51/25. So the 25 not only represents a capacity to express love for the individual, it is 
also at the heart of how the love of self is available to the tribe as well. More than that, the 25th gate has a 
highly mystical value which we will not deal with here. It is not possible to teach the mystical value of 
any of these gates without really understanding that the structure of the hexagram has to be seen 
differently. The mundane values of the 25th gate are what I will deal with here. 

Above the lines it says: The perfection of action through an uncontrived and spontaneous nature. 'The 
perfection...' Perfection is not a word you find very often, particularly in the Rave I'Ching. '...of action...' 
Right away there should be an enormous question in your head: what the hell has action to do with the 
25th gate? The 25th gate is part of the G center and is not connected to a motor, '...through an 
uncontrived...' Not motivated, not made up, not predetermined; not worked out. '...and spontaneous 
nature.' Nature is a word that is specifically related to the 10th gate. The 25th gate and the 10th gate have 

a deep connection to each other because they are both about a possibility of centering the nature of 
humanity, that is, centering the behavior of the individual so that the individual can survive in the world. 

25.1 Selflessness 

The first line always gives you the foundation. This first line in particular is something that is very 
profound and, when you get into its deepest levels, you really begin to recognize the nature of what 
universal love is all about. The first line is called Selflessness. Here we are in the self. 

The 25 is pointed towards the most dynamic willpower in the body. It is pointed towards the deepest 
sense of ego power because the will in the 51 is an enormous thing, and that will is deeply possessive. "I 
am the power," says the 51, and the 25 says, "No, the power exists." The 25 is selfless in the sense that it 
is not going to claim ego power. The 51 says "I am the jumper," and the 25 says "There is only the jump." 
There is no claim, no possessiveness here. One cannot possess the universe. Motiveless action. 

Here, we come to a very important impact in the genetic continuity of the global program because, in the 
25.1 and the 25.3, we have lines that are impacted by the fact that neither Neptune nor Pluto has been in 
Aries for a very long time. The 25/51 is an Arian channel and both Pluto and Neptune have been far away 
from being able to activate this channel of Initiation for many years. (Please see the section on Outer 
Planet Transits in the Glossary in Volume 2.) 

The first thing to recognize about Selflessness is that the overview is motiveless action. It is something 
that has to be learned. It is an overview. We are all conditioned to be motivated, all of us. We are 
conditioned to have a motive. If you do this, you get that. We are always conditioned by motivation. 
Neptune exalted. The universalization of activity. Psychic attunement that is its own reward. This line 
does not exist in the world. Neptune will get there in about 30 years, probably around the time that the 
cycle changes (2027). Pluto will be in Aries in 2080. 

What we have is the Mercury in detriment. It is the only thing that is active in the first line and remember 
that this is the foundation. This is the foundation of what selflessness is in our age. It is: A tendency to 
publicize one's selflessness. Mother Teresa, Princess Diana, all this propaganda about how selfless one is. 
It is not enough to be a quiet philanthropist. Everyone has to blow their philanthropic horn. That is, 
everybody is making a claim about their selflessness. "Look how selfless I am. Look, I have no motive. I 
am just a wonderful person." 

In the white book: The potential for centering through attunement to challenges. That does not exist. We 
don't have that. There will be a generation born with it some day, but what we are dealing with now is: 
The insecurity of the Self manifested in times of challenge. That is very productive for us. We live in an 
era where the Self is insecure and so we have an enormous movement throughout the world that people 
try to secure their identity. "Who am I? What am I? Where am I? Is there a motive? Is only God great?" 
You can see that the detriment here is one of the keys to the revival of fundamentalism and theocracies in 
the world, this lack of identity being imprinted by old religious symbols onto people. 

The insecurity of the Self manifested in times of challenge. Challenge is a keynote for the channel. That 
is, the competitiveness that lies in initiation always has to deal with the challenge of the ego that must be 
met. What happens here in the challenge from the ego is that the selflessness is there, but it always has to 
be expressed because there is uncertainty about the quality of identity. In other words, the identity is not 
strong enough just to be silently motiveless, that identity has to be able to say, "Look what I have done. 
Ain't I terrific? I hope that they are going to make me a saint." 

This is lower trigram, so it does not know that the 51 and its power is there. It can be quite shocking, 
obviously, to meet that and the spirit of the Self is always challenged by that shock. So, the first thing to 
recognize is that we live in a time in which the global identity is very weak, because this is the foundation 
of the Self in our era. "Please, Master, tell me who I am." During the transit of Mercury, we may discover 
what selflessness is, which means to recognize the motives that are at the root of our actions. It may seem 
selfless, but in reality is not. 

25.2 The Existentialist 

In these gates of love, we will see that we have certain lines which are unusual in their performance or 
values. This second line is particularly so. It embodies the nature of what innocence really is. Innocence is 
only possible existentially. There is no other way to be innocent. Following what we have seen about 
collective love, that collective love is rooted in being oneself: selflessness, motivelessness, is rooted in the 
now. Only in the now is one free of guile. 

The Existentialist. Devotion and dedication to the now. Like all lower trigrams, the motivelessness is only 
broken by the other side stepping in because this is the nature of the hexagram. The motivelessness is 
there naturally - it is only broken by the other side stepping in. In this moment, what has been motiveless 
and selfless can take on another nature. When somebody says to you, "You are so selfless," that is the 
moment that your selflessness begins to disappear. 

Mercury exalted. The perfection of the intellect through concentration and focus on what is, rather than on 
what could be or has been. If you look inside the 25.2, you see somebody who is just in the now. They 
don't know why they are doing the things that they do. They are just there in that process. This does not 
mean that that is intellectual, or that they have that intellectual capacity. That is, some will and some 
won't. It will depend on their design and on whom they meet. But the fact of the matter is that the longer 
the 25.2 is allowed to be in its motivelessness, the more it will come to recognize ultimately, at the 
intellectual level, what it means to be surrendered. Again, this is the nature of what universal love is all 
about. Universal love is the acceptance that we are helpless in all of this and that all you can do is to not 
interfere but be right there in the now. 

On the other side, Mars in detriment, which by its very nature is immature. A dedication that can never be 
free of personal motivation and its attendant projections. This is because of others. This is the moment 
where the 25.2 is seen by somebody for what they are. "Oh, you have been so motiveless, so selfless, but 
really, you should be rewarded." It is not that they just do this for nothing. They don't even know what 
they are doing. 

They are just in it, but the outside force is going to come on them and because of that, this projection 
comes in. With projection, there is this mixing of terms where, all of a sudden, the individual, like the 
abstract, is suddenly trying to figure out what the pattern is going to be. "If I stay selfless, I will become a 
saint." That can only come from the outside coming in. 

In the white book: The innocence of the Self and its protection can only be maintained in the now. 
Because this is an overview line, these people are pulled out of the now all the time. When they are pulled 
out of the now, they are shocked. Often it is projected on them that they had a motive all along, but they 
did not. 

The whole thing to see is that the love that can be generated out of these gates is what has been generated 
for the benefit of the totality. It comes out of the individual, but it is there for the global whole. This 25.2 
is a very beautiful motivelessness but, of course, it has to meet the world and because it is not equipped to 
deal with the world, it can end up losing its innocence, which means it loses its existential nature. 

After all, regardless of the perspective of the driver, whether we are looking forward out of the window, 
or whether we look backwards in the mirror or whether we are just simply there, we are all in the present 
together. \% are all in the now of the experience together and the world is fundamentally existential, 
whether we like it or not. The only way to be is to be in the now, whether we can or not, because we 
simply are, regardless of our illusion. 

25.3 Sensibility 

The trial and error line is a deeply mystical line and, as such, it has quite a different value, in a way, at the 
mystical level. It is an overview line. Sensibility. The recognition that innocent action does not in itself 
guarantees success. This is not the 46. In my work with people, because I am somebody with the 25.3 and 
the 51, I keep on reminding them that life is not about being happy. It is not about being successful. It is 
not about any of those things because all of those things carry with them expectations, motivations and 
rewards. It is simply about living your life; that is all. 

One of the things that you learn in the 46th gate is that if you do live out your nature, you can be lucky. 
That is, good things can come to you as well as bad things. But at least those things belong to you. So, 
innocent action, being innocent, does not mean that life will be a success. By being existential, that does 
not mean necessarily that you are going to be happy or sad. 

Remember that this is individual and individual is melancholic and melancholy is about happy and/or sad. 
It does not mean that life is going to be wonderful just because you are innocent. It can be a horror. There 
are so many human beings in the world that are forced to live existentially and live at the edge of society, 
moment by moment by moment. It can be a very unpleasant thing. Nonetheless, by living existentially, 
one opens up the possibility for universal love in the world. This is the real surrender. Not "my will be 
done," but "thy will be done." This is just to be here in the wave. 

The nature of this line: this is a very profound line for our time because it is an indication that we live in 
an era, up until 2080, in which it is really possible for us to transcend trial and error and reach wisdom. 
The reason for that is that we do not have the detriment in this line. 

Pluto in detriment. The potential loss of innocence through misfortune that in the extreme can manifest 
from crime to suicide. Jiirgen and I went looking back to the era where Pluto was in Aries and was 
activating this line. We looked for famous people. There were none. The only thing that we could find for 
that date is the Brazilian Republic which I think lasted two years. Around this time, in 1820, we had the 
growth of prisons. This was a direct result of Pluto being in the 25.3. 

By the way, I want to add to my comment about the ego in this line in terms, of doing analysis for people. 
If -you see somebody with a 25.3 who has an open ego, it does not work the same way. The 25.3 without 
the power of the ego to be able to withstand the shock is going to have problems with its innocence. It 
will get through because of the inactive Plutonic side, but the fact is that the ego is mentioned in Ibis way 
here. It is essential to understand that a strong ego is something very important in that kind of 
configuration. We live in pan era in which the shattering of innocence does not (lead to failure and crime, 
does not lead to abuse, but does lead 'to what is always present in the 25th gate, which is (blood. This is 
the gate of blood. This is the gate of the spirit of the life, the spiriit in the blood. 

What we have instead of this Pk*omic detriment is a Mars exalted. 'The power of the ,Ego... Right away, 
we have something interesting here because -we have been seeing -all along that whenever the ego is 
imemtiomed, we get to see a detrimental impact on the nature of the Self. In other words, we get to see 
the Self trying to be possessive and claim something, instead of just accepting the nature of what is. But 

here we have something very different: Mars exalted and particularly at its best in this sense. (Mars is 
exalted in Aries anyway.) ... to withstand failure and still maintain its nature. 

In my work, I have analyzed all kinds of things in the nature of my life and obviously, I paid a lot of 
attention to imy experience with the Voice and the mechanisms at work. There is no question for me that 
my survival of that was rooted in the fact that I have the 25.3, one of the many things that kept me alive in 
that experience so that I was not destroyed. The fact that there was no Pluto there. The fact that there was 
no possibility of that really becoming not only shattered by the experience, but criminal. 

With the knowledge that I was given, I could have stayed secretly a black magician. I still could. The 
knowledge that I was given, the things that I was told that I could do, the things that were possible with 
the knowledge that was given to me; but I do not live in a Plutonic age where that criminality is 
something possible, out of that shattering in the trial and error. 

Remember that the third line does not know that there is something on the other side. It is not 
transpersonal. It is different when you have the whole channel. That is what Initiation is all about. It is 
about the recognition of that. But the fact is that the third line, by itself, does not know that. 
In the white book: The power of the spirit to withstand failure and shock. Failure in its motiveless action: 
in other words, that motiveless action suddenly is something that just falls apart. All right, that motiveless 
action has to meet a more powerful force and is shocked. All right, it will find a way to maintain its 
innocence, regardless of that. 

25.4 Survival 

The 46.4 is an exalted fourth line. It is the line of Impact. This 25.4 is its polarity; it is exactly opposite 
the 46.4, and it is one of the most exalted lines that we are going to find. It is one these rare lines that has 
a double exaltation, like in the 11.4. So you notice that in fourth lines, there are some very important 
attributes simply because fourth lines can have a great deal of influence because they are one-tracked and 
fixed on their process and they are transpersonal. Remember that this is the only gate of the Self pointed 
to the ego and the relationship between the Self and the ego is one of the most important within our 
vehicle. So, when you have a transpersonal line in the 25th gate, this 25.4 knows the ego on the other 
side, knows what that ego is and what its power presents, and in that sense, it has the capacity over time. 

This is an overview line: The nature of true innocence can be maintained regardless of circumstances. The 
nature of true motivelessness. Here are people that are fixed (this is the harmony to the first line) and one- 
tracked in their selflessness and, of course, this is the great exaltation. Again, because of the overview 
line, you do not start off that way. 

Venus exalted. The beauty of the rose in the garbage dump. One of my favorite lines in the Rave I Ching: 
the beauty of the rose in the garbage dump, just for what it is. The manifestation, the one-trackedness, of 
innocence can exist in any kind of decadence. It makes no difference. 

In the white book: The spiritual warrior, the innocence maintained regardless of circumstances. Jupiter is 
also exalted. What you have is that Venus establishes our basic morals and Jupiter writes the law. The two 
of them together establish the framework of how societies and communities function. These two together 
in this line, and we find them together in the fifth line again, is a very important connection. Whenever 
you see Venus and Jupiter together in a line you know that is has a very strong impact on the way society 
sees and functions. The highest principles even amongst the greatest decadence. There is no significant 
difference in this language. 

There is no planet in detriment. What we have here is not only a fourth line that is by its very nature fixed 
and onetracked, but by the nature of the line itself is fixed and one -tracked. There is only exaltation. 
There is only this ability to maintain innocence regardless of the circumstance. A very beautiful line. 

The wonderful thing about being one -tracked is if it stays on the track, it will arrive, like a train when it is 
on the track: it will arrive. That is a security. The whole thing about being one -pointed when you are here 
in an existentialist line is that, no matter what happens to you, you are always remaining existentialist; 
that is the value here. 

25.5 Recuperation 

It is a very strange line. If the 46.5 is the weakest of the fifth lines, well, the 25.5 is not far behind. That is, 
this is a line that is weak for a reason, in the sense that the only time that most human beings are 
existential is when they are sick. Think about that. Think about the last time that you were ill. You were 
right there in the sickness. You can't escape it. It is unpleasant. You don't like it. It does not allow you to 
focus on the future. It does not really allow you to reflect on the past. It just keeps you stuck at being sick 
and, in being sick, you are in the now and, in being in the now, you are finally being yourself. 

Most human beings never come to themselves until they are sick. They do not come to themselves until 
they are sick because the sickness that they have is because they are not themselves in the first place. 
Because of that, in trying to heal themselves of that sickness, they are actually trying to come back to 
themselves, without understanding it. The moment that somebody recovers from an illness is a moment 
that they can start again to be themselves. 

Of course, they immediately go out and take on the same kind of conditioning again and get sick again. 
When they get sick again, they get thrown into the existential plane again, so they heal themselves on the 
existential level. There is no other way to heal other than in the now because you know that you can't get 
out until you are better. There is nothing you can do but be there. 

So, this is a very strange line. It is a great line of projection. Everybody is lo8king to that fifth line and 
projecting onto that innocence and motivelessness. "You are the innocent one. You are the motiveless 
one. You have the spirit that I, or humanity, could use." The now is about being healthy. 

Recuperation. When innocence is sapped of its vitality, healing... (This is the only line that speaks of 
healing.) ... is the first priority. When somebody projects onto you, remember the harmony to the second 
line and the problems with being brought to a place of motivation by others; here it is even stronger. What 
you have here is other people wanting to project onto your innocence, wanting your innocence to be their 
spirit. That takes strength away and, in taking vitality away, it takes away the vitality to be innocent in the 
now, and the only way that you can avoid that is to withdraw. 

Venus exalted. The ability to recognize the inner meaning of an affliction and to withdraw until it is 
healed. In the white book: The power of the spirit to heal and be healed. Only when you are in the now, 
only when you are being in the experience of your body, only when you are accepting your rhythm are 
you healthy. 

The mystery of this line is that healing oneself is about withdrawal from conditioning. This is what 
healing is about: to withdraw from conditioning and to heal the conditioners. Jupiter in detriment. 
Hypochondria and the need to be healed by others. This is something very important to understand. The 
moment that your innocence is sapped of its vitality and the moment that somebody is projecting onto 
your spirit, in that moment, you take in their conditioning and in the moment that you go for their 

conditioning, you become the sick one and they have to heal you. They, of course, heal you with what 
does not belong to you and so you stay the sick one. 

It is so important to understand what healing is really all about, that there is no need for anyone to be 
healed as long as they are not taken away from their nature. The moment innocence is sapped of its 
vitality, disease is in the world. So what that means is that as long as we are not being innocent, as long as 
we are not being what we are, we create disease, we create illness, and it is a self-serving process. 

After all, disease is one of the greatest employers in the world: hospitals, doctors, homeopaths, medicines, 
factories, recuperations, spas, healers. All of that comes back to the same thing. Universal love is getting 
down and realizing, "Hey, it is not up to me. All I have to do is to accept what it is to be me and I am 
going to be fine. But the moment I try to be something else, the moment I try to accept the conditioning to 
be something else, is the moment that I bring sickness into the world." 

If you don't live out your rhythm, you take love away from the world. If you don't live in your body and 
accept what it is to live in your body, you take away the capacity for success for humanity. The moment 
that you do not live selflessly, motiveless, you bring disease into the world. 

In the white book: The weakness of the spirit which requires healing from others. The fifth line is the line 
of priesthood and doctors. It is the priesthood of the healing shaman. It is the priesthood of blame, the 
blame that says, "You are sick because of this or that." That is both positive and negative. In other words, 
sometimes it is the truth and sometimes it is sheer nonsense. This is one of the ways to try to find out how 
we can be healthy. One of the things you will find about 25.5's is that they tend to be sickly. 

25.6 Ignorance 

Like any of these sixth lines we are dealing with, it is something that is outside of the basic nature of a 
hexagram. It is withdrawn from it. It is sitting above. Keep in mind that all of these sixth lines are going 
to flower soon. That is, when we step into the next cycle in 2027 and we are living in a sixth line- instead 
of a first line-theme, this is going to be the flowering of that: the opening up of the emotional spirit 
through the 55.6 and the beginning of a process in which sixth lines are going to come into a different 
epoch and really be part of their time. So we are in a developmental process towards that time where sixth 
lines come down from their roof tops and get involved. 

Everything about the nature of the 25th gate started in the overview of the lines in the first place. It said: 
The perfection of action.... When you come to the 25.6, you are dealing with a line that has a deep 
perspective: it can look into the centering circuit. It can look into Integration. It can look into the whole 
individual process and, as such, its vision, its ideal, is enormous by comparison. In order for it to make a 
commitment to anything, it has to see that the value of mutation is there. Without mutation, motiveless 
action does not mean anything. The whole substance then becomes useless. What action? What is the 
action that requires us to be motiveless? What action is the perfection of motivelessness? 

I am not somebody who spends much time, since the last 10 or 15 years, with what other people think 
about the nature of what it is to be, but it is one of those extraordinary questions and so many great 
thinkers are trying to come up with a formula. For me, it is clear that I am choiceless. It is the only thing 
that I can see as the simplest way of discovering what it is to be. For me, here, in this sixth line, lies the 
possibility to recognize choicelessness and to see that action is not something that has to be contemplated, 
but action is something simply to be accepted, to be accepted without motive. 

Ignorance. False innocence betrayed by actions. The Earth exalted. The milder of a negative position, 
where inappropriate action is censured. These children find out very quickly that, no matter how innocent 

they are, if the actions are not right, they get to suffer a great deal and they become very careful, later in 
their life, about what kind of action they engage in, to the point that they do not engage in action at all. 

Uranus in detriment. Constant inappropriate and destabilizing actions whose very counter-productiveness 
strips away the facade of innocence. It is not enough to be motiveless in one's spirit. One's actions have to 
be pure and unmotivated. They simply have to be a by-product of being. 

In the white book: The loss of innocence through inappropriate action, or Constant inappropriate action in 
times of challenge that can break the spirit. The 25.6 goes to the 17.1, which is all about collecting 
endless amounts of opinions. It is an openness to all kinds of stimuli. In other words: what has the 25.6 to 
do? My god, there are a lot of actions in the world. There are so many different ways, different formulas. 
The 17th gate is the great gate of organizing humanity. That is what it is there for. It comes back to the 
question of: what is innocence? The 25.6 can always look at the activities of others and they see clearly 
whether they are motivated or innocent. It can always tell. It has quite a gift in that sense. But for itself, it 
is a very difficult process. Only when they see that action can be motiveless, only then it is possible for 
them. It has to be concretized in their opinion. In other words, they have to see its value to humanity. 
They have to see that it has a mutative quality. 

These people often have their innocence broken but fortunately for them, they do not have the harmony to 
the 3 in detriment because Pluto is not there, so they do not suffer deeply in their innocence being broken. 
They simply pull away and withdraw. Withdrawal is one of the secrets of the 25th gate. Somebody who 
only has the 25 has to learn to move themselves away from others. When I was giving name-groupings 
for various hexagrams and I was putting together the hexagrams of aloneness (the 12, 33, 40)1 was very 
tempted to add the 25. I did not because I thought it would confuse people. It is so important to 
understand that the 25th gate is only at its best when it is alone because then it is innocent. 

Limitation is everything for humanity. Limitation (the 60th gate, part of the individual circuitry) says that 
there is a structure for everything. The only thing to recognize is the structure. Once you understand the 
nature of structure, then you can find a way to see that whatever moves through that structure will be a 
polarity, a binary like everything else in 

life, but the structure is the framework. The framework for a 25, the structure, in the language of 
individuality in the 43/ 23, is that when innocence is sapped of vitality, withdraw. Withdrawal means so 
much to innocence because it brings one back to the self. 

This is being in the cave, all by themselves. All that they say is, "I am now." They are pure innocence. 
Withdrawal and aloneness have enormous value to the 25. The 25.6 is great at being a fool on the hill, 
totally away from everything and quite common, in this day and age, watching television. Their favorite 
line then is, "look at that phony." 

HEXAGRAM 26 THE TAMING POWER OF THE GREAT 

We go from the small will (the 40) to the small ego. The small willpower in the 40 leads into the big 
willpower in the 51 and the small ego in the 26 crosses over to the 21, the big ego. Here we deal with the 
small ego. In sexual terminology, both the 40 and the 26 are gates of denial. They are fundamentally 
weak. That is why they need their rest. 

Think about the 26. We know that the instinctive side of tribal circuitry has to do with our organizational 
groupings on the material plane, our work culture. The 26th gate is the gate of the marketing manager or 
the sales person. One of the things that are so clear about the 26 is that while everybody else in the factory 
is working really hard and struggling to get the products out on time, on a deadline, administrating the 
organization and keeping the company happy, the 26 is on the golf course. It is playing golf and not doing 
its business. 

Please recognize that the ego cannot work the way in which everybody else who needs the ego wants it to 
work. Everybody wants the ego to be like the root center or the sacral center, but it is not. It is very 
different. 

I have told students of mine before, in the Gray courses, that one of the cute little mysteries of our design 
is that there is no direct connection between the ego and the sacral center. It there was one, we would not 
die. It is because the sacral center, with a direct connection to the ego, will stop the ego from being lazy 
and going to sleep. It just will. 

The moment the sacral has a direct connection to the ego, the ego would not be allowed to say, "I am a 
motor but I am not working today." Only the ego can do that because that is the kind of motor that the ego 
is. The difficulty that society has with the ego is the assumption that willpower has to operate like sacral 
power. It is not true. This is not a generator at all. 

Written above the lines it says: The maximization of the power of memory applied to the nurturing of 
continuity. The 26th gate is the gate of the egoist and it is the gate of exaggeration. The tribe expects to be 
exaggerated to. It is very important for the tribe. It likes that. This is the best refrigerator, the best car, the 
best country. Exaggeration is part of the way of getting the tribe to feel good. The 26th gate is the strength 
or lack of strength to apply memory. 

The whole thing to understand about the ego is that it is built on manipulation, and please do not think of 
this as a bad word. It is simply the ability to manipulate things. There are very few gates that are called 
'taming gates': The Taming Power of the Small (the 9th gate), to be able to take the broad spectrum of 
energy and to focus, tame it, to tame the root and its pressure by focusing it; and here, the capacity of the 
ego to manipulate instinctive memory. 

Because it is a small ego, it also must be massaged and, while everybody else is working so hard, the boss 
calls the salesman who is standing on the golf course with his cell phone. The boss asks, "Did you see the 
client?' Hoh, yes," says the 26. "Of course I did." That may or may not be true. The 26 may want to see 
that client, may think that they should see that client, but this is the ego and rest is important. 

"I really don't have the juice," says the 26. Only when the ego is understood for that nature can it be 
properly handled by 37's, 44's, 25's, or 45's. Until that is understood, there is only conflict with the ego. 

26.1 A Bird in the hand 

The first line establishes the foundation of what the hexagram is all about. Here we find A bird in the 
hand. The saying in English is, "A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush." In other words, it is really 
good to recognize what you have rather than trying to imagine what you could possibly get. This is one of 
the great lessons for the egoist. 

Neptune exalted. Whenever you see Neptune exalted in a first line you are allowed to shake your head 
and wonder. This is a foundation line and Neptune does not allow you to see anything. So the egoist never 
really gets into the foundation. They just sort of get confused about what it is to be them. 

The ability to enjoy the dreams engendered by accomplishment in order to avoid delusion of unlikely 
potential. Egoists make their living on what they can do. They make that living based on what they show 
they can and have done. The moment that the egoist goes out for the company and makes a sale, they can 
skate for weeks doing nothing, just floating along, feeling wonderful and living off that moment of 
accomplishment. "Did you see what I did? I did that. At any moment I could do it again, if I am in the 
mood. Treat me nice. Give me a good bonus. Allow me to go to the golf course." Meanwhile, everybody 
in the factory is sweating. 

Egos have a bad reputation for a reason. There are a lot of people dependent on the ego making the sale. 
If they do not make the sale, the people in the factory cannot make their living, the stockholders do not 
make any money, the boss gets fired. They are all sitting there waiting for the ego that is on the golf 
course. 

Mars in detriment. Accomplishment as a license for foolhardy risk taking. "I made that sale. Ain't I great? 
I will quit and see if I will get a better job," or "I should really be the boss of this company." 

The ego which transcends limitation through dreaming. This is one thing that is so wonderful about 
manipulation of memory. The 26 dreams of being a 21 because the 21 seems to be in control of 
everything and the 26 would love to be in control. "I am on the golf course four days a week. I work one 
day." What I tell 26's is that it is so important in their working life that they make sure they have enough 
leisure time because leisure time, vacations, are essential in order for them to be able to recuperate their 
energy. 

I know this so intensely in my personal life. I had Pluto defining my sacral center for seven years. It is 
gone now and I am back to being ruled by my ego and I know what that feels like. It is very different. The 
sacral pumps out the energy over and over. It is the ego that says, "Should I really do that? Maybe I'll just 
rest today. I have been able to achieve this and that. I don't have to do anything. Now I can escape for a 
while." That is what the ego does, so it can dream. The ego loves to dream. Let it accept what it has and 
let it go off dreaming about what is possible because it is the dream that sells. 

That is the gift of the 26 which it transmits to the tribe and, by doing so, it is able to bring the tribe the 
nourishment that it needs. That is the foundation. They are not very good at being handled. I am a 26.1, so 
whenever I would stop doing educational work when I was younger and got into business, it was always 
very clear to me that there was always somebody trying to put a finger on my time and my energy and my 
will. I am not very good at being handled. 

44's do the handling for the 26's. If the 44 does not know how to handle a 26, enormous problems will 
come into the organization. They simply do not function properly anymore. So this is interesting to 
recognize: you are dealing with a lower trigram and their commitment to society. It is a gate of denial. "I 
don't care about the people in the factory. I'll play golf today." This is not transpersonal. 

26.2 The Lessons of History 

When you come to the second line, you come to the situation where you can be seen. The 26 is not just 
the egoist, it is also the capacity to lie and to exaggerate: all of these things that are part of what is 
necessary to get information to the tribe. People look inside of the 26.2 and they see them as being either 
egoists or liars. These people are always being watched and they don't necessarily know that because 
second lines do not have that kind of capacity. What they say, whether it is an exaggeration or not, can be 
seen by others and, all of a sudden, they are paper tigers and suddenly meet somebody who says, "You 
said that." 

The lessons of history. The energy and depth of reflection to learn from the past in anticipation of the 
future. They learn that if you lie, then you'd better have a very good memory because, otherwise, you will 
get caught. 'Oh, entangled webs we weave, would first we practiced to deceive.' You will have to have a 
good memory. This is what they learn. They don't think anybody is listening to them. "I have caught this 
huge fish last night. It was an incredible thing. " The next day, their partner asks and it turns out that it was 
not true and they don't even remember because they do not think that anybody has actually listened to all 
that. But they are listened to because they can be seen as being an exaggerator, or being an egoist. 

Pluto in detriment. The urge to take action despite the evidence of history. To try to continue with your 
manipulation even when you have been found out. The whole thing about second lines is: they get found 
out. That is not bad because if they get found out enough, they can end up being the best liars and, by the 
way, being a liar is not bad. It depends on what you are lying about. By telling somebody, "This is the 
best refrigerator that has ever been made," yes, it is a lie, but the., person who is buying that does not 
want to hear, "This is the worst one ever made." Then you would not buy it. You don't want to hear, "This 
is all right. It is okay.. It works." You don't want to hear that either. You want to hear somebody saying to' 
you,, "I know that you are surprised) that it is only 1/1 Oth the priicef of a good refrigerator, but this is the 
best one ever. You will save a lot of money and be happy. Besides that, your mother and your neighbor 
bought one, so you must buy one too." 

This kind of lie is something that is very productive in ourcommunities because that is-what we expect, 
like on TV: "This product gets everything whiter than anythimg else." The tribe loves that. We all know 
that it is a joke.. But we! don't want to be told, "This is a so-so cleaner." \4 want to be told that it is. the 
best cleaner. The second) line gets found out but they discover that people are paying attention to them. In 
discovering that; they have to be careful. 

One of the things that 26's and 4N have to deal with in their life is the expectation of everybody else who 
is.dependemt on their ego.. So they put their ego and their willpower to the test every time, like the athlete 
that is pumped up one the! field: if the 40 makes a bad move, everybody is going to. boo them. They have 
to take the burden of:everybody else's expectation. With the 26, everybody else has an expectation that 
you are the only one that can sell the product. They are all depending on you. You have to take the burden 
of that as well. The fact of the matter is that 26's seek out a way to get out of the pressure so that they can 
recuperate their energy because the ego cannot work consistently, and then they go back in. In that space 
in between this is where all the lying takes place. It is not just lying; it is sometimes nothing more than 
exaggeration. 

This whole business about stretching whatever the truth happens to be: the 26 and the 40 will do that in 
order to protect their time, their energy and their ego from being shattered. When the 26 says, "This is the 
best refrigerator, please buy it," one out of every fourteen people will say "yes." Thirteen say "no." That 
26 has to deal with all of these no's. It is not so easy for that 26 to go back out into the world the next time 
because they know that, in order to get to the place where everybody thinks they are so wonderful, they 
have to go through a space where everybody thinks that they are terrible (the people who say, "Go away. I 
don't need this.") This is quite a role. The 26's are suppliers for the community. 

Someone who is just operating out of an undefined ego that gets pumped up by somebody else, blurts 
these things out and has no idea. Somebody with an ego not connected to an awareness system within 
them has no idea and no way of reflecting upon it. Yes, they can get very much caught up in the 
exaggeration itself and live it out. 

Of course, all the lower trigrams here get shocked anyway because the lower trigram will always meet the 
outside when it is least expected. So the 26.2 who does not think anybody is paying attention to it is on 
the golf course and suddenly meets the boss. The boss says "I thought you were with Mr. Jones." It is this 
moment where they get found out. This happens to them. "Mr. Jones died." 

I have trained sales people and they all lie, otherwise they could not do their job. They have to lie to 
themselves, too, just to give themselves the courage to go back out into the world and to deal with people 
that reject them. After all, we expect of the ego what no other center is expected to deal with. The ego is 
expected to deal with abuse, rejection. The jobs that no other center wants, they give to the ego. The ego 
will protect itself. It is unaware, so it uses the tools that are inherent to it. 

26.3 Influence 

This third line is an overview line like the 40.3. It is telling you that through trial and error, through 
adaptation, you have a lifelong process. The ability, once prepared, to gather support. 'Once prepared': it 
is a long-term process. These people really have a gift. Third lines are always the harmony to wisdom in 
the sixth line. The third line can develop through trial and error the kind of techniques that will allow it to 
manipulate memory, so that they can successfully serve the community. 

The Sun exalted. The authority to focus communal effort. They have to learn this. Remember something 
about the 26. The vast majority of the time, because the ego is unaware, this capacity to exaggerate, to 
transmit to the community, to enlarge things in order to make them attractive, can become what we call 
lying. But, at the same time, the 26 is capable of great truth, like all tricksters. They can tell you as great a 
truth as they can tell you a great lie because this is what is inherent in their capacity. 

The Saturn in detriment. There is nothing more to the point than a salesman that walks into the office and 
quits, saying, "I'll tell you why nobody can sell this product." They will tell you the truth and they will put 
it to you so clear that you cannot miss it. You can close down the factory and do something else. 

The leadership, while gathering support, will underestimate potential challenges. This is one of things 
about the ego: The ego gets carried away and it is vulnerable. It either does too much or it ignores the 
demands and threats that can come to it from others. Whenever you see terminology like 'threat' here, 
basically all this is talking about is demands that are made on this gate. The ego is always faced with 
demands being made on it, either the demands within itself (it depends on the design) or, most often, the 
demands that are coming from the outside. 

In the white book: The power of the ego to gather support. It takes time for that ego to develop that 
strength and only when it develops that strength can it gather support. Understand something about the 
ego: it is at its strongest when it can accept rejection. This is the only time that the ego is truly strong. No 
ego is strong that suffers from rejection. It is not possible. If you go out into the world and you are trying 
to get others to be interested in something, the ratio of those who will actually be positive with you is very 
small. Rejection is something that is inherent for the ego to learn about. It is why the ego likes to be left 
alone a lot, because when it goes out there into the world, it will have to deal with that quality of life that 
always brings rejection into its life. The ego is unable to recognize the challenges or the potential in 
others, or the potential challenges in others, certain demands on the ego. 

The whole thing about this third line is that you can learn through trial and error how to use your ego to 
influence the collective, but the moment that somebody sees that you have that gift, they want you to do 
that for them as well. Not only that but once they figure out what you are doing, they want to take it from 
you. Egos are always being challenged by competition. Always. Otherwise we would not have a patent 
office. 

26.4 Censorship 

The upper trigram gives us a transpersonal, manipulative skill. In other words, when you deal with the 
fourth and fifth lines in the 26, you are dealing with people who really do have a deep skill in them to 
transmit to the tribe, to be able to propagandize or market or take to the tribe. 

My nickname for the fourth line of Censorship is 'the Chernobyl line.' It is a very funny line. Listen to 
what it says: The alteration of memory through elimination. It is an overview line which means that it 
takes time in life. The memory system, what you remember, is changed by slowly removing things. It is 
like, by the time you actually give your resume to somebody that you want a job from, you have left out 
the jobs you don't want them to know about. This is the elimination of memory that comes over time. 

Pluto exalted. The ability through censorship to save the collectivity from itself. In other words, you have 
somebody in a hospital in Hamburg and the doctors think that it is, possibly the Ebola virus. If that were 
actually true,, it would create an enormous dilemma within the community.. So when the doctor says, 
"Until I am really sure, I am mot going to. tell) anybody. I am going to save! the collectivity from itself,, 
from its panic." That is one side. That is the positive side. 

When you get to the Saturn in detriment (Chernobyl): The use of censorship to maintain the status quo; 
selective memory in fear of unrestrained consequences. "No, there was no accident in the nuclear pliant,, 
as far as we know everything is, time." This is not letting out the information, out of: fear of what will 
happen if that information gets out. 

I am using large examples, of this. In a human being, what that means is that, on the exalted side, there 
are things that are left behind that should be left behind because it is; healthier.. In the detriment, things 
are left behind that may not make! yaw healthier because they are left behind, but regardless, these are not 
people that should ever have post life therapy, they should not have hypnotism or rebirthing sessions.. 
They should not go through any of these things because what is left behind, what is forgotten, is 
important to leave forgotten far these people. 

In the white book: The power of the ego maintained through forgetting. Take the example of a 
salesperson. If you have to do a sales job and the last sales job you had, you were a failure and you were 
fired and you could not make your living, it is a good idea not to remember how bad all that was. It is a 
good idea just to put that aside and just see what will happen in the next job. In other words, for the 
strength of the ego, for these people, it is important that certain things are forgotten. 

The other side of this: The power of the ego maintained through selective memory. It is the selective 
memory that can be detrimental. These people forget things, i.e. they forget to tell you that there was a 
phone call because, in their imagination, that call might be disruptive for you and they don't want to be 
the source of that disruption. So they just selectively forget to tell you that there was this phone call from 
your banker, the police, or the doctor. In other words, this censorship works at many different levels. For 
the 26.4 person it is healthy to forget, but it is unhealthy for the others. Someone with the 26.4 makes you 
uncomfortable because you know that there is something they are not telling you. That is when the 44 
comes along and pulls it out, just like the 37 can pull it out of the 40. 

26.5 Adaptability 

What is often misunderstood about the 26 and the 40 is that they are enormously involved with other 
human beings. These are deep human-contact gates because the tribe is dependent on the ego. So these 
gates, because they are the only way for the tribe to get into that ego system, have to deal with all kinds of 
human and social pressures. Whenever I see someone who has the 26.5, I always say to them: "You 
know, you are made for Human Design." 

If there is a line of all the 384 lines that says that you should study Human Design, it is the fifth line of 
Adaptability. This is what the outside projects onto this capacity of the egoist. Here in this projection we 
have: The understanding of mechanics and the application of energy to achieve maximum potential. If 
you don't understand human beings, if you don't understand how things work, then you are not going to 
be able to properly manipulate the information and get it out. You have to know how people work. 

I had a job once where I had to make two hundred phone calls a day. It was in a newspaper office and I 
was in my early twenties. I had an old Dutch boss and he had made millions of dollars doing this job. He 
was training me because he intended to retire. He told me, "If you make two hundred calls a day, you are 
going to get twenty that say yes." By the way, if you make two hundred phone calls a day and you are the 
world's best salesperson, twenty will say "yes." The capacity is about being able to accept those one 
hundred eighty "no's". I have had so many phones slammed down on me, so many people say, "No, don't 
bother me." I did that for two years in my life. I probably spoke to half a million of people. I probably had 
four hundred ninety thousands of, "Go away, no." I made a lot of money. This is what the ego is all about: 
to understand the nature of human beings. When I pick up the telephone and I hear somebody's voice, I 
can tell you so much just when I hear their voice. 

Everything about the capacity to have influence on the tribe is the ability to understand the nature of 
human beings, how they work and what they need and how to satisfy those needs, how to explain to 
somebody what they need and that you can do it for them. 

Venus in detriment. A resistance and dissatisfaction when basic changes to nature are necessary. This is 
all about being forced to learn techniques. Remember that the fifth line gets projected on. Everybody 
says, "You can be great at this," but that does not mean that you have the tools that it takes. The tools that 
it takes are, that the moment that you step in there, you really have to understand other human beings. 

In the white book: The power of memory which maximizes the potential of the ego to attract others; and 
The resistance of the egoist to adaptation. The moment that these people that have to learn techniques 
have to change their technique, they are very uncomfortable. So the 26.5 in detriment, when they have to 
learn a new way of dealing with people or of doing their work, they are very uncomfortable; they really 
do not want to have to adapt to that. Understand mechanics. 

26.6 Authority 

The whole thing to recognize about the nature of the sixth line that is sitting on the roof is to look at what 
they meet in their next step, which is the 11.1 in this case. It is the gate of ideas and the first line is called 
Attunement. That first line of attunement is about the concept of being in the right place at the right time. 
One of the most frustrating things for the 26.6 is that it is trying to figure out exactly the right time and 
place because everything about the 26.6 is the recognition that the ego only gets respect through its 
correctness of action, only then can it truly be an authority. Here we have an overview line. It is a lifelong 
process. 

Authority The natural attainment of influence justified by the correctness of actions. What this represents 
is the legitimate ego. I have no problem with my ego in terms of being able to see that I have some kind 
of accomplishment in my life. The ego tends to be justified. This is all about the value of the ego as a 
motor, justified by the correctness of his action, that the ego in this doing is correct. If it works to the 
benefit of the community, to the material benefit of the 26, if it is correct, if they are in the right place at 
the right time, this is perfect. 

Well, you don't get it all the time. The 26.6, after trying when they are young to assert their ego and 
control others, they give up and they go and sit on the cosmic fence and they watch the movie, waiting for 
that possibility that perhaps there is a right place and that there is a right time to fulfill the potential of the 
tribe. 

The Sun exalted. The embodiment of reason and purpose that posses the test of time. This means that the 
ego has to be consistent; what it produces has to be of value. In the end, the ego is there to make sure that 
the tribe is healthy, that the tribe has enough to eat, that the tribe has shelter and all the other things that 
are part of the ego's responsibility in the tribal structure. 

The Moon in detriment attains Authority as a symbol and focus but not necessarily as a true embodiment. 
The constitutional monarch, stripped of real power but still the symbol of continuity of authority. These 
people are always separate and they can be very inspiring, ego-wise, yet they themselves don't do 
anything. They are still waiting for their opportunity to really be in the right place at the right time. 
Always remember in any kind of reading: when you come to a sixth line, don't expect it to act like the 
hexagram. It will do so when it is young because it has to learn, but it will not do so later. It will hold 
back. A sixth line sees the whole circuit. This 26.6 is looking at the whole tribal circuit which says: "I 
have to serve and protect the people." So, unless what it is doing is correct, unless it can end up being of 
service and being protective for the tribe, for the community, for those who are dependent, then there is 
nothing to do. "Why should I use my ego power to sell soap when it is not going to be productive and be 
of value to the community?" 

The strong ego whose influence is justified by the correctness of its actions; or The expression of the ego 
as a role whose influence is symbolic and lacks authority. Most 26.6's look like the detriment; very few 
live out the exaltation. Other ego people coming into contact with them, but particularly undefined egos 
are deeply impressed because they seem to have enormous ego power but seem to be unusually humble 
because they don't do anything with their ego. They don't feel like they have to push it out because there 
is no sense in doing that unless there is the right moment. 

Remember something about the ego motor: the ego motor will just stop working. It just will. It will take a 
break. In the 26.6, like in the 40.6, it can take a break for life. It steps out until it meets a 44.6 in its 
aloofness. The two of them will look at each other and say, "You are not involved either; maybe we 
should do something." The 26 is pointed to awareness whereas the 40 is just pointed towards emotions. 

HEXAGRAM 27 NOURISHMENT 

Looking at the sexual roles in the sacral center, our roles or strategies in forming union, we come to the 
27th hexagram, Nourishment. We come to the sexual role that we have in caring. This is quite different. 
On one side of the sacral, we have the reproductive capacity to be able to produce children and bring them 
into the world. When you come to the other side, to the channel of Preservation, this is about nourishing 
them, nurturing them, feeding them, allowing them to become healthy contributors in their society. 

You can see here that in the 27th hexagram, like in the 59th hexagram, each of these lines represent a 
role. Following the same process, line by line, that we have seen in the roles of the 59th hexagram, we see 
again the progression of how the lines work. 

In the first line, we see the role of self-provider and coveter, the one that can provide and the one that 
needs, the one that is strong and the one that is weak. The role of the second line is the role of the 
nourisher or the depleter, one who nourishes and one who takes away. The third line: the role of bonds 
made and broken. This consistency of the third line is always this trial and error. Here, the trial and error 
that takes place in caring. The fourth line: the fixedness that we saw in friendship on one side, the 
confident, or not. Here it is the benefactor and on the other side the dependant, the same process, but in 
the language that is applied to caring rather than a language that is applied to our sexuality. The fifth line, 
the universalization, nourishment as distribution or hoarding. Those that can put it out and those that 
constantly need to take it in at that level. And finally, the sixth line, the transition line, is all about trust. 
Can I trust caring? Is it worthwhile to care or not? 

The ultimate sixth line question is: "Is there anything that I can trust? And if so, what is it? And if it is 
true, prove it to me so that I can really know for sure that there is something that I can trust. " The question 
of the 59.6 is: "Can I trust this moment of being in love, or attracted?" The question of the 27.6 is: "Can I 
trust that caring is really beneficial and worthwhile? Can I trust this person to share in that union of 
caring?" Trust is a big question of the sixth line. 

Above the lines in the black book it says: The enhancement of the quality and the substance of all 
activities through caring. The quality of all activities is enhanced through caring. Caring is fundamental 
for any process and that is the nature of this hexagram: the enhancement of all activity through caring. 

27.1 Selfishness 

The first line always establishes a foundation. When we were dealing with the sixth line of the 3rd 
hexagram which is called Surrender, the very next hexagram is the 27.1. This line is called Selfishness. 

Think about what caring is all about. The foundation of caring is Selfishness and if you look at this line, it 
has the Sun exalted and the Earth in detriment. Whenever you see Sun/Earth together in the same line, 
you know that this line has enormous impact. It is speaking for one of the basic structures that we have: 
Sun above/Earth below. (The other lines with the Sun exalted and the Earth in detriment are: 8.2, 12.6, 
14.6, 15.2, 20.3, 23.4, 29.5, 31.1, 38.3, 40.6, and 48.4. There is one line with the Earth exalted and the 
Sun detriment: 9.3.) 

Here, the Sun exalted. The ego-driven first law of caring for oneself which is not necessarily at the 
expense of others. First lines have to know what it is to care. Caring begins at home. It begins with 
yourself; it begins with your own life. To care for yourself is to enhance the quality of your own life. This 
is where it begins. Selfishness is not bad. It is the foundation of caring. First you have to care for yourself. 

The Earth in detriment. Envy and its attendant misfortunes. In the white book: The power to care for 
oneself first. You cannot give to anyone unless you have looked after yourself first. One the other side, 
we have: The power of selfishness that is manifested through envy. "I cannot look after myself. I want 
somebody to look after me. I wish I could look after myself the way they do." 

You are always going to have the other side of this energy. We are a binary. Every single step along the 
genetic path goes into two different directions all the time. There are some of us who recognize 
intrinsically that we have to care for ourselves first and there are the others in our society who say, "I can't 
care for myself. Somebody has to care for me." This is the preemptive strike. This is weakness and 
strength. The strong ones can care for themselves and the weak ones cannot. 

27.2 Self-sufficiency 

The first line is aware of its capacity to care because it is looking inwards. When you get to the second 
line and you get to projection, it projects out that it cares. When I make certain kinds of statements, they 
sound very strong and they are not intended to be frightening but the reality is that the second line of the 
27 and all of the lines of the 27 but the second line particularly can lead to all kinds of disease and all 
kinds of health problems, all kinds of physical problems. All these things are rooted here in this 27th gate 
and the nature of caring. One of the things that are clear is that when caring is not evident, there are all 
kinds of atrophy that take place. If you have somebody who is dying and you have nobody who cares for 
them and there is nobody who imbues that caring in them, there is very little within that will hold on to 
the life process. Caring itself carries an enormous power with it: the power to enhance the quality of life. 

The second line does not really know whether it has the equipment to care and because of that, it is 
constantly projecting out the caring. When people first read this line, they think that it is wonderful. Self- 
sufciency. The obvious law that to give, one must have. But the second line does not know that. The first 
line does. 

The Moon exalted. The Mother. The great nourisher. These are nourishers who do not know how much 
they can nourish. Think about what that means: you have a certain amount of resources within you and 
there is somebody who is tapping into those resources and if you are a second line, you don't know how 
far you can go. In other words, you can end up emptying out all your resources until you get found out, 
like all second lines, and you collapse because you have been depleted and you are sick. 
Remember that the 27 is directly pointing towards our immune system and our health system. This is the 
nourishment of our immune system and, without proper caring, our immune system does not work 
properly. So, in this second line where there is this projection outwards, there is no sense of how much I 
can give; nor is there, in the detriment, any sense of how much I can take. 

The 27.2 in the detriment is: Weakness that can sap the strength and power of others. These are people 
who are projecting out their need for caring and they are constantly pulling in. This is the child that 
constantly keeps on demanding his mother's breast, whether that child needs to be fed or not. It is 
constantly demanding until the mother gets a breast infection and ends up with all kinds of pain and there 
is no more milk available for the child. Nature steps in at some point and says, "Wait a minute," but it 
steps in with the mother being sick. 

The reality is that when you are dealing with the second line of the 27, there is something to be aware of: 
These people do not have any sense of what the limit is. That is true of all second lines. That is why they 
end up in those situations of getting caught. By the way, we live in a time now where we have the great 
veiling planet of Neptune sitting in the 60th gate, the gate of limitation. There are all kinds of people who 
do not know where their limitations are right now. In the same way, they do not know how many 

resources they have. They do not know necessarily how far they can go because the whole business of 
where the boundaries are suddenly is covered by this veil. 

This is the way the second line operates here. In this second line, because it is so important, this is caring, 
this is enhancement. Because it is such an important dominant field in the tribe, it leads to all kinds of 
problems because you have people that are being sucked out and you have people that are just doing all 
that sucking in. Both of them can become very unhealthy. 

Next thing, now that I have said that, is do not take a moralistic judgment: "Oh, boy, they have the 27.2." 
It is so important to understand that it is necessary for us to go through all these processes. Each and 
every one of them has their value. If you are somebody who is getting succor from the nourishing mother, 
it can be quite wonderful and that caring can be marvelous. It may be hell for the nourishing mother but it 
can be wonderful for the recipient who says, "Yes, she died, but she was great. She looked after me. She 
made my life possible." There is always the other side of all these things. Don't bring your judgments in. 

27.3 Greed 

When we get to the third line, bonds made and broken, this whole process of trial and error, this line is 
called Greed. When people see that, they get upset. Everything about the 27th hexagram is about living a 
better quality of life. That is why you have the cliche of parents who say, "I will make the world better for 
my children than it was for me." They are going to enhance the quality of life. 

The third line, because it is a trial and error line and because it is all about adaptation, is trying to figure 
out how you have the right kind of caring so that you can get the right kind of enhancement in your life. 
Because they are looking for this enhancement, they will go through trial and error; they go through what 
appears to be an obsessive kind of process to try to find the right caring. They are constantly breaking the 
bonds of the caring because they keep on looking for what will really enhance the quality of their life. 

Please understand that life is a very difficult thing. We all know that. Caring enhances the quality of our 
process and makes it easier for us to live with the ordeal. Every human being needs somebody who is 
going to care about them and about what happens to them because it helps bring about an enhancement of 
the quality of their life. We are not here alone. This channel is deeply altruistic. It is not about finding 
enhancement for oneself but to provide that to the tribe through the law that is on the other side of this in 
the 50th gate. 

71he obsession with having much more than one needs. Literally, it is not enough that II know about this 
coring. Is there someitlniirng that can make my life even better and enhance it even more? That is the 
other side of this. 

Pluto exalted. Here, the psychological manifestation. The obsession and dependency on ,knowing what is 
hidden. The secret policeman. This is Sigmund Freud's line. In the white book: The power derived 
fromhavingmore than one needs, whether sexually, mentally or materially. Remember that it is 'more' in 
the sense of caring more sand having ,a better quality dfllilfe. It is all -about enhancement and, in the end, 
what the first three lines don't iunderstand is that on the other side there is the law (floe 50). Caring has to 
submit to the law because the (law controls the frequency and the law controls the awareness. 

The caring that is corning out of the 27 is just a genetic rdle. "I mood -to care about all these things. If I 
don't, I wiil not have a better life. I need to, even to the paint that I will go around secretly and find out all 
of these things." 

On the other side df -this: The lust for power to get more than one needs. By the way, it also has the 
dbvious value of wanting more and more caring, but it is not-the same as the second line. The second lime 
wants more and more from tine very same person, as an example. The third line wants more from you and 
more -from the next one and the one after that one. It is a different process. 

If you look at the second, the third and the fourth line, they all have Mars in detriment and one of the 
things that are clear to me is that Mars is a great disease initiator. Mars can always initiate illness out of 
its immature energy. When you look at this third line in the black book and you look at the Mars in 
detriment: Mundane and wholly without redeeming value, greed, a lust that inevitably cripples and 
addicts. The reality is that within this bonds being made and broken and looking for the enhancement in 
life, there is also the reality that you may not find it and then you become addicted to finding the kind of 
caring and the kind of knowledge you need to allow you to care, the kind of thing that will make you feel 
better, the kind of thing that will allow you to feel good in caring. 

These are people that become addicted to all kinds of things: to drugs, to certain kinds of situations, and 
they can be crippled by that, unable to care for themselves, deeply depressed because they cannot find the 
enhancement in life. They cannot see how they can take their ordinary life and give it a quality that allows 
them to feel good about what it is to be alive. That is what caring is for. Though the third line, unlike the 
second line, does not lead directly to sickness, the result is that the third line in its detriment will lead 
indirectly to illness. The moment that there is this inability to see that life can be okay, that there can be 
this better quality in life, there is this obsession with trying to find out how you can make it better. If you 
take a look at Freud (I mentioned his name as part of that, he has the exalted, fixed), you can see that: to 
seek out obsessively, to understand everything that was hidden underneath in order to find out how to 
care. You find it out through trial and error, through adaptation, and only at that point where you can find 
that out can you begin to work with that process. 

The people who have the detriment do not have a way of finding out what they need to know and they do 
not really have a focus for finding out what they need to know. They keep going from one thing to the 
next, waiting for that moment where they find it. In that, it can lead to all kinds of physical problems in 
their life. 

27.4 Generosity 

Just like the fourth line of the 59, when you get to the upper trigram here, you are dealing with channels 
that are really about our connection with others, about our intimacy with others, our nourishing of others 
and yet, in the first three lines there is really an inability to understand what the other is all about. In this 
case, the other is the 50th hexagram, the establishment of what the values are. It is the establishment of 
what the law is. When you get to the fourth line, it knows that there is something else at the other end. It 
knows that there are values over there and that there is awareness over there. It recognizes that what it has 
to offer is that it has this power of enhancement to offer, caring. It can offer this. 

This is the line of Generosity. The natural sharing of attained abundance. Please understand that. It goes 
back to the first line, to its resonance that says, "First you have to look after yourself, and then you can 
give." When you get to the fourth line, it talks about the sharing of abundance. This is not somebody who 
can be depleted. This is somebody who can only give once the abundance is there and attained, and then 
they are ready to share that energy. 

Jupiter exalted. Magnanimous and qualitative sharing. The gift of rewarding those who are deserving. But 
they are very focused. What these people are focused on is, "I have to care." That is their whole trip. 
Everything else is put aside. They have to care. 

When you get to Mars in detriment, you get to this third example of the impact that Mars can have on us 
in terms of destabilizing our well-being. Remember that this is a gate that is opening up to the immune 
system. Mars in detriment. Indiscriminate sharing. That is going to bring the wrong people into your life. 
The wrong people coming into your life can make you sick. 

There are three kinds of illnesses that are rooted here. In the second line, that illness is built right in 
through not recognizing what the barriers are. When you get to the third line, the illness is secondary. It 
comes from the ordeal of trying to find the right quality of life and stumbling along the way and, when 
you stumble, you can really get hurt and ill. When you come to this fourth line, it is about bringing the 
wrong people into your life. This brings disease into your life. This line is notorious for sexual 
transmission. Somebody comes into your life and they give you gonorrhea. This is about bringing the 
wrong people into your life through indiscriminate sharing. Just because you can care does not mean that 
you have to care for everyone. This is the Martian side, the immaturity in caring. 

In the white book: The power and strength to share generously; or The potential loss of sharing through 
indiscriminate sharing. Bring the wrong people into your life and those people make you sick. 

I am involved with in a long term project which is called 'The Global Incarnation Index' and it has to do 
with our incarnating crosses that we come in on. The 27th hexagram is part of a cross that is called the 
cross of The Unexpected and the 27.4 is one of the great classic lines of the unexpected. Many years ago, 
Martin Grassinger made some charts for me of the discovery of Pluto, Uranus and Neptune. In all those 
cases, the Nodes were in 27.4 and 28.4. When the comet 'Shoemaker Levy' banged into Jupiter, the Nodes 
were in 27.4/28.4. 

If you look at charts of people who carry this energy, they are always capable of releasing the unexpected, 
which is both positive and wonderful and horribly frightening in this line. You can get the unexpected 
gonorrhea; you can also get the unexpected caring. All of a sudden, there is somebody there who really 
cares and is offering you that caring. "I did not know that you cared. Really?" It is suddenly out of 
nowhere. The unexpected is always part of this process. 

27.5 The Executor 

When you start with the first line, it tells you about the essence. We saw that the essence is about looking 
after oneself, and when you get to the fifth line, you get to the way the world projects on that. The world 
projects on the 27 as the executor. Someone who is carrying the 27.5 has someone on the other side 
saying, "They care. I know that they care." This projection is going onto them. They may, or they may 
not. In the same way that you can project on the 59.5 that that is somebody you can love but you don't 
know whether they are going to love you back, here is somebody that you project on that they really care 
but you don't know if they really do. You don't know because it is a projection. 

The Executor. The ability to distribute effectively the resources of others. This is what caring is about for 
the mythology of our planet. Caring is about somebody who takes the responsibility to make sure that 
others are nurtured properly. That is what caring is supposed to be all about. 

Jupiter exalted. Either the gifted and principled agent of distribution or the good sense and ability to find 
one. "Yes, I know that you think that I really care but that is not something I can care about. I'll send you 
to somebody who will care about that." The doctor who is an eye specialist sends you to a nose specialist 
saying, "That is not my field, but they care for you over there." 

On the other side, Saturn in detriment. A restrictive nature that hampers distribution or the seeking of 
advice and assistance. Again, this is the concept of the paper tiger. This is somebody who is projected on 
that they can really care, but they themselves know that they don't. That does not come out. 

In the white book: The power and strength to care for the resources of others, or Weakness and the risk of 
loss of power restrict caring. They will lose their power if it is shown that they cannot really care or if 
they cannot really be the executor. One of the things you see, just like the love of the Casanova gigolo 
that has become themes in literature, so is the executor who doesn't care about you and puts the money in 
their pocket. We have all kinds of stories running around about, "Yes, I trusted this person to look after 
my interests." They look after their own interests and then they go to jail because the law catches up with 
them, telling them, "You were supposed to look after that person's money and you put it all in your own 
pocket," and they lose their power in the end. 

I remember this great story in New York City about a day care center. There was this day care center 
which was supposed to look after children and the people who were running this center were starving the 
children so that they could make money from the food. They were starving the children. Typical of the 
27.5: you project on them, "They really care." It is called 'being taken for a ride.' The 59.5 and 27.5 are 
really capable of taking you for a ride because you are projecting on them and you don't get to see what is 
really there. By the way, in putting it this way, also understand that they are the universalizing agents. 
They may in fact be great executors, but like everything having to do with anything, you can't go in 
blindly. It is not just a projection field that you can accept and believe. 

27.6 Wariness 

When we come to the sixth line, we come to Wariness. Again, this is a transition line. It is the end of the 
process. This line says: A protection against an abuse of generosity. 

The Moon exalted. A practical and realistic approach to nurturing, whose appropriateness is guided by 
feelings and instinct. Pluto in detriment. A tendency to be overly suspicious. 

Whenever you are looking at the 27.6, there is only one thing that can really stand out there which is that 
the whole thing about this process is: Can you trust, or not? It is all about trust. It is all about seeing 
whether caring is of any value, if it is really having its proper effect. Is it going to work properly? Is it 
going to enhance the quality of life? The 27th hexagram goes to the 50th hexagram which carries all of 
the basic frequencies of awareness that occupies our whole process. In other words, coming out of that is 
a basic fundamental question which is, "Can I trust anything in this life process? Can I trust caring? Can I
