the spy or you are the victim of the spy. You notice, by the way, that the third, fourth and fifth lines have 
Pluto exalted. 

This line is called Espionage. The ability to prepare for and anticipate decline through the accumulation 
of secret or privileged information. I have met so many people that have an astrological background who 
are deeply interested in the patterns of others, working out exactly what they are. 

In the Book of Letters: The realization that knowledge, both covert and esoteric, is necessary if one is to 
be prepared for crisis and change. What happens to these people is that their crisis is that they are always 
busy looking at others and not seeing themselves. They get their crisis when they have to see their own 
mirror, but they have a real gift of looking into the other. 

Here, you find the Moon in detriment. The tendency in recognizing the strength of the opposition to 
accept the inevitability of decline and rather than resist, to offer one's services to guarantee survival. The 
double agent. This is where their gift pays off in blackmail or in fees. Crisis knowledge that is available to 
others for a price. That price can be money or a piece of flesh. It depends on the circumstances. The one- 
pointedness of the line is that this is all about knowing the other. Anybody that comes to me with this 
line, the first thing that I tell them is, "You'd better learn about other people, to understand how they 
operate. While you are doing that, don't forget to learn about yourself. You'll save yourself an enormous 
crisis that way." 

36.5 The Underground 

Fifth line, universalization. \% get to the sum total of the nature of this. It is called The Underground. 
Pluto exalted. Perfected survival regardless of conditions. These people will get their experience, and they 
will survive it. That does not mean anything about others. They are here to get their experience. When 
they are really of value for others is when they have been through enough experiences. 

Immunity to crisis as both generator and survivor. In other words, no matter what their situation is, they 
can always move from inexperience to experience and always will, and damn the consequences. They are 
out there to get their experience. This is nature of what this hexagram is about. 

When you get to the other side, Mercury in detriment. A nervousness that can lead to self-betrayal. They 
can get very nervous because they know that the crisis is coming. They can feel it coming and sometimes 
they can let it go without getting their opportunity to go through it because what they want is the 
experience at the other end. By the way, these people end up being either fascinating or deeply boring. If 
they do not have an interesting life, what they tell you over and over again will drive you crazy. 

Self-betraying nervousness in times of crisis. They know when the crisis is coming, they want to 
participate in the crisis and, when sometimes the excitement is too much for them, they let it out. When 
they do so, my advice to these people is, "Don't take a contraband across borders." That is a metaphor for 
many things. These people are probably the most honest people who create crisis. Sometimes, their 

honesty gets them into trouble. They are the kind of people that will confess to someone and get 
themselves into trouble and have a crisis. They are inherently honest in that. 

36.6 Justice 

Now we get to the sixth line, the line of transition, the top of the house. The 36.6 is looking towards the 
25.1. That is the next hexagram, the next line. The 25.1 is about selfless and motiveless action. All of this 
is deeply manipulative. This is depth, after all; we are looking at the mirror of the 48. It is an emotional 
depth and understanding of the other operating in the wave but it is still an emotional grasp of the other 
and, because of that, there is so much built into the crisis that looks like it is manipulative. 

What they are looking for, in the end, is action that is without motive. "I don't have to do this to get that." 
The 35/36 is the channel of expectations. If I do this and this, I will get that. Then you'get to that and you 
realize, "Shit, I have to start again," and on and on. This is an ongoing process. Expectation leads to 
frustration. These people can get deeply disturbed by the fact that life does not reward you that way. You 
have to get out of the expectation business. 

This line is called Justice ('just is'). The inevitable survival of right. Change is the only thing that endures. 
The 32nd hexagram tells us that. To go from inexperience to experience is the human way. This is 
correct. Sixth lines are always looking for something else. This is looking far beyond the nature of the 
experience. It is looking for what, in essence, all of this is bringing out in terms of the other side. What 
does the experience or the change lead to? 

Sixth lines can be depressive. These people have seen it all before and they are the ones that are least 
likely to jump at experiences. Like the 59.6, the One Night Stand, they can end up being celibate because 
they do not get the opportunity to see something that is transcendent, transitional for them. The next gate, 
the 25.1, is a spiritual gate. It is a mystical potential. This is where universal love starts. So they are 
looking for something far beyond that. 

Jupiter exalted. The knowledge and attendant faith that the powers of darkness eventually destroy 
themselves. 'Those whom the gods wish to destroy, they first make mad.' Saturn in detriment. A profound 
sorrow and cynicism that is not diminished by the understanding that darkness is self, annihilating. 
'Darkness' is ignorance. Madness looms as long as there is ignorance. Ignorance is the great darkness. 
Human beings need to experience to make sense of what it is to be. We need the evidence. Not everything 
can be evidenced through the formula of the logic process. We need human experience. We need to know 
what it is like to have to go through and do things. 

In the Book of Letters: The correctness of crisis when it arises out of pure feelings. As long as the feelings 
are not pure, they will avoid the crisis. 36.6 people are not the kind of people that you associate with 
crisis. When they do have them, they are huge. They are not crisis people because they are not turned on 
by any old experience. There is always this sense of "What else is there?" 

In the detriment: The sorrow or cynicism that comes with seeing that despite the correctness of the 
feelings, there is always crisis. The deepest crisis is that the crisis goes nowhere, that the wheel keeps on 
turning, that the expectation is never fulfilled. Deep inside, they know that. What they are saying is, 
"What is the sense of just going through this again? Why can't there be something different?" 

One of the great jokes that you will notice in the lines through the circuits, particularly in the collective, is 
that all the sixth lines in the logic want to be abstract and all the sixth lines of the abstract want to be 
logical. The logic has this tendency to say in the end, "Does this make sense?" and the abstract has the 
tendency to say, "Is it really true? Is it a fact?" It is where they meet. The collective process is inside of 

us. We need all of those elements together. This sixth line can get very depressed due to its very nature: to 
be able to go through change to evolve, to continue this human process. 

They are the people that are the strongest believers and the strongest desirers of the world coming to an 
end. They stand up and say, "I hope it will all come to an end." I know a number of people who have that 
line and when Jupiter was struck by the comet Shoemaker Levy, they had this big grin on their faces. 
"Oh, I hope it will come to an end." 

HEXAGRAM 37 THE FAMILY 

We come to The Family and we move into the tribal process. In coming to the 37th hexagram, we come 
to channel of Community, this deeply social channel, a design of a part seeking the whole. This stream is 
about sensitivity. It is about touch. The 37th gate is the gate of friendship and family, the gate of 
affection, the gate of touching and hugging-at a price because, in the tribe, there is always a bargain. 

Here, we have the possibility of who will or who will not provide what is needed. This is the energy, in 
the wave, the potential to recognize who will provide and who won't. That is why I said that there is 
always a price. The 37 needs the power of the ego and it is always looking for it. The possibility here is 
the sense of touch, and the mouth. 

I have the 40. I have met a lot of 37's in my life. They love to hug and kiss me. This is their nature. The 
40 is the stomach and the mouth is at the other end. The mouth is always saying, "Your stomach is always 
full, fill mine." The deepest relationship between the 37 and the 40 has to do with resources, as this whole 
stream has to do with resources. 

37.1 The Mother/Father 

Please remember about the 55.6, the line in the 55 that will awaken to the spirit, its next step is to the 
37.1. That is the transition this line is looking for. The first thing about mutation in the individual, in 
terms of the spirit, is that the first place it has to go is directly into the tribe, into the line of the 
Mother/Father as a mutation into the family, into the tribe itself. 

A position of inherent respect that ensures a focus for the development of guidelines. Venus exalted. 
Harmony is the key to the successful maintenance of relationships. It is only through harmony that the 
beauty and the values of the family can endure. Look, this is a foundation line. There is no polarity. It is 
very straight forward. This is what the family is all about. 

In the Book of Letters: Friendship that is rooted in sensitivity and ensures harmony. It has to be rooted in 
the sensitivity to the legitimate bargain, in the touch. I make fun of the bargain but, please understand that 
it is natural. The thing is that it has to be a clean bargain. All clean bargains are of value. The whole thing 
with the beginning of this process is to recognize that the first thing that the spirit mutation will do is that 
it has to go to the mother and father and it has to be instilled as a value within the family as a guideline. 
This will be its step. 

What friendship is all about is that everything having to do with friendship has to do with sensitivity. 
Sensitivity is a word that simply says resources. The selfishness in the 55.6 leads to the family and the 
resources. 

37.2 Responsibility 

When you get to the second line, you get to projection. In getting to the second line, the projection is 
Responsibility. This is the ashram line. It has Jupiter exalted. The understanding of the principle of 
individual responsibility as the foundation for successful cooperation. That is, "We all do it, but 
everybody does their thing." Whenever people have this line, I always tell them, "You can't be in 
relationships or friendships in which other people are dependent on you because you will always end up 
being the other side of this line, which is telling them what they should do: to be responsible." 

Mercury in detriment. A tendency to point out the responsibility of others. This is a natural ashram line. 
You have all these people in an ashram that are responsible for themselves in the cooperation and you 

have somebody who is on the other side of this line always telling them where they should be responsible. 
You have both sides at the same time. 

The heading above the lines says: The manifestation, macro- and micro-cosmically, of the organic nature 
of communities. This projection is not about family at all. It is about being in the family. It is not about 
being of the family. It is about projecting into the family. This is projection and it does not have the 
introspection to recognize the true guidelines or values, or the nature of the family. It simply knows that it 
has to belong somewhere in order to get its resources. 

37.3 Evenhandedness 

When you get to the third line, the end of the lower trigram, you get to line of adaptation, to the line of 
bonds being made and broken, to the wave of allegiance and rejection. So we know that in that sense 
there will be an irresponsibility in relationship to the nature of the family. 

It is called Evenhandedness. The success of any group is dependant on maintaining order. Jupiter exalted. 
The ability to judge what behavior is appropriate and to react in a balanced manner to transgressions. 
'What behavior is appropriate' is the behavior that will bring the resources that are necessary. Always 
remember that. So, this is the attempt to adapt in order to make sure that one can get the resources that are 
necessary. 

Mars in detriment. An ironic tendency to either test incessantly the borders of acceptability or to respond 
to the very same tendency in others with severity. All of this is about trying to adapt to a situation in order 
to get to the resources. The rules can be changed in that, remember, bonds made and broken. This is the 
one where everybody has to behave in a certain way and then all of a sudden the situation changes and 
everybody has to behave differently. We have to change the way the family works because the conditions 
have changed. This can be very destabilizing. 

In the Book of Letters we have: The possibility to have the sensitivity to know what behavior is 
appropriate in a relationship. In order to get the resources: don't forget to add that. It is very important to 
keep that in mind. It is not simply about behavior. This is not Grace. This is not behavior to set up a 
situation where mutation can take place. This is behavior that is designed to get a return. It is looking for 
resources. 

The other side: The possible lack of sensitivity to what behavior is appropriate. These are people that will 
change their behavior simply because it is a way for them to get access to resources that they wouldn't get 
behaving the way they did before. They can feel very insensitive to those people that were there with 
them while they were in that behavioral mode. These people can end up being the kind of people that 
other people will complain about. They are always changing or breaking the rules, or they punish you 
because you broke the rules, the very rules that they break. Remember that the 37 is going up and down in 
the hope and pain wave. Add that to everything that we are saying. 

37.4 Leadership by example 

We get to the upper trigram and we get to the externalization, to the one-track. We get to Leadership by 
example. Any member of the family may take on a leading role through exemplary behavior. 'Exemplary 
behavior' is getting the resources. This is so important to understand. The community cannot survive 
without the resources. The 37, which recognizes the principles that is has received from the 19/49 
process, knows that it is its responsibility to attract the ego force that will fulfill those resources. Any 
member of the family can take on this leadership role if they can figure out how to get the resources. 

Moon exalted. The manifestation of highest principles in everyday and practical affairs. The higher 
principles are making sure that the family is looked after. This is not selfish, please understand that. It is 
for the nature of the family. It is selfish in the 55.6, when it is individual. When it gets to the 37.1, this is 
for the family. This is making sure that there is enough for the children to eat; there is enough money to 
build a school. 

Saturn in detriment. A conservatism that generally only accepts the leadership of the father who may or 
may not be a valued role model. 'The father', in that sense, can be the father in the patriarchy and the 
mother in the matriarchy. It makes no difference. It is only about accepting the way to get material and 
the resources based on a traditional archetype. 

In the Book of Letters: The possibility of the highest principles in all relationships resulting in a 
leadership role. The moment that you can provide for your family, you take on a leadership role. There 
are so many families in which the traditional bread winner, the father, is replaced by a child that is 
successful. It is normal in that sense that they take on the leadership role because they have the power. 
The power for the family is where the resources are. 

The possibility of being insensitive to the leadership of anyone other than those accepted by tradition. 
"You can bring more money into the house than the father does, but I will still honor my father instead of 
you. He will tell me what the guidelines are." Remember, at the foundation of the family are the 
guidelines. So, these families come into conflict. The conflict arises between the one that has traditional 
leadership and the one that actually has the pocket book. It is a lot of tension in families. I am not just 
talking about blood families. I am talking about any kind of community, any kind of relationship that you 
have with friends. The situation is: who actually has the role and who actually has the power? The power 
is in the resources. 

37.5 Love 

This universalization line has such a lovely name. It is called Love. Natural and unaffected devotion to 
the family. Always remember that fifth lines are about seduction. This is the great seduction of 
community, family and affection, which is love. This is a nice seduction, isn't it? 

Venus exalted. Natural harmony and perfected sharing. Mars in detriment. Emotional dependency that 
often turns love into hatred. This is an interesting line. When you look at the Book of Letters, you have 
the Venusian aspect which says: Natural harmony and sharing possible through friendship. This is what 
has to be universalized in the family. What is being offered in this 'harmony and sharing' is the non- 
revealed wave that is underneath. This harmony and sharing goes from hope to pain and back again. That 
is not part of the billing. The billing is, "I am your friend. I am affectionate with you. We will have 
harmony together. Can I seduce you with that?" And the other side is saying, "Seduce me with that." Then 
the wave comes along. It will create all kinds of dilemmas. 

The other side is: The possibility of dependency turning love into hate. This is very important. It is milder 
for the person who has it than for the one who doesn't. This is all about the emotions. We can never 
escape the fact that we have the solar plex center here. These people are offering their love and their 
harmony for what the ego will deliver on the other side. If they become dependent on that ego, if they 
keep on offering this perfect affection in order to get their bread and butter, they will quickly develop a 
hate for that ego at the other end. Even more so: these people that carry this line make other people 
emotionally dependent on them. By doing so, they create the potential for hatred in the other person 
because most of those people are undefined emotionally and are being yanked up and down on that 
emotional wave. 

In all this talk of the sweetness of love, you also have to recognize that the family always has its love but 
it is never something that stays at one place. It is always going up and down in the wave. We all know 
this in our families and communities. This breeds all kind of dependencies and it says that this is the 
universalized methodology. This is: "Get them dependent on the emotional wave". Out of this can come 
hatred. Hitler had this line in an undefined emotional center. 

37.6 Purpose 

The 37.6 carries a unique significance. There are six waves of spirituality, the six mystical waves. This is 
a movement that goes from the 19 to the 49, from the 37 to the 40, from the 51 to the 25, and from the 20 
to the 10, the three mystical channels bridged by the 40/37. At the mystical level, the 37 is looking for a 
family that is far beyond the mundane. At the mystical level, it is looking for God. This is a gate that 
yearns for something very profound. One of the extraordinary things about the 37.6 is that it leads to the 
63.1. It leads to After Completion; the 63.1 is about the spiral of life. 

The 37.6 is saying, "What is it all about? Who am I? Where do I belong? Is there something greater that 
this?" After all, it is the part that is seeking to be one with the whole. But the whole is more than the 
family, the group, the nation and the planet. The whole can be transcendent. 

In the 37.6, there is this deep need for God, whatever one wants to call it. Spirituality. To be moved. 
Within the 37, there is this burning question: what is the purpose? What is the purpose of all this work? 
What is the purpose of constantly having to look for the resources? What is the purpose of maintaining all 
this? Is there something greater than all of this? This 37.6 is not just looking for the 40 at the other end. It 
is far beyond that. It is far beyond the community. It is looking beyond all of that because all of that is 
just business, and it knows that. There must be something else than just building temples. There must be 
something beyond all of this material. There must be something beyond just having to feed ourselves. It 
has to be more than just killing to replenish. It comes out of the 19/49. It knows. There has to be 
something that raises us up out of the nature around us. 

This perception of 'What is it for?' is the deepest question within the 37.6. Yearning for that. It is not 
looking to go up to the 21 /45. It is hoping to be able to go the other way so that it can be awakened 
through initiation, so that it can come to recognize the holiness of its nature, not simply to work in this 
plane. 70% of all women on earth spend 50% of their time looking for firewood and water, nowl Think of 
that. What is it about? The nature of the family, in the end, is this yearning for an explanation so that they 
can see that this trivia in this life is somehow substantiated, that it makes sense. 'Micro- and macrocosm.' 
This line is called Purpose. The energy to maintain the family is enhanced by recognizing its values. What 
is it really all about? 

Venus exalted. The gift of not only recognizing the inner meaning of the family but an appreciation for its 
values. Mercury in detriment. A need for diversity that may ignore the achievements of the family in 
favor of withdrawal. These are the ones that leave the tribe and go looking for God. They are the ones that 
go on the road and forget about all that stuff. I guess India is the best place to see them, to see the ones 
that have left their home, that have taken the road to God, whatever they think it may be. 

In the Book of Letters: The possibility of extending friendship through the appreciation of its value. But 
again, for these people, the greatest friendships are the ones that guide them to some kind of spiritual 
sustenance in their life. There are not just looking for food. They are looking for manna. 

On the other side we have: The need for diversity that despite appreciation will prefer casual friendships. 
"We will not get involved with all that. We will be looking for something else, something much deeper." 
One of the most important things for me in the nature of my work is that human beings have an 

opportunity to recognize that there is a purpose. Their purpose is a unique one. Every human being carries 
a unique purpose. I have mentioned that I am working on a project that will describe how we all 
incarnate, logically and precisely, so that every human being can see the intrinsic value of their being. 
Until the family can grasp that, we are not going to have any peace. Everybody needs to know that their 
purpose is fulfilled by being. 

We can only suspend the judgment that compares our lives to this and that when we see intrinsically that 
we are limited and in that limitation is our perfection. All of us together transcend all of that. In the end, 
the deepest cry of the family is 'what, why and how?' They need to know that. That is very difficult for 
them because they are in the wave. The real awakening of the human family will not happen until spirit 
awareness begins to flow on this planet. The foundation of that is to take people through their nature. 

My joy in being able to teach at that level is to bring people an opportunity to see how deeply 
programmed we are. We have no choice. There is nothing you can do about that except see its beauty. It 
is not 'no chance.' It is a beautiful process the moment that you can surrender to the nature of what it is to 
be you. 

HEXAGRAM 38 OPPOSITION 

We come to the individual process: the 38th hexagram, Opposition, the polarity of the 39th hexagram, 
Obstruction. These gates are deeply similar in the nature of their pressure. At the same time, they are 
pointed towards different outlets. The 38th gate is pointed towards the splenic system and this channel, 
the 28/38, has to do with the development of our intuitive processes. The 38th gate is the gate of the 
fighter and the fuel is the energy to struggle or not. This is the inherent energy. 

I always try to stress to the people that carry the 38th energy that the only struggle that is worthwhile is 
the struggle that tells you that life is of value because that is inherently what the struggle is all about, that 
life is truly of value. That is why you have risk-taking at the other end. 

The energy mechanic is the impulse coming out of the format of the 3/60 to ignore. There is nothing more 
exquisite than a 38 ignoring you. They ignore you; they do not hear you. You talk to them and 10 minutes 
later, they look at you and say, "Were you talking to me?" They are in their own process. This is a fuel or 
a pressure -energy of the individual process. 

Above the lines it says: The ability to preserve individual integrity trough opposition to detrimental 
forces. 'Individual integrity.' It is about the value of the individual life, not the value of the collective or 
the communal, tribal life. It is the value of the individual life. If you scratch any seeker, they will all ask 
you the same question, "What is my purpose in life?" At the core, to be individual is this need to 
recognize value in your own life. 

38.1 Qualification 

The first line always acts as a guide to the essential meaning of the hexagram. This foundation line is 
called Qualification. There is something very beautiful in this. This is a fuel, a pressure -energy, which is 
speaking for the whole hexagram and you can see that, right from the beginning, the intuitive process 
carries something that we call psychic phenomena. 

Tempering opposition based on circumstances. Don't always strugglel Don't always fightl The line is 
saying to only struggle and fight for those things that are of value. Otherwise, don't bother. 

Neptune exalted. Nine times in the 384 lines we find a first line, a foundation that has Neptune as its 
exaltation. The foundation of what you fight for is veiled. The very basis of this hexagram is hidden. It is 
hidden in the mysteriousness of mutation and the mutative capacity of anything individual. What is of 
value to fight for can be an enormous mystery in life. Most people don't know. 

A psychic attunement that guarantees proper action. 'Proper action' in the sense of what to struggle for or 
not, when to struggle or not, when to listen or not. 

In the white book: The psychic gift of knowing when and how to fight. Which means, with Neptune here, 
it is just there. That is where it gets its psychic label because it appears mysteriously from behind the veil 
and suddenly, in a noxious situation, where nothing is going on, the 38.1 finds itself engaged and 
struggling. They don't know why because it is a psychic moment. It is coming from behind the veil. 

Mars in detriment. The tendency to oppose as a general rule. This is also the nature of what is inherent in 
Opposition. The drive to fight as a general rule. "Get out of my way. I am doing it my way." The 
individual is not designed to be influenced. This is one of the most important things to understand about 
the nature of individuality. 

Wherever you see an individual gate in your design, recognize that that is an aspect of your nature that is 
not to be influenced by others. That is why, at the core of what the pressure is, it is to be intuitively 
penetrating and aware in the now through the 57/20. But at the root of that, it is to fight anybody that gets 
in your way, right, wrong, or indifferent. The key is: is it really of value for you to fight about that? As a 
first line, this is the true struggle. What is worth fighting for is the great question of the 38. 1. 

38.2 Politeness 

The second line has a very deceptive name; very few people really grasp it. All second lines are about 
projecting outwards but they do not have the depth. This is not a question of what the struggle is or what 
one has to struggle about. This is just a projection outwards that one is a struggler and that one is a 
fighter. 

This projection outwards comes under this title of Politeness. Don't misunderstand this. This does not 
mean that these people do not struggle. It just means that they struggle all the time and it is polite. "Please 
stop doing that. I don't want you to do that anymore. Please." They can drive you crazy with their 
politeness. 

Opposition that does not transgress normal codes of behavior. Pluto exalted. The value of discretion. In 
the white book it says: The energy for the intuitive awareness for discretion. These people try to keep the 
struggle from getting out of hand. They don't want the big fight. They just very carefully coach everything 
in nice polite terms and you know right away that they are struggling with you, but they are polite, so they 
survive. 

Think about what is at the other end. In the 28th gate, we have the fear of death. I know so many 28's and 
38's who have been beaten and robbed in their life. They bring struggle into the world and they get it 
back. The 38.2 knows that and so, they struggle on politely. This is the framework that will lead to the 
universalization in the fifth line: they struggle politely. 

Moon in detriment. An over-politeness that is both servile and obviously superficial and defeats its very 
purpose. These people kill you with their politeness. "Oh, yes I will do this for you." They can drive you 
crazy with the way in which they express it. 

The energy for over-politeness in times of struggle. The fear of dying, the fear of being beaten, destroyed, 
and broken is very powerful in this gate. If you are a fighter, you know what the fight is. The fight is to 
the death. This lies underneath every 38: the recognition that the fight is to the death. The struggle is to 
the death. 

38.3 Alliance 

The third line is a joke. The moment that you understand what third lines are about (bonds made and 
broken, trial and error), the idea that this line is called Alliance is very funny because you know that 
inherent in these alliances is the fact that they will fall apart. They will fall apart because the individual 
ultimately struggles alone. This is the whole thing. 

In the end, by the time you get into the integration system, the one thing that is clear is that everyone is 
alone. Individuals know this intensely. That is why it is so important for them to recognize in their 
lifetime what their individual value is. They know that they are alone and they ask themselves: Is it worth 
it? 

Sun exalted. The ability to sustain through integration with similar forces, thus ensuring the vitality to 
persevere. Please understand what that means. "I am struggling against that person in the neighborhood 
and I will struggle with that person for the rest of my life on my own. If it happens that my next door 
neighbor is also struggling with that person, I will go along with my next door neighbor and we will 
struggle together." That is never really an alliance. It is the alliance in the way in which the English and 
the French army will fight together, but they only do so if they have a common enemy. When they do not 
have one, they will fight each other because that is the nature of the individual. 

In the white book: The energy to integrate with others in times of struggle, as long as it is the same 
struggle, as long as it is focused on the same thing or pointed towards the same thing. 

We have the Earth in detriment. Here you see one of these Sun/Earth polarities. These lines are important. 
Earth in detriment. Selfish alliance which saps the energy of one's partners in order to ensure personal 
vitality. "I am struggling with my neighbor and my neighbor is struggling with my neighbor. I will let my 
neighbor do most of the struggling so I can save my energy. When my neighbor burns out, then I will 
jump in the right moment and finish it off." This is the third line. 

38.4 Investigation 

When you get to the fourth and fifth lines, you get to the inherently social lines. Nothing about the 
individual is inherently social. At the top of the lines, it says: The ability to preserve individual integrity 
through opposition to detrimental forces. The 'detrimental force' is anyone who tries to influence the 
individual. So, when you look at the inherent sociability of the fourth and fifth lines, please understand 
that that is only going to come from an appropriate individual. It will have to come from another 
individual, in essence from the 28th gate at the other end. In other words, individuals do not influence 
each other. They empower each other or not, but they do not influence each other. They empower each 
other to live out their own individuality and, in that, as long as they are empowering each other, a trust 
can develop between the two of them. 

This is the line of Investigation: the single-mindedness, the focus of the individual to struggle for what is 
of value in life. Analysis which strengthens opposition. Pluto exalted. The detective who develops or the 
insider who accepts a joint opposition whose success can only be based on trust. In the white book: The 
energy to recognize who can be of value in times of struggle. 

The 38 is a pressure and the pressure needs to be released. Its natural pathway obviously leads to the 28. 
When a 38 and a 28 have an electro-magnetic connection to each other, in that moment, it is possible to 
align with each other. It is possible to trust and struggle together out of empowerment for each other. That 
"who" is the very important element. Who is that person that you can trust to not influence but empower 
you? This is the key in the fourth line. 

Mars in detriment. The power of adrenaline to provoke aggressiveness. In the black book: The 
aggressiveness in opposition that prejudices investigation and limits trustworthiness. The thing to 
recognize about this line is that these are some of the most aggressive individuals that we have in terms of 
maintaining their individual integrity. The slightest attempt to influence them will get the strongest 
possible reaction because that is what they are here for. Because of that, even another individual can bring 
out an aggressive reaction in 38.4's. We are complex beings. They may meet a 28 who is basically 
collective but they have the 28 to their 38. That basic collective part is not going to empower, but to 
share. It wants to make judgments. It wants to correct. It wants to say, "No, let us not do it this way. Let 
us do it that way. " In that instant, you get violence as a potential because the aggressiveness will say, "No, 
no, my way. " 

What you have here in the fourth line is a very fixed energy on being able to establish if life is worthwhile 
or not, a genetic possibility to recognize who can empower you to fulfill that recognition. Because of the 
strength of this, there is also the possibility that nobody will have it. There is this constant aggressive 
defense against being influenced by the outside. My son has the fourth line twice with Neptune. The way 
in which that comes out is very bizarre. Telling him that he should do something does not work. He just 
does not listen. He looks like saying, "Who the hell are you to tell me anything?" I was sitting in a cafe 
and he was about to go across the street and as he left I said to him, "Be careful." Before he gets to the 
crossing, he turns around and says, "I know what I am doing." He is only five years old. These are 38's. 
Don't get in their way. 

38.5 Alienation 

We will see when we look at the 39.5 as the polarity on the other side, because it is projected on these 
people that they are provocative, that they are basically left alone. The same thing is true when you come 
to this fifth line with its appropriate name Alienation. Remember that the fifth line is how the public or 
the outside world sees a hexagram. So, the outside world sees the 38 as an alienated being, somebody 
who is fighting in their own world, somebody who is really not connected to the rest because they seem to 
be caught up in some kind of struggle about something. This energy is seen as alienating energy by the 
outside. 

A stage in opposition where one is totally isolated. This is the universalization of the pressure to be 
individually intuitive. It is absolutely perfect. The individual is always at their best when they are isolated 
within the aloneness of their own being because they have to resolve everything in life within their own 
context. They are individual. 

Saturn exalted. The ambition and concentration to endure. These are very tough folks. You project on 
them that they can fight and they are there. They are always ready for the struggle. It gets projected on 
them all the time, so they are deeply trained in life for what the struggle can be. 

The energy to stubbornly fight alone. This is their magic, in that sense. Their magic is that they do not 
need to have others with them in their struggle because, in fact, their struggle can be of value to others. 
They are often groundbreakers because they are given the opportunity to struggle for what is really of 
value. They often get to be the people that first discover the value of something because they are given the 
opportunity to struggle. 

Pluto in detriment. Alienation experienced as painful confinement that by its very nature blinds one to the 
possibility that there are those at some point who may come to one's aid. In the white book: The energy 
for stubbornness is so strong that it is difficult to recognize that there are others who can help in times of 
struggle. It is about alienation. Even in its detriment, where there is always this possibility that there may 
be somebody else (after all, there is the 28th gate at the other side), there is still this sense that one is 
always alone. The difference is what all individuals have to live out in their process. They have to go 
through the binary of what aloneness is. This binary of aloneness for the individual is that half of the time 
it is delicious and half of the time it is not. This is what lies in alienation. 

The exalted says, "It is great to fight alone. I only have to deal with my resources, my process, with what 
is of value to me. I don't have to concern myself with anybody else." The other side says, "I have to fight 
alone. Isn't this awful? Nobody will help me. Nobody cares about my struggle. Nobody empowers me." 
They always have this feeling that they have to do it alone. It is true. You have to do it alone. Somebody 
can help you to get to the door but you have to go through the door yourself. The 38 is always going to 
need that doorway of the 28. It cannot be fulfilled by itself. The 38 is only a pressure. 

Remember that how the lines manifest is entirely dependent on the design. Again, you cannot take any of 
the meanings of these lines and project on them until you see them directly in context to the design. How 
they will come out and how they actually operate, that will make the difference. If you have the 38.5 and 
you have no outlet for it, you will feel alienated within yourself because it is so difficult to bring it out. 
Again, all of these lines have to be seen in the context of the design. 

38.6 Misunderstanding 

Each of these gates that come out the root center and point towards the splenic center have very unusual, 
Uranian lines. We will see the 58.1, the Love of life. We will see the 54.4 which is the mystical line of 
Enlightenment/Endarkenment, and here we come to the 38.6. This unusual line is the quality that exists in 
this individual process. The 38.6 has a direct resonance to the 20.6 that is going from the fuel to the 
expression. The expression in the 20.6, in the throat, is Wisdom, wisdom in the now that is of value to 
society and to civilization. The 38.6 is one of the most potentially mutative of all gates in the individual 
process. The only lines that are intrinsically more mutative are the lines that you will find in the 3rd 
hexagram. In other words, what you are seeing here in this particular line is a mutative force. It is a 
mutative force and, because mutation will always bring something new, that mutative force is always 
misunderstood. 

It is so difficult for individuals, even when they have the opportunity at the mental level, to explain 
themselves. When you are dealing with a fuel, with a pressure in the 38.6, there is this fundamental 
knowing of what is worth struggling for or, as is more often the case, what not to struggle for. There is 
always this misunderstanding from the outside because it does not seem to fit into any kind of recognized 
pattern from the past. 

Opposition without basis. Saturn exalted. Eventual crystallization that clears up misunderstandings. 
Eventual'! 

In the white book, it says: Energy which attracts misunderstanding and the stubbornness to face 
opposition. These people know something that other people don't know. They still don't know what it 
means and they don't know how to express it. It is just something inside. They can seem like they are 
fighting for something and nobody can understand why they are fighting and what they are fighting about 
and they themselves often have no idea why they are struggling and fighting. That is the nature of the 
38.6. But there is always eventual crystallization. In other words, because it is a mutative process, 
eventually the mutation can take hold and, in that moment that the mutation gets to manifest, gets 
expressed or generated, in that moment, it is possible to recognize what the struggle has been for. Then all 
those people around them that were struggling with them will let go and the struggle will end. 

When you come to the Earth in detriment, you have: The recognition that misunderstanding is at the root 
of opposition, but the insistence that it is the misunderstanding of the opposing forces. The detriment is 
more mutative than the exalted. It will actually struggle for something and it does not know why it is 
struggling for it for all of its life, despite what anybody tries to tell them, because so deep is that force 
inside that the mutation of knowing is the only way that they will find value. 38.6 people are often 
tormented by the fact that the knowing of others is never a knowing that is sufficient for them because the 
value of life for them lies in a knowing that no one seems to have access to and only they seem to have a 
recognition of, inside of themselves, but do not know what it is. The 38.6 does not fight. They do not 
engage in struggle. Their struggle is all held within because nobody understands them. 

There is a very clear description of this in the keynote. The keynote does not belong to individuality. 
Misunderstanding. The 38.6 is the bane of the collective. They drive the collective crazy. The collective 
can deal with individual knowing that has been around for a while but they have a lot of problems with 

individual knowing that is brand new and cannot be explained to them. So, they are up against the wall of 
struggle that they cannot deal with. 

Again, recognize what the nature of a sixth line is. This line is looking for the quality of the whole circuit. 
In other words, not only is the knowing finally there that gives value to the life; it also leads to the 
awareness that gives life its proper form, its proper convictions and brings it out awake in the now to 
mutate all of society. No wonder that they are misunderstood. How difficult a process that is. For all sixth 
lines in individual gates, it is much more difficult to make any kind of commitment than it is for a 
collective sixth line. A tribal sixth line can be pulled in relatively quickly. The collective takes a little bit 
longer, but to bring in the individual sixth line to get a commitment out of these peoplel It has to come out 
of their unique knowing. 

HEXAGRAM 39 OBSTRUCTION 

We move to the 39th gate and we come to the individual process. Whenever we are dealing with the 
stream of Emoting, whenever we are dealing with this individual stream that operates through the solar 
plex system, we know that this is the stream in which we are going to have the metamorphosis or the 
mutation taking place that will open up the potential to release the spirit consciousness that lies within the 
solar plex system. We know that the event itself is keyed to the 55th hexagram, to the sixth line. Keep in 
mind that the 55.6 is a potential which operates correctly when it is being fueled by the 39th gate. The 
39th gate, as a fuel, is going to make its contribution to this metamorphosis that is going to take place in 
our emotional process. 

The 39th gate is the gate of Obstruction, and it is the gate of provocation. It is the energy to provoke or 
not. In sexual terms, this theme is about teasing. This energy provokes in order to find the right spirit. 
This is one of the gates that could be best understood through the negative. 

That is, provocation is there to find out who can not be provoked. If you try to provoke somebody and 
they are not provoked, that spirit is correct for you. If you can provoke somebody, that spirit is not correct 
for you. The provocation tries to find the right potential for that fuel to feed, to find the right spirit. All of 
that can be very confusing because the 55 is in the wave. What appears to be the right spirit on Monday 
will not be the right spirit on Tuesday. In the archetype of how this gate functions, the provocation is 
there to find the right spirit because, once linked to the correct spirit, there is the potential to emote, the 
potential to bring out the individual spirit and the capacity to bring mutation to manifestation, to bring it 
to everything else. 

The individual is responsible for mutation in the plan. This is inherent in their design. You also have to 
see that there is no metamorphosis of the emotional system other than through the individual process. The 
individual can only have impact on the tribe or the collective when it is truly in the right spirit, what most 
people confuse with the term 'enlightenment.' Most people confuse this pathway with this term. The 
individual mutative force that is in the right mood, this spirit is infectious because it is there to move the 
mutation through the totality. The energy mechanic is the impulse which is rooted in the 3/60, in the 
pulsing energy to eat. It is about what you eat. 

One of my favorite statements for 39's is when somebody comes into your life, imagine if you have to eat 
with them. Would you really like to eat with them? 39's know that better than anybody else. Adults never 
really get that, but if you ask children about the people around them, "Who do you want to eat with?" this 
is very revealing because they tell you spontaneously. 

If you look at this stream and you look at the 12th gate which says caution and meditation in the face of 
temptation, you see that the 12th gate manifests the individual process in the throat. It is the gate of 
caution. It is important to withstand the temptation to do. It is better to meditate and back away from 
acting. In the 39, we find the fuel for this process. 

The heading above the lines says: The value of obstruction in provoking analysis, assessment and 
reevaluation. It is the very fuel for that caution. That is what provoking is all about. Provoking is a deeply 
selective process. It is a very important process. What is so difficult for people who carry this energy is 
that, because they automatically are provocative, and given the nature of the world, they get so many 
people who are provoked by them. Because they are not the right spirit (not everybody is the right spirit), 
these people end up disliking the very value, the very essence of what they are. All of these themes can be 
seen in the first line in the foundation. 

What is successful in provocation once, in terms of the spirit, may not be the next time due to the 
emotional wave on the other side. The 39 people themselves have to recognize why they are provoking. 
The 39 is a fuel, and it is not aware. So, they realize that they provoke naturally, and if they accept that, 
what they are only looking for is for the response of people who are not provoked by them (what I call the 
right spirit). In other words, if you have a certain kind of habit, like if you like to tap your feet while you 
are eating and you have somebody sitting beside you, and every time you are tapping your feet, the other 
person starts going "Ahem." This means that you are provoking them; thus they do not have the right 
spirit. Don't eat with them. If somebody else is there and doesn't mind your tapping, then you have found 
the right spirit. Period. It is not sophisticated. It is simply the recognition that those aspects of your nature 
are provocative to some. Only the people to whom it is not provocative are for you. To provoke 
"efficiently" comes back to your own recognition. 

If you carry the 39 energy within you, you have to recognize that people who are not provoked by you, in 
whatever situation, are right for you in that moment, in that time. They carry the right spirit. They may 
not next time because this energy is directed to the emotional field, to the wave. So, it may work one 
moment and may not work the next. What you do discover over time is who is generally always provoked 
and who is generally not always provoked by you. Then you have succeeded. 

The whole success for a 39 is to keep on provoking. In order to be yourself, you have to be provocative 
with the recognition why the provocation is there so that you are not uncomfortable when people do not 
like your trip. The worst thing for any individual is somebody who says, "I don't like the way you are 
doing that. Change it." This is very difficult for provocative people because they will always have people 
around telling them, "Don't provoke me." This is like telling the sun not to shine. They 39's are what they 
are and that is their beauty. 

So many gates have ways of deeply knowing what is correct for them. It is in their genetics. The gift of 
the 39 is to provoke. Otherwise, we do not have a way to get enough people together who are carrying a 
good spirit. The good spirit comes from acceptance, like in The Troubleshooter; the wisdom of a 39 
saying, "That is where the problem is," this being a provocation. If you are a problem-solver and you have 
people in your life who accept your advice, that is the right spirit for you. If they don't accept your advice, 
they are not the right spirit for you. The Martian people in the 39 try to insist that others respect their 
advice. The key to 39 is to continuously provoke. I continue to shock people. It is my design. You have to 
continue to be what you are. It is just the recognition of the value of these things. Of all people that I 
know, 39's are the most uncomfortable with the nature of their energy because they do not like the 
negative results of their provocation. Too bad; this is the only way to learn. 

39.1 Disengagement 

It is called Disengagement. The basis of provocation is to back away. This is one of the deepest 
provocations of all. Think about what that means, genetically. The moment that the 39 disengages, there 
is no mutation. 

Mars exalted. The determination when confronted by obstacles to withdraw, but only temporarily. 
Understand the nature of the foundation. It is looking inward. It is trying to understand what provocation 
is and, the moment that it provokes, the moment that it is dealing with its capacity to provoke, it always 
ends up in situations where that leads to a reaction and they withdraw, but only temporarily. In other 
words, they will go through it again and again. 

The energy to provoke by refusing to confront obstacles. The obstacle is the resulting provocation in the 
other. Think about that. When you are provoking somebody, you tease them. What you are teasing is that 
you need to get exactly the right potential for that teasing. Not everybody will respond in the same way. 

Those people who will be provoked by that teasing are not for you, but you have to find who is for you. 
Thus, you keep on provoking and every time you meet the obstacle, their response to that provocation, 
you back away and try to find another one. 

You are looking for the spirit. Understand that the 39th gate is a gate that has deep inside of it the only 
instrument that is out there to look for the spirit. When these human beings stop provoking, we have less 
and less people who are looking for the spirit. For every 39, there is a resonance in the world. The spirit 
can be found but it is a research, after all. 

Mercury in detriment. Disengagement, with an accompanying indecision as to when to re engage. There 
is a good sound biological reason why the foundation for this gate which is seeking to find the spirit for 
mutation, is being held back in this disengagement, because we do not want all kinds of mutations in the 
world. Just because something is a mutation, it will not inherently guarantee that it is a good mutation. It 
can be a bad one. A bad mutation is when the 39 provokes someone and they try to stay instead of 
withdrawing when this person gets provoked. Thus, you will have a negative mutation right away and it 
will manifest in the quality of that relationship because it then is contentious, caught in the mood swing 
and the spirit is not there, but only the motor. This is a way of holding back from too many mutations. 

The value of this kind of education is when people who carry the energy of the 39 begin to recognize the 
value of what that gate is. In order to do so, they all have to develop what I call a thick skin. If you 
provoke somebody and they get provoked, you know that they are not for you. They will put up an energy 
vibration that is sent towards you which says, "This person is a provoker and this person is not nice," or 
other gossip told. If people talk about the 39 behind their back or into their face, they do not necessarily 
like that. 

This is the whole thing about being a 39. That is why there are so few people in the world that are truly 
looking for the spirit. Most of them are engaged in disengagement. They are pulling back. They provoke, 
they get the reaction and then pull away. This is what most of the planet is doing with this energy. 

39.2 Confrontation 

The second line is always projecting outwards. The 39.2 is projecting outwards that they are provocative 
and therefore, other people can treat them accordingly and respond, even when they are not provocative. 
What happens to these people is that, because everybody responds to that provocation, they end up having 
to deal with it a lot. 

The second line is called Confrontation. That is what they get. By the way, you can notice that the second, 
the fourth and the sixth line have the Moon exalted. One of the easiest ways of thinking of the Moon is to 
recognize that it is what moves and drives us. When the Moon is exalted, this is a very powerful force 
because we get a constant cycle every 28 days of the Moon coming back to this line and reinforcing this, 
or when it is at the other side of the definition. 

Here, The instinctual and direct assault of obstacles. These people are projected on that they are 
provocative. You are sitting with somebody who is describing to you what the ABC is. The 39.2 is sitting 
there and does not say a single word, does not stare, does not look funny, does not make any motions, 
does not do anything, and the person who just described the ABC turns to the 39.2 and says, "What is the 
matter with that?" The 39.2 inside is saying, "What me?" and starts stuttering some excuse. What is 
necessary is the direct assault on the obstacle: "Nothing. I was not paying any attention to you." They get 
this presumption all the time, this projection that they are ready to be provocative. 

In the white book: The energy to provoke through direct assault. These are people that have to deliver this 
direct assault. They have people coming right at them and say, "Why are you looking at me so strange?" 
"I am not looking at you at all." This answer is just as provocative in response. They give the direct 
assault back. 

Jupiter in detriment. The principle of preservation that tempts one to go around an obstacle that should be 
tackled headon. In the white book: An emotional discomfort when direct assault is essential. Think about 
what happens to these people. They are so used to being picked on because that is how they feel. They 
feel like they are being picked on. "Why do you pick on me? I did not say anything. I did not look at you 
funny. I did not do anything. Leave me alone." The people with the Jupiter in detriment get the direct 
assault and they do everything in their power to get away from that provocation. They do not go right 
back and say, "You idiot. Why do you look at me?" They try to say, "Really, no, no. Did I look like that? 
I did not mean to. I am really sorry that you thought that I thought that you are funny." These people get 
very angry. The other person will find that answer just as provocative as the direct assault. The 39 never 
gets outside of the game. 

39.3 Responsibility 

We come to the completion of the lower trigram, to the trial and error process, to the learning process. 
This is the resonance to the sixth line and the potential of wisdom. The third line is called Responsibility 
and here you begin to see the root of what will ultimately be, in the 39.6, the fuel for the 55.6, which will 
lead to the mutation. 

This is the trial and error process of learning to get to this point, and the first thing that we see in this is: 
The avoidance of confronting obstacles if failure puts others at risk. This 'others at risk' sounds strange 
because we are dealing with an individual fuel in an individual channel and circuit. Yet, built into it is a 
genetic recognition of the power of mutation to change everything, either positively or negatively. 

We have Jupiter in detriment. The great benefic whose first consideration is for the larger framework. In 
the white book: The energy to provoke through self-sacrifice. For example, you have a teacher who is 
bullying the children in the classroom, provoking them, and you have one child who carries this 39.3 
energy who will make the sacrifice in order to protect the others. They will go up to that teacher and 
challenge him. This child will get into trouble, will have to leave the school, will be punished. If this child 
will not make this self-sacrifice, others will be at risk. 

The responsibility in the third line is this early recognition of the responsibility of being a mutative force. 
That responsibility is not simply for the individual. Sometimes the provocation has to be for the benefit of 
others. These are the people in any kind of group situation that do the provoking for others. They, 
themselves, might well prefer not to get involved because trial and error means mistakes and punishment. 
But because nobody can, they do, because is built in. 

The Earth in detriment. The often disastrous assumption that others are more at risk if an obstacle is not 
confronted. The white book: The energy to provoke through the failure to make sacrifices. They do not 
make the sacrifice and provoke others through that behavior. In the same situation in the classroom, the 
capacity to provoke on behalf of everyone, but not doing it. This is extremely individual. 

The third line is starting the process of seeing that the individual mutation always has to be ready for 
sacrifice, always. The moment that you have a mutative force in the world, there are forces that want to 
destroy it. All individuals, as freaks, are subject to being stoned and, the moment that one is ready to 
make a mutative provocation for the benefit of others, it becomes the focus of that field of energy. 
Sacrifice is built into bringing mutation. There is no mutation without sacrifice. 

39.4 Temperance 

We come to the fourth line, to the beginning of the upper trigram. It is about being unidirectional; it is 
about being fixed and one -minded. This fourth line is one of the great lines of the 384 lines. It is such a 
complex line. Even the language of this line, its keynotes come from everywhere. 

The fourth line is called Temperance. It sounds very much like the introduction to the 12th hexagram. 
Careful evaluation and assessment before taking action. Before provoking. The nature of the gate is not 
about doing; it is about provoking. 

Moon exalted. The values of feelings and instincts in establishing the proper timing. Feelings have 
nothing to do with this stream. Instincts have nothing to do with this stream, either. Timing has nothing to 
do with this stream. We have already looked at the abstract, the tribal and the collective in that one 
sentence. Three keynotes from three different fields is a very complex energy. 

The values of feelings and instincts in establishing the proper timing. This means: when to provoke. 
Understand the beauty of this line. This line is the first time that we can go across the channel. It has the 
recognition that there is something else on the other side of the channel. The moment that it recognizes 
the forces on the other side, it says, "Oh. There is a big emotional motor over there and it is going up and 
down in a wave. If I don't choose the right time, I will never get the right spirit." 

In terms of the white book: The energy to provoke at exactly the right time. This is the magic and the 
fixation of the fourth line: when is the right time? Because of that, they externalize at different times until 
they learn. These are the kind of people that only provoke you on Mondays or when you tell them that 
you have a headache. They find out at what time to provoke you to get a maximum impact, to see whether 
or not you have the right spirit. 

The other side of this energy has the Sun in detriment. The faulty belief that willpower alone can 
overcome any obstacle regardless of circumstances. 'Willpower': this keynote belongs to the tribal 
circuitry. You see that this energy is very complex. You have all kinds of keynotes coming from the 
whole body graph. This whole field is the fuel for mutation. It is not the fuel to initiate mutation. It is not 
the 3/60. It is the fuel to bring that mutation out into the world and allow it to spread. It is very powerful 
in that sense. 

In the white book: The energy to provoke that ignores circumstances. This energy does not wait for the 
right time. These people end up being a pain in the neck because they are always provoking you at the 
wrong time. If it is the right time to provoke somebody when they have a headache, do not provoke them 
when they do not have one because you will get crushed. You keep on persisting to provoke them 
whenever you feel like it, instead of recognizing that there is a right time for that. 

39.5 Single-mindedness 

The fifth line is always being projected upon, so anybody that carries this fifth line is projected on as 
being provocative. Due to that projection, they do not have to provoke very much because people get out 
of their way, unless they are really looking for a fight. So, people avoid getting involved at any kind of 
difficult level with the 39.5 people. 

This line is called Single-mindedness. The rare ability not to overcome but to bypass obstacles. There is 
no one to be provoked out there, in that sense. They do not get a chance. What happens to these people is 
that they very rarely find the right spirit. This is a time that we are living in. The 39 provokes to find the 

spirit. That is its true nature. That is the first line. The fifth line is how everybody else sees it. How 
everybody else sees it as wrong. What they see is that provocation should not be necessary and it is 
something to be avoided. If provocation is avoided, no spirit can be found. These people are projected on 
that they are single-minded, that they are the ones that can get it done. They do not run into any problems 
because they do not get the constant provocation because other people are very aware of this capacity in 
them. 

Neptune exalted. The imagination to establish new patterns that make the obstacles irrelevant. The 
moment that the obstacles are irrelevant, the spirit is gone. Think about that. The moment that it is 
projected on you that you are provocative, so "let's not provoke them," there is no chance to find the 
spirit. But this is what the totality wants out of that fifth line. This is their projection on what this fuel is 
all about. 

The Mars in detriment. Simple hardheadedness. Though less exalted, it can often result in success and 
gather support by its very determination. It is amazing how many people are mutated by these 39.5's 
because, rather than going through the provocation with them, they just accept whatever it is in the mood, 
and they can often pull people along with them, but the spirit is missing. This is the whole thing. It is so 
important that when you are working with people that have the 39th gate, that they truly understand what 
provocation is for. It is there to find the right spirit. The right spirit is the spirit that is not provoked. You 
can cheat by doing the fifth line number. The fifth line number is, "Let's see. There does not seem to be 
any provocation out there, so everything is okay" It does not work that way. 

In our evolutionary process, we are slowly moving towards the sixth line. We are actually in the fifth line 
phase which is the great projected phase. So, we have the most complex Maya now that the planet has 
ever had. We have an enormous projected Maya around us. That is the density of the fifth line. 
Everything about our world is about projection now, our concepts about each other, the universe, and god. 
All of that is part of a vast projection field and all of that is through the fifth line, universalization, 
because we are all living this global village consciousness. It is part of the process to go through this fifth 
line phase so we can complete all of that because the spirit comes afterwards. It can't come now. It does 
not exist now. 

39.6 The Troubleshooter 

The Troubleshooter is an American Western term. They used to have these characters that could take you 
across the country in carriages. The person who was sitting beside the driver was called the 
troubleshooter. If any trouble came along, this person would shoot it. This is where the word 
'troubleshooter' comes from. 

Like all sixth lines, we have a transition field here. It goes beyond the nature of the hexagram and looks 
for much more. What the 39.6 is looking at is, "Can we get this mutation into the world and, once it is in 
the world, will it be of value to humanity?' That is its process. You can see what the beauty of 
provocation is, at its highest level. Provocation, at its highest level, is nothing more than the capacity to 
go to somebody else and provide them, empower them, with mutation. "I know what is wrong with your 
life." "Get out of my face," is the answer of a lot of people who do not like anybody coming up to them to 
tell them what their problem is. "Can I help you with this? Can I show you how to do this?" 

Nothing is more provocative in this life than somebody coming up to you and telling you what is wrong 
with you, and that they will fix it. Due to the nature of sixth lines, most of these troubleshooters never 
look for trouble and do not shoot. They just hope that the riot will be very quiet and everything will be 
okay. Their inherent gift is this capacity of penetrating to the core of what somebody's dilemma is. Not 

their own. Recognize how altruistic and special that is. Mutation is for the whole specie and never for the 
individuals. It is for the whole specie. Otherwise, it is of no value. 

So, the ultimate field here is as it says in the white book: The energy to provoke others by attempting to 
solve their problems. The 39 is provoking to find the right spirit. So, anybody who is going to listen to 
these very gifted people is the right spirit. To be able to offer this mutation is a very gifted fuel: those 
people take the mutation and move it along. 

In the black book it says: The natural gift for solving problems. It is a gift. What that ultimately means is 
that the final stage in our process, this mutation, will solve our problems. To get rid of these bodies is one 
way to solve our problems. It is just about changing the equipment. But nonetheless, you get to the point 
that you have problem-solving. What you will also have is when the 39 really has this capacity and when 
we get to the stage where the mutation takes place, it is a natural gift that will be accepted by others 
because they are a very important mutative force. 

Moon exalted. Practicality and the ability to guide and nurture others. These people get blown off so fast. 
In our work together, we are dealing with our adult consciousness, but you start your life with your 
design. If you have a 39.6 child and it says to you, "I don't think that you know what you are doing in the 
kitchen," or "You don't know how to run the computer," think about what happens to this 39.6 child. They 
have a natural gift for solving problems but it is provocative and they get rejected a lot for that 
provocation. That puts them in a bad mood because we are dealing with a mood gate and they feel terrible 
and then they say, "I don't care. I won't help them or tell them what is wrong. They will give me a hard 
time. They will not do that." Always remember that when you are looking at any line, think about it first 
as a child's line before you think about it as an adult line. You get to see that so much of what is there in 
the beginning is already deeply conditioned by the forces around it and so few of these aspects get a 
chance to flourish because of that. 

All 39 children know what that is like. That provocation always was in them. They already provoked you 
as a baby. Some of these babies get thrown against walls. Recognize that you start your life with your 
design and see it in that perspective, and then you begin to understand what it may or may not be like. In 
most cases, 39.6's do not provoke anything. It is rare. It has to do with the spirit that is available. If there 
is the right spirit, there is the opportunity for them to always release their wisdom. All sixth lines carry the 
potential of wisdom. They can release the wisdom of what the problem is and how to solve that problem. 
Remember that it is a genetic gift. There is no awareness here. It is simply the capacity in that fuel to deal 
with any dilemma and to be able to mutate it. 

On the other side: The emotional drive to dominate that provokes others. In the black book we have Mars 
in detriment. Ego dominance that generally abuses this gift for self-aggrandizement and personal ambition 
rather than for the benefit of others. It is so difficult for these people when they are growing up because 
they can't solve problems if they go the other way. They insist for the rest of their lives that they are the 
only ones in the world that can solve any problem and that others had better pay attention to them or 
nothing is going to happen. Both of those stances are not provoking at all when it is obvious that it is 
there because we take in each other's auras. Or provoking insistently and again, remember that most of the 
time, the potential of the sixth line does not come out because it has already been held back in the youth. 
There will be exceptions. 

When we have the transition that is going to take place, when this movement takes place and this begins 
to open up, these people will really be of value in society. It will be a time for them when they will 
flourish because their gifts are essential to maintain the spirit field. The individual stream maintains it. 

Remember that the 39 is coming out of the root center. The Troubleshooters are under enormous pressure 
to solve problems. They have no other way. That is their nature and they have to recognize when not to 
provoke. "If I can't solve your problems, I will stop eating." We have people who do that all the time. 
That is the ultimate 39.6 provocation. "You do not treat us well in our independence movement, so will 
we all stop eating." Or the other way around: people who can't solve the problem and get fat. 

HEXAGRAM 40 DELIVERANCE 

The heart center and the Self are of enormous significance to us. The G center and the heart center are 
part of the most basic and primary infrastructure that is built within us. They both represent qualities that 
are often deeply confused: the relationship between the Self and the T. In looking at the ego gates and the 
gates of the G, we are going to distinguish very clearly between the natures of these two. 

In dealing with the ego, a picture of the tribal circuitry gives an impression of the importance of the heart 
center and the ego in our mundane lives. It is absolutely essential for humanity to function out of its ego. 
This is why we have civilizations and cultures (friendship is one of the best examples of this) that are 
always caught up in the ego, in how great they are, or have been. 

Ego is intrinsic to the nature of what the tribe is all about. Everything about tribal circuitry is rooted in the 
ego. More than that, the 51, which is missing in this picture of tribal circuitry, is also tribal even though it 
is deeply individual. As part of individual circuitry, it serves the tribe. It is directly connected to the tribe. 
The way in which we are going to look at the heart center is through its two primary functions, which are 
willpower in the 40th gate leading to the 51st gate, and ego or the possessiveness of the T in the 26th gate 
leading to the 21st gate. 

The heart center is very complex. It is obviously misunderstood. Egoism is something that is put down in 
the Eastern side of our world, this quality of the T and its possessiveness. When you are looking at the 
ego, you are looking at a biological complexity that is unlike any other center that we have. We will look 
at these very important functions. Willpower begins with the stomach which is part of the heart center, 
like the heart muscle itself which is in the 21 st gate, or the gall bladder which is in the 51 st gate, or the 
thymus gland which generates our immune system which is in the 26th gate. We have a very complex 
center here, in terms of how it moves its information out into the biological structure. 

The stomach and the heart give you a deep insight into the nature of how the ego works. The ego, the will, 
can never work consistently. It is very important to grasp this. Willpower can only last so long under 
certain circumstances and then it has to give up, in the same way that your heart needs to beat. It cannot 
hold the tone. There has to be the space in between. There has to be this moment of tension and then 
relaxation. The same thing is true for the nature of the stomach. You cannot feed the stomach all day. It is 
not possible. The stomach needs to have its time of rest and then it needs to have its time of work. In 
understanding the nature of the ego, it is important to see that it is always looking for rest. This is 
something about the ego that is not really understood. It is not looking to go out and to shine, to send out 
its willpower. It is basically looking to rest until there is exactly the right timing to release that energy, so 
that the release of that energy is productive because the ego itself knows that it can only be active so long. 
In other words, unless you really have the will, you are not able to climb that mountain. 

The ego recognizes that it must have the resource and, at the same time, in order to get there, it knows that 
it has to rest. This makes the will something that is not always easy for others because it is unlike any of 
the other motors. When you turn on the generator, you turn it on for life until death, frequency after 
frequency, on and on and on. When you turn on the emotional system, you have a lifelong wave. When 
you turn of the adrenaline system, the pressure never goes away. It is constant. The thing about the ego is 
that it works and then it goes on vacation. That is the nature of the ego. 

The ego mechanic, here, in the white book: A will or lack of will to provide for the needy. This is the role 
of the 40th gate. In English, Deliverance has several meanings: Jesus delivered people from their sins. To 
be delivered is almost equivalent to being brought to satori, or enlightenment. To be delivered from evil is 
in the Lord's Prayer. Deliverance carries with it quite a substantial value as a mundane process: to be the 

one that delivers is synonymous with being a breadwinner. If you deliver, you bring home the goods so 
that everybody can eat. Deliverance also has a high mystical and spiritual value to it. 

The very name of this gate is what is really demanded of the ego. The tribe needs the ego to express its 
power. Willpower is something that does not operate in a fixed pattern. All of us know that by the way we 
eat. You can be fairly regular in your eating but you can also have all kinds of variations that run in 
between. Only when the ego system builds up its proper readiness is it going to use that willpower. When 
the willpower is there, its purpose is to provide for those who need. The byproduct of that is that the 
deliverer may in fact do well themselves, but the thing that drives their ego is the need of those who call 
upon it. This is classic in the nature of the 40/37, in the channel of Community, in terms of the marriage 
contract. This is the channel of the marriage contract in sexuality. The reality is that the 40 is expected to 
deliver. The 40 and its ego is expected to go out there in the world and conquer the material plane and, in 
return, it will have its ego massaged. 

The whole thing to understand about the 40th gate is that it is not the big powerful will. We find the 
strong will in the 51st gate. Rather, the 40 is the potential of will that can be built up or inflated by others. 
The ego is simply lazy and basically wants to rest, "Yes, I can do it but, please, I need my rest first before 
I will try that." Before the ego gets going, it has to have something on the other side that says, "You are
