really wonderful," or "There is nothing in the refrigerator and you have to go out and do something about 
it." The fact is that the ego needs to be worked on. If it does not get worked on, if it does not get massaged 
or pumped up, it says, "Sorry, I am tired today and I don't feel like doing it. I will just sit here." 

Above the lines, the key to everything about the 40th gate, it says: The point of transition between 
struggle and liberation. This is the whole business of understanding the ego. It has its time for struggle 
and then it has its required liberation, to be free of the struggle. No ego can stay with struggle. This is 
something so important to understand. You can only push will so far. 

40.1 Recuperation 

When we get to the beginning of any hexagram structure, we begin with the first line in the lower trigram. 
Remember that the lower trigram does not know that there is anything else at the other end of the channel. 
So, they are not social and are quite surprised, even though it happens to be a social channel, the channel 
of the social marriage contract, in that sense. The first three lines are not socially gifted. First lines are 
only interested in the foundation. They themselves tend to be invisible. In other words, they are the kind 
of ego you can't find to tell them that the refrigerator is empty. They are out in the backyard somewhere 
having a snooze. They don't want to have anything to do with that. While they are lying there, they are 
trying to figure out if willpower is something of value in the first place. 

The first line, which always represents the essence of any hexagram, is called Recuperation. It tells you 
what the ego requires. It can only be used for so long and then it must have its rest. If you look at any 
kind of long-term relationship of couples where the man comes home from work and just throws himself 
on the sofa and turns on the TV and blares out his brain, and there is this whole list of things that he could 
be doing. You can't ask him. If you do that, it will create problems because that willpower is also ego. 
"Don't bother me now." The ego must have its rest. When you give it its rest, everything works. 

The ability to relax and enjoy the fruits of one's labors. Whenever I see somebody with this line, I always 
remind them of one thing: Your friends are only of value to you as long as they don't take you aside and 
say, "Excuse me, you really have a problem." For this kind of person, friendship is not having people tell 
them that they have a problem that their willpower has to deal with, that they have to go out and do 
something about. They just want to be able to relax. They will do their work if you let them relax. They 
need to relax. 

This is true for the stomach. It is very important for any human being to understand the nature of 
nutrition. You cannot eat if you are not hungry anymore than willpower can be used if it is not the right 
time and the person who has that capacity does not want to be involved in that process. This is 
devastating for the system. It is extremely unhealthy and creates what people call ulcers. It creates all 
kinds of difficulties within the physical stomach itself. 

The Moon is in detriment. The Moon cannot stand still. The whole thing about this is that this 40th gate, 
though it requires its rest, it cannot just rest. If it can rest when it comes home from work, it has to get up 
the next day and go out into the world and do its thing. In the social context, these are people who do not 
stay with the same relationships in their lifetime. Their communities and families go through changes 
because what they are looking for is to be left in peace. 

In the white book: The ego strength to enjoy being alone. The 40th gate says, "I don't need you." This is 
not true. The 40th gate and the 26th gate are gates of denial. It is in their mechanism to say, "Don't bother 
me now." In order to get the ego to do anything, you have to massage it. That is why this "don't bother 
me" is not true. Otherwise, it will say, "I will stay alone," and the other says, "Oh, no you can't. We really 
need you. We have to have you. You are so important to us." They have to be pulled into the game. 

The other side is: The ego uncomfortable with being alone too long. After the 40th gate had its rest, it 
says, "Why isn't there anybody around being nice to me and asking me to go to work? And who needs 
me? Why doesn't somebody need met" So, they are ready to look for somebody who will need them, so 
that their ego can be puffed up and they can go out and come back and say, "Hey, don't bother me now. 
I'm getting my rest." 

40.2 Resoluteness 

When you are dealing with the second line, you are dealing with a light on inside the house and people 
can see in. Wherever you have the second line, you have to learn in life that other people see things in you 
that you don't see yourself. The 40th hexagram is about aloneness in the ego sense, as we have seen. The 
ego requires its time for rest. It seeks to be alone so that it is not pulled on as an ego force. The second 
line does not know very much about being social and other people. Other people are walking by its house, 
looking through its window and they say, "This one is alone, but this one can have a very strong will. If 
we can get to this one, it is able to do something for us." All of a sudden, the 40 is surprised that there is 
somebody there that is pulling on their willpower. 

Resoluteness. The power and authoriy in deliverance... (aloneness) ... to shed forever the qualities which 
hampered liberation. In other words, for the second line, aloneness is something that is very healthy. It is 
good for them. After all, they don't know how to deal with the outside anyway, so they are stuck on the 
inside. 

When you come to the detriment, you have: A natural peacefulness that in deliverance may sympathize 
with and attempt to nurture the forces which hampered liberation. By the way, liberation is just a word for 
rest. It is better to be alone than having people around who constantly pull you into work. That is what 
this line is saying at its exalted side, but at its detriment side it is saying that one is defenseless in that 
moment that people look inside, see that you have the will and come and get it. 

One of the jokes about me is that my second line is a projection. I project out that I am alone, but it is 
actually not that difficult to come up to me and ask me something, to come into my aura. There are people 
who know how to get in and take that. 

The power through aloneness to recognize the importance and the potential disruptive effect of others. 
"What they are going to get me into now?" This is what you learn. All second lines collapse under 
recognition because this is what a second line is about. This is how they learn. All of a sudden, somebody 
sees something in you that you don't know is there. People are seeing in me that there is some chance to 
make a bargain, and I don't even know that is there. They can see that. 

The other side is: The power of loneliness to blind the ego to the possible disruptive effect of others. 
When somebody gets in, because the second line doesn't know what to do with others, it is basically 
stuck, and it ends up getting pulled into things. The basic demand of the ego: "Would you do me a favor?" 
Anyone who is coming to the ego is coming for its will and its capacity to do things. The aloneness in this 
gate is all about saying, "I'll be with you sometimes. But the rest of the time, leave me alone." Most of the 
people think that is very personal. In other words, they take it as a psychological statement rather than 
what it is. It is a pure ego statement. Willpower can only work so much. What happens to the second line 
is that it really gets disrupted because they don't really know what is going on inside of them. They are 
just busy in their aloneness. 

40.3 Humility 

Before you get to the Pluto exalted in this line, you have an overview statement that says: A calculated 
mode in deliverance to avoid attracting the attention of negative forces. Whenever you see an introduction 
in a line before the exalted and the detriment, that is telling you that you are dealing with a lifelong 
process, an ongoing process, and really is not something that is dealt with properly until one matures in 
life. All third lines are lines of adaptation, and as such are lines of trial and error. 

It will be, in this line of Humility, a trial and error process to find out about aloneness, and to find out in 
your aloneness how not to attract negative forces. It does not mean that you don't attract them. It actually 
means that you will attract negative forces until you finally learn: better to be alone than to have this one 
or that one in your life. Remember that this is fundamentally social and communal, so it really is about 
the other in that sense. 

Pluto exalted. The subtlety to enjoy deliverance... (being alone) ...without having to Haunt it. This is like 
not telling everybody, "You have to work and I can rest. I have done mine." It is not about that. It is about 
enjoying your quiet time, your time between having to use the willpower. 

Mars in detriment. The ego arrogance that demands attention and gets it. In the white book, it gives you a 
clear picture. It says: The capacity of the ego to avoid negative forces even if it means being alone. This is 
what the ego has to learn in the third line. It is better to be alone than to deal with negative forces. 

In the detriment: The capacity of the ego to demand attention. And it gets it, which means that, literally, 
that ego ends up doing all kinds of things that it shouldn't, with the wrong influences in his life. It is so 
important to understand that the power of the will is dependant on the massage. If you have a 40 football 
team and you put them on the field where they are at home, and you have 40,000 people shouting their 
name, pumping them up, they will play better than if there are only ten people and they are all booing. In 
other words, the power of the will is always dependant on who is pulling on that will. 

The 'negative forces' are those forces that do not allow that will to operate properly, or for that rest to be 
allowed in between. It is a trial and error process. It will take time in the life to develop that. They are 
better off alone than having to deal with negative forces. They are not better off alone in general. No ego 
can be alone forever. It must go out and do its business, but it is better to be alone than to be with negative 
forces. You have forces (other people) that say, "I need you to do this. You have to work." If that ego 
does not have the power to do that, does not feel like doing that, does not have strength to do that, it is 

dealing with negative forces because they are pulling on it to do something that is not natural for them. 
Then it is better to be alone. Aloneness has to do with the stomach. You can only be alone so long before 
you go hungry. You have to feed yourself. You have to look after yourself. That is what the willpower is 
for. In the third line, it is a learning process. 

40.4 Organization 

With the fourth line, we come to the upper trigram, to a transpersonal process which is taking place in a 
social channel here. The fourth to sixth lines have specific social skills. Fourth lines are fixed and one- 
pointed. They are unidirectional, one-tracked. 

The fourth line here is: The power to transform and the intuitive intellect to select and organize for the 
purpose of maintaining deliverance. All this means is: when you know that there is another side, how 
much work do you have to give them to keep them happy and quiet so that they continue to massage your 
ego and you'll have your chance for rest? In other words, the more you have your life together on the 
material plane, your job, your work, it is all very healthy. This is being organized. Being able to do your 
work and then having the time to be able to relax. 

The Mars in detriment is different though. An uncontrollable zeal that ignores the quality of support in 
preference for the quantity, which in the long run may destabilize deliverance. These are people that drop 
dead from work. These are workaholics. We are dealing with a fourth line, so you are dealing with this 
fixed externalization. They are really onetracked. "I will get my will out, and then I have to rest." When 
you get to the detriment, it is all about, "Oh, this one wants me. Okay, I will do this work. This one wants 
me; I will get my will out." As long as they keep on getting their ego massaged, it can be very dangerous. 

The fourth line in the white book: The power of the ego when organized and active to maintain 
separateness. Organize actively, do your ego work, and pull away and have your rest. In the same way as 
human beings do when they eat, they should have a chance to rest afterwards. It is healthy for them. In 
Spain, they have these big 'siestas.' You eat, and then everything is closed and there is nothing to do for 
hours, and it is correct. This is great for the stomach. 

On the other side: The empowering of the ego through the capacity to organize others. The more they get 
into that organization, the less time they have left. They are so busy dealing with using their will that they 
don't take their rest. And again, this is something that is essential. We cannot overwork the ego. The more 
you overwork it, the less productive it becomes. 

40.5 Rigidity 

All first lines tell you about the intrinsic nature of a hexagram, and fifth lines tell you how everybody sees 
them. The ego is never seen by society as being something that is pleasant. The ego puts food in 
civilization's mouth and yet, at the same time, the ego says, "Keep a low profile. Don't show it too much 
because it is not a nice thing." 

The fifth line here is called Rigidity. The projection onto this ego is that it is rigid. The overview line here 
shows that it is a lifelong process. The recognition that to achieve liberation... (to achieve your rest) ...all 
negative forces must be rejected. The demands on the ego always have to be censored. The ego is 
standing there saying, "What do you actually want from me? Tell me exactly. Then I know whether you 
are a positive or a negative force, so I know whether my will suits that. " 

Uranus exalted. The revolutionary who demands absolute victory. Absolute victory in this sense is, "I do 
my thing when I want. And when I rest, leave me alone." Fifth lines in the 40 have great advantages in 

life because people project on them that that is exactly what they are going to be like. They will be rigid. 
This is what others project on them, "This is a rigid ego. It will do its thing when it wants, and otherwise, 
it will do nothing." That is how society sees it. 

By the way, it does not mean that that is true. You can see what happens in the detriment. Remember that 
the fifth line is in harmony to the second. In the second line, in the detriment, we saw the natural 
peacefulness that will let in the wrong force and have that wrong force pull it out of its aloneness. Here, 
the fifth line in the detriment is: A tendency in revolution to accept a certain amount of necessary 
deviation on the assumption that it can be successfully purged later. 

'Let them keep on making that kind of demand on me because it is nice that they are here giving me this 
massage. But afterwards, I will teach them not to do that." It is typical of the 40's rigidity. The power of 
the ego is maintained in the rejection of negative relationships. Remember, what is negative to the ego is 
simply anything that calls on it when it does not want to work. The ego is not an awareness. It is just a 
motor. You can have a 40 sitting at the telephone and they get 5 calls from people. Four of them ask them 
to do things, and they just don't like the people and do not identify with the thing. Then the fifth call 
comes and they say, "I am ready," and off they go. They are ready to do it. It all depends on who is 
calling. This is what moves the world. 

The weakness of the ego in its loneliness to maintain and not reject negative relationships. The ego is 
always vulnerable to its aloneness because it survives on the massage. Even though it needs to push the 
other away, it does not want to push them away too far. They want to make sure that they will be close 
enough later so that they can massage them again, so that they are ready to go back and do their thing. 
This is the nature of the ego. People do not particularly like it. 

40.6 Decapitation 

Sixth lines are never part of the hexagram. They are sifting on the roof and because of that, they have a 
totally different perspective. The 40.6 perspective is more than just the gate at the other end of the 
channel. It goes out to the entire circuit. It is looking at all of the possibilities that are there in the tribal 
circuitry. And more than that, the sixth line is moving in a track. The next thing that it is going to meet is 
the 64.1. It is on its way to many different things. When it is sifting up there on the roof, you cannot 
expect it to respond in the way the rest of the lines do. 

This sixth line is called Decapitation. It is an overview line; it is a lifelong process. Remember something 
about all sixth lines. Whatever the description of a sixth line is, you live it out quickly when you are 
young and then you avoid it almost entirely for the rest of your life. If you have the 59.6, you have a lot of 
one night stands until the age of 18 to 25, and then you never do it again. The fact of the matter is that 
what happens with sixth lines is that you live them out, but the moment you realize that you are not 
getting what you want out of that, it stops. The sixth line is a cosmic fence sitter. 

In this image of the community or the family, think about what this line says. It says: The necessary 
destruction of inferior forces in positions of power before liberation can take place. This is about, who are 
these people to make demands on the ego? You can imagine the 40.6 sitting on the roof of their house and 
looking into the garden and seeing their family there. They know which ones should be taken from power 
because they know exactly which ones put pressure on the will system that is not correct. They are 
inferior. They do not belong there. The will is an incredible thing if it is properly treated, but if not, it is a 
very destructive thing. 

The Sun exalted. The authority, coupled with the magnanimity to remove from power only those who 
deserve such drastic treatment. All of the language here in this hexagram was about 'negative forces'. The 

sixth line talks about 'inferior forces'. The demands that the negative forces make on the will are 
legitimate; they are just not particularly good for that will and so are only negative in that sense. But the 
inferior forces make demands that are unfair, unnecessary, and unreasonable. They are the ones that have 
to be removed from power and that is the gift of the sixth line in the 40. 

The Earth in detriment. Exemplified by the terror of the French revolution, where the idea of who was 
deserving of punishment was cruelly extended to an entire class. We are dealing with the tribe here. "How 
dare the state tax me until I am dead? I will kill those bastards because they are inferior and destroying 
my society, my family, my life. They are taxing my willpower to the point that I cannot function 
anymore." That is not about negative forces anymore. That is about inferior forces because they make 
claims and bargains with the will that are unfair. "You go out and do that for me, darling, and I will give 
you a reward." Then you go home and there is no reward. It is not fair, and the sixth line learns that very 
early. It climbs up to the top of the house and says, "They have no right to tell me to do that." 

The power and authority of the ego to reject individuals in legitimate defense of the group. If the ego is 
treated properly, everybody benefits. The other side is: The distortion of the ego through power and 
authority. What is important for the 40.6 is that if you have a child with this line, you cannot create false 
bargains with them. You cannot make these deals that are famous in tribes. "You take out the garbage and 
I do that." You'd better keep your word. Otherwise, you become an inferior force and they will cut off 
your head. 

HEXAGRAM 41 DECREASE 

The pressure centers are of enormous importance, like all things. We are basically a sandwich. You have 
a pressure above and a pressure below, and everything else is just squashed in the middle. Those 
pressures rule the nature of the world that we live in. They fuel all of the basic potentials of what it is to 
be in a body, of what it is to live out the consciousness of being a human being. They are essential and 
they are always present. 

When I say they are always present, that is not a matter of whether you have them personally in your 
design or not. As long as they are in the world, they are a part of the aura of the world and everybody gets 
in contact with them. So, in looking at these pressure centers, please understand that we are looking at the 
fundamental root of all human processes. In that, the fundamental source of pressure is necessary to 
initiate all of these processes. 

I start with the 41st hexagram for a particular reason. We are living in a time in which the 41st hexagram 
is activated by outer planets so we are going to have a deep continuing experience with it. The 41 st 
hexagram is the fuel or the pressure of an abstract stream in the sensing circuit, the stream of feeling. This 
stream is a uniquely human stream. It is the evolutionary and genetic material necessary for us to 
experience incarnation in a human form. Without this stream, the human evolutionary process would not 
exist. Not only are we speaking here of a fundamental pressure for a life process, but in particular, to 
understand it is not shared with any other form of life. This is a very specific pressure and a very specific 
stream that is directly associated with what we experience as being human. 

The 41st hexagram, as a codon in our genetic code, is the only initiating codon. It is an initiating codon in 
the sense that it begins. It is at the beginning in the genetic structure of everything. Thus, we begin with 
the 41 st hexagram, with the most important pressure in our evolutionary process now and ever since we 
became Homo sapiens, or modern humans. The 41st hexagram is the trigger that brought us into the stage 
that we are in and we are still going towards completion. 

What is unique for us as human beings is the capacity to be able to feel. This capacity leads to the need, 
the desire for experience. The desire for experience to be able to feel and manifest that feeling is the 
human evolutionary process. It is what drives us from one experience to the next until we develop through 
that process. It also brings into play the nature of crisis. In other words, it tells us very clearly that the 
evolutionary process is rooted in crisis, change and transitoriness. The 41st gate, Decrease, is the gate of 
contraction and it is the fuel in which there is the energy to feel, or not. So, the whole capacity to feel, the 
complete potential that exists in our genetic spectrum, is rooted in the 41. 

In looking at sexuality in Human Design, the 41 is the gate of fantasy, the capacity to be able to fantasize 
the feeling itself because all the feelings lie there. The old Chinese image of the 41st hexagram was the 
gardener who would cut back the garden in the wintertime or fall to prepare it for the following season. 
By cutting it back, nothing was lost because all the potential of that plant, everything that that plant could 
possibly be, every twig, every leaf and every flower, was already there within it, contracted inside, held 
inside as a potential. So the 41st gate carries with it this enormous potential for any kind of experience. 

This is the key to what it is to be human. Its mechanic is that it is always about hunger. A human being is 
so different from its animal kin. They only have one kind of hunger: basic, predatory hunger to stay alive. 
But human beings have a duality in that. We have the material hunger, the hunger for survival, but we 
also have this other hunger, the deeper one: the human hunger for experience. To go to Mars and see what 
the rocks look like. What for? Just to see what the rocks are. To discover America. What for? Just to see 
what is there on the other side. The basic fuel, the fundamental fuel for the evolutionary process, is the 
hunger to feel. 

The whole key to being an abstract being, whatever kind of abstract definition you have, is that the 
essential understanding about life is rooted in something very simple: one step after the other. Don't 
repeat your steps. Look at what that really is saying, like the 64th gate in the ajna: because there is so 
much potential information, built into these gates is a mechanism that is ready to release only one at a 
time. In other words, all those feelings are built up within the nature of the 41 as a resource. 

Above the lines in the black book it says, The limitation of resources which maximizes development of 
potential. If you have all these fantasies running around inside of you, it will diminish your potential. If 
you focus your energy (the name of this channel) on one fantasy, on one feeling, then you can move 
through that. And when it is over, you can go on to the next one. 

This is the key to the abstract process, this maximization of that potential by recognizing that this resource 
is always there. You don't have to have all the fantasies all the time, you can have one at a time and go 
through what is the correct evolutionary process. 

41.1 Reasonableness 

Remember, when you are looking at a hexagram, the first line is always going to represent not simply the 
foundation of the hexagram, but its essential truth. What is its basis? 

The first line is Reasonableness. You can't have all of your fantasies because you will lose your power. 
You must get one and then go on to the next. Reasonableness becomes the key. The appropriate 
delegation of responsibility. The first line is looking inward. It has no capacity to look outward. It is 
interested in what the essential mechanism is. What is fantasy? That is the question that the first line 
always asks. 

When the first line of the 41 is a child, they want to know what the difference is between what is real and 
what is fantasy. They want to grasp that right away. What is fantasy? The appropriate delegation of 
responsibility; it is the theme we have just been looking at. 

Remember that we are dealing with the root center, with the adrenaline hormone, the stress hormone. The 
root center carries with it enormous power. There is a tremendous fuel at work here. So, the appropriate 
delegation of responsibility is how to use that energy. In other words, what fantasy, what feeling do you 
focus on? Don't get caught up in just seeing that fantasy. If you are somebody who is focusing on feeling 
good about the day and feeling bad about your work and you are a Al. 1, you will be very uncomfortable. 
Either focus on the good feeling (that it is a nice day) or focus on feeling bad (because you are at work), 
but do not try to focus on both of them. It will not work for you. It will not be productive for you. It will 
not be a healthy fueling of your potential. 

Remember the mirrors, the dualistic interplay in Design. The splenic system is our immune system. It is 
our protection from disease. We know that it is all about health. But recognize as well that there is illness 
that strikes the solar plex system, this powerful motor emotional system: emotional illness, emotional 
unhealthiness, lack of balance, emotionally. When these fuels are properly recognized and you live out 
their nature, then the solar plex, the emotional system, benefits from that and it becomes healthier. It is 
getting a healthier fuel. These are pressures, and they carry with them a great deal of force. I would have 
used the word 'conditioning' but I do not want to confuse you. This power carries a great deal of force. 

This line has Neptune exalted. The imagination to make the very best out of very little. You don't need to 
have all the feelings to get everything out of it. One focused feeling can take you all the way: always will, 
always can. That Neptunian side tends to be people who are much more caught up in the fantasy of the 

41, the Neptunian quality of that. Anybody who has Neptune there has it veiled automatically. Think 
about that: the foundation is automatically veiled, so it can be very mysterious and it tends to be about 
fantasy on the non-manifesting side. 

The Mercurial side: A tendency in understanding to assume capability, leading to strain. I always tell 
people with the 41 st gate: it is wonderful for you to have this feeling, this fantasy inside, but don't ever 
think that there is more for you. Remember that everything about the abstract stream is about our process 
of expectations. If you do one step after the other, you assume that you will get somewhere because that is 
the nature of the abstract process. The assumption of capability is when you look inside and you see you 
have this fantasy, you think that because you can fantasize it, you can do it. I can fantasize making love to 
Martians but I will not be able to do it. The reality is that for these people, this is often very difficult. You 
can see it in the white book. It talks about coolness and the hothead: the cool and hot of the pressure to 
feel. This is the fundamental duality in fantasy: they are either cool or hot fantasies. 

Coolness, where the energy to release feelings is selective. In other words, one is clear about one feeling 
at a time. By the way, these feelings can come very quickly but as long as they are one at a time, it is 
okay. The hothead, the urge to release feelings. What happens to these people is that they can get into a 
great deal of trouble in life because they have within them this need to feel out what is essentially nothing 
more than a fantasy, with very little odds of realizing it. 

Remember that only the fourth to the sixth lines really have the skills to integrate with the energy on the 
other side. The first line is simply there to look into the nature of the feeling, of the fantasy, but the 
moment it is trying to live that out, it will get a lot of crises. If they are truly emotional people, they will 
enjoy their crises anyway. The 41st gate is a potential to release your own feelings and it is also a 
potential to condition the release of feelings in others. 

The 41st hexagram is a nice meditation. You have to see that we have six steps in our evolutionary 
process, and we are not at the sixth line yet. Wie will all have very interesting experiences as a collective 
(not necessarily individually) with the movement of Neptune and Uranus reaching 41.6. It is an 
evolutionary process. We have gone as far as the fifth line. So, when you are looking at this process, the 
first thing to recognize about the very first step is that human evolution was rooted in focus on the feeling, 
and then you get the experience. That is how you learn. If you are sitting there and you have a zillion 
feelings, you do not move. There is no way to go. The very first thing that distinguished us was the

gate at the other end, to begin a process of actually manifesting that as experience was there. 

41.2 Caution 

When you come to the second line, you are no longer in the foundation. Now you have this deep genetic

that: collective. 

The two sides of this are Saturn and Mars. A conservative nature that does not risk its own security in 
aiding others. You can fantasize how you can help somebody and you can then go and focus on that and 
do it. You can fantasize on helping somebody and not be able to manifest that at all. You can have a 
feeling for starving children in Biafra and not send any coins. These things are all built into the Saturnian 
line. 

In the white book: Energy for one's own feelings but not for others. To focus on one's own feelings, one's 
own fantasies, and not on the feelings of others or whatever their requirements happen to be. 

The Martian side is The energy for the display of feelings for recognition. This is trying to get others to 
recognize that one is a feeling person. Remember that the second line is projecting outward. 

A desire for recognition that throws caution to the winds, depleting valuable resources for only temporary 
gain. This stream is about desire for change, for experience and about the desire to fulfill one's fantasies. 
It is the expectation that if one has a fantasy and fulfills it, one is going to get something. The second line 
is projecting outwards that they have this resource inside of them. 

Remember the immaturity of Mars. Immaturity is not a question of good or bad. The immature 41.2,

are projecting something out and do not have the quality of the first line. They do not have this

kinds of difficulties for them. 

There is something else about this: already in this second line, which is very rare, there is a need for 
others. This is the most sexual of all the streams and there is no way that the human experience was going 
to be allowed to be individual. It wasn't. They are collective and, as such, early (in the second line, a line 
that is titled Humanism) there is a need to display this feeling for others to fulfill the feeling, the fantasy, 
the collective process of not having the experience by yourself, but sharing the experience with somebody 
else. The second line is not equipped. It is Mars; it is immature and it has its problems with that. The 
exalted line, the Saturnian field, is more secure in that role. 

41.3 Efficiency 

One of the dilemmas of the collective process is that somebody always starts it. So, in that essence, there 
is always an individual, a single being, that starts to change events. When you are looking at the whole 
evolutionary process here, you will see in the dualities of the lines that the exalted tend to point towards 
doing things by oneself, whereas the detriment says, "No, we have to involve everybody else." The third 
line is classic of this. Remember that the third line is completing a process. It has qualities of the first and 
second line. It has completed the process in the sense that it is, within itself, ready to experiment. 

The third line is about trial and error, bonds made and broken. It is about this learning process which is 
called Efficiency here. In times of decrease selfishness is justified. In that moment of your feeling, what it 
is saying is: release your energy into that feeling and you will discover whether that is a mistake or not. 
Wait and see. But release all of your energy into that feeling. That is efficient. 

Remember that the adrenaline system, if it is defined in somebody, must be used. This energy must be 
worked. It is absolutely essential. When that energy is being used properly, that is what efficiency is all 
about. Because it is a. third line, it means that you are not instantly efficient. It means that you have to 
learn how to be efficient, when to release energy into a fantasy, when to release energy into a feeling. 
This is not about an awareness that tells you when. It is about a process that, if you don't do it right, it 
does not work and you learn from that experience and you try to do it differently the next time, as a result 
of that learning experience. 

Saturn exalted. Material ambition and the discipline to go at it alone; and The energy that fuels the feeling 
for personal ambition. Very much oriented towards someone's rather than the collective's experience. "I 

will see how that mushroom tastes. That is my fantasy. I want to feel what that is like. I want to have that 
experience." If the person drops dead after eating the mushroom, nobody else will do it. But if that person

have to do is to eat one of these," then it can become a collective experience, a collective feeling. What 
this line is saying is that efficiency is to put your energy into your feeling and your fantasy. 

When you come to the other side, you have the Moon in detriment. I have my design Moon in this line. I 
know it well. 

Instinctive assistance, admirable but in this position misguided, where two will use up resources more 
than twice as fast as one. The energy that fuels the feeling to share. I am very individual. This is the only 
part of me that really is designed to give anything to anybody at any time. One of the jokes in my life is

This feeling that one has to share: now, it is a detriment. Think of the jokes. 

This whole stream is about the human experience and though each of these early lines are geared towards

41.4 Correction 

When we get to the upper trigram, we get to a different kind of process because the fourth and fifth lines 
are oriented towards the other end of the channel. They recognize the potential at the other side through 
definition. By their very nature, the fourth and fifth lines are the social lines because it is inherent in their 
genetic capacity to integrate and to look across the channel for the definition. 

Here, we are dealing with a very collective stream, with an experiential stream, a sexual stream. That 
means we are dealing with very powerful forces. The moment you come to the fourth line, you come to 
the fixedness of a fourth line. Fourth lines are unidirectional. They are fixed. The first thing we can 
recognize about that is that, given the nature of this gate, this is a very appropriate line. Decrease is 
designed to operate with one feeling at a time, with one fantasy you are focused on at a time. So, this 
unidirectional capacity in the fourth line is of value. You are focused and fixed on your feeling. You are 
holding back all of this fuel, waiting for the moment that the potential is there because you can recognize 
that when the potential is there, you can get that energy across, focused on it. 

What often happens is that 41.4's get locked into being fixed on one feeling, one fantasy, and can be fixed 
on a certain feeling or fantasy for a very long time, even throughout their whole life because it is this 
fixedness that is there. But there is a great advantage in that fixedness. 

The line is called Correction. Successful adaptation to limitation. The limitation is, "I am a fuel. I am not 
a potential." The limitation is very basic. In this line, the Earth is exalted. When we have the Earth 
exalted, you recognize that it is part of a regular cycle of the Earth. It is something that is going to happen 
twice a year. It is a very strong grounding force in that sense. Out of the Earth, we get our basic security. 

Here, we have a classic line. Survival of the fittest-in the Darwinian concept-and its eventual flourishing. 
The fixedness of humanity on a feeling, on a fantasy, guaranteed that it would be the top of the food 

chain. We are to be at the top of the food chain. The survival of the fittest is our movement. The survival 
of the fittest is the perfection that comes out of being unidirectional in one's fantasy and feeling, to get 
there finally, to be able to fly, to be able to go to space, to do whatever the case may be and to be fixed on 
that. 

The Venusian side: The expenditure of energy on maintaining relationships rather than on correction. It 
immediately goes back into the powerful relationship field. In times of decrease, weak associations are 
shunned as costly, no matter how attractive. The survival of the fittest is that you are always in the 
process that you are fixed on but you have to adapt along the way. Otherwise, you will never get to your 
goal. 

Here, the focus is different. The focus is pulled out to the other. Remember that the fourth and fifth lines 
will always go across. By being pulled out to the other, it loses its fixedness, but it maintains the 
relationships. That is the other side of it. You have the fantasy that you want to be able to do something in 
a certain way and the people that you are with do not want to do it that way. They want to do something 
that is similar, but their way. You do not want to lose them so you go along with that. Thus, you lose that 
fixedness which is very important. These people can end up being very frustrated because they don't get 
to live out this experience. 

About 50,000 years ago, we got to the point of this line. It was probably around the same time that we 
began to have relationships with animals in which we could not simply kill them but control them. 

41.5 Authorization 

The first line always gives you the essential truth of the hexagram, but the fifth line is always how it is 
perceived by the world around us. We know that when we are dealing with the structure of a hexagram, 
we are dealing with a resonance within a hexagram, the music within a hexagram. The first line is in 
resonance with the fourth line, the second with the fifth, and the third with the sixth. The foundation of 
knowing what a fantasy is leads to being able to externalize that fantasy and being fixed on getting that 
feeling out. In the second line, we saw the capacity to project out this fuel, this pressure within you, this

somebody who automatically is going to have projected on them that they have this resource, that they 
have the feeling and the fantasy. "1 know that person will go along with me. I know that they have the 
same feeling I have." This is projected onto that person. They may or may not. 

This fifth line is called Authorization. Think about this in evolutionary terms. This is the stage of our 
evolutionary process that we are in now. We have given authority (we have projected authority) onto this 
essential process of experience. From the moment that we entered into this stage of our development, we 
have had more experiences than we could ever possibly have imagined earlier. The 20th century is full of

given authority to the experiential way. This is what it is to be human. Vas go after this and that, and we 
go to Mars and the stars, etc., until we finally shake hands with God. 

Authorization. The external recognition of one's potential despite limitations. Think about the nature of 
what it is to have any root gate that has no natural outlet. You have this powerful motor with all this 
essential fuel, all this essential resource material waiting for that opportunity, waiting within the limitation 
of only being fuel. Do not attribute awareness to any of these gates. They are not aware; they are fuels. 
That fuel is not a potential. The 30 is the potential, the 36 is the possibility and the manifestation does not 
come until you get all the way up to the Progress in the throat. There is a lot of limitation in just having 
the fantasy or the resource of the feeling. You may never get them out. 

Think about the 41.5. They have a greater chance to release their feelings and fantasies than anybody else 
on Earth because everybody else is ready to project on them that they have a feeling and a fantasy. So, 
these people are always at risk because they can end up just firing rockets. Everybody comes up to them 
and says, "Aha. I know that you want to do this with me. Let me provide you with the potential, okay?" 

Mars exalted. That tells you something right away. Whenever you see Mars exalted you know that this is 
all about just let it go.' The value of energy when properly channeled. There are people in America who 
asked me if this was a channeling line. The answer is yes. It is written here. Properly channeled energy is

The fuel for properly channeled feelings despite limitations. These people are always being projected

Venus in detriment. Look at the fourth line and the fifth lines which are the only social lines. We have a 
collective stream and we know that it is deeply social. It is about the development of humanity, and

Limitations initiate the fuel for negative feelings. Think about what that is like for a 41.5, when somebody 
comes up to them and says, "I am deaf, dumb and blind. Could you give me three bucks?" It is very

Wherever you see a fifth line, you have the theme of being victimized, used by others, in that sense,

mechanism, it is not that you can change the impact of somebody hooking into it but, by being aware of

about having energy. 

I have a defined ego. I will offer my willpower sometimes to others, but not always. Before I became 
aware of that energy, I was always empowering everybody around me with my will. I do not do that 
anymore. It is not something that I trained myself. It is a byproduct of being aware of your own nature. It

The other thing that we always have as a footnote to any of these discussions is that any of these aspects, 
any of these lines, can only be seen in the context of somebody's design. How those things are going to

You have manifestors with the 41.5, where the energy might go through the spleen and go up to the throat

41.6 Contagion 

When you get to the sixth line, please keep in mind that we are looking at this 41st hexagram as a key to 
understand our human evolutionary process. When I say human evolutionary process, I do mean strictly 
that. This time frame that we have, in which we are in these kinds of vehicles and functioning the way we 
do, we are at the stage of the fifth line, but we are not yet at the stage of the sixth line. We will first deal 
with the mutation that will bring about the awakening of what we call emotional consciousness, or spirit 
consciousness. But there is something else that has to take place. One of the more mysterious things that 
the Voice told me about our evolutionary process is that when the change comes, when we lose these 
vehicles and we go on to our next process, that this stream that starts in the 41 and goes all the way up, 
will disappear. It will not exist anymore and this reality is built into this line. 

Contagion. The law that the maximization of potential not only ends decrease (ends feeling, ends fantasy) 
but inevitably such transcendence benefits others. 

Think about how I describe what the nature of emotional or spirit consciousness is like. We have 
emotional waves that are being generated and, between those waves as they interact with each other, there 
is a field, an interactive field, a field where the consciousness actually will exist. We do not understand 
such a thing. It is not possible anyway to understand it in the logical sense of the word. This is something 
where our experience of consciousness will be outside of our individual bodies and will not be our own 
consciousness, but it will be a consciousness that we are sharing with somebody else, or a group of 
people, or ultimately, a planetary field. Something that is in a slow developing process. 

When you get to the sixth line of a hexagram, you get to the roof of the house. You get to the end of the 
process. We know that we find the potential of wisdom in every sixth line and, therefore, it is less likely 
to function in the nature of what the hexagram is than any of the other lines. It says, "What for?" and 
"Why should I? I want to see the whole thing." You cannot see the whole experiential field. It is not 
possible. The law is that the maximization of potential ends in decrease, ends this process of constantly 
needing another experience. This process of constantly going from one thing to the next will come to an 

end. But inevitably such transcendence (after all, it is transcendence we are talking about here) benefits 
others. At the moment that we are no longer looking for the new experience, we are all in one thing 
together, as long as there is not the drive within humanity that it has to be more. 

Saturn exalted. The maximization of the potential of form. The father (or the mother) whose success will 
benefit his children. It is very important to understand that the children of Homo sapiens, if you look at 
this from the mystical side, will be something else. This transition out of the experiential way, its 
completion, will lead to the transcendence that not those who do transcend will experience. They will go

By the way, that has mundane applications as well, like all lines. The 41.6, when it can make a fuelling 
commitment to an energy, can ultimately benefit others through that and be of value. It is called 
Contagion. They can lead all kinds of human beings into an experiential trend. These people can be 
trendsetters. But ultimately, the major trend, the ultimate trend, the mystical trend, is when we have a lack 
of experience: when the need for experience, the desire for experience, is left behind. That is when the 
process is complete. We are not there yet. 

Pluto in detriment. The tendency in transcendence to keep it a secret in fear of being deprived of its 
special advantages. This is what we are going to experience in the next century. The way in which 
evolution works is that we will have pockets all over the planet of different kinds of creatures, like us, that

bizarre. They will be the ones that are different in the way in which experience is initiated because they

They will be the root of cults in the next century that will say that, not only is it all coming to an end, but 
they are already dying from it, that there is no place to go, that there is nowhere for humanity to go, that 
humanity is going to die out. They will have a lot of confirmation of that because it will look like that. We 
will have a vast decrease in population. 

Here in the white book: The fuel for recognition through feelings; and The fuel for secret or repressed 
feelings. Be careful with the words 'repressed feelings'. Ultimately, that is what is going to take place, in

Please understand that we are moving towards a time in which we need to be vastly organized, organized

You can see some of that now in what people call the AIDS epidemic. One of the things about the stream

You will have a reaction to this in the environment until all of the experiences, the feelings and desires

For us, nothing that I am describing is particularly pleasant. For us, we are part of the aura of the fifth line 
where we give authority to experience. Without experience, you do not know. That is why we have virtual 
reality. Nobody gets the experience, vie already have vast movements at work to take us out of needing to 
physically have the experience ourselves, and yet, we have come into the world in a time where it still has

The experiential drive is coming to an end. The whole experiential nature of being human is coming to an

The deepest event in the next century will be that the fertility capacity in humans will be devastated. We

It is like the project to Mars. They spend 256 million dollars to get it there. They are spending about 1 12

HEXAGRAM 42 INCREASE 

We are dealing with the collective process here. We are dealing with the collective power of the sacral 
center. One of the things to recognize about the nature of the collective, and it is something that you 
should always keep in mind when you are looking at somebody's chart or definition, that the collective is 
not personal. The whole nature of collective circuitry is that, inherent in it is the capacity and the need to 
be able to share. The reality is that it is the most social of all circuitry and, in that sense, it is the most 
social of all energy. It is energy that is there to be shared for collective purposes. The collective abstract 
process is about the energy for experience. 

It is very important to understand that our abstract process defines the nature of what it is to be alive in 
the world. It defines what it is to be human and what our human process is: that is, moving from one 
experience to another so that we can learn from that experience. When we begin here with the 42nd 
hexagram, Increase, we begin with this process of the energy or the power to be able to complete the 
necessary energy in order to be able to make a commitment to a life experience. So, the 42nd hexagram 
starts this process of energizing the possibility of being able to go through a complete experience. 

It says above the lines: The expansion of the resources which maximizes the development of full 
potential. The full potential to go through the human experience. This channel, Maturation, is a design of 
balanced development. Yet, everybody who deals with the nature of the abstract is always saying, "Yes, 
wait a minute, now." It is full of crisis, change and instability. There is all this emotional up and down 
that goes with it. But this is the human experiential way. 

42.1 Diversification 

First lines always speak for the nature of the hexagram. The first line is called Diversification. This is not 
synthesis. This is not the first line of the third hexagram. This is diversification. This is literally the 
foundation of the experiential way. That is: not to do the same thing twice. This is the lesson for the 
abstract person. "Do it once, have the experience, put it in your bank account and go on to the next thing." 
The essence begins with diversification. 

Sun exalted. The ability when surplus resources are available to extend one's activities beyond their 
normal scope. On the logic side, we are stuck with patterns and habits. That is the logic side. It is about 
patterns and habits which lock you into a fixed way of living out your process. The abstract comes along 
and says, "I have to go beyond these patterns and habits in order to have my experience." The surplus 
resources to go beyond just the strict patterns to find that additional experience. 

Venus in detriment. A tendency when surplus resources are available to centrifugal application. 
Decadence. In the white book it says: Growth through expansion, particularly when defined to the root; or 
Too much expansion can lead to decadence. Now look, the decadence in this is what happens to your 
energy the moment that you are placing your energy commitments in too many places. This is something 
that comes back to one of the most important things that you can do in a reading for people. 

When people have a defined sacral center, people who are generators by nature, for them to understand 
that only when their sacral center makes the commitment as "uh-huh" are they really going to have the 
energy and not descend into decadence. What so often happens to sacral people is that they make their 
decisions in life based on other places (their emotional system, their throat or their mind) and, in doing so, 
they literally do become decadent in the way they are using their energy because most of that energy is 
not going towards their process experientially but is being fed off to others. 

This can create all kinds of energy problems in the human being themselves, aside from the dilemma of 
people who say, "You have broken your word, your promise or this commitment." The 42 is always under 
pressure to finish things, so it can feel very guilty when it can't finish things. This is the decadence that 
can come in. Without the clarity to understand where the energy goes. Remember that there is no 
awareness here. There is the energy to grow and complete but there is no awareness. There is the energy 
to be diversified, but how diversified? How far out do you go? How many different experiences do you 
go after? Are they really for you? If they are not, they will eat up your energy. 

42.2 Identification 

The first line, due to its introspective nature, recognizes that it has a resource and that those resources can 
be available for all kinds of diversity. It does not know what to do with it but nonetheless, it knows that 
that is there. When you come to the second line, the projective line, you know that they do not know 
whether they have the resources or not. What they are doing is that they are projecting out that they have 
their resources. 

The line is called Identification. Sun exalted. Recognition and acute capitalization of trends. Remember 
that somebody who has anything in the abstract process is always interested in a new experience that 
comes along. They are the first ones. When I go and give public lectures, the room is filled with 1 1 /56's. 
They just come and say, "Aha, a new idea, something new and different to think about! Some new 
possible experience!" The identification is literally being able to make your energy (projected) available, 
and then the diversity is shown to you, in that sense. 

The whole thing about that is that you don't really know, as a second line, whether you really have the 
resources. You can identify that. You can recognize that straight away, "Aha, there is an experience, a 
new thing that is available to me." You are projecting out but you don't really know if it is for you. You 
do not really know if you can handle it. This is not about awareness. 

The Venusian detriment: An ascetically motivated withdrawal in times of progressive change. These are 
people that are projecting out their resource and then, all of a sudden, everything around them changes 
and there is this sense that what they are projecting out does not fit in anymore. In other words, on both 
sides of this line is this capacity to be able to project out exactly into a new experience to see whether one 
has what it takes or not. Or, at the very same time, to recognize that there is something different going on, 
some new experience that is available, but not feeling equipped. Remember that the second line always 
has this dilemma of not knowing whether or not there is the necessary depth, the necessary tools. 

In the white book: Power for growth through participating in trends. The moment that these people see a 
new trend, they can project their energy into it. The other side of this is: Growth which stops in reaction to 
trends or change. Because, all of a sudden, they are out of step. They can be in step or they can be out of 
step, but it is all a projection. There is no guarantee of the depth underneath. 

42.3 Trial and Error 

Everything that we have been talking about in terms of third lines, here, you get to see the archetype of 
what a third line is. After all, when you are dealing with the abstract, you are dealing with the experiential 
way. You are dealing with the human process and the keynote of the third line is Trial and Error. This is 
the term that we have been using: trial and error, bonds made and broken. In times of increase... You can 
substitute growth for 'increase'. This is the maturing process. How we grow is through trial and error. 
...mistakes are a natural part of the process. 

Mars exalted. The energy and assertion to turn mistakes into advantages. This is so difficult for people to 
recognize. What they call a mistake is only a point on an arc of a path. It is not something that you have to 
go back to. We do not go back to anything. We are flying at 445,000 kilometers an hour in space. You 
cannot turn around at that speed. You can't even put on the brakes at that speed. There is nothing to do 
about that. It is very important to understand that. So look, the mistakes become advantages. That is the 
nature of growth. 

In this line you see a phenomenon that all parents know with their children. When children are young and 
they get sick with a fever, they grow. If you measure them two days later, they have grown. You can look 
at the sickness and say, "Oh, my goodness. Here is a failure. The child is not well. I did not look after it 
properly." The fact is that that illness is an advantage because the illness itself is part of the growth 
process. Otherwise, it would not be there. It is very important to understand the essence of trial and error. 
We have an obsession with 'no mistakes.' No mistakes? You might as well die because there is no growth 
and maturity and there is no process. 

On the other side of this, the Moon in detriment. A moodiness that in error may succumb to brooding and 
unnecessary caution. "Oh, I made a mistake. It is terrible. I have to be careful next time. I will not do that 
again." 

The power to accept mistakes as part of the growth. Here is Mars, the twelve-year-old child in all its 
glory. This is one of the best positions you can have for Mars in your design. Mars saying, "Yes, I have 
the power to grow." 

Mistakes give power to moodiness and caution. Trial and error really is the essence. Remember that the 
resonance to the third line is always the sixth line, the possibility for a profound mutation, for a transition 
to take place. Growth is rooted in trial and error. 

42.4 The Middle Man 

When you come to the fourth line, you come to the upper trigram. We now have a transpersonal process. 
There is this recognition of what is at the other end of the channel and so we have a totally different 
process. Always remember the limitation that is there in the first three lines: this deep involvement in the 
nature of the gate itself. "I have the resources, I project the resources, I adapt to the resources." But it is 
still within itself. 

When you get to the fourth line, you get to something different. This transpersonal is the beginning of the 
recognition that, in order for experience to be achieved, it has to be achieved through union with others, in 
consort or connection with others. This line, by the way, is a line that I have seen in, I think now, seven 
different midwives. 

This line is called The middle man. It should probably be called the midwife. This would be a great line to 
call the midwife because this is the energy to provide the resources by being in the middle, in mediation, 
providing the resources for others. In other words, there is this intrinsic recognition that the maturity 
cannot be established alone. 

The Moon exalted. The quintessential manifestation of the mediator. On the Venusian side we have: the 
gift to establish and maintain relationships is ill-suited in this position to act in mediation, where harmony 
must take a back seat to pragmatism. This is about using these resources carefully, not simply working on 
the social level of recognizing that there is another end of the channel. 

Remember that collective circuitry is, by its very nature, social. So, underneath all of these lines is lying 
this social imperative that says, "I have to share this." Here in the fourth line it is, "I have to share my 
resources." What happens is that, in the detriment, they get caught up in the social aspect, trying to make 
sure that everybody is harmonious and that everything is okay, instead of putting the energy into their real 
business. That is like a woman being in labor and the midwife is putting her energy into trying to be 
harmonic with this woman who is in labor, instead of putting her energy right there to what the process is. 

There are times when the social aspect takes away from the necessary pragmatism. These are people that 
have wonderful energy but, so often, their energy is used by other people. Their resources are given away 
to others simply because they want to establish a harmonic social environment and that becomes more 
important than just pragmatically using the energy. 

The maturity to bring growth through mediation. To bring growth to the collective, in that sense, by 
having the resources. Fourth lines are very fixed. "I am fixed on having to give my resources to others. I 
have to share my resources with others." 

In the detriment we have: A lack of maturity where the power to harmonize distorts mediation and limits 
growth. If you are so busy trying to make sure that your client who is in labor is going to like you as a 
person, you may have all kinds of difficulties in the actual birthing because the energy is in the wrong 
place. It is like the surgeon who is cutting open your heart and listening to rock and roll at the same time 
and gets lost in the song, and you end up with a pair of scissors inside. 

42.5 Self-actualization 

Look at the incredible resonance in this gate. The first line and the fourth line, the second and the fifth 
line, all have Venus in detriment. Here is a fundamentally collective process and the Venus in detriment

aspect of experience. This is not about the social aspects of experience. It is about the pragmatism of 
recognizing the nature of the experience itself but you can see that the Venusian power here can distort 
the resources. 

Remember that, in the first line, we always have the essence, to diversify the resources, and when we get 
to the fifth line, we get to see how the world looks at it. The world calls it Self-actualization. They project 
on the 42.5: "Aha, they have the resources to be able to go through a process and grow. They are the ones 
who are mature." This is a very funny thing. 42.5's are always being projected on that they are the mature 
ones. "They are so mature for their age." This is the flavor that comes with the 42.5. 

The Sun exalted. The fulfillment and actualization of purpose as a natural path, whose reward is a healthy 
sense of self, rather than the power and influence that naturally follow. This projecting out, this projection

projecting on you that you have power, then you have power. These people are projected on all the time

The Venusian detriment. Self-actualization as a strictly inner experience that may demand or result in a

the two, which is to be identified with here. 

The detriment here is not really a detriment. It is simply that this growth power is going to be "my own" 
growth power. "I have an inner growth process rather than helping you with your growth process. You 

can project on me that I have the resources for you, but I do not identify with where you are going and I 
will not give you that energy." 

The two sides of this in the white book: Growth that is self-fulfilling and naturally leads to influence, or 
Inner growth that empowers reclusiveness. "I will do my own experience." These are often people that do

I had a reading with some guy, a really insecure and uncomfortable, strange sort of creature, working in a

tell anybody about. That can range from anything, to anywhere because the abstract circuit, being what it

their inner experiences. 

42.6 Nurturing 

When you get to the sixth line and you get to transition, you get to the classic situation in which the sixth 
line does not necessarily want to release what is there, unless there is much more to it. After all, the whole 
nature of the abstract process is to go through experience so that, at the end of that experience, when you 
have completed that process, you can reflect upon that process and out of that comes your maturity. Out 
of that comes what we call history: the ability to be able to share with others the nature of your 
experience. 

Here, when you get to it in the white book it is very clear: The power to share the process of growth with 
others. Perhaps. You only share the process of growth if the experience can be seen, in that sense; if they 
can believe that it is going to lead to that kind of growth. That is full of all kinds of 'ifs', 'buts,' 'maybes', 
'should haves', 'could haves', and 'I don't knows'. They are not necessarily going to share it, but they can. 

On the other side we have: The refusal to share the benefits of growth with others. The Nurturing, in the 
black book: A natural and instinctive nurturing of others. Saturn in detriment. A restrictive and malefic 
materialism that is selfalienating and encourages aggression. 

This is one of the sixth lines that can get a lot of hostility because everybody knows that they have the 
resources and everybody is saying, "Why don't you give these things out. You are collective and this is 
about sharing. We want it." 

So they can go to the extreme, and again, this is dependent on the nature of the design, whether the center 
is defined and how this operates. They can get to the point where they react in that way only to use their 
resources for their own benefit. 

Materialism, in the sense that energy has value. I am somebody that has three motors open. I know how 
valuable energy is. I teach on your adrenaline. It is not mine. I know how valuable it is. That adrenaline 
energy is a necessary currency. Without it, there is no fuel for the process. 

People who carry energy gates like this are carrying wealth within them. The moment that the energy is

is to come to grips with what it is to be human, what it is to be alive, what it is to live out the experiential 
way. Like all sixth lines, it is not certain whether or not it is worthwhile, whether it can trust that the 
process is valuable for its growth. 

This wonderful joke: where does the 42.6 lead to? To Synthesis in the 3.1. It starts with Diversification 
and you get to the end of the whole thing and you say, "Well, yes, all this diversity is terrific, but what 
does it all mean?" That is what the sixth line is thinking about. What does it all mean? Not just this 
experience. What you get from the nature of the sixth line is that they are not ready to make the mistake 
that is made in the third line. They are saying "What for? What do I have to go through that for? I am not 
really sure that it is of value to me." There is always a hesitancy in the sixth line because there is this 
inherent sense of "Yeah, but what else?" 

HEXAGRAM 43 BREAKTHROUGH 

We move to the individual process, to the 43 hexagram and we come to the channel of 
Structuring, a design of individuality, from genius to freak. We have the gate of insight, sudden 
awareness, the possibility of spontaneous individual knowing, or not. Whether that knowing is of 
value for anybody else is another story. The awareness possibility is spontaneous resolution, 
the voice of the muse, the inner ear. This is the inner acoustic mind. 

This is not a visual mind. What is going on in the 43 rd gate is that there is an inner dialogue. It 
goes on in the whole stream and that sudden awareness is an inner-dialogue awareness. "Oh, I 
knows," it says on the inside. Whether it can actually say that on the outside is another story. It 
is a very particular path to translate that sudden awareness, that inner dialogue, into an 
externalized dialogue that can explain itself. That is quite a process. 

In the Rave I'Ching it says, In order for achievement to be maintained a new order must be 

fairly established. The only achievement for the 43 rd gate is the ability to explain their knowing. 
Unless they can properly explain their knowing, they are not going to feel like they can achieve. 
So, they can be very frustrated in that and it all resonates back to the process in the 28th 
hexagram: "Is life really worthwhile?" Or you go to the resonance in the 57 th hexagram that 
says, "Am I afraid of tomorrow?" The knower is afraid of tomorrow if they know that, tomorrow, 
they will have to explain themselves and they don't know if they can. 

Because the individual is always attracting attention, they will also attract rejection. If they 
cannot explain themselves, they will be rejected. So, there is a deep anxiety, the fear of the 
mind, that no one will know what they mean. "They don't know me. They don't know what I 
mean. They don't know what I want." The counseling that I give all individuals is that they have 
to learn how to communicate so that they can develop the skills necessary to explain 
themselves. 

43.1 Patience 

The introspection here is called Patience. Pluto exalted. The recognition that new forms (new 
knowing) can not be established until resistance has been eliminated. "Is it really a knowing? Do 
I really know it?" This is the examination of the knowing. 

Venus in detriment. An impatience to enjoy the sweets of accomplishment that inevitably leaves 
a sour taste in the mouth. Knowers get attention with their "I know". If they don't go through the 
introspection, they can end up in a lot., difficulty. 

The depth necessary to bring into form an individual insight. That is to really know what you 
know. To know your knowing,, you have to go into it. 

On the other side of this: A delight in the insight but a lack of depth to establish it. Suddenly, 
there is this sense of "Ah, I know," but can you really explain that to somebody else? The 
detriment side knows that it can't. It gets up on "Oh, I know" and what happens to these people 
is that when they meet another individual who says exactly the same thing, they look at them 
and say "I know" and they feel good because they themselves have great difficulty in getting 
that out. 

It is the first line that demonstrates the nature of the hexagram. That sudden awareness is 
something that either leads to the demands of depth, to go into it deeply, know your knowing, or 

it comes out on the other side where there is no ability to express it. So many knowers cannot 
express their knowing. 

Please keep in mind that, statistically, there is more of this channel than there is of the 1 1/56 or 
the 17/62. This channel is an opposition in the zodiac and you get it a lot. Most of the time, 
when you are getting the 43, you are getting the 23 with it. One of the unusual things about 
these channels that form oppositions is that when you get one, you automatically get the other 
with it. So knowers, from the mental, the awareness perspective, are often automatically 
connected to their throat. It is very different from idea people and opinion people. Nine times out 
of ten, these 43's already have access to the throat and this is much more common than others. 
It changes the way that you look at this. In ten charts that have this channel activated, you will 
find seven of them who have the whole channel. The opposition is a very common thing. Please 
keep that in mind when we go through these lines: often they automatically have their 
connection to the throat. 

This creates a real dilemma for these people. They do not have the basic restriction that is there 
on the 1 1 and the 1 7, who do not automatically have the outlet and who have a restriction on 
their process. The knowers do not have that. Generally speaking, the moment the knower has 
that "Aha, I know," everybody hears, . 

43.2 Dedication 

These people talk out loud. They do not know if anybody listens to them. They are the kind of 
people walking around the house and, all of a sudden, you hear them. "Oh, I knowl" And you 
wonder who they are talking to. It simply comes of the projection. 

This line is called Dedication. Pluto exalted. The maintenance of specialized attitudes which 
promote breakthrough. These people can have linguistic tics, for example, repeating things out 
loud again and again. "The sky is blue. The sky is blue... I know." That is their way of going 
through their knowing. When they are learning something, they may have a very specialized 
out-loud-technique for learning that drives other people crazy. That may seem weird to other 
people but that is their process on getting it through. 

Unique mental habits and thought processes which promote insight. I guarantee that, for much 
of history, these people were considered mad because, all of a sudden, they blurt things out and 
you wonder whether they are possessed by the devil. This is a freak channel. People who have 
the 43.2 are easily possessed, in that sense. They can feel possessed. 

The other side has Moon in detriment. A dedication to action that, when actualization is in sight, 
may become incautious. In most cases, that is what happens because the 23 is already 
available at the other end. So, they can automatically just blurt out whatever that knowing is in 
the moment, which can seem absurd to somebody else. That is not to say that it cannot be of 
enormous value as well. Do not misunderstand that. 

The urge for expression that will abandon its normal processes when an opportunity arises. 
There is a wonderful description of a surgeon in a book written by Oliver Sacks, who has 
Tourette's syndrome and he has hand and foot tics. There is this wonderful scene of him in the 
infirmary room with the other surgeons, just before he has to do an operation. He is lying on. the 
floor and he has his feet up on somebody and his hands are going all around, and he is 
repeating "I know, I know," and then he goes into the operating room and it is gone. He is a 
great surgeon and people love him. 

All the funny stuff that the 43.2 can do, given the right circumstances, instantaneously, that is 
gone and the other side of them can come out and they can seem quite normal, just to protect 
themselves, because they are freaks anyway. (By the way, this doctor flew an airplane.) 

The physical tics of that are related to the emotional system, and the acoustic tics are related to 
the mind. One of the gifts that lie in acoustic tics, that is in this unusual way the mind works, is 
the repetition of sounds which leads to excellent language skills. You have to recognize about 
the 43/23 that the 43, when it hears a sound, is trying to figure out how to translate it in order to 
figure out how to explain it. It is not turning the picture into a word; it is turning the inner sound 
into an outer sound. There are a great many language skills that are involved in this. You have a 
lot of mimics here as well. 

43.3 Expediency 

We come to the end of the upper trigram. We come to bonds made and broken and the theme 
of irresponsibility. It is called Expediency. The third line has the potential in it to be both 
introspective and projective, and it is looking to the other side for the first time. But again, we 
have to keep in mind that, in most cases, 43's have the 23 on the other side. 

Pluto exalted. The powerful drive for regeneration that will, when breakthrough (their knowing) is 
threatened, use any means, align with any force and endure any condemnation to achieve the 
goal. I knew this very well. It is my South Node line. 

Moon i n detriment. An oversensitiviy to condemnation that may preclude justified expediency 
and result in failure. The nature of this third line is to get one's knowing out no matter what, 
which of course can be very dangerous. If you do not know what you are talking about, you will 
be in a lot of trouble. 

A certainly in knowing that can withstand condemnation. I know this so well in respectltb Human 
Design. What I '(now about the nature of my experience with the Voice and the information that I 
was given, it did not matter how many people told me that I was crazy. It made no difference to 
me. I did not listen to them. My knowing was very clear. The capacity to withstand 
condemnation. 

On the other side: Individual insight abandoned in the face of condemnation. The teal dilemma 
of the knower is whether or not you will be able to live with your own knowing. For a great many 
people, this is a constant dilemma: "Can I continue to project my knowing out and put up with 
having all these people say, 'You are wrong.'?" This is something every knower goes through. 
My first reaction after my experience with the voice was "Oh, no, do I really have to do this? Do I 
have to put up with all these people saying 'Oh, no.'?" You align with any force. 

43.4 The One-track mind 

Here, we get to externalization and you get to the line that gives its name to what I am
