describing to you as a theme, this One-track mind. These people can drive you mad. Knowing 
is something that is very difficult to get across to everybody else. These people are fixed on one 
knowing, whatever that knowing happens to be. They are incredibly persistent in that knowing. 

Mercury exalted. The over-reliance and stubborn obsession with one's mental abilities in the 
face of recurring obstacles. This design, given Mercurial mental gifts may, though rarely, 

succeed. Jupiter in detriment. A belief in inherent right action based on limited knowledge that 
shuns advice. "I know, and you don't." Even if somebody is standing there telling them very 
calmly and clearly that they are wrong and explains to them why 1 and 1 equals 2 and not 76, 
they still insist on their "I know." Their knowing can be extremely stubborn. They are really fixed 
in their knowing. 

A stubborn reliance on one's unique insights that demands focused mental ability to be properly 
conceptualized. They may be of enormous value and they may be Galileo's that are shunned all 
of their lives and may have real brilliance within them, or they can just be rockers (as 'in racking 
one's brains'), which is the other side of the coin. You get everything in that spectrum. This is 
the key to people that have this line. "Okay, you are fixed on this knowing, so get it very clear so 
that other people can grasp it. If you cannot explain it, you will be shunned, and if you are fixed 
on it, you appear to be an obsessive. You have to be able to explain it." 

The other side is: The vanity to attempt expression without depth. These are people that know 
the moment they come into the world. If they could speak, they would tell their mothers that they 
are doing a lousy job. "I know what you should do with me." They will claim that authority the 
moment they come into the world. 

43.5 Progression 

We reach the point within the hexagram where the process is complete. You get to Progression. 
This a fascinating line because the emphasis of this line is about understanding the nature of 
the other. The fifth line already recognizes its knowing when it is there. It has its knowing, but its 
greatest concern is not about what it knows but whether it is able to get its knowing across to 
the other side. The only way these people can do that is when they have a deep understanding 
of the other, so that they are able to recognize when and with whom they can get their knowing 
out. This is the whole thing about the knower. That is why you have the 12/22 as a social 
channel for the individual, this capacity to recognize within the mood when it is the right timing, 
when is it a good time to go out as an individual and to offer your knowing and explanation. 

Moon exalted. The step by step adaptation to relationships which hinders breakthrough through 
practical actions that will not jeopardize eventual success. "First, let me seduce them and, if I 
succeed in seducing them, then I will give them my knowing because then it will be easier 
because then they are already ready to accept me rather than treating me as a freak. I can't just 
throw my knowing at them. I am not the second line." 

Venus in detriment. A tendency to concentrate on harmonizing relationships that tends to 
strengthen the position of restrictive forces rather than benefiting breakthrough. You seduce 
them and become their friend. You finally tell them your knowing and they tell you, "Yes, yes, I 
know you. That does not work." This is very difficult. What happens to the fifth line is that they 
are very concerned about what people think about them. The fifth line is afraid of being burned 
at the stake. They recognize that their knowing can always be dangerous for them unless they 
can have a good relationship with the people. That is the key in their process. 

The gift of knowing when a unique insight can be shared effectively with others. The other side 
of this: An over-reliance on the receptivity of others that turns harmony into the conditioner of 
individual expression. "I won't say what I really know because I will lose them as my friend." This 
can be deeply frustrating for the knower. I recommend to people with this line: their dilemma is 
no longer whether they can explain themselves or not. Their dilemma is: do they really 

understand people? Unless they understand people, they will have difficulty in getting their 
knowing across. 

43.6 Breakthrough 

Here we have the line of transition. This line is about mutation. Once you get to the end of the 
process in the 43rd gate, the sixth line is no longer interested in the knowing itself, but whether 
the knowing is mutative. Only when it is mutative, it is really something. It is looking for that One 
night stand, the Blaze of glory, whatever you want to call it. It is looking for something that is 
beyond the knowing. It is the capacity to recognize that the individual process can always be 
mutative, and it is looking for the mutative potential. This line goes through an enormous 
transformation when knowing occurs. 

Breakthrough. Sun exalted. Actualization and centering, that in breakthrough naturally establish 
both internally and externally a new order. Everything gets wiped out in that. The moment that 
the new knowing is there, the only thing that is interesting is that, in this kind of mind, it is 
already mutative. It will erase all kinds of things. It will be the knowing that this mind is focused 
on, not focused in terms of explaining it, but waiting for the mutation to take hold. It is always 
about looking to see where the mutation can be. 

On the Martian side: An ego tendency that in breakthrough sees justification of its lesser 
attributes and carries them over into the new order. 

In the white book, you have: Unique knowing that is both personally and collectively of value. It 
is of value, but these people won't tell you their knowing because they are only interested in 
mutation. I know this so well. I have people who come up to me after a lecture or a course and 
they say to me, "This is so interesting." That does not mean anything to me. If somebody is 
saying to a 43.6, "Your knowing is interesting," they will look at you "Oh, my god. Keep these 
people away from me." The 43.6 says to itself, "Of course it is interesting, you fool. It is 
knowing." It is something that is there to be mutative. The 43.6 people have a sense of 
aloofness (44.6) in that: "The knowing is not for you because you will not mutate with this 
knowing." 

The other side is: Where the value of knowing is more important than other aspects of life. This 
is where this line can be weird. This is the mad scientist who is so absorbed in his knowing that 
they forget to wash or eat or sleep. They forget the world outside, their children and their family. 
They are gone in their knowing and can be very deluded in that, hoping for the possibility of 
mutation to come along. 

HEXAGRAM 44 COMING TO MEET 

We will shift to the possibilities and, in doing so, understand that there is an unseen process that takes 
place. There is a movement between potential and possibility. It uses the language of the mind to describe 
it. I call it conceptualizing. One has to divorce oneself from thinking that conceptualizing is a word that 
describes a mental process. Let's take the assumption that this is a word we can use to describe the 
awareness process, which requires a leap. There is a jump, like neurons firing in the brain. There 
is a jump that takes place between the potential and the possibility. This is a very special place. Because 
we know that we deal with a wave environment at the emotional level and a frequency environment at the 
awareness level, we know that there is a movement in the frequency from the potential to the possibility. 

One of the things that we will see as we go through our process with the lines is that you can almost read 
what takes place in between the lines. When you go for example to the 44.1, that started in the 32.1 and 
there is a process of conceptualizing to bring the possibility of that awareness to a point of clarity. This is 
a very special place. One of the things to keep in mind is that when you come to doing your own line 
studies, you will discover that, as you move through the lines, this movement becomes visible. You can 
see what is taking place as a conceptualizing process moving from the potential to the possibility. 

The 44th hexagram and the 24th hexagram that is opposite it, the 19th and the 33rd hexagram form a 
cross in the zodiac. It is called the cross of The Four Ways. Coming to Meet is one of the four ways, the 
only one that is healthy. What you have to keep in mind about the relationship between the splenic and 
the heart center is that this is the only place where they meet. The thymus gland sits in the 26th gate and 
our lymphatic system is rooted in the 44th gate. Out of these two is where our basic protective system is 
developed: the B-cells are produced in the 44th gate and the T-cells are produced in the 26th gate. 
Together they form the healthiest channel that we have. The nice joke is that the healthiest way is the 
material way. This is very true because we have 10 million children born each week that are born hungry 
It is obvious they are not healthy because they are lacking material sustenance. 

In the hierarchy, we see that the 44th gate, in terms of this material movement, is the personnel manager. 
It is the great nose. It can smell anything. That is what it is there for. The gate of alertness: Coming to 
Meet. It says here (above the lines in the original white book), the possibility is the transformation stored 
or not as a memory. 

Remember that the 32nd gate, the potential in this stream, is the potential to recognize what can be 
transformed, or not. Once the 32nd gate (the financial officer) says, "I am going to spend my money on 
it," at that moment, the 44th gate is ready to take that and store it as a memory. It stores what that is and 
works with it. When it is stored as a memory in the 44th gate, then they know exactly that the 26 will be 
able to carry that out. After all, the 44 cannot do it itself. The splenic system is not a motor. It is looking 
for the ego and its willpower in order to fulfill whatever this transformation potential is. It is one thing for 
the 54 to come up with the energy for the transformation. It is another thing for the 32 to say, "All right, 
we will commit to it." It is yet another thing for the 44 to go looking for the right ego, but it still has to get 
out there and manifest in the end. 

The awareness possibility is the osmotic regulator. This is cellular memory. This is the water balance. 
This is where the cellular memory is at its deepest. This is the pure gate of instinct, which means that the 
first and second lines that are instinctive themes represent the deepest cellular memory that you are going 
to find in a human being. These people have a very, very rich memory system. This is a spontaneous 
memory. Do not forget that we are dealing with an existential center. This is not a memory that can be 
called up. The 26th gate is the ability to manipulate, The Taming Power of the Great. The memory in the 
44 is available instinctively in the moment, and it is there to recognize what is the right ego and what isn't 

to fulfill the transformation. The personnel manager always has to surrender to the financial officer's 
decision. 

In the 32nd hexagram the heading was: The only thing that endures is change, and when you come the 
heading of the 44th hexagram you have: The success of any interaction is based on the absence of any 
preconditions. There are no preconditions. There is the instinctive memory of what is necessary which 
will simply respond in the now to the right relationship, to the right interaction in order to fulfill the 
transformation. 

44.1 Conditions 

Whenever you are dealing with first lines, you are dealing with the keynote of introspection. We know 
that this is the foundation of the hexagram and this first line is a classic example of what a foundation 
really means because it establishes the basic nature of what Coming to Meet is all about. This is one of 
the four ways. It is called Conditions. It says, The establishment of frameworks as the result of 
interaction. This is what surrender is all about: it has to take place within a specific framework. Here is 
this transformation we want to bring about. Here is the framework of how it gets done. 

Pluto exalted. A mastery of the collective that can establish restrictive conditions for inferior components 
with the ability to enforce them. Think about that. This is the foundation of this hexagram. It starts with 
the mastery of the collective. This is very important to understand. 

This is one of the four ways to our well43eing and our health, to our financial success. Everything in the 
tribe is about establishing the hierarchy, which has to be established rigidly in the corporate culture; 
otherwise, the culture will fail. Even in the most liberal corporate institutions, the hierarchy remains, no 
matter whether everybody is dressing in jeans and calls each other by the first name or not. All 
organizations are rooted in hierarchy and the 44th gate is there, not only to recognize who can fulfill the 
transformation, but who will honor (this is the tribe) the hierarchy and be loyal. 

The other side is Venus in detriment. An attractive nature that will interact with inferior forces and will 
fail to apply restrictions, resulting in a risk to continued harmony. There is no success on the material 
plane unless the hierarchy is properly established and the moment that there is a failure to apply 
restrictions is the moment that not the end result but the harmony is damaged. It becomes so obvious that 
if you raise a child without any restrictions, somehow that is not going to be good. The first thing you 
discover is that restrictions are natural. It is about what kind of restrictions, not about whether they should 
be there or not. The hierarchy requires its pattern, after all. 

Here in the white book: An alertness to patterns that can lead to mastery of the collective. First of all, that 
is based on memory. If you do not really know what the transformation is about, for example, if you do 
not know, as a personnel manager, what your product is and of what value it is to be community, you will 
not be able to choose the right person to present that in terms of their ego. 

The failure of the instinct out of the need for harmony. "I do not want to tell you that I am the boss 
because I want you to be my friend." This is the other side of it. The first thing to recognize about the 
nature of the first line, about the nature of conditions, is that this is the root of our material success. It 
requires that we establish conditions. If we do not establish conditions, we will not have our proper health 
and we will not have our success on the material plane. Being an anarchist, it is very funny for me to say 
those things. 

When you are working at any commercial level, there are two kinds of managers: people managers and 
goal oriented managers. The first line is about the people manager. This is really the foundation. 

Remember that when you are starting with the lower trigram, it is involved with its own process and is 
not really ready to go across to the other side of the channel. The special-ness of the first line is that it is 
already conscious of the need (it is an awareness gate after all) of how important it is to work with the 
right people, and find the right people. 

44.2 Management 

When you get to the second line, you get to a line of projection. All second lines are projection outwards, 
with the inability to be introspective. They cannot look inwards, which means that they are not looking 
for the people. They are looking towards: Can we get to the goal? Due to that, they can often make 
mistakes with the people because they are more interested in the goal. 

When you look at the second line, it is called Management. This is interesting because the nature of most 
commercial enterprises is that they are goal oriented rather than being people oriented. If I was running a 
large corporation and I was looking at my personnel staff, I would make sure that both first lines and 
second lines were there. In other words, it is one thing to be goal orientated but the other thing is that you 
need to have the right people in that process. 

Jupiter exalted. The development and management of a proper collective structure which restricts inferior 
elements by creating cooperative modes that integrate these forces with progressive and superior forces. If 
you have lousy people who are working for you, it is okay. Integrate them with people who do better and 
maybe they will be all right. This is what gets done all the time. This is a very common practice. "They 
are not doing very well. We will put them with Harry." 

On the other side of this is Mars in detriment. A tendency in management to concentrate exclusively on 
goals, ignoring inferior elements, which leads inevitably to quantitative success and qualitative failure. 
The second line is good at getting the goals done. They will find an ego that will get the work done but 
that will lead to a lot of problems in the human organization. Every time that we are looking at the 44/26, 
we are looking at the most important health movement that we have. So, if it will be a qualitative failure, 
it is ultimately not going to be good, neither for the corporation nor for the workers or for the consumers 
(or whoever it is that is involved in the product) because it is not essentially healthy. On the other hand, 
like all of these things, if you have somebody who is only interested in goals and that is their design, and 
they have the second line and are working in a company that is only interested in goals, good for them. 
After all, you are here to be what you are. 

This is not a moral question. This is simply about recognizing that in these first two lines, because they 
are the instinctive themes, here lies the core of the way in which we work together. It is the core and the 
way in which we are brought together by those who can be responsible for that. It is two-sided. One side 
overemphasizes the human element, and the other overemphasizes the goal element. This is the beginning 
of the hexagram process. 

44.3 Interference 

This is the line of adaptation and the end of the lower trigram process. In this line, we have the two earlier 
processes integrated together. Here, we have the line of Interference. The failure to interact based on 
circumstances. This is a keen sense of what the ego is on the other side because this is the first line that 
recognizes that there is an ego on the other side and has a sensory connection to it. 

Mars exalted. The ability to recognize the threat of interference and to prepare for its effects. Neptune in 
detriment. A deluded response to interference that gets stuck in projection and, as a result, is unrealistic in 
appraisal and errorprone. Remember that third lines can be very irresponsible. Third lines, by their very 

nature, know that there is an ego at the other side. In this particular case, they do not really know what it 
is and how it works. They have to connect to it and learn that. 

In the Book of Letters: The alertness and instincts to handle the ego of others. That capability does not 
mean that they will interact with the ego. The 44.3's have a lot of trouble getting through this whole 
channel. They make the contact with the ego and on this side can recognize it, but the moment that the 
splenic system actually meets the ego, there is fear in the splenic system. It is the fear of the past. This 
fear brings to the 44th gate this sense of, "Oh, this ego is very powerful and I can get carried away on its 
energy." After all, the 44th hexagram is about dominating, being able to manage the ego power at the 
other end. The ego is not aware, but it is a motor and the 44 would like to have contact to that motor 
because it is healthy and turns on the system. At the same time, when the 44 makes contact, it is cautious 
because it senses the power of the ego. 

It is like when you get on a horse for the first time and suddenly you recognize, "I am high above the 
ground and this is a big animal and I do not know what it thinks and it will do weird things." So, when 
you make contact with the horse, you say, "I'll get off now." This is what happens to the 44. It hooks into 
the ego and says, "Wait a minute. I'll get off." This is the reverse of what Coming to Meet is. They come 
to meet, but they go away very quickly. 

On the other side of the line: The possibility that the instinct cannot handle the ego of others. This is 
where it really steps back. It steps into the ego field, catches it all and says, "I really do not want to deal 
with that because that is too much for me." (Irresponsible in coming to meet.) A manager with this line 
makes bonds and breaks them. He hires a strong ego who does a wonderful job, but he fires him because 
the 44 can't stand the person's ego. It does not matter how good they have done the job. Or, that very 
manager meets somebody who he knows would do a terrific job but he refuses to work with that one, so 
he does not hire them at all. 

44.4 Honesty 

The fourth line is the beginning of the upper trigram and its direct resonance is to the first line. Due to that 
resonance, you know that being a people manager is a deep theme that already matured by the time that 
you get to the fourth line. The fourth line is an externalization line and, therefore, has a single track. It is 
deeply fixed on one aspect. Here, this aspect is called Honesty. It says: The refusal to engage in 
hypocritical interaction. These are people whose management style is considered to be straight forward. 
They are very direct. 

Pluto exalted. Indifference at its most logical and cutting. The indifference is to the needs of the 
individual. After all, this is taking the people-manager resonance from the first line. There is this deep 
indifference to all this stuff about having to work really hard to make sure that the other is really 
comfortable with all this. 

By the time you get to the fourth line, you know that there is something on the other side and the only 
way the fourth line is able to work with them is that it is very direct with them. 

The Sun in detriment, that in extreme situations, in cases of self-sustainment, will expect assistance from 
forces it has totally rejected. Here the honesty is the genuine need. You want to do business with 
somebody and, being a fourth line, you are very direct and say, "Look, I am not in the ABC business, I 
am in the XYZ business, go away." Two years later, you discover that you want to get into the ABC 
business and you call up the very people you rejected and you can actually say to them, "Why don't you 
come over and we'll talk. Now, I am interested in the ABC business." This is all about being direct. This 

directness can seem obsessive because there is nothing else there. They can only be focused in that 
honesty, in that one transformation that they want to bring about. 

The indifference possible when guided by the instinctive memory. In other words, you really know the 
type, so why mess around? Put it straight to them. 

On the other side: The sacrifice of indifference for survival. In other words, when a change can come (this 
is all about transformation) then they can go back to the very thing that they rejected, being very honest 
and being seen that way. 

44.5 Manipulation 

The fifth line is the finish of the hexagram process. Here you have the completion of what the hexagram 
is all about. Within the hexagram, you have the ability to universalize the process. Please understand in 
this sense that the 44/26 represents the immune system of the tribe. It is the defense system for the tribe. It 
is what keeps the tribe healthy. This material reality, this fifth line, represents literally what that is all 
about: what is going to keep the tribe immune from disease, immune from failure at the material level. 
The 32nd gate was the fear of failure and the 44th gate is the fear of the past and they are trying to 
overcome those fears through having material success in the present. 

The fifth line is called Manipulation. The ability to transform interaction with inferior elements into the 
energizing of progressive processes with the additional benefit that, in tapping the inferior elements, they 
remain weak. Think about the nature of that. That is, you cannot have everybody climb the ladder of the 
hierarchy. This does not work and yet, at the same time, inferior elements being part of the tribe need to 
have their sustenance, need to be protected and need to have a sense of self-worth within the community. 

The gift of this sort of manipulation is to integrate these forces into the operation and allow them to have 
their place by making them comfortable through the manipulating style of the personnel manager and, at 
the same time, have them be satisfied that they will spend 55 years plugging bolds into the side of a car. 
This is absolutely essential on this planet. Otherwise things fall apart. 

On the other side of this, Mars in detriment. The tendency in this form of manipulation to become abusive 
and degenerate to their level. This is the dictatorial fiat. This is the need for control in the 32nd gate. Here, 
in the detriment of the fifth line of the 44, it becomes the power trip. "I have the power and you don't. 
You do what you are told." I can be very abusive. 

In the Book of Letters: Where the instinctive recognitions of the patterns leads to the possible 
manipulation of others. Again, manipulation without any negative connotation. Without a proper 
hierarchy, there is no success. I have grown up in North America which was rooted in the idea that the 
traditional hierarchical caste systems could be replaced, so that they would throw away the ideas of 
monarchy and institute republics. If you go to North America today, they simply replaced that with the 
monetary class system: how much money you make. The moment they meet you, they want to know how 
much money you make because then they can put you into a place within the hierarchy. 

The fact of the matter is that, if you are working for a company and you are getting well paid relative to 
what you do, you don't mind that the CEO is taking home two million dollars. It astonishes me how many 
employees find it quite normal that the boss is making this enormous fortune while they are slaving for 
forty-eight hours a week. However, this is natural to us. This is our way. We are animals. Animals are all 
hierarchical, no matter how sophisticated we look as a patina on the surface. Everything is about 
hierarchy, and it will not go away. The thing is not to see that as a moral, or prejudice. You have to see 

that everybody has a place that way. As long as everybody is in the place that is correct for them, no hard 
feelings and everything will be fine. 

44.6 Aloofness 

When we come to the sixth line, we come to the roof of the house, and there we have nothing but the deep 
desire for transition. Here it is called Aloofness. If you have a hexagram that is called Coming to Meet 
and you get to the sixth line and it is called Aloofness, you know that this whole process of looking for 
the ego is past. It is not about looking for the ego. It has to be there, of course, because it is part of the 
way that you get out: you get to the throat and to manifestation. The sixth line is always looking for 
something much grander, in that sense. Be aware of something: all sixth lines have within them a 
potential to be deeply depressed. This ability to stand on the top of the house, to be finished with the 
process and to be able to look out beyond and wonder what is there and long for it because it is the 
resonance to the One Night Stand: it may come or it may not. You may get that opportunity or you may 
not. Because of that, there is this sense of, in the aloofness, "Nobody is really going to fulfill that for me. I 
will not get that quality of ego that will lead far beyond all of this material plane that the personnel 
manager is locked into." 

Pluto exalted. A perfected renewal in which the establishment of a new form inures one to the 
condemnation of the rejected. This is somebody who has their growing up and they end up finding 
themselves moving, for example, towards a career where they could have this kind of work. They would 
never stay there. They could never live out the personnel manager as a personnel manager. There is 
always something else that is further beyond for them. What is further beyond is the new form: something 
that is going to change the way that whole hierarchical structure operates. 

The awareness of patterns, which ensures one's instinctive well-being. They do not need the ego on the 
other side. They are not lusting after it because they can be well within themselves. 

On the other side: The awareness of patterns that can bolster the ego at the expense of the well-being of 
others. This has nothing to do with being concerned about just any other ego on the other side. It is about 
something else. 

Until they find that 'something else', they can never commit themselves to the power that is there. Their 
ability is to recognize a very special quality of ego that will be, in the mystical sense, a real surrender and 
that what gets transmitted is something totally new. All sixth lines can infuse the collective with 
something that they are not yet aware of. All sixth lines, because they are collective themes, can go deep 
into the collective. This is where the collective gets constantly enriched from the individual, from the 
tribe, so that the collective slowly becomes this umbrella that we all can live within. A very important role 
here in the 44th gate. 

HEXAGRAM 45 GATHERING TOGETHER 

The 45th gate is the only outlet for the entire tribal process, so this gate carries with it an enormous 
importance that is part of our evolutionary process. There will be a time, long away from now, when the 
45 will actually become aware and will be part of what we now consider an ajna process. The 45 is very 
important. It is the only voice in the throat that is a purely possessive voice and therefore it is the only 
place within the Throat in which the manifestation of possession takes place. To have and not have, to get 
and not get, to be able to control and not control: all this is rooted in the nature of the 45. 

The 45 is a gate of action. It is directly connected to the ego and, in that sense, very different from the 35 
and the 12 that are connected to the solar plex. It is not operating in the wave of the solar plex. It is 
operating out of the energy of the ego which we call willpower or, when we are being negative, egoism. 

The 45 is the gate of the tribal leader. This is not the collective leadership of the 31. This is the tribal 
leader, the leader by blood. This is the queen and the king. This is the lord and the lady. This is the 
leading family in a community. This is all this kind of blood hierarchy. 

Above the lines is says: The natural and generally beneficial attraction of like forces. The keyword here is 
'beneficial.' This is the nature of the 45. The responsibility of the king and queen, regardless of whether 
they are pashas or not, or possessive or not, regardless of whether they have to have the nicest crown and 
throne, their power lies in them being of benefit to the tribe. As long as they can be of benefit to the tribe, 
they can indulge in anything, including decadence. As long as their benefit is there for the tribe, they are 
of value. 

45.1 Canvassing 

When you begin with the first line, you begin with the inherent recognition that to be a 45 is to be, by 
your very nature, beneficial to the tribe. That does not mean that you get to exercise that beneficence. 
After all, if you do not have the other side, then you always have to wait for the energy to come. 

The first line is called Canvassing which is: The ability to promote and develop gathering together 
through the education of the uncommitted. Mars in detriment. An over-zealousness that turns canvassing 
into proselytization and tends to alienate rather than gather support. This is all about education. 

In terms of the white book: The material direction lies in education, or The drive for material that leads to 
aggressive education. 

The whole thing about being the leader of the tribe is that the way in which the tribe benefits is by being 
educated. The more educated the community, the more successful it becomes. We live in an age in which 
we have watched this historically over the last 300 years: the development of public education and the 
vast improvement in the nature of our lives and the ability for us to have representative democracies in 
which the population as a whole is given a responsibility for the direction of the people. This is the 
byproduct of education. The key to the nature of the 45 is that, if they can bring education to the tribe, 
they are always going to be of benefit, which means they themselves have to be educated. 

It is very important for 45's to be educated and, of course, this is a joke because all aristocracy has been 
privileged in having education while the rest of humanity was left behind. It is built into being a 45 that 
you must have a solid education because it is only out of that grounding that you can be of benefit to 
those that are in your community. 

At the mundane level, at the material level, this is about being successful in business when you can 
provide something new, something of educational value, something that the other does not know anything 
about. For example, the first person that brings the refrigerator into the community that never had one 
before. When the tribal leader brings the refrigerator and says, "Let me educate you about the benefits of 
this refrigerator. " You can be a salesman in a shop or you can be the tribal leader, but what you are trying 
to bring is of benefit. 

This is one of the keys to the 45. If the 45 is not providing something that is of benefit to the community, 
whatever they make, whatever money they bring into their lives, will poison them. I am being very heavy 
because it is accurate. This is the whole nature of possession. The 45 is allowed to possess. This is their 
nature. They have to possess. At the same time, out of their possession, they must bring benefit to others 
and it must be of value to others. If they just make money from the tribe, "Here I have the ABC box and 
you should all have my picture hanging in your house," that is not a leader benefiting the public because 
they have to buy that. They have to invest in that and, ultimately, the money that comes from that will be 
poisoned because it is not of benefit. The leader must bring things of benefit. The first line knows that its 
beneficence is there, but it does not necessarily know how to bring that to the tribe. 

45.2 Consensus 

The second line is projection, so you know what these people are projecting out. They project out that 
they can be the tribal leader and that they can be of benefit to others. The fact that this is a mechanical 
gate in the throat, a metamorphic gate, means that there are already built into these people techniques of 
bringing about this beneficial impact. 

The second line is called Consensus. Gathering together is strengthened by acknowledged common 
interest. Well, it does not work any other way. These people are projecting out that they can be of benefit. 
But they can only really be of benefit to those people that they can really be of benefit to. Otherwise, they 
are paper tigers and it may not turn out to be that way and they are uncomfortable. 

Uranus exalted. The inventiveness to establish techniques by which common ground can be assessed. So, 
there is a quality within these people that they can project out, which is that they can provide a beneficial 
technique to others. 

In the white book: A material direction through the expression of techniques for the benefit of others. 
Please, do not forget this beneficence. It always has to be built into this process. The difficulty with the 
second line is that, because they are projecting outwards, there are only certain people (this is not a 
transpersonal line) that they can really be of benefit for. They feel handicapped by those people for which 
they are not of benefit. 

They end up with the pressure of the other side, which is: An innate rebellion against conformityor, in 
terms of the white book: The refusal to accept the material techniques of others. That is like being the 
king and saying, "This is the way things work." And, instead of having a subject that says, "This is not for 
me," you have a subject that comes up to you and says to you, "Your technique is wrong." The 45.2 in 
detriment does not want to hear anything like that. They are not going to pay attention to somebody else 
telling them what and how the benefit should be. They are people that try to become the power behind the 
throne, and they try to control. These 45.2's can often get controlled from behind by other people. 

45.3 Exclusion 

Most difficult in the 45 is the third line. So many third lines are difficult simply because they are involved 
in this trial and error process. Because the wave is about bonds made and broken, this is extremely 

difficult for a tribal leader. The bond for a tribal leader is only broken when they die. This is something 
that is clear for them in the nature of their process. This is not an official that you can un-elect. This is a 
tribal leader. You either kill them or you wait until they die, but they are going to be the leader until they 
die. This is the way we used to live with kings in this world. 

This line is called Exclusion. It says: The ability when excluded to take whatever measures are necessary 
to dissolve the antiquated form and to accept even humiliation to achieve inclusion. These are people who 
know that they are the ones that can bring the benefits but they do not always get that recognition. 
Because so often in their growing process, they offer a benefit that they can bring, and there is a mistake 
involved and it does not really work out, due to that, they don't necessarily trust themselves. Nor do the 
others who hook into that energy trust them that there really is something that can work. Yet at the same 
time, because it is in their blood, it is in their genetics to be a leader, they will do anything, including 
accepting humiliation, to get close to that center of power, so that they can eventually have their 
opportunity to be beneficial to others. The instinct to find a way to be included in a material process. 

The other side is: The expression of frustration when not included in a material process. This is as it says 
in the black book: An aggressive and often violent reaction to exclusion. For example: succession in a 
family. You have five children and one of them becomes the ruler of the tribe. One of those children 
realizes within themselves that they are the one that can bring a better benefit to the tribe and that they 
will be a better leader, but they have to accept the humiliation of not being the leader and still stay close 
to the leadership. On the positive side, they make their contribution that way. They will slowly try to 
educate the one that is really in power to get the benefits out somehow so that they can participate in that 
process. But, if they have the detriment, then they hire an assassin and they kill their sibling and they take 
over the throne. Or the producer who controls the film instead of the director. The director has to suffer 
the humiliation of putting up with the producer saying, "You have to do this and that." And slowly, the 
director tries to find a way in which he can influence the producer, so that it comes out beneficially the 
way he wants. Of course, in the extreme, you kill the producer. 

45.4 Direction 

When you come to the upper trigram, you come to the fourth line. You come to externalization, to this 
fixed recognition that, first of all, there is another side. The 45/21 never works properly when it is inside 
somebody's chart. If you see somebody who has this whole channel, you know that they will always have 
difficulties. This is a channel that is designed to be electro-magnetic, in order to be at its most effective. 
The awareness in the fourth line is the recognition and the mechanic that there is a force on the other side, 
the 21, the power of the ego to drive this whole process. The fourth line is called Direction. This is a fixed 
externalization of being of benefit. That is what it is all about. 

The ability to focus the opportunity of gathering together for the service of higher principles. 'Higher 
principles' means: is it of benefit? That is all. Don't get caught up in thinking that is has to be spiritual or 
mystical. It has to do with the mundane plane and being able to provide for the tribe. When it comes to 
the tribe, the highest principles are food, shelter and health. That is number one. After that, there are all 
these different levels. Higher principles mean that, whatever the source of the material plane is, it has to 
bring benefit to those who will receive all of that. 

On the other side, we have Mars in detriment. The tendency to try to influence the direction of a group 
action for personal benefit. That is okay. It is the same process. These people make sure that, while they 
are being of benefit to everybody else, they are really of benefit to themselves as well. They are not just 
simply fixed on externalizing their beneficial value to others. 

In the white book: The expression (or the lack of expression) of higher principles on the material plane. If 
you get involved in bringing false benefits to the community, this will always backlash against the 45, 
even if it is the 21 who does it. It is the 45 that has to take the responsibility for that. So, it is very 
important for 45 's to recognize that whatever they are involved in on the material plane, they have to see 
the direct benefit of their work. If they cannot see the direct benefit of their work, they are in the wrong 
kind of work because it is going to bring back all kinds of negative energy into their life. The other thing 
is, like in all fourth lines, it waits for opportunity. 

45.5 Leadership 

You get to the fifth line and you get to universalization. Again, this is the way in which the community, 
the tribe, will project onto this fifth-line person. It is always projected onto them that they really are the 
leader. These are people that naturally can be made leaders in a community because the community will 
project this quality onto them. Whether you are dealing with the exalted or the detriment in this line, there 
is very little difference, other than that the detriment talks about the immature process. It is about what it 
takes to slowly develop that recognition because it is built in. 

This line is called Leadership. All gathering must have a center and a focus. This is about the leader. They 
are the center, the focus. They are the one. Uranus exalted. The intuitive intellect and gift for innovation 
that enhance the group effort and ensure continuity through respect for the center. They are projected on 
to be the tribal authority and, in the exalted side, they have the capacity to live that out. 

The gift for expressing leadership on the material plane. By the way, the way a 45 expresses their 
leadership is always being able to educate others so that they can benefit, which means that they direct. 
They tell people what to do; they don't do the doing themselves. That is why the 21 connected to the 45 in 
a chart is of no value whatsoever to the 45, because the 45 then says, "I have to do." This is not for them 
to do. They have to educate and provide the benefit, but it is for the tribe to work out those benefits, to go 
through that process. 

The Jupiter in detriment. A sense of right action that assumes a respect that may not as yet have been 
earned. This side is the difficulty for the child. This is the situation where the child itself recognizes its 
leadership quality but, of course, leadership is something that you have to establish. You have to be able 
to show that you can do it. When you are young, you do not have that experience. So, the reality is that 
these children seem very arrogant, very aristocratic. They can feel like, "I am a pasha and everything 
should come to me now," instead of waiting until the time comes that they can really earn that by truly 
being of benefit to others. Again, they are the product of the projection field on them. 

In the white book: The drive for leadership that may not have yet earned the right. What I say to these 
people is, "That is okay. You will eventually get the respect. You just keep on working on your process." 
That is what it is all about. 

45.6 Reconsideration 

This 45.6 is very extraordinary because it goes directly to the 12.1. The 12th gate is the gate called 
Standstill. Standstill is where mutation is spread. It is out of 12th gate, which is a mutative gate, that we 
first got our voice. It is the gate in which all mutation gets to manifest out into the world. The 45.6 is 
looking directly at this individual mutative process and its social capacity to spread that mutation. The 
45.6 is the kind of tribal leader that makes the tribe very nervous because it is the only tribal leader that 
recognizes that, unless we integrate the strangers, the outsiders, into the tribe, the genetic pool of the tribe 
is going to die. 

Imagine what that is like if it is a family business. The head of the family business says, "The only way 
that this business is really going to grow now is if we stop having it as a family business. We put our 
shares on the stock market. We become a real corporation and we will bring in all these outsiders to help 
us in this process to expand." For members of the tribe, for members of that family, that can be very 
frightening because it is no longer a family community business. All of a sudden, outsiders are coming in. 

This sixth line, like all sixth lines, knows that it is not enough to be the tribal leader. "I don't want to be 
just this tribal leader. I don't want to sit in my tipi, in my village, living a primitive life for the rest of my 
days. I want a television, a computer..." The reality is that the sixth line recognizes the intrinsic value of 
the outsider. On one side: Let's just bring the outsiders in. On the other side: Once we have them in, let's 
control them so that the rest of the tribe is happy. 

So, you have all kinds of rulers in history. (Catherine the Great, who brought all the French philosophers 
into the court.) They brought the outsiders in to try to bring about a broader mutation in the tribe, so that 
the tribe would grow and become healthier, thus bringing a benefit from the outside. New genes, new 
blood, new ideas and new concepts. All of that is a threat to the tribe because the tribe likes its traditions. 
It does not expect its leaders to be heretics, but the reality is that their leader can turn around on them and 
say, "Yes, but I want to bring in all these foreign people because I think that this will be beneficial to our 
society." 

We all know what happens afterwards. We have that in our all modern countries where you have all kinds 
of immigration and then you have the native tribe and you bring in all these other forces, and after a while 
you get a backlash in all of that because the tribe gets upset. 

A material direction which serves the outsider; or A material direction that is focused on conditioning the 
outsider to conform. 

An outsider who can admit that its prior rejection was an error will generally be accepted into the 
gathering. To bring the outsiders in is the gift of the sixth line. An innate empathy with the outsider 
mentality and its eccentric and often misunderstood logic. This works on many levels, but the real level is 
that if you don't bring the strangers in, the tribe is going to fail. It is going to die. If you do not bring a 
stranger into the business, it is not going to be successful. 

Jupiter in detriment. Where Uranus will innovate to find a place for an outsider, Jupiter will demand that 
it conforms. "Okay, you are a stranger. You have come here and you have fallen in love with my 
daughter, and you do not come from the same tribe as me. I don't mind that you are here. You can be my 
son, but you have to behave like we behave here in this village. Bring your blood, but I am going to 
control you and make sure that you look like everybody else in the tribe, so that nobody gets upset and 
bothers my poor daughter because she has married this freak, this outsider." This is the sixth line saying, 
"Okay, you can come in as a stranger, but I will control you." 

All of this is about understanding that, rooted in the 45.6, is the opportunity for the tribe to mutate. If the 
tribe cannot mutate, we will have no changes in this world that are really of value. It is only when the 
tribe changes that the world changes. The collective is impersonal. The tribe is there in deep support for 
each other. Only when we can mutate the tribe are we going to have eventual mutation in the way that we 
live with each other and the way we share the resources of the world. 

HEXAGRAM 46 PUSHING UPWARD 

Keep something in mind about our work in Human Design. It is a logical system and, as such, it is there 
to provide a framework in education for people so that they understand the basic mechanics of their 
nature. The nature of love in the world has nothing to do with hugging and kissing, though all that is very 
nice, but with making sure that people are being educated from the earliest possible age. Without that 
education, human beings do not have a possibility to see that what they are is not an embarrassment. 

What they are is not something that has to be refined and improved. It is not something that has to be 
perfected because it is exactly what it is supposed to be: an aspect of the totality, an aspect of the 
spectrum of things. 

We have a false prophecy about the nature of love. We assume that we generate love in the world by 
loving each other. This is a funny thing because this has nothing to do with what this love is all about. It 
has nothing to do with loving your guru, your friend or your dog. It has to do with being one with the 
creative process, accepting surrender for what it is to be you and seeing in that surrender your own 
beauty. Only when you find surrender in your own beauty, do you put love in the aura of the world. There 
is no other way, no matter how sweet and nice you are and how much love you have within yourself, and 
how much love you want to put out in the world; it is not going to change the aura of our planet. What 
changes the aura of our planet is human beings living their nature. That is the crux of what our work is, so 
that human beings can just live out their nature without the morality, without the conditioning, to see 
clearly what it is just to be themselves. That creates love in the world. We won't see that in our time. 

We have seen that the nature of the love of humanity (the 15th gate) is about the quality of the collective 
aura, and that is where the love of humanity is going to manifest. When we come to the 46th gate, we 
come to the body itself and we come to the flesh, and this is the moment that we step into our personal 
realm. In other words, this is not the generalized aura, but this is the physical body of humanity, which is 
our vehicles. The spiritual nature of the body is the body as a temple, that the flesh, to be in a body, is a 
holy thing. 

Above the lines it says: Good fortune that may be perceived as the result of serendipity (to be in the right 
place at the right time) but derives from effort and dedication. To maintain the body, its physical graces, 
its diet, its comfort and its shelter, is an ordeal. We all know that. This requires effort and dedication. To 
be dedicated to the body is to be dedicated to be in the life. This is the experiential stream of the abstract. 
This is the very humanist way. In the gates of the Vessel of Love, we have the collective being opposite to 
the individual. It is part of what the structure of the Vessel is all about. It is deeply personal and 
individual, in a sense, because the 46/29 as a channel has a quality to it. That quality is to keep the 
experience the prime focus. In other words, through the 46/29, when you enter into an experience, you 
enter into it and blindly release yourself to it. You literally fall into the experience. In doing so, only when 
you hit bottom, when the fall comes to an end, when you are through the experience, only then do you 
have an opportunity to reflect and only then is something gained from that experience. 

The 46 is extremely existential in its nature. What the 46 is all about is being in the experience that brings 
the good fortune, not necessarily the experience itself. This is what so few understand. If you look for 
something to come of your life, nothing will come, but if you are in your life, everything is possible. This 
is about being in the body and accepting its way. 

46.1 Being discovered 

The first line, as the foundation of this, is called Being discovered. Dedication in obscurity that is 
unexpectedly discovered. This is the whole secret of what this hexagram is all about. Every other place in 

the abstract process is loaded with expectation. If I do this and this, I will get that. The 46 says: shut up, 
just be. Just be in the experience for the sake of the experience and only then it can be productive. Then 
later, afterwards it can be productive through reflection, through seeing what you have actually been 
through, because if you stop in the middle, you break the flow, you break the continuity, you lose the 
value and you never have a chance to reflect. 

Neptune exalted. Art for art's sake. Any creative endeavor that is self-fulfilling sooner or later is 
recognized. I tell all of these people: just do your thing for the joy of it. Do not worry about whether it 
works or not, whether it is a success or not, whether you are loved or not. Just be in it because only then is 
good fortune possible. Then everybody will say that you were in the right place at the right time. 

In the white book: The potential for creative success through dedication. Just to be dedicated to the thing, 
to be in the experience, to be in your body. Think about it as your body. Just accept what it is to be you. 
To be lucky (all over the world people play lottery) can only happen if you are being yourself. To be 
lucky, in the abstract sense, is only when you are living out your nature. Only when you are living out the 
experience can good fortune come to you. Otherwise, it can't. Don't stop in the middle of the experience 
and ask yourself: why am I so unlucky? 

Jupiter in detriment. The ability to judge the potential of those in obscurity but often solely to benefit 
one's own success. The determination to recognize and benefit from the success of others. This is a deeply 
social channel that is rooted in the principle of success. It is 'succeeding where other people fail' or 'failing 
where other people succeed.' This is all about making the experience of being in the world worthwhile. It 
is the 29 that says yes to life, and it is the 46 that has to accept the life in the body, in the now, for what it 
is and to wait for its rewards. 

46.2 The Prima Donna 

We saw in the 15.2, that the second line was an advantage because it allowed the 15.2 to be seen as an 
extremist and, therefore, the opportunity of being left alone. When you bring that into the physical body, 
you come up with The Prima Donna. Everybody looks inside of this person and thinks they see somebody 
who always thinks that they are in the right place at the right time, doing the right thing. Of course, other 
people can feel quite uncomfortable with that. 

The Sun exalted. A difficult and demanding nature that succeeds despite its behavior because of the depth 
of its talents. 

The first two lines are deeply involved with the creative process, obviously. They lay a foundation for the 
whole hexagram. To accept what it is to be in any experience is inherently a creative process. You will 
learn from that. Out of reflection can come all sorts of advantages and rewards. 

Mars in detriment. Unrealistic demands and offensive nature of egocentric mediocrity. Very heavy 
sounding language. Nicer in the white book: The determination to succeed that may offend others, or The 
determination to be treated as a success before it has been realized. These people always think that they 
are in the right place at the right time and they have this air of what people do not like. Others have the 
sense of, "How come you feel like being in the right place at the right time and we don't?" But the 46.2 
does not know that. It is a second line. Other people look into them and see that the 46.2's are prima 
donnas for other people, and not for themselves. They are just in their experience. The 46.2 can be 
difficult for other people because they are in their experience, but in the end they will accept them. "They 
are eccentric, or they are terrible people, but they are deeply talented. Look at the way they dance." 

We are dealing with projection lines in the second and the fifth line, so there is a lot of projection going 
on. Humanity does not feel lucky. People don't feel lucky about their lives, as a generality. Luck is 
something that people hope and look for and dream about. If you see somebody who is really in their trip, 
these people do get rewards. They may get rewards even though they do not deserve them, which is really 
galling to other people. The 46.2, if they are in their experience, no matter how uncomfortable they are as 
a person for other people, tough. They should be in their experience even if it is mediocre. After all, not 
all experiences are great. 

46.3 Projection 

Third line is adaptive. It is part of the lower trigram. So, the first to the third line have the capacity to be 
in their experience, but what happens to them when they meet the other side is that it can either 
destabilize them, or not. 

In this line called Projection, we have the Moon exalted. A practical approach to good fortune that 
maintains the same patterns and attitudes that brought success and does not get side-tracked by indulging 
in further expectations. In the white book: The determination to stay with what brings success. Think 
about what happens to these people. They are third line, so they know that they have to be in their 
experience, and then they meet somebody and that person tries to pull them out of their experience 
because, the moment they meet them, they say, "What are you doing? Can we do this? Do you have some 
time?" and the third-line person tries to be in their experience, is deeply involved in something and 
someone taps them on the shoulder and say, "Excuse me, I have a problem. Can you help me?" 

The 46.3 has to stay with their thing. This is very practical for them. In other words, they meet the force 
on the other side but they have to try to get back to being in their experience because that is the only thing 
that will bring them success. Not what pulls them away. The 46.3 may end up annoying a lot of people 
who try to break into their experience while they are in there. 

Mars in detriment. A tendency through projection to treat a potential future as the present, leading to 
unjustified egoism and the loss of momentum and support. Here comes the ego again. The whole thing 
about projecting into the future is, the moment that you see that you have an experience, you realize that 
you need to stay with this experience, and it is not about the rewards you get, but about what you get 
done, what you get finished. For example, you start the morning and say, "I'll build this XYZ," because 
that is your pattern, because you want to be able to fulfill that. You want to be in the experience of doing 
that. You can be the kind of person that says to somebody, "This thing is going to be ready for you 
tomorrow." Well, this is not existential. The fact is that the third line does not know whether or not they 
will be left undisturbed because, the moment someone comes into their aura, it breaks that moment of 
experience. They may not get back to that successful pattern and may end up being somebody who 
sounds like they're always making promises and not keeping them. 

In the white book: The determination to treat a projected success as a reality. By the way, like all of these 
lines that sound negative, they are not. There are those 46.3's who, out of that experience, learn to find 
people in their lives that do not disturb them that way, because this is inherently social. They realize that 
when they meet 29's and they have to make a commitment, it is not the commitment that is important. It is 
the people that are important because all of this has to do with social context. The fact of the matter is that 
in the third lines we have the strongest learning process. This is our trial and error process, and it will take 
them time to live that out. 

46.4 Impact 

We are dealing with very specialized collective gates which, obviously, by their very nature are social, 
and we are dealing here with transpersonal lines. As I mentioned before, the 15 and the 46 have very 
unusual lines and here, we come to them in the major transpersonal lines in the fourth and fifth. Normally, 
the fifth line is exalted and the fourth line has its difficulties. Here you have fourth line that is exalted, and 
it is called Impact. 

The Earth exalted. It is there right from the beginning. The ability, once recognized, ('once recognized' 
means, though, that there is a process involved) to move rapidly from a position of obscurity to influence. 
These are people that know how to externalize their experience in the now. They know how to get other 
people not to get in their way. They are good at that because they are one-tracked. They are fixed on their 
experience but not to the point of exclusion of the other because they have social gifts. So, they know 
how to keep to their experience without alienating those people around them and by finding valuable 
allies to help them fulfill their experience. 

The moment that they are recognized, they rapidly move upwards because they have really good skills 
and they can stay in their experience. The only thing about these people is that their experience is 
everything and, though they have very good social skills and you really think that they are nice, and they 
may be, the fact is: they do not pay much attention to other people even though they have the social skills 
for them. They don't. They are in their experience. 

You see that more in the other side of this: Pluto in detriment. A reaction in achievement that tends to bite 
the hand that fed it. By the way, this is very much the propaganda of those people that have to meet the 
46.4. The fact is that they really are just in their experience. They can forget that you once helped them 
along that way. It is not that they do not care about you. It is not that if they were really confronted with 
it, they would not realize, "Oh, yes, I did not realize that I did that to you." 

These are often people that have psychic crashes. They end up sitting at a therapist's desk because they 
suddenly realize that they have crushed a lot of people and they did not even know that was happening. 
Poor things, it is not their fault. Imagine trying to cure somebody of that. It is not their fault. They are 
there to bite off the hand that feeds them. To those people that do not understand that they happen to be in 
their experience and that that is what brings them good fortune: tough. 

Remember that the nature of a line is not something that we have to heal. I always get this negative 
reaction that people have to certain lines, but it is not about fixing these things. It is not being a moralist 
saying, "Boo to biting off the hand that feeds you. This is disgusting." This is not the way it works. They 
are simply externalizing their experience at the expense of their social skills. What to do? That is who 
they are. 

In the white book: The good luck which comes from being determined that eventually, in the right place 
at the right time, leads to recognition; or The determination in success to ignore those who helped create 
it. By the way: this is not motivedriven ignoring. It is not like, "I am going to ignore them because they 
helped me." The only time that it can be like that is when they are told by somebody; then they are like 
that. 

46.5 Pacing 

We have an exalted fourth line and a detrimental fifth line. Fifth lines are normally the exalted lines. This 
is probably, of all the 64 hexagrams, the weakest of all fifth lines because of its social and abstract nature, 
and because we are dealing with pure projection. In terms of the projection: this is what society is looking 
at. What society wants to see is that there is a pacing and that everything has its kind of process so that 
success can be worked out. Everybody projects on the 46.5 that they are the ones that can always be 

successful. Remember that the 29.5 is about failure and the detriment in the 29.5 is about guaranteed 
failure. So here, when you are dealing with the 46.5 you are dealing with the consequences of what 
happens to projection on this abstract gate. What happens is in its language. 

The Moon exalted. The maintenance of proper rhythm... (Rhythm does not belong here. Rhythm is the 
15th gate.) ...that in its instinctive practicality... (Instinct does not belong here but in the tribal circuitry.) 
...avoids radical divergence from successful patterns. (With patterns we go back into the logic again.) The 
abstract process is intended to be existential. It is not intended to stay with things. This is not what it is 
about. It is an existential process in the experience. The cycle of the experience can be 10 minutes or 25 
years, but the abstract being is here to go through an experience, to reflect upon it and go on to another 
experience. 

If you are an abstract person and you are working as a salesperson, if you see a different client all the 
time, that is healthy. You go through the process, the experience. It is existential and you get to reflect on 
it later. "That person was nasty. He/she was a bad customer," or "This product sells; the other one 
doesn't." In other words, you get the whole picture from that. The moment that you deal with servicing 
that customer and you see that customer day after day, it will all fall apart because that is not an abstract 
process. You can have the experience for a while to see what it is like to service people, but you are not 
going to stay with that. 

But here, in the fifth line, it is projected on these people that there should be stability in this. So what 
happens is that people come along and project onto the 46.5 that they are going to be a success in 
whatever they are doing, and these people get stuck in that. They get conditioned by the outside to get 
stuck in a certain experience and what brought them early success ends up failing. 

The 46.5 is walking along the beach and they look down and see some money on the ground. They pick it 
up and put it in their pocket. They are very pleased and continue their walk. Then they sit in a cafe with a 
friend who tells the 46.5, "You are the kind of person. You are always so lucky. You can make a living 
just walking up and down the beach, picking up money." Off they go and they find some money, this day 
and that day. Each time they find something, it gives them a little confidence to stay with it, and they will 
find more until they quit because this is what happens to them. Their possibility for success in the 
moment gets recognized by somebody else, projected on them and then they get stuck in that pattern. The 
maintenance of proper rhythm that in its instinctive practicality avoids radical divergence from successful 
patterns. 

Neptune in detriment. An irrational... (That is the knowing circuit.) ...rejection of the very patterns that 
have proven successful. So, to understand that is to also understand that, to everybody else, it is irrational. 
It is projected on them. "How can you stop walking up and down the beach picking up coins? You are so 
lucky, you will always find something. You are crazy to give that up." 46.5's are driven crazy by other 
people. If you have a 46.5 client, tell them to learn about people and to understand that when people 
project on them they are a success, they want something of it. They want to share in it. The 46.5 ends up 
with commitments that are devastating for them. The most devastating commitment for an abstract being 
is a commitment that says, "I am going to stay with the pattern." 

In the white book: The determination to stay with the rhythm which brings success; or Determined to say 
no to the very rhythm that brings success. By the way, that saying no to the rhythm (i.e. the "cycle") is 
after being projected into it and then discovering that while you stay in it, it does not work and then you 
say no to it and you get out of it. Very difficult position. 

The whole thing for the 46 who does not have the whole channel and is looking at the 29: it is who you do 
the experience with. Everybody thinks that commitment is about the thing. For the abstract person, it is 

not the thing but who you do the thing with, because it is collective. So, you cannot avoid going through 
those experiences where you get into things through other people's projections, to see what it is like and 
then to say no to them when they then get upset. "Why are you saying no? If you stay with this, this is 
going to be that." You just have to accept that that is a pattern for you. 

46.6 Integrity 

If you look for a place of real wisdom in the abstract process, that's when you come to the 46.6. We know 
how sixth lines rise above any given situation and that when they are young, they get involved in what 
their line is all about and they learn very quickly that that does not work very well. This line is called 
Integrity and it is a Saturn/Neptune combination. 

Saturn exalted. The wisdom to secure one's identity through careful consideration of the restrictive 
potential of commitments. Neptune in detriment. Deceiving oneself and others by over-extending one's 
resources and eventually being in the position of having to break promises. The 46.6, like the whole 46th 
gate, has the quality within them that if they do accept the experience that they are in, there is going to be 
reward. 

The other thing is that they have to be in the experience. The 46.6 learns very quickly that it is not the 
experience at all that is the thing because it gets to see the whole circuit. It gets to see that the whole 
circuit is based on the impersonal contact between humans. They realize that the abstract process is faulty 
in the sense that the experience itself takes one away from the real wisdom that is possible, because it is 
the people. Like in collective sexuality in the 35/36, 41 /30, what you have is experience and excitement 
that has nothing to do with the actual person. The one thing the 46.6 knows is that success is absolutely 
dependent on the other person, and that the experience is just a catalyst, but it is the other person or the 
collective sharing that can result in real success. 

The 46.6 is not limited to just looking at this drive in the sacral center to say 'yes' to life, to experience, to 
commitments. It goes beyond that. It looks into the whole circuitry. It sees the obsession. It sees the crisis. 
It sees the progress. It sees the possibilities that are there. It sees that experience can make a contribution 
to the direction of humanity. 

Remember, the direction of humanity is towards beauty, aesthetics and harmony. That is our direction. 
The reality is that only an experience whose net value is to show the beauty and the harmony possible in 
human direction, only then is that experience worth having. That is quite a criterion. You can sit up there 
on the fence for a long time to wait and see, to find that experience that, being in it, ultimately, is of value 
to humanity. 

In the white book: The determination to say no to restrictive commitments; or A drive for success that 
will not say no and will end up breaking promises. But all of this happens when they're young. This is not 
something that is necessarily part of their mature life, unless you have people who are very Mars-oriented. 
The 46.6 goes to the 18.1. It goes to work on What has been spoilt. It goes to the need to correct within a 
collective process. A need to find what is worth challenging, and what is challenging. What is worth 
correcting? What is of value to humanity? The 46.6 is not likely to be an obvious success in this life 
because, for them, it will be dependent on how clear they are about the nature of the beings around them. 
Their success is dependent on that and, like all good sixth lines, as they sit up there on the roof of the 
house, they are checking out all the possibilities. They are looking at those different people, trying to see 
who, in fact, can help make success possible. 

It is a very difficult position and yet, it is one that carries within it a deep inherent wisdom. That is the real 
integrity. Real integrity is that you can have any kind of experience as long as that is an experience that 

you can fully put yourself into and realize that it is of substance, that it can be of value in terms of being 
able to bring something out of that back into the collective. We have two kinds of teachers: the 46.6 is the 
teacher of experience, and those teachers of experience really benefit us. They save us time, they smooth 
our way and provide us with all kinds of opportunities. That is the possibility that lies within this integrity 
of the sixth line. The 18.1 is the adherence to conservative patterns. What to challenge, this is the 
dilemma here. 

HEXAGRAM 47 OPPRESSION 

The channel 64/47, the channel of Abstraction, the channel of mental activity mixed with clarity. The 
47th gate is the gate of Oppression, the gate of realization. Its potential is the awareness to recognize what 
makes sense or not. When you are dealing with the abstract mind, the inspiration that it receives out of the 
64th gate is memory. It stores visual memory that comes back in sequences. What it is like is: you have a 
camera working in your brain all day which takes pictures of the world as the world goes by you. Every 
single inch of footage of that camera goes in and all of it gets stored in what we call the deep gray areas of 
the brain. Everything that you are taking in gets stored, but access is another story. The 64th gate is the 
abstract inspiration and, as such, it releases its sequences and not the complete footage. 

In other words, you do not get the complete beginning, middle and end. You get a sequence within that 
framework. That is why the 64th gate is a gate of Confusion. 

The first thing to recognize about Oppression is the awareness to recognize what makes sense or not, to 
recognize whether you can make sense out of that sequence. Where does it belong? Do I know what this 
is? So, this is the potential. The awareness potential is the identification of a single image, the freeze 
frame, to be able to go in and to be able to identify what the sequence is. This is the whole thing that is so 
important about the 47. That is, it needs to be able to say, "Aha, now what I am remembering, what I am 
seeing makes sense to me." 

In the Rave I'Ching, there is no more difficult a statement than the heading above the lines. It says: A 
restrictive and adverse state as a result of internal weakness or external strength, or both. The whole thing 
about the 47th hexagram is that it is oppressive. There is the inability to prove anything. There is no 
splenic system involved in the abstract process. Just simply getting a sequence out of order is, by its very 
nature, difficult on the psyche. It is there. It has to be dealt with and all one can do, in essence, is guess. 
You are realizing. You are trying to make sense out of something. What happens in a situation like that is 
what is collected from the past. You either see that in that movie the problem way is yours, or theirs. 

This all goes back to the nature of the emotional system that generates guilt, blame and shame. Making 
sense out of things is actually about who gets the blame? Does the day or the situation get the blame? Is it 
me or them? What you are trying to realize is who to blame. That's what it is on the personal level. It is 
also many other things. But the reality is that it is uncomfortable because, even when you get to the point 
that you can make sense out of it, that does not say anything. It is an attempt to relieve oneself from the 
oppression. It still has to become an idea. It still has to become something that can stimulate others. It still 
has to go through a long process. 

The thing to keep in mind about all this is that it is oppression because one of the most difficult things for 
human beings to do is to make sense out of what it is to be human. After all, all of our history that has 
been generated out of the mental plane is coming from this stream because this stream is the capacity to 
be able to look at the past and try to make sense out of past experience. It has enormous value and it is 
difficult because trying to make sense out of what it is to be human is a difficult task. 

47.1 Taking Stock 

The first line is always the foundation. It is the beginning of a process and it is introspective. This is a 
classic line for that because it is called Taking stock, and that is what taking stock is all about. It is a real 
introspective process. 

Saturn exalted. The ability in times of hardship to concentrate on eradicating the negative factors that 
have led to oppression. This hexagram is always in hardship because it is trying to realize and to make 

sense, and it has always got the sequences coming. Whenever one is looking at the past through this gate, 
you are trying to figure out what went wrong, in that sense. You are always looking to see why it didn't 
work the way I wanted it to work, the way it should, could or might have worked. You get to a point 
where that kind of a mind is trying to eradicate what went wrong in order to come up with an idea of what 
could be right. This is the nature of this kind of a mind. 

In the detriment: The delusion of seeing oppression as an exclusively external phenomenon with often 
disastrous results. In other words, I have to make sense out of this stuff, not because of me but because of 
what they did. "If it wasn't for them creating all these problems, I wouldn't have to think about that all the
