time. It is their fault. I wish they would stop." That is the other side of this line. You have to recognize 
that this is the foundation of oppression: you are either trying to correct or fix, trying to make sense out of 
what did not work in order that you can come up with an idea of what will work, or you end up constantly 
feeling like "I will never be able to come up with an idea that will really work because it is them and not 
me and I have to be the one that suffers." 

In the white book: The realization that negative thoughts have to be eradicated. Please understand that 
that can become quite obsessive. This is constantly dealing with what happened yesterday and the day 
before, trying to clean that out and trying to work it out and make sense out of it. 

On the other side we have: The sense that the world is against you. It is all their fault. This is the 
beginning of the abstract mind. That is why it is desperate for ideas. It wants to get out of that. 

47.2 Ambition 

The projection line is about the inability to take stock, to be introspective, and it is simply the need to 
project outwards. One of the things that are so funny about this line is that its resonance, the fifth line, is 
called The Saint. This is the training ground for saints and it ends up seeming exactly the opposite. It 
tends to be quite chaotic. The nature of this projection is that the only way to escape the past it to be busy 
in the present. This is the key to understanding this second line. I always tell this second line the same 
thing: be busy. 

It is called Ambition. Saturn exalted. The ambition and drive to overcome personal oppression in order to 
achieve security, which means that these can be people that are quite disturbed. 'Disturbed' in the sense 
that they cannot make sense out of something and it really bothers them. What they do is that they get 
involved with something else to try to get away from it. But as we well know, you carry everything with 
you. So, while they are being busy, they carry that with them. It always catches up to them. They 
ultimately have to deal with it one way or another. 

Mercury in detriment. An indecisiveness in times of personal oppression, whether to apply intelligence to 
recovery or accept its weight to take advantage of other prevailing conditions that may only be temporary. 
What that is saying basically is: When I have that, my biggest problem is what do I do? I know I should 
be busy, but what should I be busy with? If I don't know what to be busy with, should I really look at this 
problem and try to realize my way out of it? If I can't do that, what should I really be busy with? This can 
be very confusing. 

In the white book: Realizing that to be busy is mentally healthy. Otherwise, these people get sick. It is 
classic. If you have a 47.2 and you are not occupied, if you do not have something to do that is of value to 
you, you will get deeper and deeper into that because you cannot look inward. Remember, this trap of the 
second line. In other words, they can't realize it anyway. They have to surrender to that and, of course, it 
is only the beginning of a maturing process in the hexagram. They are not ready until the fifth line, its 
resonance, to really be able to surrender to their oppression. The second line just simply projects 

outwards. One of the most important things for these people is quality busy-ness, and the best thing, 
because of its Saturnian nature, is to make money. This is very good for 47.2s. 

47.3 Self-Oppression 

Remember that the abstract process is connected very strongly to the emotional wave. If you look at the 
third line emotional wave, you have the wave of bonds made and broken. The third line is a line of 
adaptation and, as such, it is the first opportunity in which, within the hexagram, there is this possibility 
of looking across to the other side. It is called Self-Oppression. 

Jupiter exalted. The conscious and well integrated being whose natural right action will eventually come 
to see the unfoundedness of its oppression. All that is saying is that all this stuff I keep remembering, I 
keep remembering and there is nothing I can do about it, but basically today I am okay. That is the highest 
level of this line. It is this 'okay part' that is so important in this. 

The Martian side is: A self-oppression so highly energized that it may prove irreversible and destructive. 
Going back into that mental process, you cannot make any sense out of those mental pictures. That is the 
self-oppression. You cannot make any sense out of them at all and you cannot say, in that sense, that 
today it is okay. 

In the white book: The eventual realization that one is really o.k. Everything about the abstract process is 
rooted in ultimate crisis: death and rebirth. This is the beginning, the middle and the end of things. 
Ultimately, you come to a point where you go through the field of crisis and you can come out with the 
third line and be able to say, "Yes, my mind gives me a hard time but I am okay." 

Whenever I work with people that have the 47.3, 1 tell them something very straight forward, "Your mind 
is your enemy. It does not have to ruin your life." It is the enemy for them because it is always going to be 
oppressed. For them it feels like, "Oh, my lifel This does not work. That did not work." The possibility for 
them is to realize that that is simply their mind. That is not what they are living day to day, moment by 
moment. It is simply an aspect in the way in which their mind operates. That is easier said than done. But 
the fact of the matter is that, particularly for the people that have the 47.3 activated in an undefined ajna, 
it is much easier to discover that life really is okay and that oppression is just the way their mind works. 
The other thing to recognize about this is that this is an experiential path and, as such, if we don't have the 
47.3's we don't have the best counselors available for what self -oppression truly is. 

This is the whole thing about so many lines that appear to be difficult. Without those human beings that 
can transcend the difficulty of that nature, we would not have people who would be able to guide us. 
After all, the talent of the abstract way is through experience. "I went through all these years of being self- 
oppressed. Let me tell you how this works. It does not have to ruin your life. I have had the experience. 
Let me explain it to you," says the 47.3 who has gone through that.. Remember, they are historians. Every 
single aspect of this hexagram is difficult because life is difficult, and it is extraordinary difficult to make 
sense out of life. That is why we need logic. That is why logic is healthy. So, it is an ordeal for these 
people and yet at the same time, they are the ones that can guide us through what that ordeal is. 

In the experiential way, that is the most important information you get. You get a map from somebody 
else who says, "You know, I have been there; let me tell you about it so that we can share this together." 
One of the important things to recognize is that the experience that is built into this is not by its very 
nature negative. That is not a moral question. It is of enormous advantage to us. If you are doing a reading 
for somebody who has the 47.3, the only thing that you can point to is: What in their chart can they really 
rely on to see that that is their life? For the people that have that as their only definition, the 64/47.3, this 

is a very difficult life. For them, it is very difficult to see that their life is okay. They can only learn to see 
that certain conditioning is okay. 

47.4 Repression 

With the fourth line, you get to the upper trigram and you get to externalization and to the one-track- 
process. Think about that in terms of the emotional wave of kindness/meanness; it is the Brotherhood/ 
Sisterhood. If you look at the fourth line of the 30th hexagram, it is called Burnout. That is one of the 
things to recognize about the nature of this fourth line. The fourth line is very much aware that there is 
another side. I use the word hope for the inspiration of the other side. It is all part of a belief system. It is 
hoping that what is one the other side can relieve it of its oppression. Instead, it ends up seeing that, not 
only can the other side not do that, but it is the other side that is repressing them. 

The constraints of external oppression. Saturn exalted. The strength of identity that even in times of the 
most powerful oppression can maintain its resources and to some extent ensure survival for the benefit of 
others. These people have a very fixed thing that they cannot make sense out of. They may be able to 
make sense out of all kind of things but there is one thing (the fixed nature of the fourth line) they cannot 
make sense of, and that is the thing that disturbs them the most. That is the thing they are always trying to 
get resolved and they can't. It is always something from the outside and they are hoping that the outside 
somehow resolves it. Looking, trying to externalize for that experience. 

The other side, the Moon in detriment. When robbed of its light, the Moon is lost in darkness, barely able 
to nourish itself, let alone others. These people can be very dependent and, the moment they get 
overwhelmed by that external repression, they can become so dependent that they can become psychically 
so weak, they burn out. When you have one thing and you cannot resolve that one thing, the rest of you is 
not healthy. It just keeps burning and burning. 

A sense of identity that can be maintained despite external conditioning. These people always get it. It is 
not that they are making this up. They are not crazy. If you are born with a 47.4, you have to deal with all 
kinds of forces on the outside, like everybody else, except the 47.4 takes it personal. We all have to deal 
with external repression, oppression, all of us, but we have a different way of dealing with that. Each in 
our own particular styles. These people are always fixed on that. 

The identity overwhelmed by external conditioning. They are so dependent on the other that they 
collapse. These are, for example, people that got something in their head that they want somebody to fix 
for them (their therapist, the doctor, their guru). Everybody is trying to condition them away from that, 
trying to solve it for them and it does not work. They really go mad. They can really burn out. The best 
therapist for them is the 36.4 because it brings them the correct crisis. 

47.5 The Saint 

When we come to the fifth and sixth lines, we notice that they are both singularities. These are two out of 
the nine lines throughout the 384 that are singularities. The fifth line is The Saint, this resonance from the 
projection out of Ambition, this being busy. The second line is being busy to escape and the Saint is being 
busy but not as an escape. There just is nothing else to do. Why get involved with all of that oppression 
which is just going to catch you up in the whole mental trip? Why not simply just go out there and live 
your life? This is the nature of the fifth line. This position has special significance and there is no planet 
in detriment. 

Venus exalted. The gift in times of oppression to maintain, without hypocrisy, a harmonic relationship 
with one's oppressors, while providing aid and succor to the oppressed. These people are just fine; that is, 
it is going on in there and if you talk to them they'll say, "Yes, I know. But it is just my mind." 

In the white book: Realization at its most exalted. Acceptance of the weight of the abstract process and 
the grace that naturally follows. The abstract process is a painful process. It is its nature. The wave is from 
hope to pain. It is its nature. It is difficult. It is full of illusion. It is full of change and transitoriness. It 
always has its crisis. It is always going to be something that is uncomfortable, particularly at the mental 
level. The nature of the fifth line is that it is the universalization line: to show that, yes, oppression is there 
but this is not a bad thing. This is a process of remembering and trying to make sense out of what it is to 
be human. It ends up that people who carry this line can be very saintly. They can care very much for the 
pain of other humans and they can deal with that, and they can offer themselves in that because they do 
know it so well. 

47.6 Futility 

The ajna center, like the splenic center and like any awareness center, is a center of fear. In the mind, we 
call it anxiety. The fear of the 47th gate is the fear of not being able to realize, the fear of not being able to 
make sense out of life, the fear of not being able to relieve oneself of the oppression. When you come to 
the sixth line, all sixth lines carry with them the potential for depression. You are getting to the top of the 
house. You are on the roof and you looking out beyond, and what your hexagram represents is not what 
you are looking for. The 47.6, the next line is the 6.1, directly into the wave of the 6.1, directly into the 
line of not wasting your resources. This is a line of Futility. It is futile and it can be the most deeply 
depressive of all lines. Because it is on the mental plane, it can involve deep anxiety. 

Futility. A difficult position, for which there is no exaltation. The Sun in detriment, where the strength of 
will alone may find a way to adapt and survive, but without hope of ever overcoming the oppression. 
Here in the white book: Life as an ordeal stripped of realization. That means, from the mental plane and 
perspective, for these people, it is truly futile. Why bother to make sense out of that? What is the truth? 
The depression that lies in this sixth line, at this place, what it really wants is the truth. It does not just 
want something that makes sense because it knows that that does not work. It is futile. Something that 
makes sense today makes different sense tomorrow or no sense at all, and the sixth line knows that 
because it knows that it is just a wave. What it is really looking for is something beyond that. It is looking 
for the truth. What is the truth? What is it to be human? 

The truth comes in the next line: Don't waste your resources on relationships that are not of value to you. 
That is its truth. Do not be open to things that are not of value to you. It is looking for its truth. These 
people know exactly that there is no use complaining. They realize that complaints are futile. They are 
very sensitive when they have other people around that constantly complain. They do not like that and, 
therefore, it is very important for them not to waste their resources on the wrong relationships. 

HEXAGRAM 48 THE WELL 

We are in a collective process. The 48th hexagram is part of the channel of talent, the channel of The 
Wave Length. It is part of the logical process of correction and perfection and, as I mentioned when we 
were looking at the 57th gate and the 18th gate, the 48th gate is a gate of frustration. Its possibility is to 
have depth, but depth without expression, without the possibility to experiment, leads to deep frustration. 
This frustration is known creatively by anybody who is involved in any kind of creative process: the 
inability to be able to experiment, the inability to be able to see whether or not your depth can lead to a 
solution. 

The 48th gate is the gate of black magic: black magic in the sense that it is knowledge without necessarily 
being able to manifest. The 48th gate is The Well. It is the darkest place you will find in a chart. It is filled 
with all this deep, dark mystery. "I know how to turn straw into gold, if you only give me enough money 
to build the machinery." The 48 says, "I have got it," and looks to the 16 and asks, "Can I experiment with 
this? Will you finance this?" The machine, by the way, which will turn straw into gold would cost much 
more than the finished product, but that is another story. 

In the 48, in the gate of depth, there is always the frustration. "Is there a possibility? Can I actually get to 
the Throat? Can I actually manifest? Can I see that this experiment will lead to a solution?" Remember 
that frustration is one of the deepest aspects of our collective logical process. It is hard for the logic to 
find a motor. The three gates of logic in the Throat do not lead directly to an energy. What that means is 
that we have committees and bureaucracies. We have all kinds of recommendations that are made over 
and over again, and the deep frustration that lies within the collective: why can't they just do it instead of 
talking about it? This frustration is part of our whole logical process. So, all that is rooted in the 48. 

That frustration is, by its very nature, necessary because it is so difficult to get to the energy that logic 
needs. The frustration is in and of itself a driving force. There is this constant tension (the 48 is part of the 
cross of Tension) which is necessary because it has to hold on to that "I have got the depth. I have got to 
get it out." It is collective and not personal. There is this deep frustration in needing to share that depth. 

The 48th gate, The Well, the gate of depth: the possibility here is the awareness resource of vital 
information as a pattern or not. What is vital is determined by the 18th gate which has the gift to 
recognize what needs to be corrected or perfected. This is what is vital. What often happens with the 48th 
gate is that (every line can be its polarity) that vitality becomes trivia. There is an enormous amount of 
trivia that lies in depth. I have what people call a photographic memory, so not only do I remember things 
that seem to be of value to you, but I remember the most absurd and useless information that you could 
possibly imagine, i.e. theme songs of commercials on the radio from 25 years ago. Things that people 
think that nobody should remember, I remember. The Well is filled with many things. The Well is not just 
filled with what we think is valuable and essential truth. The Well is also filled with a lot of junk. This is 
the whole thing about talent. Talent can be wonderful, and very kitschy. The awareness possibility in the 
48: correction stored as a pattern. The whole thing about depth is, "We know this is what has to be 
corrected. This is the pattern that has to be worked with. Now we will go deep into that and see exactly 
how we can do that, and then we pray that we meet a 16 so that we can get it out, so that we can get our 
experiment done. It is very difficult for logic to actually be experimented with. 

Please understand the nature of the expression because most people do not understand what 'white' and 
'black magic' means. The nature of the 48th gate is to come to grips with what is exactly the right pattern, 
and to understand the form. To understand the form is to understand the pattern. Black magic is 
understanding the pattern and using that as an advantage over others. That is simply the manipulation of 
the understanding of something. This is what they call 'black magic' and in many cases the 48's are aware 
of patterns that others are not aware of. Because they have to look for the possibility of expression, they 

take advantage of the patterns that they know. I consider astrologers to be black magicians, given this 
expression. When an astrologer does a reading, he holds the chart and you are the ignorant one. They will 
tell you exactly what is there because they have the power and you don't. This is the work of black magic. 
There is no way for you to confirm that. There is no way for you to do anything other than to accept that 
they know and you don't. 

The nature of Human Design is not that. Human Design is not black magic. It is a knowledge of form and 
a knowledge of form is available to anyone. So when a Human Design analyst puts a chart down on the 
table, you can understand exactly what they are pointing at so that you can see what is there. There is a 
fundamental difference between these forms. By the way, that is not to say that I think that black magic is 
about good or bad. It is just about understanding the nature of the terminology. In the 48, you are dealing 
with a pattern. This is the channel of talent for the collective, the depth of which can be of enormous 
value to the collective. 

When we were looking at the 18th gate, the heading to it says: The vigilance and the determination to 
uphold and defend basic and fundamental human rights. Let us not forget that that is what the 18th gate is 
about: to uphold basic and fundamental human rights and to correct anything that denies those rights. 
When you get to the 48th hexagram, it says: The necessary and qualitative foundation that is a 
prerequisite to establish the common good. Without depth, without the recognition and the understanding 
about the nature of the form, without being able to understand the pattern, common good cannot be 
established. Though this can be a gate of black magic in that sense, please understand that the nature of 
this depth is there for the common good. It is not about telling somebody that you know what is good for 
them. It is about allowing them to experiment with it and find out for themselves. That is another story. 

48.1 Insignificance 

The line of introspection. The foundation is called Insignificance. One of the things to understand about 
depth is that it takes time. Each of these lines requires a different kind of spacing in the life because they 
can actually reach the point in which the Well is rich with what is inside of it. 

Moon exalted. An instinctive recognition of what is practical and deserves attention. This is part of the 
foundation of what depth is about. On one side, depth always represents the possibility of something that 
is practical and deserves attention. When I have people who come with the first line, I always remind 
them, "Yes, you are going to be able to have an understanding of many things, but the only things that 
you will get to experiment with are those things that are practical and really are deserving of somebody 
else's attention." 

The Martian side is: An ego tendency to apply energy to trivial considerations. This is what I said to you 
about the basic dichotomy that exists within the nature of The Well. The Well has these two sides. It has 
the capacity to recognize and understand patterns that are of benefit to humanity (this is a collective 
process) and, on the other side, it has the recognition of the patterns and all the trivia that is connected to 
those patterns. 

A taste for recognizing what is practical and deserves attention; or A taste for trivia. By the way, I love 
trivia. This is not about good or bad in these things. The essential truths of my life are in the trivia. This is 
what I have discovered. I am an eclectic and therefore I collect everything. What I discovered about the 
garbage is that what I was collecting I assumed to be flowers and that when I looked to the flowers and I 
dug into the earth, I recognized that their root is all that stuff I considered to be garbage. All of that trivia: 
like cliches. I love cliches. I hated them when I was intellectual and ignorant. I thought that they were 
terrible, but now I realize that they are the funniest things we have and that they are essentially true. The 

little things, the trivial things, are not about not respecting them. You simply have to recognize that depth 
is something that is not just about what is important. It is also about what is simply there. 

The collective field: to recognize and be aware of the collective environment is the foundation of depth. 
Depth is not limited to a prejudice that says, "I can only be deep because it is a value". This is not the 
mind. This has nothing to do with the way we think. This is the depth that is coming into us all the time 
and we are not necessarily consciously involved with this process at all. It is simply there and suddenly it 
blurts out of our mouth, and we hear that we have collected these patterns. They are suddenly just 
emerging. So, recognize that the basis of depth is not to be judgmental from the mental perspective about 
what your depth is made up of. Fear of inadequacy is the fear here and so often when people come to me 
with the 48th gate (I have both my Neptunes here, so I know it deeply), I say to them, "Relax, you are 
deep. You cannot judge your depth from your mind." That is what Neptune taught me. I was never 
allowed to see it. It is a depth that takes place at a lymphatic level. It has nothing to do with the way we 
think. It collects everything. It collects, in each person that carries that gate, exactly the depth that you 
need. This is the beauty of it. 

48.2 Degeneracy 

This line is called Degeneracy. If you look at the 18.2, it is called Terminal disease, which meant that no 
correction can take place. There is nothing that can be corrected. This is a very important lesson for the 
48.2. This is a projection field. It cannot look inside, so it is not looking at its depth. It just wants to have 
its chance to experiment on the other side. Due to that wish and due to the fact that it does not know the 
other side, it is just projecting outwards and fails to recognize something intrinsic: it does not matter how 
much depth you have, the experimenter controls it. Remember that. This is very important. No matter 
how much depth you have, it is the 16th gate that is in control of manifestation, of expression, and it is the 
16th gate that says, "I will experiment with this, or not". 

The awareness that to successfully establish a new form one cannot neglect the most positive attributes 
just to accommodate inferior elements. This would lead to deterioration. The other side: The misguided 
urge for harmony that when associated with inferior values degenerates into decadence. 

You are a 48 and you are working as a graphic artist for an advertising agency, and you have a very 
important client for your company. The client wants you to design a soap box for them. You go about 
your job and you design a soap box with your 48 depth and talent. You know what pattern will work. You 
know what kind of pattern the collective is really going to appreciate and you design the box. You color it 
and put all your letters on. This is classic for the 48.2. Then the client comes and says, "The box has the 
right shape but I do not like the color. I don't like what you have written. I don't like the letter type that 
you used. I don't like where you have put it. I want you to change all these points and experiment with 
blue instead of red and with this kind of type." The 48.2 in the detriment can always say yes to that, based 
on the rooting of the 18.2. "It is not good enough, I am inadequate. I cannot really challenge the authority 
because I cannot correct them. I will give up my artistic integrity and I will allow them to degenerate my 
creative skills. What my intuition brought out for that box was correct, whether they like it or not. " 

But in the 48, there is this deep fear of inadequacy. That fear out of the projection line can immediately 
lead to the talent being broken. I met so many of these people and they all suffer from this until they 
finally realize that, unless they stand by their intuition and allow it to be correct for them, they will soon 
discover that there are people who will resonate to that. They should only work with those people. 

A confidence in awareness to resist inferior influences. It is all about confidence. You either have 
confidence in your taste, or you don't. 

A lack of confidence that invites interference and decadence. You can only have confidence when you 
know the mechanics. If you have a defined splenic system and the 48th gate, you have to recognize that 
you must rely on that. It is you. It does not mean that it will be right for everyone. It means that it will 
always be right for you. The confidence comes in accepting that that is correct for you, as long as you 
recognize that there is the opportunity, the possibility, to stand by your intuition. 

All projected fields generate interference from others. Every second line is looking for somebody who is 
going to smack it because second lines are always the projections that lack depth, so they end up banging 
into something. But it does not mean that they are inferior in quality. I know wonderful 48.2 artists who 
went through hell during the early part of their career because they had people telling them what they 
should paint. "Don't paint in oil, paint in water colors. Those brushes are too big. Use smaller ones." They 
did what they were told. When they had their reading done, they all understood the mechanics, and this 
whole burden disappeared. They were relieved of the whole load. Confidence can only grow out of the 
recognition of the mechanics. If you have it, you have to learn to rely on it. That is what our work is 
about. Trust what is you. 

48.3 Incommunicado 

When you come to the third line and the fourth line, you come to the themes of individuality. The theme 
about individual depth is the most difficult of all the lines in the 48. Both of these lines are indications of 
long term processes. I have both my Neptunes in the third and the fourth line. When you get to your half- 
life point, to your mid-life, that is when you begin to get a benefit from the depth that can be developed 
here. Both Incommunicado and Restructuring are, by their very nature, long term processes, and this 
means that the depth is not there for a very long time. The Well really has to fill up. The third line is 
called Incommunicado. This line speaks for itself. It is a line of adaptation; this is the end of the lower 
trigram process. 

The Moon exalted. Symbolized by the 'no-moon' phase where the potential of light is unrecognized, 
unavailable and unknowable. The redeeming value is in the transience of such a stage which can give 
strength to those so afflicted. Mercury in detriment. The profound anxiety when a profound intelligence is 
forgotten in the wilderness. 

The depth is there but it takes many years for it to flower. The process is such that anybody who has that 
line knows that there is depth within them. There is this urge to bring it out. It is very difficult for people, 
like myself, who are very individual. These two lines that I have my Neptunes in, the only way that they 
get to the throat is via the 57/20, so my depth is always coming out through this manifestation to my 
throat, yet I had to go through a lifetime process of not knowing what the hell I was here for, having no 
idea and not getting out any of what I thought was the depth within me. This is a long term process. 

Where the development of taste and depth is a long-term process; and on the other side: The tendency in a 
long-term process to anxiety. This can be deeply frustrating. It is one of the most frustrating lines because 
it is the capacity to be totally ignored for your depth. Many people can be psychically damaged by this. 
These are the people that become obsessed with skills. They think, "If I have the right skill I can get my 
depth out," and are constantly looking for another skill. 

48.4 Restructuring 

The fourth line people are the most gifted. They are very talented people but most of them never get to 
live out their talent in their life because this is a deeply frustrating line, much more frustrating than the 
Incommunicado, because the Incommunicado does come to an end and one gets used to the fact that one's 

depth does not seem to come out. You get a delightful sweet surprise when it finally does. The reality is 
that when you are dealing with the fourth line, (remember that it is about externalization), it is the 
recognition that one has to make on the other side and it is a very fixed process, a one-track-process. 

Here, in the Restructuring you have: The good sense to take advantage of the restriction on short-term 
activity to assess the situation and restructure for long-term goals that will facilitate development when 
activity resumes. On other side: A resistance to restructuring on speculation with the tendency, when 
activity resumes, to have to do so anyway. 

Please understand how this works. Let's say that you are a writer having this line. You have the depth, and 
all of a sudden there is a transit and the 16 comes along and you start to write. The depth is coming out 
and it feels wonderful and then it suddenly stops. It might stop after an hour, or after four days. It depends 
on the transit and on what is going on in your process. But the fact is that this is the line of stopping and 
starting. These people can go absolutely nuts because they think (like the 18.4) that they are incompetent. 
So, they start writing something and it stops and they burn it, they throw it away. They forget about it 
because they say, "I could not do it. I could not fulfill that. I could not keep on doing it." This is a lie. 

The nature of this line is that it takes a long time for these individual theme -lines to mature into their 
creative depth. What that means it that processes start and stop. They stop for a reason. They stop so that 
new depth can be added before you can return. This used to drive me crazy. I start writing something. I 
am on automatic -pilot. I am what I call a bio-faxmachine: it is there and it is great and then it stopped. I 
got really angry. Why did it stop? I was ignorant and thought that it was my talent and my depth. "This 
hand and this pen will do what I say," but this does not work. This can be very frustrating. Only when I 
was aware of this knowledge, only then, for the first time in my life could I do that. I have been working 
on a book for over four years now and I work on it when I can. I have never done that in my whole life. 
When I did the white book, I sat still for two and a half months and worked 14 hours a day. That is my 
style. But there is a part in me that has to work on things in this fourth-line way and I learned from that 
knowledge to trust it: to see that I can go back. Before, I never thought that I could go back, that it would 
still be there waiting for me to go back to and that it would continue. 

This is so important for the people with the fourth line. They have to see that whatever comes out is 
correct for its time, for its moment, and it is not to be destroyed. One has not to be frustrated that one 
cannot continue. I always tell these people about respecting and honoring the muse, who is not always 
there. 

The awareness that depth and its possible expression will face restrictions with a resulting taste for short- 
term projects. Learn to accept what you get existentially, creatively. Whatever you get, it is okay. When it 
stops, it is time to refill the well. 

A taste for long-term projects that will be frustrated in restraint. "I want to write a book starting at page 1 
and I want to get to the last page and I don't want anything to get in the way of that." Of course, it always 
does and then you end up with this deep frustration. Whenever you see people with the third and fourth 
line, understand that they have their roots in the 18.3 and the 18.4. This is the root for the deep frustration. 
"I want to correct it now and get the whole thing done." 

48.5 Action 

When you get to the fifth and sixth lines, you are in the collective themes and the 48th belongs to a 
collective circuit. We know that fifth lines have a special quality; they are the penultimate of a hexagram, 
they bring together all of the basic qualities of the hexagram and have the capacity within them to 

universalize them. The fifth lines that are in a collective circuitry have a deep resonance to that circuitry, 
and universalization is something that can be powerfully moved through those fifth lines. 

Here, it is called Action. A natural urge to apply energy to action. In other words, "I have got it. Let's do 
it. I have the pattern, the depth. Let's do it. " These people are interested in getting the pattern out, getting 
the corrective process out, getting the experiment done. Remember that the fifth line, in terms of its 
emotional wave, has to do with seduction. All fifth lines are deeply seductive. Let me seduce you to do an 
experiment with my wonderful depth. 

On the other side of that, the Moon in detriment. An over-reliance on the need for protection that in times 
of social renewal is obsessed with the details of planning at the expense of action. On one side of the 18.5, 
you have The Therapist and on the other side you have The Mental patient. They belong to each other in 
the same bag which gets carried over to this fifth line. So, the natural urge to apply energy into action. "I 
know how everybody can be made to feel better. Let's do it." The collective answer. On the other side is 
the fear that the experiment won't work. It is safer to keep on working out the details of it. "Yes, well, I 
really think that I have an answer, but I am still doing my research. I am not ready to experiment with it. I 
am not ready to tell you what it is." 

A taste for action; or Insecurity with one's depth that can fail to take action. "I am not ready." Endless 
planning and detail-working and, in its own way, this is the instability of The Mental patient that we have 
in the detriment of the 18.5. It is so difficult to get logic into action that, the moment that the opportunity 
is there, you have to be ready and the people in the detriment are not always ready. They are afraid of the 
authority that they have challenged. They are afraid of their depth not being adequate enough and they are 
afraid of failing, of having everybody say, "Look, you were wrong all along and you have wasted your 
time." Rather than getting to the point of experimenting, they don't let anybody know what their depth 
really is. These are people that keep diaries that nobody ever sees, with all their theories about the nature 
of living. Later, you find out that they were totally different than what you thought. 

48.6 Self-fulfillment 

The sixth line, the roof of the house. The line of transition is called Self-fulfillment. An undiminishable 
resource. Venus exalted. The valued center that as it gives, it receives and thus can continue to give. 
When it gives, it receives. Remember that this is a sixth line. The 18.6 is not Work on what has been 
spoilt, it is spoilt. This is the little Buddha that everybody has to nurture. This is the one that has be 
looked after and treated well. 

On the other side of this Self-fulfillment, the depth is there, regardless. They are not inadequate. These are 
people with depth and understanding but they do not particularly care about whether they experiment with 
it or not in order to really see for sure if they understand. Only if they give out their understanding will the 
opportunity for experimentation come back and, the moment they do that, they are of value to other 
human beings. They can be very gifted. They already can intuitively recognize what is beyond the skills 
on the other side, what the indication or direction is afterwards, when the experiment is actually proven. 
They recognize intuitively what can transpire out of that experiment. 

Moon in detriment. A tendency to superficiality that, though generous and nurturing, will lack the 
inspirational quality that can transform its gift into a common currency. In the white book: A depth and 
potential talent that is of value to others; or Where the depth is limited, the taste will be superficial and 
affect the quality of the possible talent. All depth is limited unless it can be experimented with. This is the 
ultimate limitation of all depth. The moment that you recognize something and understand it, you have to 
check it out and if you do not do so, you are not truly a logical being and you will not be able to provide 

for the love of humanity, to provide a logical pattern that is reliable for humanity to move towards the 
future. 

So, it becomes very important for the sixth lines to give their pattern to somebody else, if they themselves 
do not want to check it out. "We know that you understand, but if you can't check it out, give it to 
somebody else." There is no selfishness in this. This is self -fulfilled. If the sixth lines consider that, they 
can become enormously valuable because what they offer for experimentation can lead to something that 
is totally beyond the talent. It is where it goes to throughout the whole being. By the way, these are people 
where everybody else says that they are inadequate. This is the funny thing about this line. But they are 
not. 

HEXAGRAM 49 REVOLUTION 

This hexagram is called Revolution, and we step into the emotional system. Remember that 
every single gate out of the emotional system resonates to the nature of that wave. The channel 
19/49, the channel of Synthesis, is a design of sensitivity. This is a tribal, mystical channel. It is 
about the nature of resources in the tribe, and it is about touch. The 49 th hexagram is the gate of 
principles. This gate establishes the principles of resources: who gets what and what do they 
get. This is the nature of the 49 th gate. It establishes what has to be obeyed. The 49 th gate is 
always looking for obedience. That is its nature. It is a gate of principles and its potential is the 
awareness of what is needed or not. Please understand that this is not an awareness. What is 
needed or not, as a principle, operates in the wave. When you are at the low end of the wave, 
you do not need it so much, or maybe you do. Or at the high end of the wave, you need 
something or you don't. This is conditioned by the nature of the wave. 

All of our revolutions, all of our principles have been conditioned ignorantly by the nature of this 
wave. The awareness potential is food discrimination. This is all about dictating from the 49th 
position, and establishing the principles about what food should be available, and when the food 
should be available, and how to get the food. All of this is about organizing the resources for the 
tribe. So, the 49 th gate is an emotional gate and, as such, in its wave, it determines what kind of 
resources do go where. The access to food is not guaranteed because it is a long way to the 
throat. Revolutions are promises. Principles are often nothing more than empty bags, usually 
with money inside that has been removed. This is the gate of the sacrificer and the sacrificed. 
This is the butcher's gate. 

49.1 The Law of Necessity 

This is the foundation. This is the introspection. This is the root of all revolution. The nature of 
revolution is that it must be based on the Law of necessity. Revolution has no support unless it 
is perceived as necessary. 

Jupiter exalted. The understanding and application of this law to maximize expansion of support 
and thereby ensure viability. The awareness that the potential of a principle is based on it being 
accepted as viable. After all, this is tribal. The 49 is always looking for support and the first thing 
that it recognizes is: there is no revolution unless it has that support. The 49 will only get that 
support if what it is offering is viable. It has to be of value. It is not just a revolution for the sake 
of revolution. There must be a basic necessity at work. 

Sun in detriment. The misuse of influence, to insist that necessity can be created out of action. 
The 'Helter Skelter' syndrome. To commit acts of disorder as proof that disorder exists. This is 
the Helter Skelter syndrome which is based on Charles Manson, this madman from America. He 
decided to kill people and tried to make it look like it was black people who were doing the 
killing, in the hope that this would start a race war. If you don't have a race war and you think 
that there should be a race war, then you create it and make it look like there is one in order to 
get everybody on the band wagon. This is Helter Skelter. "Okay, it is not around. Let's do it and 
then they think that it is around and then we will get our revolution." This is practiced a lot by 
fascists or communists, by all kinds of people, in the early days of their whole process to try to 
attract people. 

The detriment in the Book of Letters: Oversensitivity to rejection that can turn a principle into a 
crusade. "You reject me. I will make sure that I will get the support and I'll show you how I get 

that support. You don't think that there is a race war going on. I will show you," and then they go 
out and kill some people to let everybody know. 

Revolution is based on the law of necessity. The purity of revolution is based on a true 
necessity. The perversion of revolution is when the necessity is created as an illusion in order to 
establish a framework for revolution to take place. These are the two sides of the foundation. 
Everything about the 49th gate is about whether principles are going to be accepted or rejected. 
That is the nature of its wave. 

49.2 The Last Resort 

When we come to the second line, we come to the line of projection. It is called The last resort. 
The nature of this: If you look above the lines in the Rave I'Ching it says: Ideally the 
transformation of forms is based on the highest principles and not simply for power. This is a 
power gate. It always has power because it is establishing the principles, which it does 
emotionally. That means that it can blind you. So many decent people were blinded by 
horrendous principles because of their emotional power. 

Here we have the Earth exalted. The determination to exhaust every possible peaceful avenue 
for change and then, when satisfied that no other course is possible, to plan in detail before 
revolution is attempted. These are the people that are always planning to reject you or planning 
to accept you, depending on where they are in the nature of their wave. 

The potential to explore every possibility before rejecting. In the moment of rejection, you have 
to understand that rejection leads to revolution and the establishment of a new principle. So, 
what happens to these people is that they are the ones who get more and more impatient. They 
keep waiting for something to come along that is going to match their principles. When they run 
out of patience, they start planning for their revolution, whatever that revolution will be. It can be 
a household revolution. It does not have to be one of these grand revolutions. But it is a 
revolution in terms of establishing a new principle. You have somebody in your life and you 
keep on saying to them, "Squeeze the toothpaste at the bottom," and that principle keeps being 
rejected by them and you keep on telling them, hoping that they will eventually do what you told 
them. If they don't, you explode and you project all of that out to them and say, "This is it. 
Finished. You are rejected." 

When we get to the other side of this, we get to Pluto in detriment. The overwhelming 
revolutionary urge that is impatient with accommodation and negotiation. The tendency here is 
the coup d'etat that has little general support. You walk in and say, "I have a new principle 
today." Everybody looks at you like you are crazy. You walk back home and say, "All right. New 
principle today: from now on, nobody is allowed to use the refrigerator after 9 o'clock p.m." If 
you don't have the support of others, you will have to back that up by putting a lock on the door 
with a timer. Otherwise you will have a problem. This is the nature of the lost resort which can 
always lead to this point where, based on the nature of the wave, either the high end where you 
feel that you can advance (second line wave) or the low end where you feel that you have to 
withdraw. But there is this point where, in the withdrawal, you are looking and seeing, "All right, I 
am waiting. They still don't follow my principle," and then the wave goes to the advance and 
then, booml In you go and establish your principle. This is the nature of the coup d'etat as well, 
except that it is much more forceful. 

There is a lot of suffering associated with this gate because this is a gate of very powerful 
rejection. If you are rejected within the tribe, you have nowhere to go. You have no shelter, no 

home, no place to live and nothing to eat. Your children will have no friends. They will not have 
an education. This gate decides whether you should even be allowed to live or not. It is 
revolution. Revolution is a bloody business because it is emotional. If you do not want an 
unnecessary revolution, make sure that everybody has enough to eat and make sure that 
everybody has a partner. That is what this is all about. It is about resources. If there is not 
enough to eat and if there Js not enough selection of partners, then you have problems. If you 
ever want to calm down a revolutionary, give them a good dinner. It immediately calms them 
down. It is very good for them, and lets them be revolutionaries in their own home. 

49.3 Popular Discontent 

When you get to the third line and you get to Popular discontent, and we have the theme of 
irresponsibility. Here we have the wave of allegiance/rejection, bonds made and broken. So you 
know what kind of revolutions these will be. They are on/off revolutions. You are part of the hip- 
hop revolution and then immediately you jump over to the bebop revolution, and then you go 
back to the hip-hop. 

Neptune exalted. The ability to destroy antiquated forms once the restrictions have been 
removed. The moment that these people are emotionally uncomfortable with the lack of a 
resource, they are ready to get on the revolutionary band wagon. They will just jump right in 
there. Remember, there is a lot of fertility in that. They can bring a lot of people along with them. 
"Why isn't there a zucchini in the shopping market anymore?" 

Pluto in detriment. With general support, a savageness in eliminating the old order that may 
permanently scar the new. 

This is rooted in the 6.3, the breaking of allegiances, and in the 59.3 which is promiscuity. It can 
be very painful for people. After all, this is tribal and requires support. You bring somebody into 
a revolution and then you totally turn your back to it and to them, after you have brought them 
in. You are the one that can be very changeable in the nature of the principle. 

In the Book of Letters, you have: The potential in sensitivity to reject failed principles or 
relationships. This 49.3 will always react that way. "This does not work. I do not want to have 
anything to do with this revolution. I do not want to have anything to do with the Marxist 
revolution because I want to have my Mercedes." 

On the other side: An insensitivity in rejection and rejecting. This is what leaves the scars. By 
the way, it can be brutal. If you get left out in a revolution, you are the one who has no access to 
the resources. So it can definitely leave scars in others. In order for revolution to be of value it 
has to be viable and it can't be simply for the power. 

49.4 Platform 

When you get to this externalization, here it is no longer a process in which the revolutionary 
potential will have its difficulties in getting out. The first three lines are always about that. It is a 
process for them to develop a recognition of the intrinsic value of their value. By the time you 
get to the fourth line, this outwards movement is already established. The fourth line as 
externalization is fixed and one-tracked. This is a one-track agenda. We have already seen this 
when we looked at the 11.4, the way in which The Teacher works, and the 17.4, the way in 
which The Personnel manager works. When you looking here at Platform, what you are looking 
at is a narrow agenda, whatever it happens to be. 

Jupiter exalted. A political and social agenda, embodied in guarantees to human rights that 
ensures a just and valued replacement of the old order. What happens to these people is that 
their concerns are legitimate, but their focus is limited. That can be of enormous value. For 
example, people whose only concern is the welfare of animals. That is their platform. They see 
somebody with a fur coat and go bananas. If they think about cattle being locked up in these 
horrible boxes and being stuffed with food and hormones, they go crazy. They have a single 
agenda which can be wonderful, or a pain in the neck. These are people that are always 
banging at you with their single platform. 

A potential sensitivity to the needs of society. Please remember: that need is not a general need 
of society. It is a very specific need. These people, when they are at home, (We are not talking 
about the world; we are talking about the tribe and the household.) they have their special 
agenda. It is very fixed, what resource they think is necessary. "I don't care if you want to have 
beds. I need a car." They are fixed on their specific agenda and it does not matter to them. They 
know that the car is of value because it will allow them to make money. They will have their own 
way of seeing why that principle is necessary. They are not very clear about what else is going 
on around them and what the other needs are. They are easily rejected. Some of them are 
considered to be nuts. 

Mars in detriment. Promises, promises, promises and only to guarantee support with little 
possibility of implementation. If you would only follow this principle that if everybody held their 
nose in the morning and drank their yarn, everybody would feel better. There are people who 
think that is great, but the reality is that to promise that to others does not necessarily mean that 
that revolution is going to be implemented. Let's hope not. 

49.5 Organization 

We come to the universalization of the revolutionary process, of this principle process. 
Organization. Moon exalted. Practical provisions for the needs of others in revolutionary times (if 
the times are not revolutionary, forget it) which ensures support and continued understanding. 

In the Book of Letters: A potential sensitivity to the practical needs of others. That is operating in 
a wave. So when you are at the low end of the wave, that potential sensitivity for the practical 
needs: you recognize it but you have no need to get involved in that because everything about 
the wave is about selflessness and selfishness. The moment that the wave is in the selfish part, 
you realize the needs and problems of society. This is my line. I know it so well. You see that 
society needs some practical provisions but, tough, I don't feel like it. I have to look after myself. 
I am selfish in that wave. For me, it was even more confusing because my wave is conditioned 
by other people due to my undefined emotional system, and it is my only theme. On the other 
side is selflessness: I have my own problems, but let me give you those principles in order that 
you can have practical provisions in revolutionary times. Understand how that operates in its 
wave. One side of that line is always operating in that wave. 

Mars in detriment. A concentration on the organization of power to clearly define authority, often 
at the expense of higher principles. This is rooted in the selflessness/selfishness wave. The 
moment that you are in charge of which resources will be distributed, if you are selfish, you will 
take advantage of that power. This can be heavy on people. After all, this is about seduction 
and sacrifice. 

In the white book: A rejection of higher principles in seeking to organize others. When that is 
selfless, that is okay. There are times when higher principles will have to be sacrificed in order 
for revolution to take place. History is full of deals that are made with the devil in order to get to 
the end that will be justified. Often higher principles are sacrificed but they could never be 
sacrificed in the selfish end of that wave because then you have power trippers. Then you have 
people that will bring about the sacrifice. This whole gate is about the images of Christ/Anti- 
Christ, the Sacrificer, the Sacrificed, the Seducer and the Seduced. It is all rooted in here and 
this is a key for the nature of revolution. 

Revolution is operating in a wave where it is selfish and selfless. It is very easy to see Marxism 
as being selfless and Communism as being selfish. The moment that you see it in practice, you 
can see how the wave operates, given the nature of what human beings are. As long as the 
emotional system is unaware, no revolution is trustworthy due to this lack of awareness. Every 
single step that we take is a step we have to logically analyze, whether it really is healthy for the 
well-being of the other. Nothing of the emotional system is fundamentally healthy. We have to 
be deeply concerned about the nature of any kind revolution, any kind of emotional principle that 
is established for us, because it is not rooted in awareness. 

Collective logic is the only thing that can guarantee human rights, not emotional principles. They 
usually cry out because people don't have enough to eat. Out of that not having enough to eat, 
not having enough territory and not having the protection of their language and their culture, out 
of that comes an enormous abuse of other human beings. What is so important about the 
emotional system, what is so important about the nature of revolution, is that you take away all 
of its power when people have enough to eat. My joke about Mc Donald's is not such a joke. 
Countries who can afford to have that kind of lifestyle on a homogenous planet don't have any 
interest in warfare. There is food being made available. The general wealth is increasing in 
terms of the average human being having enough calories in their bodies every day. 

You have 10 million children born a week hungry. Those children are going to be 
revolutionaries. If you do not feed them, they are going to kill you. Please understand that. That 
is the law of revolution. All of the heat and violence of this is eliminated when there is tribal 
integrity, which means that your language, your home, your food and your family is secure, but 
most of all, that there is enough to eat. That is the most practical of all provisions. Food. 

49.6 Attraction 

When you get to the line of transition, remember, the nature of the 6.6 was not interested in the 
intimacy but in the world the children will live in, if it was going to have children at all. The 49th 
hexagram is part of our tribal process and it establishes our sexuality and the arrangements that 
will take place in the marriage itself. It establishes what the community is like and what the 
resources of the community are going to be. It establishes the principles for that. The 49.6, if 
engaged, is quite remarkable. It is called Attraction and it can be a very attractive force. But, like 
the mystery of the One Night Stand, it may not get involved in any principle at all because it is 
deeply concerned about what the revolution will bring. Not what the intimacy will bring, not what 
the world is going to be, not what the revolution is but what the revolution will bring. These are 
some of the few forces that you find in the 49 that will laugh at revolutions and say, "They are all 
the same. They start off good and they end up bloody." 

The power of revolution in action to expand its support. Neptune exalted. An innate 
impressionability that transforms the fence sitter into the committed. The sensitivity and potential 
to embrace and transform others. When they are sympathetic to a revolutionary course because 

they can see that the revolution will bring the principle that they want, they have enormous 
power of pulling people over to that revolution and bringing them in. 

Saturn in detriment. Stubborn, and often fatal, rejectionism. These people will say, "No, I am 
interested in change but your revolution is not going to bring what I think is necessary." They 
often are killed for that. Oversensitivity that leads to rejection of principles and others as a rule. 
'As a rule' means that these are not really revolutionaries. They are not involved in the 
revolution. They look at what are the principles that can be established after the revolution. This 
is their great concern. The moment that they have that sense, they can be very powerful. 

But, remember the wave. This is very different from sixth lines that are not directly emotional. 
Here you always have to deal with that. When you look at any of your lines in relationship to 
this, please understand what principle is important for you. You have to see how you respond to 
any given principle in time through your wave. If there is a principle that you can tolerate at the 
low end and enjoy at the high end, it is good for you. If you can only abide a principle at the high 
end and detest it at the low end, it cannot be correct for you. In other words, the wave has to 
teach you, by going through your spectrum, what principle is really correct for you, which means 
that revolution is not something that you can spontaneously jump to. That is the spleen. You 
have to wait and go through the process. By the way, what is really interesting here is that, if 
you notice that in the sixth line here, the exalted is Neptune and in its resonance in the third line, 
the exalted is Neptune. Neptune is veiled. The real truth in the sixth line, which in the emotional 
system is about what is going to awaken first to emotional awareness, is that the spirituality that 
lies in the sixth line is to recognize what revolution to be sympathetic with. But now these are 
deeply veiled processes in which we do not clearly see what is going on. The Neptunes in 
resonance with each other in the three and six. 

HEXAGRAM 50 THE CAULDRON 

The root of awareness. The 50th gate is, in that sense, where all awareness is nurtured because it is, like 
the sixth gate, a gate of fusion. It fuses all the processes that are going through the splenic center: the 
stream of taste, the collective logical process, the stream of intuition, the individual process and the 
stream of instinct, the tribal process. Each of those three streams is rooted in the 50th gate which produces 
an awareness frequency. The sixth gate produces an emotional wave. There are six of them. 

These six awareness frequencies are at the beginning of our awareness process and literally the root of it. 
The 50th gate, The Cauldron (a nice image, this big melting pot of all these different possibilities), is the 
gate of values which establishes the law within the tribe, which, in essence, is the law and the values of 
our cultures and our civilization. This is our oldest and most ancient awareness. Here, in the 50th gate are 
the frequencies that lead to what we call awareness. 

The gate of values. The potential here is to be responsible, or not. Every single gate out of the splenic 
system is a gate of primal fear. The primary fear of the 50th gate and the fear that is at the heart of all 
awareness is the fear of responsibility. The potential here is to be responsible or not, and the awareness 
potential is values. This is the tribal law giver. The laws of the tribe are rooted in this existential 
awareness. This is the channel of the law. It establishes the law in the tribe, in the community and in the 
culture. One of the things to recognize very clearly in the way in which we come together in our 
civilization is that this is all being dictated by the frequencies that originate in this 50th gate: the world we 
live in, the lives that we share with each other and the way that we share those lives. 

50.1 The Immigrant 

The Immigrant. Humbleness of origin that benefits rather than restricts destiny. Mars exalted. The desire 
to be effective and successful that builds on the most fundamental strengths while it refines its nature. The 
whole thing about this is recognizing that the fundamental strength is the foundation itself. First, you have 
to have the foundation and only from the foundation can refinement come. So, if you are an immigrant 
and you are coming to a new land, to a new consciousness, the first thing is that you have to be able to 
plant yourself somewhere and begin this process of establishing a foundation, and then the refinement can 
begin. If you come out of great poverty, something we witnessed in America, and arrive in North 
America, you will not be able to drive around in a Cadillac until you spend a long time establishing your 
foundation and slowly refining the nature, so that you can fit into the culture around. 

Venus in detriment. A dissatisfaction with or embarrassment with origins that makes an obsession of 
refinement. This can be difficult. That is, you are uncomfortable with the foundation that you have and 
you become obsessed with correcting, fixing or refining that. 

Mars exalted. The awareness that the growth and refinement of values will benefit destiny. This is the 
encouragement that all first line people need. I have 10 first lines in my chart. I was stupid for 38 years. It 
takes a long time when you have a lot of first lines to be able to develop the potential so that the 
refinement can come out, but it says something else to you. It benefits destiny. The moment that you 
recognize where your first lines are, you can also see that those are aspects in your nature that are not 
easily transferable outwards until you've really built your foundation. Those are areas in you that you 
need to focus on. These are areas that require patience and time before the refinement can come. 

A dissatisfaction with original values that demands refinement. Same process as in the Rove I'Ching. 
Think about this in terms of the law because all law began this way. This is the beginning of what we call 
our moral codes. This is the line of Moses, of Hammurabi. This is the line of establishing the original 
code. This is the first law. It may be very primitive and needs to be refined. 

In the 60's in Montreal, they decided that it was time because the city was French and it operated under 
the Napoleonic Code, and there were things they wanted to remove from the Code, such as the law about 
tying up your horse on the main street. These kinds of things. You have these old laws and, once you've 
established the foundation of civility in the society, you can begin to refine the law. This is the beginning 
of the legal process. You have a moral code which is your foundation and then you begin to refine that 
code to ultimately establish the law for civilization. 

When you have a judge sitting in a court and he has the first line, he is likely to be the kind of person who 
will go into their introspection and say, "Yes, in this particular case, perhaps the law could be refined to 
allow you this particular difference of yours." This is the nature of the line. It doesn't just say, "This is it." 
It looks into it and whatever it sees that is weak, it tries to strengthen. 

The reverse is also true. There are many people who see what is strong and try to weaken it. I am 
breaking the law since I was 13 years old. I have been smoking cannabis since I was 13. So wherever I 
go, I am breaking the law. There are many people who would like to take that strong law and make it 
weak. There is always the other side through introspection. You look at that and say, "This needs to be 
refined. Let's take the strong and make it weak." It does not just go one way. This is a frequency and, 
depending on circumstances, it is either the weakness that needs to be refined or the strength that needs to 
be refined. 

50.2 Determination 

The second line: Determination. The Sun exalted. The strength of purpose that can enjoy overcoming 
adversity to achieve its goals. The strength derived from maintaining one's values in the face of 
opposition or conditioning. This is already telling you that if you have this line, you will meet opposition. 
It tells you that, no matter what your values are, there will always be adversity. This is the projecting out 
of a value that immediately creates confrontation with others. It will always provoke that. It will always 
bring that out. 

The Venusian side: A discomfort with adversity that may lead to determined withdrawal. A lack of 
strength, where values are threatened by opposition or conditioning. The emotional wave of that is the 
wave of advance and withdrawal. On the emotional side, this is all about shyness and boldness. This is 
about projecting this field out which always brings some kind of reaction. These are values that do not 
have a real foundation. There are simply values that are being projected outwards. 

We have a classic example of that in Serbia. You have a vote that takes place and then you have the 
government that says, very determined, "No. This has to be cancelled. We remain with our values, and 
not with yours." You immediately get opposition. 

Two things happen: either you are bold and you try, as the Prima Donna, to put your wave on somebody, 
or the moment you put it out there and there is all this adversity, you withdraw. These people can be very 
bitter. All second lines can ring with bitterness. It is not their fault. This is what they are here for: to 
project out and the moment they project it out, somebody smacks them for it. It immediately brings that 
adversity out. 

The nature about the determination in the second line is both to project your value out and to be able to 
handle the adversity and, at the same time, to project it out and then withdraw from the adversity. These 
are all unstable laws and values. What is remarkable about these people is their determination. They get 
the first chance to look out of the window and they are very determined to get to the other side. 

50.3 Adaptability 

A judge that makes these laws: they will always be broken. They will demand being broken. There will 
always be something in that that somebody will have to break. Adaptability. The awareness that to 
maintain one's principles and values, the support of others is necessary. Now, this is what we would call 
making laws in constitutional assemblies, where everybody gathers around and there are all kinds of 
people that have their own personal interest in what kind of laws they want to see incorporated into the 
total law. You will always have the situation where you try to find a way to say, "Okay, you will go along 
with this law. You will not break it." These are laws that are trying to adapt to circumstances and they are 
laws that either fade off of the books or laws that get easily broken because they are usually an adaptation 
for one interest rather than another. 

On the other side you have: Discomfort with the awareness that one cannot stand alone by one's 
principles. This is where the gate wakes up and says, "Oh, I have to deal with the creatures at the other 
side. This means that I can't be me. I have to do something with them. I have to adapt and work this out 
with them so that we can live together within the law." 

Wherever you see the third line in your design, you are looking at the part of you that is actually aware of 
the fact that you are not alone. That is very nice to know and it is very important this recognition in us, 
"Oh, I am going to have to adapt to others." Some of us, in our third lines, are going to be very 
uncomfortable with that. Why do I have to adapt to others? The other side is this sense of, "If I have to 
adapt to others, I have to learn how to deal with them." Lower trigrams are very poor at being able to 
work well with others. It does not mean they can't nor does it mean that they cannot be of enormous 
value. In terms of being clear with each other in any kind of relationship, first, second and third lines are 
having trouble because they are working on what they are, and not on what the other one is. Only when 
you get to the third line, you begin this process. 

In the black book: the Moon exalted. When unable to make it alone will naturally align itself with 
nurturing and protective forces. This was Grace Kelly's line. A resentment when its natural mental gifts 
are ignored and is forced to curry favor in order to survive. In other words, "This law, your highness, is 
terrible." "Shut up, it is the law." Even if you know that it is bad for the people, even though you know 
that it is not the right thing to do, you end up having to say, "Yes, Sir" because you have to adapt. This is 
all about having to recognize, "Oh, my goodness, I have to deal with them. Otherwise, it will not work." 
That can be very beautiful, or very uncomfortable. And again, to see that in terms of all third lines. Keep 
that in mind. It is an archetype for all of them. 

50.4 Corruption 

This can be a deeply corruptive force. Remember that this is the gate of values. You have your one little 
aspect and you will go right down that line with it and you externalize it, come hell or high water. That 
can be corruptive to others, or you can be corrupted in your fixed narrow path that you are going down. 

The nature of these lines is awareness. The third line has an intuition for knowing when to adapt, and to 
whom. It is an intuition, a gift. The gift of the fourth line is the intuition to smell corruption, to know who 
is corrupt and who is corruptible. Before you can get to that point you have to be corrupted yourself and 
you have to see your own corruptibility. That is part of the process. In and of itself, this is no more 
positive or negative than any other terminology. It is simply a process. 

Keep in mind that instinct is about the nose, and intuition is about the ears. When you are dealing with 
anything having to do with the nature of the intuition, to recognize when one needs to adapt or not, or the 
intuition for corruption or not, it is what you hear. 

When you look here at the fourth line, in the Rave I'Ching it says: Corruption. A lack of enriching values. 
The first thing to see in that is the nature of resonance. First and fourth lines have a resonance to each 
other. We saw that the first line was The Immigrant who has no values, in that sense. He comes to the 
new land, has to find its foundation, develop it and refine its values. When you get to the resonance in the 
fourth line, there are no values. It is the same process. It is just at another level. 

The malefic gift of turning inferior values into material success. Given this position, Saturn's exaltation is 
that its actions are limited to selfishness and unsavoriness rather than criminality. This is about being 
focused down this one-track. Because of that, you will do anything to externalize it. There is no 
adaptation here. There is the need to externalize. You want to build your plant in Indonesia and you 
would like to do it all legally, but you can't. You have to externalize that dream of yours. Otherwise you 
never make the millions you want to make. So you go ahead and deal with inferior elements. You say, 
"How much do I have to bribe you to get that license? What will it cost me? As long as I have my one- 
track, I am willing to be corrupt here and there, as long as I can keep on externalizing." That is why, at the 
material level, that works really well: the greasing of palms. This is a judge you can buy off. It can also be 
a judge who says, "You can't buy me. I used to be available but now I am not available." 

Mars in detriment. With such energy and no traditional values, the worst can be expected. The worst to 
expect here is when you are corrupt, you get caught. In getting found out, you get the opprobrium of the 
tribe. The tribe looks at you and says, "This is a bad one. This is a Mafiosi, a gangster." 

The capacity to maintain one's strength despite inferior values. The strength is: I am going to externalize 
this value, whatever it is. The weakness lies in the fact that, because you are so caught up in having to 
externalize that, you pay. You will be corrupted simply to be able to get your way through them. 

On the other side: The potential disregard of values that may lead to corruption or the breakdown of 
defense. You are so one-tracked, "I am going to be a super vegetarian. Nothing is going to stop me. This 
is my intuition," and you may end up with a vitamin B deficiency that kills you; and "It really seems like 
this is my direction. This is what I will do. This is my one-track-mind. Nothing will take me away from 
this single track," and then you can be deeply corrupted. Not necessarily in your track, but all around you. 

Recently, an Italian company in the whole 'dirty-hands-business' in Italy, had all of these scandals. They 
were paying bribes and they could not list the bribes in their books. So the books were distorted and, due 
to that, the assets and the values of the company were distorted, and how much money they were actually 
making was distorted. When this all finally came out, they were sued by the stock market and 
shareholders because all of that was false. 

You see that you can end up with this chain reaction. You do your little corruption on the side here 
because it works and the whole thing keeps on snowballing until it blows up in your face. The fourth line 
is brotherhood/sisterhood and the wave of kindness/meanness. All fourth lines are inherently corrupt. All 
of them are trying to get out their fixed line and, in trying to do that, they are willing to make 
compromises and are willing to do things that are not necessarily of value to them. 

50.5 Consistency 

The fifth line is called Consistency. When continuity has brought success, it should not be hampered with. 
Saturn exalted. The disciplined and natural conservatism to avoid unnecessary change. Mars in detriment. 
A perverse reaction to rebel against the methodology of one's very success. Neither one of those is about 
good or bad. This is the completion of a hexagram process and therefore, you come to the point in the 
fifth line where you recognize that what has worked shall remain. So, you have a law that says, "Thou 

shalt not kill," and it is consistent and you want to keep that consistency but, at the same time, because 
you are at the completion of a process, you can see that what brought success in the past will not 
necessarily bring the same success in the future. You can rebel against the very thing that brought 
success. These are the only judges that can really change our codes. They are the only ones that can 
legitimately change the values in the tribe. They speak from a perspective in which they have gone 
through the process. 

When I say that: if you have a fifth line, genetically you are already equipped at that level. It is already 
there, as an essence. That process is already complete. Wherever you carry the fifth line, you have the 
completion in your hexagram process and in that, you are either going to have the discipline to maintain 
that, whatever direction it is bringing you, or you recognize that although it brought success in the past, it 
has to be changed. 

The conservative awareness that basic principles should not be abandoned casually. You notice that it 
does not say that you can't abandon them. It says that it shouldn't be abandoned casually. The nature of 
the fifth line is, "All right. This is what I am. I am not easily going to allow that to change."
