But then you come to the other side: When effectively stimulated, the drive to rebel against basic 
principles. When there is enough evidence, when there is enough to stimulate that recognition, then those 
principles can be changed. 

Everything that I say to you about the nature of these lines, I am saying to you in the awareness that we 
work in mechanics together. At the mundane level, this can be very perverse. Somebody who is not aware 
of it, somebody who has a job and they are doing it very well and it is successful for them, and they have 
the fifth line: they may just as likely quit. Simply because, yes, it brought success, but what is next? What 
else is there? Let me do something else. This is the mundane level of it. 

The aware level of it is to recognize that one cannot abandon that casually. Yes, if there is enough 
stimulation, it may make sense in that way. Speaking of stimulation, it is a very abstract term. It may 
make sense in that way to be able to say, "All right, it is time to change this principle." The key here is 
consistency. After all, the fifth line is always going to speak for what is the essence of a hexagram, and 
that consistency is necessary for us. 

50.6 Leadership 

Every sixth line has the capacity to lead or not. If you look at all of them very carefully, you see that they 
are of enormous importance to us in our process. Here we have Leadership. Venus exalted. The gift in a 
position of power to maintain harmony even in severity. The Moon in detriment. An inherent moodiness 
that in a position of power may at times alienate or offend and affect overall efficiency. 

In the white book: The strength to maintain one's values with vigor and continue to have harmonic 
relationships with others. If you hold on to that value of transition, you are looking for the transition. You 
are able to deal with people but it does not mean that anything is going to happen. It does not mean that 
you lead them, or not. It does not mean that you will play the role of the leader. You will only do so if it is 
more than just leading people across the river. "If I just have to lead you across the river, why don't you 
get a boy scout? If you want to take me to the land of the universe, terrific: I will lead." 

The other side is: The strength to maintain one's values but at the expense of harmonic relationships. 
"Yes, I know that you would like to have me. Tough, I am looking for what is beyond." That is the sixth 
line and it can offend people in that way. Not only that, so often people want sixth lines to lead them, and 
they refuse to be leaders. After all, this has to do with an emotional resonance of sympathy and apathy. I 

am deeply apathetic about being a leader. I have a lot of sixth line and third line resonances. The sixth line 
is not about automatically saying, "This sixth line leads." 

The sixth line itself is not in the business of propagandizing the hexagram. That is the fifth line. The sixth 
line is saying, "Yes, okay, I don't want to lead you because I don't want to go there." What happens to 
them is that they have difficulties in their relationships. At one level, they can be harmonic because 
people will recognize and are interested in and attracted to the sixth line because it takes them some place 
else, but on the other hand, due to that apathy that is built into them, they have a taste for when to lead 
and whom to lead, or not. 

One person can come up to me and ask me to lead him, and I refuse. Another person can come up with 
exactly the same request and I say, "Yes." That is the nature of the sixth line. It is not universal. It is 
deeply selective at that level and it comes from a position of power. This intrinsic power that lies here and 
all sixth lines that say, "Yes, I have accomplished all these five steps. I have all that in my background. I 
am at the end of this process. I am looking for something else. Don't bog me down. Don't hold me here. I 
am going to the next line." The next line is the 28.1, Preparation, the desire to be effective. That is what 
the leadership is looking for. 

HEXAGRAM 51 THE AROUSING 

The 51 is the greater willpower, if you will. The Arousing: thunder over thunder. It says above the lines: 
The ability to respond to disorder and shock through recognition and adaptation. 'The ability to respond': 
remember the way in which the ego motor works. The ego motor works on willpower. That is, unless 
there is a will, there is no way. If that ego needs to have a rest, nothing gets done. Only if that ego is ready 
can that willpower be expressed and then there is an ability of that willpower to respond to disorder and 
shock. In doing so, it responds through recognizing what it is and adapting to it. Here we have the gate of 
competitiveness, the gate of the warrior, of courage or foolishness. 

51.1 Reference 

The way to understand any hexagram is to really carefully think about what is stated in the first line 
because first line will always give you that fundamental knowledge of a hexagram. Here, it is called 
Reference. This first line is an overview line, so it means that the ability to adapt to shock at its 
foundation requires experience. It is not like you are equipped from birth to be able to adapt to and 
recognize the shock wave. You need the experience first. In other words, you have to be tested in the fire 
of the 51 before you understand or can work out how to deal with that fire. 

The advantage of previous crisis experience. This is the overview of this line, so you know that 
willpower, the deepest will, the courageous will, is something that is tempered in the fire of experience. It 
is not something that is just there, and because of that, it is something that can be shattered in that 
experience and never get to the full stage. 

One side is Pluto exalted. Because of the movement of Pluto and Neptune, there are certain aspects in 
design that are not active genetically in our time. I'll give you a list, which is very important when it 
comes to readings. (See Appendix: Neptune and Pluto - Outer Planet Transits for full list). Understand 
what I mean: the channel of initiation, 25/51, is in Aries. Pluto has not been in Aries since the beginning 
of the 19th century, a very long time ago. That means that nobody that is alive today carries this energy 
within them and it means that this genetic material does not exist in the world. The exalted does not exist 
because it is from Pluto which will not get to Aries for many, many years. Only when it gets there will 
that genetic material exist in the world. So, when it comes to Neptune and Pluto, their cycles are much 
greater than our individual lifetimes and thus we are dealing with planets that, in the genetic cycle of 
things, imprint us and then go away. 

In the 5 there is no way to read the exaltation now. It does not exist in the world and will not come into 
the world until that activation of the 25 (which will be activated first) and out of the 25 will come the 
possibility of the Pluto exalted coming into effect. What that means is that when we are dealing with the 
foundation of Initiation, with the foundation of Arousing in our time, what we have is the Venus in 
detriment: A tendency to emotional withdrawal after a shock, instead of this capacity to really 
successfully deal with shock. It means that this is going to require time in withdrawal. In other words, the 
5 1 learns to develop its courage through experience but any time that the 5 1 goes through an experience at 
the first line level, it means, literally, that it has to pull away and it has to withdraw before it can be healed 
again. This is about the rest necessary for the ego and it is an extended rest in order to deal with the 
experience. 

In the white book: The weakness of the ego in times of challenge. This is the foundation of this hexagram 
in our time. When you see people with the 5 1 . 1 , it is so important for them that they need long periods of 
time in order to heal from shock. I have my Personality Moon in 51.1. After my experience with the 
voice, which was an extraordinary shock to my being, I spend years recuperating from that. Years of 

dealing with that shock, having to withdraw. I have the advantage that I also have the 51.5. 1 have my Sun 
there, so it was not to the point that I withdrew so much that I no longer was part of the world. 

When I was in America this year, a man came to see me in Sedona and he brought with him a diary of a 
friend of his. He said this friend could not come. He came to tell me that this man had an experience in 
January of 1987 in which he experienced a voice. The only thing that he remembered about it was that the 
voice was going to give him information from the Book of Letters. This man showed me the man's diary 
from thatJanuary of 1987, in which he had written about the Voice from the Book of Letters. He could not 
come because he has been institutionalized ever since. He cannot feed by himself; he cannot clean 
himself. This was somebody who got fried in this experience. So, one of the things to recognize about the 
51.1: the foundation of dealing with shock is very weak in our time, and great shocks require deep 
withdrawal in order to heal from them. 

51.2 Withdrawal 

When we come to the second line, anybody who is looking into somebody that has a 51.2, they see that 
they have the will and that they do not use it because they are in withdrawal. 51.2's are often accused of 
cowardice because people who look inside see the will but do not see anything being done with it. Again, 
rest is natural for the ego. 

Withdrawal. Mars exalted. The recognition of the mechanics of shock that indicates when withdrawal is 
the only logical action. These are unlikely heroes. You can pull them out and they may turn out to be 
deeply courageous but again, it is the lower trigram. They are not ready for that kind of interaction. 

Mercury in detriment. Being too smart for one's own good and rejecting withdrawal in the vain belief that 
one can outsmart natural forces. This gate has the gift of understanding the odds, like in gambling, about 
what it takes to survive a shock and be competitive. These are people that naturally pull back from that. It 
has to be pulled out by others. That can be successful or not. They can be encouraged to be brave and it 
turns out to be folly, and they end up being fools rather than being courageous. 

In the white book: Instinctive withdrawal when the power of the ego is threatened. In other words, this 
inner knowing to realize that it will not make any difference how much willpower I have; I will not be 
able to jump across that chasm. If I try, I will die, so I'd better withdraw and find another way. 

The other side is: The egoism to reject withdrawal and face possible defeat. "Everybody says that I should 
be able to jump across that chasm, so I will," and of course, they don't make it. 

51.3 Adaptation 

The third line of the 51 is a line that gives its name to the structure of the hexagram. It is called the line of 
Adaptation. As a line of adaptation, please understand again my reference to what is written above the 
lines. This is about responding to disorder. Courage is something that has to be called. Everything about 
the ego is about the ego being called. If the ego is not called out, it does not play. If the ego is not 
massaged, it will not go out and do its thing. In this third line, we get to the ability to learn from one's 
mistakes. 

The Sun exalted. The life-sustaining awareness that thinks on its feet and thus creates opportunities. This 
is a competitiveness that rises to the occasion. In other words, it adapts to the situation. The first three 
lines do not know where the shock is coming from. The fourth, fifth and sixth lines are different. They are 
transpersonal. Here, it is always a surprise. So the third line has a real gift. It knows how to dance its way 
out of a difficulty. 

Jupiter in detriment. The destabilization that occurs when one's field of normal activity is radically and 
unpredictably disturbed, where the tendency is withdrawal rather than adaptation. These people are as 
likely to be courageous as they are to be cowardly. The ones that can run forward are the ones that can 
also run away the quickest. It is the nature of the ego because it is looking for its rest and it wants to stay 
alive. 

The 51 st gate is the gate of the gall bladder, of bile. It means that it is a gate that is rooted in its ability 
not only to deal with challenge but to be deeply competitive. 'Chutzpa' is if you kill your parents and, 
while you are on trial, you ask the judge for mercy because you are an orphan. 

We have a movement that goes from the 40 to the 5 1 . The 40/37 is a bridge, often a spiritual one, and the 
40 naturally looks towards adaptation. This gift is something that works really well in the moment on the 
exalted side, but the moment that everything is in total disorder and chaotic, it does not work anymore. 
Then the natural tendency of the ego takes over that says, "I don't have it. I will pull back and withdraw." 

Adaptation. The power of spontaneity in times of challenge. 'In times of challenge': it has to come to it. 

On the other side: The ego that may be destabilized in times of challenge. Most of us only have to deal 
with the mundane quality of shock in our lives and, because we only have to deal with that mundane 
quality, the 51.3 can usually handle it. It is an ego power after all, but when things totally and radically 
change, the 51.3 falls apart. It does okay when it is in a traffic jam but in an earthquake, it falls apart and 
goes only for its withdrawal. Don't get on an earthquake with a 51.3. 

51.4 Limitation 

When you get to the upper trigram, you get to the ability to have transpersonal skills. The 51.4 not only 
recognizes what is going on, but it recognizes very clearly its way to be competitive in the world because 
it knows what it has to meet. But it is fixed, like all fourth lines. Because it is fixed, there is always a 
limitation. 

Here the line is called Limitation. Uranus exalted. A pure inventiveness and sometimes genius to find 
some opportunity even in the midst of the most devastating shocks. These people understand that the 
world is a place that is competitive (survival of the fittest). They know that. All 51's know that you have 
to fight and be competitive to be a success in this life, to be centered, to be awake. There is this deep 
competitiveness that drives this willpower. There is a genius here, which is that as long as everything is 
not too bizarre, this ego can find a way to be one -directional and to be able to compete in the world. 

Mercury in detriment. A reasoned make-do mentality that is ineffectual in times of severe shock. In other 
words, being one -tracked and expecting the environment for competition to be a certain way. Like the 
English soldiers who came to America to conquer it: they were there in their bright red and white 
uniforms with banners and bugles, marching along in the forest, and they had a different kind of 
competitor that did not play by the rules. Those soldiers that were marching in line, like all fourth lines 
exalted, if they met other soldiers marching in a line they would be able to handle that shock and they 
would be able to be competitive in that situation and might come out with their medals and their rewards. 
But the Americans did not play fair. They hid behind the trees where it was hard to see them and they shot 
them in the back of the head while they were marching along and, all of a sudden, those men marching 
across in that line, all of that make -do business falls apart. 

The warrior ego that will find some way to answer the challenge; but, on the other side: The superficial 
ego that lacks the resources and depth to answer challenges. And in this case, not simply a challenge, but 
a challenge that is really outside of its experience. 

So much about courage has to do with experience. It is not about being a fool. The courageous one always 
makes a calculation. They are not stupid. The ego wants to live, so it makes that calculation. The moment 
that the pattern is unreliable, that is the moment that that ability to be competitive and succeed will fall 
apart. This line only has one strategy of shock. Either it fits or it misses. They are stuck with their way. 
All fourth lines can learn but it is painful because they have to rebuild their strategy. 

51.5 Symmetry 

I have my Personality Moon in the first line and my Personality Sun in the fifth line. In my experience 
with the voice (these are all speculations and thus they are meaningless, but just to illustrate that...) if I 
was someone that only had the 5 I would not be here today sharing Human Design with you and teaching 
you because I would never have recovered from the shock. The gift or the good fortune in my design is 
that I have the Sun in the fifth line, so I have the exaltation in this business of shock. It is this exaltation 
that kept me alive and allowed me to be here today and to share the knowledge that was given to me. 

The fifth line is a projection from the outside. It is a way people want to see willpower and courage. A 
favorite story of mine: when I was in high school and I was on a track team, I tried running for a while. I 
was doing the mile. I was not particularly good or bad and after some time, I got bored and decided to 
quit, and I went to the coach to tell him my intentions. He said to me: please wait until after the 
tournament this coming weekend because "When you are in the race, everybody runs faster." 

This is the whole thing about the ego. I have this whole channel, so people can be more competitive than I 
am, simply by taking in that energy. As a fifth line, it is always projected on me that I either have the 
courage or I don't. Anybody with a fifth line has an advantage in that they can live up to other people's 
projections and expectations and therefore benefit from it, or fail to live up to those expectations and be 
crushed by their condemnation. This is the path of all fifth lines. 

Symmetry. The Sun exalted. Perfected illumination that in grasping the nature of the shock can transform 
its normal patterns into a symmetrical adaptation that rides the shock and avoids its devastation. This is 
the capacity to deal with any kind of shock: simply to be able to move with it to find a way to flow with 
the nature of that shock. 

Mars in detriment. A tendency in seeking the core, to harmonize with one shock only to be overwhelmed 
by the next. This is about egoism. Courage falls apart when the ego comes in. This is about willpower. 
Ego belongs correctly to the 26 and the 21, but it does not belong to the 51. 

The warrior does not stand there and gloat over their victory. They do not. But the detriment here: The 
egoism to indulge in victory and lose vigilance. This is the person that, while they are yelling, "I did it," 
somebody cuts their head off because they were so busy feeling good about what they just managed to do. 

In the exalted: The perfection of the warrior ego through instinctive adaptation. The whole business of 
courage is: if you are one -tracked, you can fall. The moment that you are willing to flow in that, you have 
your opportunity for survival. I am expected to initiate people. That is why I am Ra Uru Hu. People say, 
"He initiates me," and it turned out that he could. So it just grows. This is all projection. I have a 5/1 
profile. People were projecting on me all my life, and still do. 

The difficulty that lies in the ego is when the different strains of the ego are confused with each other, 
when the 40 becomes the little egoist, because it is not supposed to be. It is just about will. Those 
competitors in the world that we most admire are not the brightest, are not the ones who laugh at the 
opponents that they defeat. We are most impressed with humble warriors, with competitors that we can 
admire for their skills but who don't go blowing their whistle all the time and telling you how wonderful 
they are. The moment the ego becomes part of competitiveness instead of it being willpower, that is the 
moment that spirituality is lost. That is the moment that the ego says, "I have free will. My will can do 
anything." The moment that the ego is taken away from the 51, in that moment, it has its opportunity for 
spiritual initiation. 

This is why this is a channel of Initiation. Because without the ego, it is no longer "I did that." It is the 
warrior after the battle that gets down on their hands and knees and thanks the gods that they survived 
because they know damn well that it was not up to them. They were just really lucky. This is a spiritual 
moment in which one sees that the power that lies within oneself is not one's own, that one is helpless in 
the world regardless of what motor you run on, that there are greater forces at work. But when the ego is 
part of that will, all is lost. It is gone. The spirituality is gone because the claim that is, "This is my talent, 
my power, my will." This is where the human psyche begins to fall apart, because it is a great lie. 

51.6 Separation 

The sixth line here is affected by the Pluto phenomenon, so we only have the exaltation here. All sixth 
lines are different. The line and its keynote, Separation, is the mystical name for the structure of a sixth 
line. It is about being separate. All sixth lines, in a sense, are about that: the idea of sitting on the roof of a 
house and looking out and not really being clear about what one should do in one's process. Like all sixth 
lines, like the transition. 

The Sun exalted. In times of crisis when all those around are confused and in disorder, the ability not to 
succumb to panic but to have the will and vitality to survive it alone. All sixth lines, in a sense, are alone. 
Not alone in the sense of gates of aloneness, but alone in terms of not being committed to the nature of 
their hexagram, unlike any other line that represents it. They are always somehow borrowing from the 
44.6 Aloofness, to being above all of that. 

When you meet a 51.6, do not expect to see or feel their competitiveness because for them it is a question 
of, "Why bother if it does not center me? Why bother if it does not lead to mutation? Why bother when it 
does not lead to knowing?" This is always the great question for the sixth line. 

In the white book: The power of the ego to meet challenges alone. But it also is the ego staying alone. 
Remember that the 51 has a natural place coming out of the 40, and the mystical nature of sixth lines is 
that they represent the loners. They represent those that have their own unique separate process that may 
or may not integrate with the whole. But it is not fair to expect of a 51.6 what you can call out of a 51.5. 
They may not, regardless of their power, enter into any kind of conflict or competitiveness, jump over any 
chasm. They may just sit and stare and wait for that opportunity. But they will be alone and separate in 
their process and they will not enjoy having anyone trying to push them into displaying their willpower. 

You really don't get a sense of them as being warriors. These can be people that are deeply misleading 
because, at the moment that there really is something that they must deal with, that they know will center 
them in their process, they have enormous capability and wisdom. The wisdom to know how to compete 
and how to initiate is always the possibility of the sixth line. The 51.6's are people who wait for a sign 
from God. It is very common. 

The 51.6 leads to the 42. 1. The 42.1, Diversification, is about the foundation of what the cyclical process 
is about. The channel of Maturation represents the cycles of the experiential way. Diversification is about 
the recognition that there are as many ways as there are humans. The dilemma for the 51.6, in trying to 
figure out where to be competitive and where to put its will, is that it is confronted with so many different 
pathways and, in looking at all those different pathways, again, the keynote for the 51 is to learn from 
experience. The 51.6 needs to see and recognize the experience of the many ways. This is quite a process 
and it keeps it back because there are so many possibilities that may or may not fulfill its potential. 

HEXAGRAM 52 KEEPING STILL (MOUNTAIN) 

We switch over to the logical format. When looking at the 58th hexagram, there is the obvious polarity of 
the 58 and 52. They are an opposition in the Zodiac. I have pointed out to you the importance of energy 
for the logical process, that is, the need to be able to energize experimentation in order to be able to 
guarantee or secure the future for the collective. 

The 52nd hexagram, Keeping Still, is the gate of stillness. It is an energy that is focused and it is the 
pressure to concentrate. This is the enormous difference between the 52 and the 53. This needing to be 
focused and concentrated is so diametrically opposed to the cyclical process of beginning things and 
finishing them. One of the things that are very clear about the nature of the logical process and format is 
that, in order for logical things to succeed, there must be a deep identification in order that repetition and 
focusing is possible. One has to be deeply identified with the formula in order to spend a lifetime proving 
or disproving it. This is quite a dedication. 

The fuel quality is passive and this is not about stress but about tension. The great depression of the 52 is 
the tension that one will not find the right thing to focus on. It is very depressing for this energy that has 
its pressure on concentrating when there is nothing worthwhile to concentrate on. 

Something very important to understand is that the next step of the Plutonian process is to go into the 9th 
gate. (Pluto entered the 9th gate in 1998.) So we will have an enormous amount of power for a very deep 
focus and concentration. It is the plutonic field that will be the source of that focus of attention. 

Above the lines of the 52 it says, Temporary and self-imposed inaction for the benefit of assessment. This 
is the whole thing of what the tension is. The tension is there during the assessment process because there 
is nothing to do. Unless there is something to concentrate on, there is nothing to do. 

That is why I joke and call this the gate of the Buddha. Keeping still (Mountain). Buddha sits under the 
tree with his 52 and he does not know what to do because he knows that he is not in charge of the doing. 
So he just sits there. He is enlightened because he does not have any tension while he is sitting there. This 
is the truth for all. The moment that you recognize that while he is sifting there, he is waiting for the 
perfect opportunity to find something worth concentrating on. In that moment of finding something worth 
concentrating on, there is the power to really concentrate and thus there is real fulfillment in that process. 

52.1 Think before you speak 

Think about all the pressure that is on the 52nd gate. There is a lot of pressure on the 58th gate to commit 
its energy to experimentation, and there is enormous pressure on the 52nd to commit its energy to 
concentration. But the reality is that the theme of this gate, the first line, the introspection, is: Think 
before you speak. 

Earth exalted in the foundation of the hexagram is the real grounding. This is the real stability in the 
logical process. The pause that is so profound that it leads to silence. There is nothing to do and nothing 
to say until the moment that there is something of value to concentrate on. This annoys people. Anybody 
who is involved in the logical process is desperate and hungry for energy and gets really annoyed that 
Buddha is under the tree when the fields need to be plowed. They get very annoyed that the energy is not 
available to figure out and control who is going to plow, when it will get plowed. Who will keep the 
records and how are we going to concentrate on all of that. That energy is missing and therefore, there are 
all kinds of forces. This is a collective gate and the most important collective process for us because it 
ensures our health and stability. If these people are not doing, are not providing their energy, they have all 
kinds of pressure from other people. This pressure begins in the detriment. 

Mars in detriment. Speaking first... (under pressure to commit their energy) ...and living with the 
consequences afterwards. 

In the Book of Letters: The pacification of energy that leads to stillness. "It is not time. I will not commit 
myself to this process of intense focus and concentration unless there is something there which is of 
value. There has to be." 

The Martian side is: Energy that cannot be stilled. These are the two sides of the concentrated process. 
These are the two sides of the way logic operates. Those forces in the 52 that do keep still and wait, their 
energy is of enormous value when it is committed. Those who are always ready, like the Mars, to step out 
of that, never get the focus and concentration necessary for their process in life. 

Let me try to clarify that even further for you. The 58 and the 52 are in opposition to each other. Both of 
these gates are the only natural fuels for the logical process. So, when anybody meets the 52nd gate, they 
want it to act like the 58th gate. In other words, they want the 52 to act like a motor gate and just simply 
fuel the activity of correction and challenging authority. That is not what the 52nd gate is about. It is 
about using energy passively. It is not about rushing out into the fields to plow them. It is about sitting 
under a tree, imagining how a field can be properly plowed and not making any kind of commitment to 
the collective until one has figured out in one's concentration, in one's focus, that there are certain ways 
that the fields should be plowed. While the person is sitting under the tree, all of its friends are working in 
the fields and they would love to have that motor energy of the 52. The 52 is at its best when it is sitting 
under that tree and not moving a muscle, but musing about the nature of field plowing. 

That focus and concentration is what the collective needs. The logical collective requires that. It is not the 
58th gate. Because we only have these two gates and because the logic is starved for energy, the 52 is 
under enormous pressure to act like the 58 and not be what it really is. The 52 is the pause, the silence for 
the concentration, for the focus. This is where the contribution can be made. 

52.2 Concern 

The second line is about projection. What is projected outwards here is the nature of this hexagram which 
is that this person can be focused. This person then is under pressure to concentrate. When they are 
looking at a magazine and you walk up to them and say, "Do you want a cup of coffee?" they get really 
annoyed because they are trying to focus on what is in front of them. They are projecting out this field. 

It is called Concern. Venus exalted. The pause that is initiated to benefit others. Mars in detriment. A 
selfish and abrupt pause that may endanger others unnecessarily. By the way, they are the same thing. 

In the white book: The pressure to restrain energy for the benefit of others; or The pressure to selfishly 
restrain energy at the expense of others. All of that is about projection. Remember, the person with the 
second line is not introspective. They are putting out a field of energy and it is being projected on by 
either side. So, if you are a person who has the Venus here, it is always projected on you that you are 
sitting back and being focused and concentrated for the benefit of everybody else. You are sitting under a 
tree and trying to figure out how to best plow the fields. If you have the other side, everybody is saying, 
out of that projection, "They are sitting under a tree because they are selfish and because they do not want 
to work like we want to work, and they are not doing a damn thing under that tree." 

When the 52 is connected to the throat, they can do. For example, you take a 14- year-old child in middle- 
school and you sit them down for an examination; their focus and concentration will burn more calories 

than a 20 kilometer walk. So it is not about not doing. There are all kinds of doing. The energy is being 
used, but passively. 

52.3 Controls 

When you are dealing with the first to third lines in the 52, you are dealing with collective circuitry. You 
know right away that it is very difficult for these people at times to deal with this phenomenon. After all, 
first to third lines are not really equipped to deal with the other side. That is not their focus. Their focus is 
much more internalized. When you get to the third line, the line of trial and error, you have an aspect of 
the first and second line but you have this trial and error which is immediately going to bump into others. 
The third line brings in the beginnings of the interaction with the other side and this is where the whole 
trial and error phenomenon is. 

It is called Controls. It says: External enforcement of inaction. If you have a child with the 52.3, it is told, 
"You go into your room and concentrate." External enforcement of inaction. "No, you can't get out and 
play. You sit there and practice the piano." 

Saturn exalted. The ability by its very nature to understand restraint with the potential in acceptance to use 
the period to redefine strategies. The energy for acceptance in inaction. What happens on this side is that 
these people are always going to be restrained by outside forces. Those outside forces will restrain them, 
but not all the time. So, as long as on this side they can accept the restraint, it is okay. The child that is 
told that it must practice the piano may one day look back and say, "I am so grateful that my parents 
forced me to practice because this is my life and I love this instrument, but I hated the practicing back 
then." In other words, this is the part of the format that has to be strongly guided by its interaction with 
others. 

There is a lot of trial and error in that because remember, those people who are logical, who will gravitate 
to somebody who has the 52, they want the 52 to be like the 58. They want them to be a motor energy that 
will fuel manifestation or generation, and that they will fuel activity, rather than accepting that the 52 is 
there to fuel passive focus and concentration. 

The other side is Venus in detriment. A deep dissatisfaction with controls that disturbs tranquility, leads 
to emotional withdrawal and affects vision. The pressure of restraint disturbs tranquility. These are the 
people who are forced to practice and who really hate it. It disturbs them because it takes them away from 
the stillness they had before they were told that they had to practice. These are the ones that don't end up 
playing the instrument in their lives. They end up being focused on whatever is natural for them but have 
a deep resistance to being controlled. Again, this is all trial and error. There will be a lot of mistakes along 
the way. 'Miss-take', like in the movies, is just another 'take' and nothing bad. 

52.4 Self-discipline 

The fourth line is actually the exalted line because you have a channel that is all about being fixed and 
focused. We know that fourth line themes are about being fixed and one-tracked and single-minded. So, 
obviously the nature of this fourth line in this particular gate and channel is really the key force at work in 
this hexagram. 

It says: Self -discipline. Saturn exalted. Perfected self-discipline and restraint that deals easily and wisely 
with impulsive temptations. The energy for restraint which recognizes the value of stillness and focus. 
Basically, rather than trying to intellectualize that, the root center is not aware. The 52.4's are people who, 
on principle, focus and concentrate, which means that they are focused and concentrated on everything. 
They take their time over what to buy, to see, where to go and what to do in their lives. They will always 

require and (because it is built into them) are fixed in needing the spaces of silence, this pause where they 
go through and work it all out and can finally come to some kind of decision. 

Jupiter in detriment. Though responsive to the need of a principled control based on the understanding of 
conditions, there is a tendency due to its natural expansiveness to doubt and restlessness. In other words, 
essentially it operates exactly the same way. These fourth line people are very fixed on being focused. 
Everything for them is about being focused. The only difference with the Jupiter is that this planet, once 
in a while, says, "I don't do this. Why are we focused on this? Is this the right thing to be focused on?" 
This is something that can come out of this energy in the fourth line. When you meet these people, you 
have to see that no one can ever have the power to take these people out of their focus. They can only 
participate in the focus with them. Remember that the fourth line knows that there is a 9th gate over there. 
It recognizes that, and when it meets the other side which needs focus and concentration, they together 
can really bring the format to fruition. 

If you take somebody in a classroom and you have the fourth line of the 52, and you have the 9. 1 or the 
9.4, you will have the classroom filled with people who are deeply focused and concentrated because this 
is the ideal for what we call research. It is the ideal for being fixed on the repetition of the pattern and all 
the other things that go with the logical process. 

For other people who are not logical, these people are not to be understood. They have this incredible 
power gate and the other circuits bang into that and say, "I want some energy. Give me the energy," and 
they do not get this active energy from the 52. They get passive energy. It is very difficult for them to 
come to these 52.4 people because they will not break their focus. They will not lift their head and look at 
you if they are caught up in something. They will annoy others because they won't break their focus, and 
many of us call these people neurotic. This is the great line of neurosis but not in the sense that they are 
neurotic (they are not); they are living out their nature, but in the sense of how it is perceived by others 
because they do not seem to be able to break their focus. They even appear to be obsessive. They are not. 
This is a very fixed line in a very fixed gate. It is very fixed and that is its way. They have the focus. 

They have what is called 'the brown study' which is when you look out the window but you don't see. 
This is focus without concentration. So you have somebody who is sitting in front of their newspaper and 
they are starring at the newspaper but they are not reading anything. They are in a deep focus which

does. It is the mechanics that is affecting the maturity. The sixth line is saying, "Yes, we can do it. If I can 
do that, you will be attracted to me and if you are attracted to me, we can do it together." 

Of course, because the theme is so strongly in the jumping in and out, it is not easy for these people to 
have that ability to go through, nor is it easy for them to meet the others that will allow them to see that it 
is possible to begin and end something with them. Remember that there is no 42 here. There is just the 53 
saying, "Yes, I can begin things, but can it really be completed?" 

In the black book: Moon exalted. The successful utilization of the completion of a stage in development, 
that by its evident success and value can be used as an example to attract support for the next stage. This 
remains a very important aspect and the 'Department of Planning', the gods, is very kind because they 
make sure that that mutative possibility, the transitional possibility of this sixth line, is only focused in 
one direction. It is placed in the direction of really attracting others to complete processes and really be 
mature. It has taken away what would have added to the strength of the Neptunian side not being there. It 
takes away the natural collective sociability of the people who have this gift to share and offer it and turns 
them into secretive forces. If you look at the history of the world and how it moves, you will see if you 
look at the Plutonic movement to this line, times in which so many things were deeply kept secret. 

You can see that the theme in the third line is conflict. It is about learning about people. If the sixth line 
has learned its lesson about the others, it will find the right support from others despite the other energies 
that are at work, where maturation can still take place. 

HEXAGRAM 54 THE MARRYING MAIDEN 

The 54th hexagram is both the most mundane of all the fuels which come out of the root and the most un- 
mundane. There is no real word for that un-mundane. The vast majority of people that possess this gate, 
their fuel is necessary to be able to bring out success within the tribe. We know that the 54th gate is called 
the Marrying Maiden. If you turn the number around, you get the 45 and you get to where the Marrying 
Maiden wants to be, which is to be the queen in the 45th gate. 

The Marrying Maiden is the gate of drive. This is a very powerful fuel. It is the drive to succeed because 
on the other side is the fear of failure. It is the drive to succeed on the material plane because its natural 
path is to the 21/45. It is the drive to live in a material community. That is a communal material 
community in which you have shops, and clients who become your family customers. The 54th gate is the 
drive to transform or not and in this transform-or-not is the magic that will come across in the fourth line. 

Within the 54 always lies this possibility of transformation. Remember that the gate at the other end is not 
only the gate of failure but the most conservative of all gates. It is quite something to transform that 
conservativeness. This is a very powerful field. Its energy mechanic is about liquid production. That is not 
to sound obscure. It gives us a deep insight into the nature of this gate because it is fuelling instinct. 
Instinct is rooted in the deepest of memories. Memory is stored in the liquid of the cells. Here, this liquid 
production is the 54, the beginning of memory storage. The 54 has a lovely gift. It only remembers 
winning and succeeding, instinctively, that is. The 32 at the other end will always remember failure. That 
is the balance. 

At the top of the lines it says: Interaction in its most mundane social context, but also one's mystical and 
cosmic relationships. Built in here, in the most mundane, can be the most exalted spiritual experience. 

On the other side, in the 19/49, we have the mystical channel of the tribe. Here, in the mirror on the 
splenic side, we have this incredible potential. I had a lot of dealings with sannyasins. One of the things 
that I like most of all about the nature of the sannyasins through Osho was his recognition of the 
importance of the material in our lives, this recognition that you must go out into the world and you must 
triumph on the mundane plane in order to live out true spirituality. It is very easy to be enlightened when 
you sit on the mountain and nobody sees you. It is another thing to be enlightened and having to work in 
the super-market. This is a very different story and if you can do it there, that is the real thing. Thus, lying 
within this truly mundane gate is a recognition that what is truly mundane is the only spiritual way. You 
must live your awareness in your life moment by moment, breath by breath. 

The fact that this stream about the tribal process has an individual nature should not mask that this is 
tribal and communal. It is about the nature of support. It is very important to understand that because this 
gate is deeply misunderstood. What the nature of this drive and ambition is all about is misunderstood. 

54.1 Influence 

This first line is called Influence. It is a strange line if you do not really understand what this gate is all 
about. The line says: The ability to achieve influence through secret relationships, anywhere from the 
private adviser to the Satanist. In the white book: Ambition energized through secret relationships which 
fuel influence. Think about what this really means. If you really want to rise up, you can not just call out 
and say, "I want to rise up," because there is no way to go. When a 54.1 says, "I can help you rise up," 
then they get power because of their fuel, their ability to be the adviser, to be the secret one behind the 
mass. They say to others, "Do this. Do that." In doing that, as the other rises up, they rise with them. As 
they rise with them, slowly they gain power over the very one that they have been helping to transform. 

Understand the nature of this 54th gate. The moment that the ambition is for oneself, there is no influence. 
The ambition has to be pointed towards the other. "Let me help you. Let me work for you. I really think 
what you are doing is great. Let me help you out." In that, they gain power. 

Venus in detriment. A socially misguided insistence on formal recognition of a relationship that in terms 
of influence will diminish its power. "I want everybody to know that it was my idea, and not yours." 
Power over. It is gone. If you don't tell anybody, they will eventually figure it out anyway. "It wasn't 
really him, it was her." That is the power that is inherent here. Ambition which demands formal 
recognition, limiting influence. The basis of ambition is for the community to succeed. The individual can 
rise up by helping somebody else and they themselves will gain the influence and eventually rise up. 

54.2 Discretion 

When we come to the second line, you can see how different a second line can be from a first line. The 
first line is introspective and it is looking at its foundation. It is looking inward to see how one can truly 
rise up. It is looking inward to see how we can help somebody else rise up in order to take advantage of 
that. When you get to the second line, you simply project outwards that you will be discrete. Look at these 
first three lines, they really tell you so much about ambition. Keep everything secret. Keep everything 
quiet and closed in. This line is called Discretion. Covert interaction is about not showing it. Don't let 
them see how ambitious you really are. So, here you have discretion. The energy that these people are 
projecting outwards is that they will not tell anybody. Of course, that may or may not be true. 

Saturn exalted. The wisdom, once a relationship gets formally recognized, to restrain the temptation to 
take advantage of past informal interactions. "Yes, your friend is made assistant vice president. But you 
are not going to remind him in public that in his last job, he was a mess and he covered out so-and-so very 
nicely." You restrain yourself from letting that out so that you can hold on to your power. Otherwise, your 
ambition will fail. The moment that you are not discrete, you can lose the advantage that you have gained. 
The energy of restraint fuels ambition. 

The detriment is Mars. It means immaturity. Recognition, in the formal sense, seen as a license to take 
advantage of informal knowledge. A lack of loyalty. Here is somebody who said, "Okay, now that I have 
it formally recognized and everybody knows that it was my idea, I can blow this turkey off and take their 
place. While we are sitting in this meeting, I will let everybody else know what kind of a fool this person 
is." 

Lack of loyalty. I make that sound terrible. Don't believe for a moment that we do not need lack of 
loyalty, like anything else. It is so important to understand that. The person who generated that concept, 
who was of value to the community and did that informally and gets recognized for it, they feel all right. 
"I get recognized for it. Why shouldn't I go on to the next stage, because I have the skills for that?" After 
all, this gate is called Ambition. It is others who may consider that a lack of loyalty. This is a projected 
field. This is the whole thing to understand about this in order that you don't get stuck in these things that 
we have prejudices about. You can see how they work. This is simply mechanical and we have two sides 
to this mechanic. 

54.3 Covert interaction 

Third lines. Bonds made and broken as its frequency. Trial and error as a theme. Here you have the title 
of Covert interaction. 

Pluto exalted. The ability, when stymied in formal relationships, to use secret or purely informal channels 
when it is the only resort. Think about how this works. All of these first three lines carry with them 

basically the same theme. How this works is that you have somebody that is, for example, working in the 
military, and they got to a certain rank and then they can't get any further. They get no more formal 
recognition that they should go higher up in that military order. Because they keep on trying to move the 
ladder further up and they keep on getting denied, what they do then is that they get involved in covert 
interaction, in their ambition to find a way to subvert that order. Usually we call that a coup d'etat, and all 
of a sudden you have a country that is being run by Sergeant Dow. It is not General Dow, not Colonel or 
Lieutenant Dow, but Sergeant Dow. Remember that it is conditional and only when they are stymied. It 
does not mean that they will be stymied all the time. In other words, these people will only use covert 
interaction when blocked. 

The drive when blocked to use secret means to fuel ambition. Most of the time, with the force these 
people have, they don't get blocked but because it is trial and error, there will be these bonds that are 
broken in these relationships and it will be necessary to find some other way to get around them in order 
to continue one's process. 

Venus in detriment. The insistence that formal channels, no matter how frustrating, can be overcome by 
the power of attraction. This, again, goes back to the same thing. This means, using the same military 
analogy, that even though they get stymied over and over and over again in trying to get the promotion, 
they will try to make themselves indispensable to the local general. They keep on offering their services, 
they keep on getting involved, they build up an informal relationship hoping that their very attraction and 
their very ability to integrate with that person will end up with them finally getting the next step up the 
ladder, that they think or believe they deserve. 

The energy of ambition when blocked will fuel the power of attraction to overcome the obstacle. If you 
can't to do it formally, you find some way to ingratiate yourself with the one in charge so that they will 
accept you at another level, and hopefully that will lead to your ambition being fulfilled. You can see 
clearly here that we are dealing with a communal supportive process in which the rising up is conditioned 
on somebody being there to help that process: somebody who gets empowered by these people, 
somebody who is fueled in their ambition in order that the others' ambition can be realized in the lifetime. 
It is very powerful. Something to always see in a reading with somebody who has this 54th gate is for 
them to understand that their greatest success will come by first making somebody else successful. 

Ultimately, they will get the rewards and the recognition for that energy but it has to be seen second hand. 
It has to come from others recognizing it, by seeing it, and in its apparent selflessness. "I did it so that this 
person could make it." They end up being seen as the ones that should be transformed and promoted and 
moved up the ladder. They are company people and work for the program. They are not just interested in 
themselves, and they are so pleased when they finally sit in the chairman's seat and they run the 
organization. The fairy tale associated with this gate is Cinderella. Often, these people have a smell of 
who they can bribe. They know by instinct with whom covert interactions are possible. They properly 
smell it, but as a third line, they also make mistakes and learn from them. 

54.4 Enlightenment/Endarkenment 

When you come to this fourth line, it is the only line that is intrinsically different from the traditional 
I'Ching. That is, in its pure nature obviously there is no description. At the time of the discovery of 
Uranus, that was when the 54.4 went through its transformation, so we are dealing with something that is 
just a couple of hundred years old. One of the ways to look at this fourth line is to recognize something 
about the nature of what we have been looking at in terms of how ambition actually functions. The 
Marrying Maiden, this ability to rise up, to have this drive and ambition, is always conditioned by a 
decline of drive and ambition of others, in order for them to rise up. In the externalization of that line lies 

perhaps the ability to see that one is doing in the world what one would like the world to do for oneself. 
Do for the totality what you hope the totality will do for you. 

There is this need to recognize that Enlightenment/Endarkenment is not about achieving that for oneself. 
If one tries to achieve that for others, that is how one finds it. So we have a world filled with priests trying 
to lead others to the spiritual door so that they can find it. Built into this fourth line is this recognition that 
enlightenment, or whatever these terms mean, this deep spiritual process, is not about ourselves. It is not 
our enlightenment or endarkenment. This comes elsewhere. This is about what is possible for the totality 
because anyone who has this line cannot benefit from it unless they are benefiting from whoever can get it 
through them. 

If you are a 54.4 and you do somebody's reading, it is more likely that the reading will have a greater 
impact on you than it has on them because that is the way that will operate. Depending on the person and 
the situation, you are obviously going to deal with that on a different level. But it is so important to 
understand that at the core of communal or tribal spirituality is this recognition that there is no reward 
unless you are serving others, and we have a lot of that in our tribal religion. We have all kinds of people 
such as missionaries who dedicated themselves to being of service in order to find it themselves. 

54.5 Magnanimity 

We know that the fourth and fifth lines have the capacity to deal with the other side. They are equipped 
for it. You notice that both of them are singularities. There is no polarity in these lines. They are very 
specific. When you get to the fifth line, you know that it is being projected on. So, what we have already 
learned in the first line about the nature of ambition is that it works best behind the throne. When you get 
to the fifth line, everybody assumes that the 54.5 is the power behind the throne. They are always given 
that assumption, even if it is not true. "They are the ones that are really in charge," people say, even if it is 
not true. Everybody projects on them that they really are the ones in charge. That is why it is called 
Magnanimity. The way everybody else sees the 54.5 is, "Isn't that nice. They are willing to help me. How 
magnanimous of them," without the deep recognition that by allowing them to help you, they will go 
beyond you. They will use you as a way to move up the ladder. When I say 'use you,' I don't mean that in 
the negative sense. 

Here in Magnanimity, the Sun is exalted. The natural authority and actualizing spirit, that in a position of 
power can have genuine and fruitful relationships with the less advantaged (as long as they are in service 
and make no demands). That is, if it is not a position of power, it cannot have fruitful relationships. 

In the white book: The energy for actualizing that despite this power fuels fruitful relationships with 
others. Due to the fact that this person is always projected on to be the power behind the throne, it does 
not matter what job they have. As long as they are recognized for their power and everybody treats them 
accordingly, they will continue to give their energy to the people around them who need that energy to 
keep on succeeding. If they are not given the respect of that power, then all kinds of problems can come 
out of this because for them it is absolutely essential. They cannot be magnanimous unless they have 
people around them that are going to respect them and recognize their real power. It is essential for them. 
As long as that real power is recognized, it is okay. 

If you are the power behind the throne and the king treats you like a god, everything is great. You don't 
have to be king and you can have a good time with the king who is lesser than you are. And you can have 
a good time with all those people down there you don't want to deal with because you get that 
recognition. But if the king treats you like a servant and you have made the king, this will not work. The 
54.5 is given a great advantage. It is assumed that they will be the source of power. It is assumed that they 

are the ones that can help bring about success. Therefore, they will get their opportunities, like all fifth 
lines. 

54.6 Selectivity 

All sixth lines are looking at the nature of the circuit. If you are the Marrying Maiden, and you are 
looking at the whole circuit and you are a sixth line, you are looking at the 45 which says, "I am the queen 
or the king, and I have." For any communal sixth line, particularly in the 54.6, the only ambition worth 
fuelling is an ambition that is going to take them to that place where they are going to be the ruler, and 
they are going to have that because that is the completion of what this is all about: in doing that and in 
getting to that place, and being fulfilled in that. 

This line is called Selectivity, and it is about people. After all, we are dealing with community and 
support. Saturn exalted. The ingrained responsibility, in terms of maintaining security and personal 
identity, that will naturally restrict its relationships to ones that are mutually beneficial This is very clear. 
The energy to restrict relationships that hinder ambition. Just because there is somebody that can help, 
who may be able to get me to here or there does not mean that I will, unless it is mutually beneficial and it 
is a relationship that is really of value to me that I can enjoy it, and that it is a person that I can work with. 
This becomes a key at that level. 

On the other side, Jupiter in detriment. A generally benefit and expansive nature that assumes that it can 
instill what is otherwise missing in its partners. A waste of energy. In the white book: A waste of energy 
in maintaining relationships which hinder ambition. Let's say, that you have a politician that is running for 
political office and you have somebody who has the Saturn side. As long as this person is somebody they 
can work with, as long as it is mutually beneficial, they will get involved in supporting this person but 
only if they know that if that person gets elected, they are going to get some kind of cushy government 
job that will pay them a lot in whatever form on the material plane. The Jupiterian side will look at the 
politician and will think, "Oh my god. This one will not win but this one has told me that I will get this 
cushy job, if they do win. So I will do the very" best that I can to give them the ambition, the tools and the 
fuel that they need because I can change them, transform them, so that they can be a winner." A waste of 
energy. That is on the other side. 

Remember that we are dealing with a communal sixth line. Communal sixth lines are much more ready to 
make a commitment than any other of the sixth lines due to the nature of the tribe and community. The 
thing to recognize about the power inherent in this is that these people really do have a way of climbing 
the ladder, but it is specifically about whether or not they can grasp and understand the nature of people. 
This is the most important gift to somebody who has the 54th gate. They have to understand the nature of 
humans and how they work. This going underneath the secret, the covert, to go deep inside to understand 
the mechanism of people: What turns them on? What moves them, and what doesn't? What drives them? 
Because in the end, the great success that is possible only comes as communal success, because this is a 
tribal stream. It only comes by having those right forces. 

If you are a 54 and you are carrying all this power inside of you to bring about transformation, and the 
person that offers you that opportunity or the person you connect to does not have what it takes, you will 
not rise up because they don't rise up. The third line learns this right away. It makes all kinds of mistakes 
about who it gets involved with. The sixth line, in its wisdom, says, "I know exactly what kind of person 
should be there." The Saturn restricts everything else but that type. The Jupiter says, "I know what type it 
has to be, and I'll turn this person into that type." It does not work. When I say that it does not work, that 
does not work generally. It does not mean that it won't work at all. There are many cases in which the 
politician has been groomed in that sense. Somebody who really did not have it is groomed by somebody 
else, so that they really look like they have it. 

The general sense of how it operates in the world is that it tends to be what it is for most sixth lines. They 
simply withdraw that part of them. When you meet a 54.6, you are not likely to meet somebody who 
obviously is ambitious. They hold back from ambition until they see the opportunity where they can rise 
up: either if the person is exactly the right person or because they think, out of the Jupiterian aspect, that 
they can transform that person and make it the right person. 

HEXAGRAM 55 ABUNDANCE 

This 55th gate in the channel of Emoting, a design of moodiness, is of enormous importance to humanity. 
It is in the 55.6 that the nature of emotional spirit will begin to awaken as a genetic evolutionary pattern, 
and so the nature of the 55th hexagram is important to us at that level. But please remember that on the 
mundane plane, it is the most unstable of all the emotional gates. It is the most volatile of all the 
emotional gates. It has the highest wave going up and the lowest wave going down of all the emotional 
gates. Though it represents a mystery (I call it the Sleeping Phoenix that will awaken and bring with it the 
fire of the Aquarian age.), the reality is that it represents now this enormous instability in the movement 
of the wave. This is the glass that is always half full and half empty, going through its wave process, and 
we take a look at the different lines in this context. 

Here, the gate of spirit: The potential is the awareness of provocation or not. Am I being provoked or not? 
Do I like it? tTJT 40 drsnesi-poteittict n~ $ ec t. This is one of the things to recognize about the nature of 
the 55th gate. Any time that you see anybody that has this gate, please understand how important it is to 
tell them, "Do not eat if you are not in the mood 1" It is so important for them because they can become so 
unhealthy. If you have the whole channel defined-(39V55) and you are always in the mood for eating, 
then it is there already. If that energy gets to the sacral or to the throat, there is a way of burning the 
energy. If you are not connected to the sacral or to the throat, there is no way to burn that energy. 

The 55th gate can only eat, make love or work when it is in the mood. Only in the mood can it be social. 
Unless these people with the 55th gate understand that and honor that, they are going to suffer terribly in 
their wave. So the mood becomes the essence of all this. 

What we are looking at as we go through the lines is that these are the lines of moodiness. In general, 
everything having to do with individuality has to do with honoring moods. I don't have any emotional 
definition in individuality but I have the 12th gate and I am very individual and I am deeply moody. 
Every time I step into the emotional wave, moods are very natural to me. It is simply the reality of what it 
is to be individual but it is pinpointed or highlighted here in the 55th gate. 

55.1 Cooperation 

The first line is our foundation line. It is the line of introspection. The first line always represents the 
essence of what the gate is about. Above the lines it says, Abundance is strictly a question of spirit. 
Whether one's glass is half empty or half full. 

It is called Cooperation. Jupiter exalted. The expansion of activity in cooperation with powerful forces 
through principled actions that guarantee continued support and engender prosperity. The nature of spirit 
of the 55.1. Everything about the 55th gate is establishing the spirit that will be necessary to enable the 
individual to be social. It provides the spirit for the gate 22, the gate of Grace, which opens up the 
possibility of being open to social interaction as an individual. The nature of the 55th gate is that, in this 
first line, it is going to find its spirit but only if it is dealing socially with forces that are more powerful 
than it. That is obviously subjective. What it is really saying is that the moment that the 55's bring inferior 
forces into their life, because of the nature of their high/low wave, they can go even lower than the 
inferior forces that are going to impact on them as a conditioning force. 

Whenever I am dealing with a client who has the first line, I am always telling them: it is very important 
that you are looking towards a place to go in your relationships; somebody that knows more than you, 
somebody who has more experience than you do, somebody that has a knowledge that you need, 
whatever the case may be. But something that you need to recognize is that they are of value to you in 

your social process because they are making your cup more full. Inferior forces are going to drain your 
cup. 

Venus in detriment. The concentration on harmonic relationships with powerful forces that provide for 
continuity but not necessarily advancement. This is the ability to be social with these forces but so much 
energy is spent on maintaining the sociability, the wave being the cause of all of that, that they do not 
really get the advantage that comes with the relationship. 

The potential to find the spirit through cooperation with powerful forces. You can see that it is deeply 
conditioned. The spirit is not going to come from inferior forces. It can't. That is the whole thing to 
recognize. The nature of that is that there is only a potential for the spirit in cooperation with powerful 
forces. 

The detriment: The potential to harmonize with powerful forces but not necessarily for the benefit of the 
spirit. Again, because this is all about relationships, a social process, and because it is in the deepest of the 
waves of moods, the moodiness inherent in the relationship can be distracting so that the real progression, 
the real fulfillment of the spirit, cannot take place. 

55.2 Distrust 

Probably the most disliked people can be the 55.2's. The second line is very difficult. This is the 
projection outwards of the emotional spirit, whether it is at its lowest end or at its highest end because 
there is no introspection involved. It projects out blindly because that is the nature of the emotional wave. 
Everything about the 55 is leading to the social process. Don't ever forget that about the nature of it. What 
the second line is being projected on is that that spirit is projected onto others. Individuals are always 
attracting attention and so do the individuals with this line, but they often attract negative attention. 

It is called Distrust. One thing to see about emotional spirit is that it is going beyond this word. Trust is 
just about the motor. My joke about trust: in the English language, there is 'rust' in trust. 

Abundance hampered by slander or gossip. Venus exalted. The gift of being able to penetrate to the center 
that may demonstrate effectively through its relating talents that its trustfulness is genuine. "You can trust 
whatever my spirit is carrying. You can trust that this is really me. I really am happy, even though 
tomorrow I may look very sad. You can really trust that I really am happy. You can really trust that I am 
happy with you, even though tomorrow I may look very sad with you." 

Earth in detriment. The direct challenge to the slanderers who will always have the advantage of quoting 
the Bard: "Methinks he Both protest too much." Only continued example can overcome distrust. 

In the Book of Letters: Emotional stability and strength of spirit is dependant on being trusted by others. 
These people are not introspective. They don't really go through their process of seeing that their cup is 
always half empty/half full. Because they are not aligning themselves with powerful forces, they are not 
nurturing their spirit which is their opportunity to fill their cup. They are just projecting their emotional 
spirit outwards. When they are at the high end, that can be lovely. But they still have people talk behind 
their back. 

The 55.2 is always talked about and not often nicely, and they are often distrusted. They have to 
understand that they can never challenge the distrusters because the more they say, "You can really trust 
me," the more they are distrusted. That is the nature of what that line is about. One of the most powerful 
forces, this projection force, is one of the main images of what moodiness is, which is not nice. People do 

not like it. They do not trust it because it seems to be very uncomfortable, this movement from one end of 
the scale to the other end of the scale. 

55.3 Innocence 

When we get to the third line, we get to a very interesting line. In the 25th hexagram, which is the gate of 
the spirit of the Self (not the emotional spirit), in the third line, we have a line that deals almost 
exclusively with the concept of what we call failure: whether or not the essence of the Self, the spirit of 
the Self, can survive failure. We live in a very nice time because the detriment is Pluto, and none of us are 
going to experience that detriment or the channel being activated by Pluto in our lifetimes. So, it is a time 
in which we can escape the deep pain of failure. That is the 25.3. 

When you come here to 55.3, you are dealing with the same theme. Remember that third lines, because of 
their adaptation, because of the bonds made and broken, because of the wave of allegiance and rejection, 
are always going to have situations where, given whoever has the perspective, the bond being broken can 
seem like a failure. It may not seem like a failure to the breaker of the bond but it may seem like a failure 
to the one who has had the bond broken, or vice versa. But the reality is that failure is always going to be 
a theme in third lines. This is one of the things to recognize. If you are looking for a heart that can fail, 
look at the 21.3. 

The third line of the 55th hexagram is called Innocence. Here "I was only following orders" is a genuine 
defense. Saturn exalted. When the form is correct and attempts at actualization have been disciplined and 
within guidelines, failure cannot be personally attributed. What I say to people who have this line is, "If 
you are in the mood and you do things when you are in the mood, if you fail, that is not your fault. Do not 
blame yourself. You have not lost anything in that." But you have to recognize that it has to be within its 
form. The form here is to honor the nature of the moods. 

When you get to the detriment, you find Mars fixing it. A struggle against conformity or individual 
initiative can bring a superior to ruin, while safely hiding behind his shield. If you look at the detriment in 
the Book of Letters it says: The energy to selfishly protect one's spirit at the expense of others. So you 
come into the office and you come in with your spirit at the high end, and you fill up your boss with that 
spirit so that he is twice as high, and you make all kinds of commitments. Then you go to the low end of 
your spirit and you get it reflected back from your boss, and none of the things you committed yourself to 
do will you do. All you want to do is quit and get out because the cup is half empty and you feel terrible. 
Then the boss gets fired because he had already gone and said, "Here is our projection for next year. W% 
have all these wonderful projects and Mr. Jones back here is really wonderful at this." They end up 
loosing their job. 

The thing to recognize about innocence is that the only way that there is innocence here is when the mood 
is honored, and only then can the spirit survive. The moment that the mood is not honored, all chaos 
breaks out. When the mood is being honored, these people will break bonds. This is natural for them. This 
is honoring their mood. One of the things that happen to these people is that they become very ill, 
emotionally ill, when for example, they are in jobs and they do not quit. They don't break the bond. They 
don't act innocently. They try to compensate for all of that and they just don't walk away, which is what 
their moods dictate to them. 

55.4 Assimilation 

Fourth line, upper trigram, externalization. Remember the resonance to the first line. We saw in the first 
line that the spirit is protected by aligning itself with more powerful forces, and that is the essence for the 
spirit in terms of everything that is coming out of the nature of this gate. When you get to the fourth line, 

it already has incorporated that into its process. That means that it is looking for powerful forces, but it is 
a fourth line and externalization has this quality of being very fixed. 

One of the interesting things about this line is that this line works much better when it is in an undefined 
emotional system because these people are fixed on who feels good and who doesn't. This is what they 
know and, in their relationships, their assimilation, they will be with one person because that person 
makes them feel good and they will not be with somebody else because they don't make them feel good. 
It is very clear to them but they get very fixed in that. They are not very good at dealing with a lot of 
people because this can be confusing for them, but they are very concerned about who is exactly the right 
one. 

The line is called Assimilation. Jupiter exalted. The establishment of a framework that balances principles 
with energy and leads inevitably to expansion and prosperity. Their principle is always clear for them: 
their cup is either half full or half empty, and they know that. Why I say that it works so well for people 
who are emotionally undefined is that, when they hook into an emotional person, they can easier tell 
whether that is filling their cup or not. They are in the other one's wave and they can tell right away. It is 
very clear for them. 

They are looking for that framework which will bring out that principle for them and give them the 
energy that will lead to expansion and prosperity. In other words, they need to find people that, in their 
own track, will make them feel good. These are people that are always looking for bliss. These people 
always ask you if you are happy because they want to be happy and they do not want to be sad. They are 
always looking for someone, whatever framework it is, that is going to be the one that makes them happy. 
"These people are real jerks. I don't like what they think and I don't like seeing them in public but they 
make me feel good and that is why they are my friends." They can be very fixed on that because for them 
the powerful force is any force that will give them the sense that their cup is half full. 

The potential spirit that comes when emotional awareness and energy are balanced and principled; or 
Boundless energy that ignores awareness at the risk of the spirit. The reality is that the moment you are 
dealing with a fourth line, you are dealing with this wave of kindness/meanness. If you are not clear about 
it and you don't have your framework right so that you know the timing, you crash. For example, you call 
up your friend and you can tell by their mood whether you should have anything to do with them that day. 
Otherwise, you end up in situations where you get into relationships where you think that this one will 
give you the track you want, the "I want to be happy," and the moment that this is not there, you can have 
a real crash. 

Teenagers who have this line have a very hard time because they are so focused on "I need to fill my 
cup," and always getting deeply depressed on the other side, when their cup is half empty. After all, this is 
where you have anorexia nervosa; this is where you have bulimia. This is where you have all of these 
problems trying to fill the spirit after it has been crashed. It is a key to recognize, particularly with young 
people that have the 55.4, that they can be fixed on being happy but they will always meet the other side. 
Sorry. They need to find people that will allow them, within the framework, within the principle, to 
accept both the happy and the sad, of what it is to be a moody person. Please keep in mind that somebody 
who is emotional and goes into the aura of somebody who is not emotional can drain them or bring them 
up. The emotionally defined one gets back what he sent out because the emotionally open one will reflect 
the mood back twice as strongly. 

55.5 Growth 

When you have the second line, you have Distrust, and when you come to the resonance of this line, the 
fifth line, you come to Growth. The only way to overcome distrust is through the power of seduction, our 
wave of selfishness/ selflessness. 

Growth has Uranus exalted. It says: The unusual ability in a position of power to accept advice and 
transform it innovatively. The 'unusual ability' only exists in a position of power; otherwise it is not there. 
This gift in a position of power allows one to continue to lead rather than being perceived as being led. 
One of the things to recognize about this is that the only way in which these people are going to fulfill 
their spirit is if they are in power socially. This is the whole thing for them: to be in power. 

If you have a boss that has the 55.5, he does not care if you like him or not when he is in a bad mood. He 
knows that you will come around when it is time for your pay check. The position of power allows him 
immunity in the social sense. 55.5's don't have to feel that somebody else is measuring their cup because 
they are in a position of power. If they are not in a position of power, they can become very unhappy. 
They carry underneath it the resonance of the distrust, where people are suspicious of them because their 
moods go up and down so much.
