In the Book of Letters: The emotional strength and spirit derived from positions of power. These people 
feel good in their spirit when they have work in which they have a sense of authority and they can live 
through their moods without being challenged because of the nature of their moods. 

On the other side, Sun in detriment. An integrative openness that in its broad acceptance of advice may be 
eventually eclipsed. An emotional openness where the spirit is at risk from conditioning. What happens is 
that when they are not in power, they try to get there through harmonizing. In doing so, it can end up 
being a problem because they don't have the authority and the power to withstand the condemnation. 
Remember that we are dealing with individuality here. We are talking about freaks and geniuses, about 
strangers, about those who can be rejected or alienated, put on the outside, ostracized. What you have in 
the detriment is this need to find a way to get to the power source but at the same time, because they are 
going up and down in their wave, they may not be able to get there because they don't have the 
authority. 

Only when these people are in the mood for things do they have the possibility of being in power. The 
moment that they are trying to do things when they are not in the mood, their power is just simply not 
going to be there. By the way, when they are in power they can be deeply seductive. They catch you with 
that. 

55.6 Selfishness 

We come to the sixth line and to the transition point, the place where the mutation will take place that will 
begin this process of spirit awareness. In terms of resonance, you can see that the third and the sixth line 
both have Saturn exalted. This line is called Selfishness. This is where the emotional spirit will awaken, 'v 
will have this process of emotional awareness that will awaken in humanity and emotional awareness will 
not exist inside of us. It is something that will exist outside of us. The only way in which emotional 
awareness is going to be possible is when the individual integrity is complete. 

It is one of the things to recognize that without the material requirements, the emotional system can never 
be sedated. When you are sitting together with people and you eat, whether the occasion is a celebration 
or not, and you make sure that the resources are there, you fill it all up. The nature of the materialism that 
lies here in the sixth line, the key to it is selfishness. But it is not the selfishness of the ego. It is the 
selfishness of the spirit. That is a very different thing. 

Selfishness is a word that people can misunderstand. It is not something that is negative. The spirit 
requires selfishness, or there will be no transition. It is essential because it is out of the integrity of the 
individual that this mutation will take place. And the only way it can take place is that the individual will 
be able to maintain their own uniqueness because the awareness is going to exist outside of them. One has 
to be healthy within oneself for the awareness to exist on the outside. 

Here in the Book of Letters: The potential of finding the spirit through materialism. When people come to 
me and they have this line, one of the things I tell them is, "Work. Work. Work." It is wonderful for them. 
To provide for oneself is an extraordinary thing. It elevates the spirit. I have seen this all my life, I see all 
this hunger in the world and I realize where all the turmoil and the dilemmas of the planet lie. This is all 
about recognizing that you will not get to the spirit until you can look after the body. You have no chance 
for the spirit unless you can look after the body. I am tired of holy rollers who are full of these pious 
platitudes. It is not about this, it is about feeding human beings. It is about being able to look after 
ourselves. This is fundamental. 

The only way that we can live properly with each other is when we learn to be able to work in the world 
in harmony with each other. That is what this is about. It is an essential ingredient. I meet people all the 
time. They think they are ready for enlightenment and they can barely feed themselves. Give me a breakl 
Who is going to feed you$ The reality is that there is no spirit unless you deal with the body. All of this 
other stuff is just intellectual babble, white magic. Ideas can be delicious. You can believe in them but 
you cannot eat them. First you have to be able to eat. 

The possibility that materialism becomes obsessive with a 'mean' spirit that will not share. Yes, well. 
What to do? Materialism can make you feel very good by going through this process and not sharing it. 
Well, all right. You will get the other side of it. But remember something about this: All sixth lines look 
out for something very special. They are looking far beyond the nature of what is there. This is not just 
about the individual being able to have the right spirit to be able to communicate socially through the 
12/22. This is the spirit that recognizes that a vast mutation has to take place and it is looking for that field 
of mutation. It is an emotional driving force in the world. This gate is about eating. Don't forget that the 
55 is about eating. It is an emotional driving force that says, "We have to have enough to eat, and then we 
can worry about the spirit." No sense building a church until the fields have been cleared and seeds have 
been planted. Make sure that there is food first, and then you can build a church. 

If somebody does things only for themselves, that is what they do. I don't judge. Anybody who is 
involved in this process, anybody that can maintain themselves is a lot closer to the spirit than somebody 
who can't, even if they are selfish. In this line, you have those who will make sure that others will benefit, 
and you have those that others will not benefit from. It goes to the family, to the 37.1, to the line of 
Mother/Father. 

A mythology for this line is the story of King Midas. Everything that he touched turned into gold and he 
touched his food and couldn't eat it because it turned into gold. The thing to recognize is that we are not 
dealing with tribal circuitry here. W(e are dealing with individual circuitry. This is the only place in the 
individual circuit where materialism is mentioned. The freak and the outsider that is always looking for 
the collective or the tribe to take them in, this is a signal for them that they have to lead in survival; not 
simply from that end but from the emotional spirit end as well. 

HEXAGRAM 56 THE WANDERER 

The throat center is the most complex of all the centers for a very obvious reason. It has eleven gates and 
it represents our capacity to metamorphose. In that sense, it contains within it a potential for all of us to 
manifest in this life. It contains the themes of manifestation that we have in this life. The Wanderer is one 
of the primary gates in the throat center that provides an outlet for the mind. One of the things to 
understand about the nature of the mind is that it is there to be able to conceptualize the nature of what it 
is to be in the world as a human being. One of the first things you learn in Human Design is that the mind 
has no capacity to dictate the nature of your life, but it is very good in taking a look at your life and at 
others' lives. 

The 56 is one of the two collective gates of communication. These are metamorphic gates and operate in a 
very unusual fashion. They translate inner vision, the visual capacity within us to conceptualize by seeing 
inside, into what we call language. These gates are very special gates because they contain within them 
our capacity to communicate with each other as human beings and to get the other to be able to see what 
we mean. These gates are translators, in a way. They are trying to transform an inner vision, an inner 
seeing, into language. The 56th gate is the voice of the mental abstract process. 

The gates of the throat have a voice. The voice of the 56th gate is a voice that is either hopeful or 
desperate because it is the voice of belief. It is the voice that says "I believe" or "I don't believe". The 56th 
gate is a gate of stimulation. One of the jokes is that the 56th gate, in terms of genetics, is a stop codon. 
Literally, the point of stimulation is the point in which you stop. In other words, you can tell a story but 
do not try to live out the story that you believe in. 

This 56th gate is a very important gate because, without this gate, we do not have a human learning 
process. This is a key to understand its importance. Everything about the abstract process is about the 
experiential path, which is loaded with crisis, mistakes and problems, cycles, beginnings, middles and 
ends. Without this path, we do not have a history and we do not have philosophy and we do not have the 
reflection upon our experience that gives us a sense of the truth of what it is to be us. 

The 56th gate is there to stimulate us with its storytelling. It is there to be able to take the images of its 
mind that we call 'ideas' on the abstract side, to take the ideas and bring them into a form as a story. So, 
when that story is told, you see that idea within yourself and you can make sense out of it. 

The stimulation: this gate has a great deal to do with our ability to advance as a civilization. That is, we 
collect more and more information out of our experiences. We code that information and put it into books 
and computers so that every single generation benefits from the experiences of the previous generation. 
There are no other animals like that. This is something very unique in us. This is a process that comes out 
of this gate. 

It says, in the Book of Letters: Manifestation as a verbal description of realization or not. What has been 
realized at the mental level then can be verbalized. Above the lines in the black book it says: Stability 
through movement. This is something very important to understand about the nature of ideas. The channel 
1 1/56 is the channel of Curiosity. It is a design of a searcher and a seeker. There is nothing in it that says 
that it is the design of finding the truth. It doesn't say: This is a design of finding an absolute. It is the 
design of a searcher and a seeker, and anybody who has that channel is going to spend their whole life 
searching and seeking because that is exactly what they do, no matter what they find. So, stability through 
movement. The moment one recognizes that ideas and beliefs and stimulation are transitory, that is the 
moment that you are seeing the true nature of what this gate is. 

The perpetuation of continuity through the linking of short term activity. Ideas are there to be explored, to 
be shared. They are there to be able to stimulate others. Don't get stuck in this mental process of saying "I 
have an idea," or that an idea is supposed to turn into what you invest your money in, your heart in, your 
life in. It is not about that. This is a gate of pure stimulation, to communicate to the other the story that 
you have, whatever that story may be. "You know what happened to me yesterday?" That is the 56th gate, 
and you can believe it or not. 

56.1 Quality 

This first line is called Quality. We know that all first lines are introspective by their very nature. Here, 
you get the essence of what stimulation is all about. 

Moon exalted. The practical sense that even short term activities should be of value. What that is really 
saying is here in the white book: Expression of practical ideas that have value. This is all about using this 
capacity to stimulate others with ideas that are of value, reflections that are of value and not just any old 
thing. The 56 just wants to stimulate. After all, it is not aware. It is a throat mechanic. What it needs to do 
is to constantly stimulate. But the reality is that the feedback is necessary. You need those who are really 
interested in that, who will believe in that, who will be stimulated by that. So, the importance is that 
whatever you are stimulating with should have value itself. The other thing is that when you are working 
with an idea, when you are overtaken by an idea, you have to go through the whole idea before you can 
jump and go to the next one. That is the other side of the coin. 

Mars in detriment. Whenever you see Mars, you know that you have a certain level of immaturity that 
exists. So on the other side of this line, there is a lot of immaturity built into that process of stimulation. 
"Let me stimulate you. Don't you believe me? This is me." There is the need to have the collective accept 
that process, and the Mars is: The ego drive to make an impression that will misuse energy in trivial 
pursuits. This is somebody who does not care what the quality of the concept is. They are only interested 
in getting out their stimulation and they try to stimulate people with anything, just to be able to get this 
feedback. 

In the white book: The drive to stimulate that will express any idea, no matter how trivial. Understand that 
this is the basis of what stimulation is all about. On one side, there is this clear recognition that the only 
things worth stimulating others with are things of value. There is no point telling somebody about this 
great idea of thermo-nuclear physics if it does not mean anything to them. It has to be of value to them; 
otherwise, you are not successfully going to stimulate them. 

But the tendency in this gate is simply to want to stimulate for the sake of stimulating. This is always 
going to run into difficulties because first lines do not know anything about the other side. The 56 wants 
to be able to stimulate but it does not really understand the idea in the first place. It just wants to be able 
to stimulate. This is why 56's become the great believers and disbelievers. They go through this whole 
process of belief and disbelief. The moment that they are trying to get people to believe in their 
stimulation, they discover that they themselves do not believe in it. The moment that you get into the 
trivial side of stimulation, you are always running into backlash from people because they are not going to 
believe you. 

56.2 Linkage 

The 56th hexagram contains two lines that use the word 'genius.' Genius is mentioned six times out of 384 
lines, so there is a great potential for the very unusual. Both of these lines, the second and the fifth, are in 
resonance to each other and they are both exalted by Uranus. There is an extraordinary quality of 
unusualness that can exist in this stimulation and it can be of enormous value at a deep intellectual level. 

Whenever we are dealing with a second line, always remember that these first three lines are not well 
equipped to deal with the other side. The other side in this case is the idea itself. 

When you are dealing with the second line, you are always dealing with projection. Every second line that 
you have is projecting the quality of that hexagram out into the world, but you do not necessarily have the 
depth. First lines are always busy finding their foundation, but second lines are just projecting it out with 
no way of looking inside. 

Think about what that is like for somebody who is a stimulator. If you have the 56.2, you are always 
projecting out that you can stimulate others. So they come into your aura waiting to be stimulated and 
either you can or you can't. You don't really know. You are just projecting out this field in you to others 
that you are the one that can stimulate them. Maybe you can; maybe you can't. 

Linkage. Uranus exalted. Isolated genius that will eventually find continuity through recognition and 
support. It is isolated because this is a genius for stimulation in which the awareness or depth is unknown. 
Here is somebody that has a gift within them, potentially, to be very stimulating for others, but they do 
not really know that they have that gift. And it may not happen now and not tomorrow, it may show up 
sometime, somewhere down the track. It can happen three days before you die, when you are 92; or it can 
happen right away. 

It also means that it is something that will occur. The person that has the second line, that is projecting 
outwards, they really need somebody to come into their aura, recognize their gift and say, "Wow. You can 
really stimulate others," and the second line will say, "Really? Do you think so?" Because they do not 
know that they have that depth. 

In the white book: A genius for stimulating expression that will take time to mature and will need others 
to recognize it. What that means is if you have a child that has the 56.2, you need to recognize that you 
need to encourage them to see that they have this power to stimulate. Otherwise, they get found out at an 
early age and they can forever hold back that gift within them. Anytime that you see a second line in 
somebody's chart, you know that is a place where you can go to them and provide them with what they 
need, that is, the recognition that what they are projecting out is also real underneath. These people do not 
know that. They recognize their own projection going out but they do not really know, and underneath 
that can lie a great deal of insecurity. 

The Moon in detriment. Asuperficiality... (Again, this is a projected field. There is no genuine depth in 
that.) ...which collapses under recognition and is eventually forced to move on. The inability to know 
whether you can really stimulate others or not always puts that person in that position of having that test. 
Somebody comes and says, "Okay, stimulate me. Go ahead. I dare you." If you can't, of course, there is 
the collapse. 

A gift for communicating, but not enough depth. So the 56.2's have to recognize that it will take them 
time to be able to really be secure in their communicating gift. The best for them, by the way, is the 
resonance of the 1 1 .2 or 1 1 .5 in people or transits that they meet. 

56.3 Alienation 

When you get to the third line, to the completion of the lower trigram, you are dealing with the concept or 
terminology of adaptation. Everything about the nature of the third line is about the recognition that it 
involves a process that we call trial and error. This is a wave of bonds made or broken, and this is the 
learning process in life. Nothing distinguishes the third line more than this process of: you can't do it. It 

does not work. You try it again in another way. It does not work. You go through this process of trial and 
error. 

Here the trial and error is called Alienation. It says: Determined self-sufficiency. Understand something. 
It is very difficult for somebody with the 56th gate to be self-sufficient. They are dependent on the ideas 
and the concepts coming from the 11th gate and they are forced to adapt. Yet, at the same time, the 56th 
gate, because it is a metamorphic gate in the throat, needs to be the one that does the expressing. The self- 
sufficiency in the third line is, "I want to be the one that does the speaking." This is the need to be the 
stimulator. There still is not a clear understanding that there is something on the other side of the channel 
that they are going to have to make a deal with, that they are going to have to work out an arrangement 
with. There is still this inner sense of simply, "I am a stimulator and, because of that, I do not want 
anybody to interfere with my stimulation." Out of that comes all this trial and error. 

Sun exalted. A will and egoism that often proves overbearing and guarantees continued isolation. Here, 
this is acceptable, given the Sun's intrinsic vitality. Or, as the white book says: The drive to control and be 
the focus of expression. It is very clear to the 56.3 that they can really express themselves and stimulate 
others, but they do not want to be interfered with because the moment that they are interfered with, they 
have to start all over again. "Ah, I can't do it this way. I have to do it that way. I can't stimulate them this 
way. I will stimulate them that way." Because they want to do it their own way, they often offend other 
people who are there as part of their process. 

On the other side of this, Venus in detriment. The reversed aesthetic that offends others, ensures isolation 
and eliminates support. "I do the talking here. I do the stimulating here, and not you. Don't interfere with 
my stimulation. Don't interfere with my belief system. You don't believe in me? Then I don't want to have 
anything to do with you. You are wrong and I am right." The mistakes that are made out of concepts: 
there are so many people running around who have ideas in their head that they really think are absolutes. 
If they have the third line, they will stand there and scream as loud as they can, "Marx is great." He had 
the 11th gate. Very nice. But the reality is that they can scream so loud and not hear, not take in from 
others, so that they can really offend others. 

My constant warning to you: Do not get caught up in making a moralistic judgment about whether this 
line is good or bad. It is not about that. It is a process. The third line has a resonance in the sixth line, 
which has a potential for wisdom. Wisdom can only come about through trial and error as a process in 
life. If you never make mistakes in this life, you can never be wise. That is a basic formula. 

This third line, though it may alienate a lot of people, the person that is doing all the alienating may 
eventually get to a point of real wisdom about what to stimulate and what not to stimulate with. They 
finally learn how to adapt to others. The first three lines are always at this disadvantage that they are not 
transpersonal. They do not really understand what is on the other side. They have to go through their own 
process and in that they can always be alienating. 

People who have the first line, you do not really know whether they are there or not. They are not 
showing you anything out of that first line. You have to go digging for that. They are into their own 
process. The second line is pushing all this out but you do not know what is underneath and they are not 
capable of that. The third line is ready to adapt but it does not know what to adapt to because it does not 
know where it is going to come from. They are involved in their own 
processes. 

The drive to control the expression at the expense of stimulation. "Don't interfere with me. I will not tell 
you anything unless you are quiet." A friend of mine, many years ago, was a teacher and he had the 56.3. 
He was the kind of person who will stand in front of a class and say, "If you are not quiet, I will not teach 

you." This is the 56.3. You have to control everything first and some people do not want to be controlled. 
"I will not be quiet. I am not interested in what you have to say. You are not very interesting." And all of 
a sudden, that person has to adapt and they do not want to adapt. They want to be in control and start 
screaming, "Shut up. I am talking." It can be quite a process until they learn." 

Every time that you see the collective channels being completely defined in the mind, you know that these 
people are close to being impossible in terms of trying to get through their fixedness. That is their gift 
after all: they are here to have both ends fixed and they have a very specialized process but, because of 
that, it is very hard to get in. It takes time. It will be a longer process for them to be able to go through an 
adaptation. If you have the 56.3 connected to the 11, it is difficult for you to learn to adapt because you 
are so fixed on your own ideas that you are not open to the possibility of adaptation. 

56.4 Expediency 

Now, we come to the fourth line in the upper trigram. The 1 1 .4 is called The Teacher and it is an exalted 
line. Our evolutionary process was changed by a mutation that took place in the axis of the 11.4 and the 
12.4. The 12.4 is The Prophet, the arousing of the stagnant. It opened up the communicating capability in 
our throat. The opposition to that is the 1 1 A, The Teacher. 

This line is broken up into three possibilities: the teacher, the guru and the sage: all of the possibilities for 
being able to communicate philosophical and conceptual ideas. Here, when you are looking at the fourth 
line, you are looking at the direct resonance to this very important line of being able to teach. In the fourth 
line, we are dealing with a process of externalization. This is the beginning of a process that is 
transpersonal. The fourth line realizes that there is an idea on the other end and, in order for the 56.4 to be 
a good stimulator, they have to be able to handle the idea at the other end and externalize it. This 
externalization is about being focused and being very clear that this is the thing that you have to push 
across. They can be really one -tracked in their process. 

The other thing to recognize about all fourth lines is that they are rooted in the concept of opportunism. 
All fourth lines only get to externalize at the right moment and if they try to externalize with the wrong 
timing, it does not really work very well for them because they are very fixed. 

This fourth line is called Expediency. The perfection of the superficial personality that can mask, when 
essential, its true feelings to secure protection. Imagine that the 56 is a microphone and the 1 1 with the 
ideas is the voice. The microphone is not interested in taking on the persona of the 1 1 . It is a mask. It is 
simply going to release the information. It is very important to understand that in this fourth line is the 
ultimate storyteller who tells stories as a role. It is superficial. This is somebody that is just a good 
storyteller and in that role of being a storyteller, they can stimulate you and get the idea across. 

If I were to do the chart of Jesus, if that was possible, I am sure that I would find the 56.4 because this is 
the line of telling parables, of telling stories to get your message across. It is not that you believe in your 
own story. Please understand that. There is an old joke about a family sitting together and the father is 
telling a story, and the child finally interrupts and it says, "Papa, is this true?" and this mother slaps him 
on the back of his head and says, "Don't interrupt your father. 

He is telling a story." The magic of this line is: do not believe your own story. Recognize what the story is 
for. The story is a delivery system. To be the storyteller is a mold to deliver it. 

Mercury in detriment. Expedient behavior whose price is a constant stressful alertness and nervous 
anxiety in fear of losing what has been gained. These people believe in their own stories. Instead of telling 

a story to stimulate you, they will put themselves into that story, a lie in that sense, and believe that story 
themselves. These are the kind of people that get caught up in all of that. 

The role as reality. The fear of silence and of being uncovered. In other words, these are people that will 
use storytelling to try to make sure that everybody notices who they are. And because they use 
storytelling to be noticed, they will lie in that storytelling. They go in for their job and they say, "Yes, I 
have done this for many years and I know this very well," and in that moment of doing that they believe it 
themselves. After all, this is all about believing. 

Those people that get caught up in their own story and start believing in their own story always end up 
being challenged. There is no question about that. And those who simply come out with the storytelling as 
the way to get the information across show the other side of the capacity. In both cases you have people 
that must stimulate others, and this is the underlying force. It is a fourth line. It is a line of externalization. 
It is a driving force in their process. The key is: wait for the opportunities. That is true for every fourth 
line. 

56.5 Attracting attention 

Everything about these gates of primary communication is not to forget that that is what they are. They 
are not gates of action. They are only gates of communication. What happens so often to people who have 
a gift to stimulate is that they think that this gift automatically means the ability to turn it into action. That 
is not true. The gift of being able to stimulate, to tell stories and the value of the 56 is about sharing what 
it is to be human with others. Our whole mental process is so that we can come to grips with what it is to 
be a human being and live in this world. It is not about dictating what we do. Every time I do somebody's 
reading, I am always telling people the same thing. The mind can't tell you what to do. It does not matter 
whether it is defined or undefined, connected to the throat or not. It does not make any damn difference. It 
is not going to be able to tell you what to do and it is never going to work for you. The mind does not do 
that. That is not its job. Its job is not to tell us what to do but to examine the nature of our doing, to look at 
our process. 

This stimulation is not about getting people to do something. It is there to share in the awareness of what 
it is to be human. That is what it is about. Because we live on the mental plane and all of you have been 
deeply conditioned to think that what you think is what you should do, or what you would like to think is 
what you would like to do and all of the things that go with it, we end up in this horrible place in which 
human beings don't live out what they do, and they take these ideas seriously as a game plan for life. "I 
have this wonderful idea. Why don't we all jump off this side of the bridge and see how many of us 
survive?" Well, very nice. An idea is not necessarily something that requires any kind of doing. Ideas are 
about stimulating each other about the nature of what it is to be here in the world. 

When you get to the fifth line, you get to universalization. The way the world sees this gate of stimulation 
is that they see it as something that attracts attention, and that's what it does. This is the line of Attracting 
attention. Here, again we have the resonance to the second line. In the second line we see that all second 
line people are projecting out without necessarily knowing the depth underneath, and all fifth line people 
are being projected on. If you are a 56.5, every time that somebody comes into your aura, their projection 
is that you are a storyteller. That may or may not be true, but that is their projection on you. Their 
projection is that you are the stimulator, you are the storyteller. 

You know what this is like. You have a dinner party and you want to make sure that somebody is there 
who keeps everybody talking. You will always pick a fifth line because they are the ones you project on. 
"This one is okay. This one is very stimulating." It is a projection but that does not mean that underneath 
that projection is no power. If you have a fifth line, wherever it is, the outside world will project onto that. 

That means something very special. What that means is that the outside will give you an opportunity to 
tell your story and if you are a lousy storyteller, too bad. But the outside world will give you that 
opportunity because they will project on you that you are the stimulator and that you have a story to tell 
them. 

Uranus exalted. Unusualness, innovation and sometimes genius as guarantees of eventually attracting 
attention and support. The opportunity is always there. Genetically, it is built in. This is, after all, a 
stimulating, storytelling gate. The capacity is there. It just may not be the right stimulation, but 
nonetheless, everybody is going to come and project on that. In the white book: Stimulation at its most 
innovative and unusual. 

Mars in detriment: All too often a tendency to attract attention that is self-defeating in its effects. What 
happens so often, when you go through the lines and these kinds of statements, is that we take them into 
our minds in the context of our lives at the present time. But please understand that this is a process of 
coming into the world, being born with this kind of a line and going through the development of your 
infancy, your childhood, your whole aging process. It can be very difficult when you are a child because 
everybody projects on you. This is the kind of child (with the 56.5) that comes into the classroom late and 
starts to give an excuse of why they are late, and the teacher is not going to believe it. The teacher will 
project onto this child: this child is a storyteller and it may or may not tell me the truth. You have to have 
a really good story. So, this projection gives you an opportunity but at the same time, it can pull the rug 
out from underneath your feet. That is the other side to see about it. 

Every time that you have a fifth line, you have to recognize that the more you mature into the nature of 
that hexagram (it takes time, all these processes take time), you get to a point where, at that moment of 
projection on you, you are genuinely ready to respond. There is a gift that lies in here but there is always 
that pressure of projection. This is a line where it is very difficult for people who are intrinsic liars. The 
moment you have an intrinsic genetic liar, and we have gates that bring out this quality, then you have 
somebody that will be projected on all of their life that they are just simply a storyteller and they are not 
to be believed. After all, nothing the 5 wants more than to be believed. "Do you believe me? Please, 
believe in me." They want you to believe in them and everybody who comes to these people wants to 
believe in them. "I want to believe that you are telling me the truth but my projection says that you are 
lying." This is part of the process that the 5 has to deal with. 

The power of stimulation to provoke and disturb. The moment that you have a projected force on you, 
people come with their projection, which means that they do not see you; so, depending on what you 
bring back to them, they can be made quite uncomfortable in that process. Everything about what we 
consider stimulation is hooked into this. We have the tradition throughout our history of the traveling 
storyteller. Now, we live in the world of online and internet storytelling, of television and film, which is 
all part of this archetype of attracting attention. 

56.6 Caution 

When you get to the sixth line, you get to the end of a process. This sixth line, like all sixth lines, does not 
really have anything to do with the hexagram itself. It is already beyond that process. It is like the roof of 
a house. You are looking out over the top and you do not get to see anymore what is inside because you 
have been through that process and you are looking out for what is beyond all that. When you are dealing 
with a gate of stimulation and you come to the sixth line, that is somebody who may stimulate you or not. 

The frequency wave of all sixth lines is a wave that we call trust or not. It is about trust. Every sixth line 
is no longer simply interested in what is the harmonic gate at the other end of the channel but all sixth 
lines are looking at the entire process. They are looking towards the whole circuit. They are not just 

interested in an idea, they want to know where the ideas will go, what it will cost in terms of time, energy 
and spirit. What kind of change and crisis will it bring? Will it bring success of not? Can it have a 
beginning, a middle and an end? Is it really worthwhile doing it? The sixth line is caught up in trying to 
see: is it really worth it? Why should I bother to stimulate anyone if that stimulation is not going to get to 
this and that? 

When you come to the abstract process, you come to a process rooted in expectation. Every time you look 
at somebody's chart and you see a gate that is part of the abstract circuit, you know right away that in that 
gate, you have all this expectation. It is the expectation that if I do this, I am going to get that. This 
expectation can be a very painful process because there is absolutely no guarantee whatsoever, that if you 
do step 1, 2, 3 and 4, they will give you your reward. The 56.6 says, "I know. I really do. If I stimulate, I 
do expect to have this and that and, quite frankly, from my experience, I don't see that because every time 
I stimulate it goes like this or that, but it does not really bring all of that." So when you get to the sixth 
line, it is not like you are saying, "Aha, here is somebody that is going to stimulate us." Maybe they never 
say a word to you. Instead of this being someone that can express, "I believe", they may believe in 
nothing at all because they are looking for something else. They are looking for more than just simply 
another idea. What is built into this is the fact that this line, more than any other line, is open to every 
single kind of idea that you can imagine. Everything. Open to the whole field of possible stimulation and 
due to that, they may stimulate nothing at all. 

Caution. The prudence, when linkage has been achieved, to honor its new commitments in order to secure 
its footing. Literally, what that says is that the moment you connect to an idea, if you are really going to 
stimulate with that, you have to stay with the whole process. You have to go through the whole thing. 
You have to see how the whole thing works out. 

Honesty in expression. Living by one's word. It is very difficult to be an abstract person and to live by 
your word. This is somebody that wants to be able to know that what they are telling other people to 
believe in, they believe in themselves. If you go to the 10.6, you see that in all sixth lines the hidden 
behavior is always about the question, "Are we hypocrites, or not? How can we be a role model if we are 
hypocritical in that role?" This sixth line here is dealing with the same process. "I am not just going to 
stimulate somebody because I can. I will stimulate them with something that is true to my own spirit, so 
that I am not a hypocrite." Very hard to do because ideas are unstable by their very nature. It is not easy to 
find an idea that you can live with. You look in your lives and see how many ideas have survived that you 
have carried inside of you. They come and they go. The 56.6 knows this. 

At the other end of this, you have Pluto in detriment. A very powerful Pluto transit and we have all kinds 
of people from 1939 to 1941 that carry this Pluto in 56. The profound unconscious wanderer, where 
external yearning for acceptance will unconsciously release the exact energy that creates rejection. A 
difficult role, where the self is unknown and not recognized with predictable results. In the white book: 
Wandering throughout the life from one expression to the next, unable to find the stimulation that one 
could live by. 

Every single person that carries this energy, they will travel their whole life through every kind of 
possible idea. They will go through everything to try to find the one idea that they can really live with. 
Until then, other than when they are young, they will stop stimulating other people with these ideas. 
When they get to a point where they recognize that no idea is good enough for them, they become anti- 
stimulating. Somebody comes up to them and says, "I have this great idea," and the 56.6 answers, "I have 
heard it. I am not interested. I know that stuff. I know that philosophy. I know that school of thought. I 
know those ideas. I know that way. It is not something that I can live with." 

Living with it does not mean living with it in the moment; it is about being able to live with it throughout 
your life because you have to constantly go back and reflect on it, to see clearly that it has been of value 
for you. There are so many people I know of that generation (around 1940) who have gone through so 
many concepts in their process, and so many of them end up deeply disillusioned because they get to this 
sense that there is no idea that they can really live by because ideas are, by their very nature, transitory. 

When you get to the sixth line, you can see the magic of the wheel. When you get to the 56.6, you are 
moving in the wheel to the 31.1. The next gate you come to is the gate of Influence, a logical gate to 
guide humanity and order humanity into the future. The 56.6 is an abstract gate, designed to reflect on the 
past; that sixth line is saying, "I do not want ideas. I want something that I can live by, so that I can 
stimulate others and have a valid influence on their lives in the future." 

This is where the great confusion comes from. So many people think that ideas are things that we need to 
have in the future. Ideas are there to examine the past. Only logic can project into the future. The abstract 
is there to reflect on the post, and this 56.6 is sitting on that cusp and it is saying, "Yes, but these ideas 
that come out of my past experience, unless they are of value to humanity in the future, unless they are of 
value to me in the future, I am not going to be involved with any of them. They step out of the idea 
business. 

You can also see this magic because you go from a primary gate of communication in the 56.6 to a 
primary gate of identity in the 31.1. The 56.6 is deeply concerned about its identity because only ideas 
that are really of value in life allow them to have an intellectual identity that feels good. It goes 
immediately to a gate of identity and trying to find that identity. This is why idea people always want to 
be leaders. They are not equipped. 

The frequency wave of all sixth lines is a wave that we call trust or not. It is about trust. Every sixth line is no 
longer simply interested in what is the harmonic gate at the other end of the channel but all sixth lines are 
looking at the entire process. They are looking towards the whole circuit. They are not just interested in an idea, 
they want to know where the ideas will go, what it will cost in terms of time, energy and spirit. What kind of 
change and crisis will it bring? Will it bring success of not? Can it have a beginning, a middle and an end? Is it 
really worthwhile doing it? The sixth line is caught up in trying to see: is it really worth it? Why should I bother to 
stimulate anyone if that stimulation is not going to get to this and that? 

When you come to the abstract process, you come to a process rooted in expectation. Every time you look at 
somebody's chart and you see a gate that is part of the abstract circuit, you know right away that in that gate, 
you have all this expectation. It is the expectation that if I do this, I am going to get that. This expectation can 
be a very painful process because there is absolutely no guarantee whatsoever, that if you do step 1, 2, 3 and

Honesty in expression. Living by one's word. It is very difficult to be an abstract person and to live by

Every single person that carries this energy, they will travel their whole life through every kind of

HEXAGRAM 57 THE GENTLE 

So we move to the individual process and in doing so, we come to what is described in the Rave I'Ching 
as an extraordinary gate. The heading over the lines of the 57th hexagram is: The extraordinary power of 
clarity. The 57th gate, like all the other gates that are part of the integration process, is by its very nature 
much more complex than the other gates. The 57th gate represents the primary awareness of the 
integration channel and therefore, the 57 with the 34 is the awareness that establishes the archetype of 
being human. It is the 57 that establishes the nature of our Perfected Form when connected to the 10th 
gate, which is our design for survival, so it is the awareness for our survival. When the 57 is connected to 
the 20th hexagram, it is penetrating intuitive awareness in the now. 

Everything about the individual process is acoustic. In the 28th gate, the potential, we have the fear of 
death and this deep need to struggle for whether life is worthwhile, or not. When you come to the 57th 
hexagram, we find the fear of tomorrow. Out of this fear of tomorrow and out of this acoustic field comes 
an awareness that tells us so much about what it is to stay alive because the 57th gate is really all about 
that: the awareness to stay alive. It is the gate of intuitive clarity and the possibility is the awareness to 
struggle for clarity, or not. It is still carrying the struggle from the 28/38 with it. 

Real clarity can only exist in the now for this gate and after all, it is only half of the channel. It does not 
have the 20th gate at the other end. The awareness possibility is individuation, self consciousness, and the 
existential ear, the right ear. This is the ear that hears in the now. This whole process that we are going to 
look at in the 57th gate, please understand that it is in terms of what it is to stay alive as a human being. 
That awareness is essential. This is the gate that leads to that door. 

This is individual circuitry, so please remember that the real key to individual survival will be in the third 
and fourth line because they carry individual themes. In the first two lines, we are looking at survival that 
has a tribal quality to them. 

57.1 Confusion 

When we are looking at the first line, it is called Confusion. Here is our line of introspection. Isn't it 
interesting that the 28.1 was called Preparation? The preparation leads to confusion. How nice. 

Venus exalted. The gift of penetrating to the inner meaning that ensures timely action. This is a deeply 
misunderstood line. This gift of penetrating to the inner meaning: there is no inner meaning here. There is, 
but it is lymphatic inner meaning and it will not come to you in any kind of language that your mind 
understands. This penetrating to the inner meaning is simply the ability to recognize that your intuition is 
there and operating, and let it do its job. This line can be very difficult for the people who have it. These 
people need to learn to see that their intuition really works. You have to figure it out in introspection. You 
have to see that your intuition really does work for you. 

The Moon in detriment, where feelings are no substitute for clarity and can lead to indecision. Emotions. 
The 57 is called The Gentle and awareness can be very profound and penetrating and not so gentle. The 
first thing that the 57th gate knows is that its process of The Gentle is very weak. Our immune system can 
be overwhelmed at any given time by the emotional system. The moment that the emotions are dictating 
survival is the moment that there is real confusion. There is no detail at this level, which means that they 
are not listening, which means that they are not hearing and therefore, they will be immediately in danger. 

In the white book: The possibility of the intuition penetrating to the inner meaning. That is just saying that 
the intuition can penetrate to the inner meaning. It is not that you get to know the inner meaning. You get 
the response out of the system. It knows in the moment. This is a gate of knowing. 

The other side is: The possibility that confusion will overpower the intuition. If you do not rely on your 
intuition, if you are somebody who has a defined splenic system and you do not rely on your splenic 
system, it will always be overpowered. That is why first line people, in this particular case, because it is 
very complex with the three different connections, need to recognize that they have to begin to trust their 
intuition instead of saying three days later, "I knew it." 

The moment that you trust it, you see that it is getting to the inner meaning and then you do not have to 
allow these other processes to get in the way. I have a very powerful intuition and I never paid any 
attention to it until I went through my process. I was one of these people who would always say, "I knew 
that," but it was always after. If you have a defined splenic system and you have the first line, this is a 
place where you really have to go to work and say, "Okay, I have to let it show me that it can penetrate to 
the inner meaning," in order to learn what intuition really is. 

Remember, this is the beginning of the hexagram process and the first thing that it is saying to you is that 
people have a very hard time (this is the foundation) recognizing the power of the intuition even when 
they have it, because it is weak. 

57.2 Cleansing 

Here we come to projection. So you do not have the introspection. This line is called Cleansing. The 
clarity to establish proper values and ideals must be accompanied by resolute determination to maintain 
them. The establishment of proper values and ideals is not mental. It is not thought-out. If you have this 
line, your values and ideals come out intuitively. They are coming out so that you can project them 
outwards to the other side, to the 20, in this case. 

Venus exalted. Perfected cleansing through inner realization. Look at the 28.2 which is called Shaking 
hands with the devil. This is the potential of this line. After you have shaken hands with the devil and had 
your alliance, then you can come to the 57 and say, "Okay, now I know what my proper values are 
supposed to be." Every struggle will change your morality. Somebody who will struggle with you and 
show you that life is of value, they may change your morality about the nature of what you thought about 
those people and what they are. 

Out of the second line, there is always a potential to project out these values and ideals, but they are not 
thought-out. This is why people are uncomfortable with their intuition sometimes. Those values and 
ideals are not a mental construct. They are coming out of you to keep you alive, after all. 

Moon in detriment. A superficial cleansing that tends to hide the dirt underneath the carpet. This is a very 
funny line, but it is so true. I know so many people who have this line and when I read this part of the line 
they start to giggle because that is really what they do. What is in you is in you. It is there. One of the 
things to recognize about the mundane level is it is all very obvious: sweeping the dirt underneath the 
carpet. The other level to that is not being ready to accept the values and ideals that are being projected 
out of your own system. In other words, having your own morality that says, "No, no my mind says that is 
not right. I will sweep that under the carpet. I will sweep me under the carpet and I will try to be 
something else that I am not." 

The possibility for proper values and ideals through intuition. Not through thinking, not through feeling, 
but spontaneously through intuition. The possibility that the depth of the intuition will be treated 
superficially. Jiirgen had a client with this line in the detriment. She was a stewardess and that was what 
she did between landing and the new departure. She had only a little time to clean everything, so she hid 
the dirt. 

57.3 Acuteness 

Third lines and fourth lines carry individual themes, and we are dealing with an individual process here in 
the 57th gate. This third line is of special significance. It is one of the nine hexagrams in which there is a 
singularity instead of a polarity. It is called Acuteness. There is no detriment. 

It has Mercury exalted. The perfected intelligence, where clarity eliminates doubt and ensures 
manifestation. Third lines are about adaptation. This is the capacity to adapt to life. This is the survival of 
the species. This is the ability to adapt in the now to life, to the threat of life, to the potentials of being 
alive, to the potentials of the Perfected Form, to the potentials of Penetrating Awareness. All of that is 
rooted in the third line as a capacity. By the way, it is still a third line, which means it can be very 
irresponsible. It can adapt for itself, for its own survival, while leaving others behind, while not caring for 
others, while not adapting to be able to look after them as well. 

The third line is the first attempt of going to the other side and, in doing so, it gets the glory that the 57 
looks for. "I am afraid of tomorrow and now I am in the now, and in the now there is no tomorrow. In no 
tomorrow I am alive and everything about my consciousness says, 'This is correct. I am alive. "The reality 
is that this Acuteness, though it is a very beautiful line, is for the individual alone. But the moment that 
that has something to do with anybody else, this is not so nice. This is individual adaptation. It is an 
individual theme and can be coldly cruel in ignoring the needs of others. They are part of the great 
disappearing act. If they disappear, follow them. They will survive. 

57.4 The Director 

'v a come to the upper trigram and have the resonance to the first line. The fourth line is called The 
Director. The mastery of relationships that through clarity can maximize productivity, while the 
sensitivity to inter-relationships will ensure harmony. 

Here lies the intuition to be able to stay alive through a need for others. These are people that are always 
going to be dependent on others to keep them alive so that they can get their form. The 57 needs the 10, 
the 20 and the 34. Due to its externalization quality, everything about the fourth line is that it is deeply 
focused and fixed in one area. These people are fixed on the relationship. They are fixed on being able to 
deal with their fear of tomorrow by intuitively recognizing how to handle their relationships with others. 
This is by its nature very selfish. Because it is a fourth line, it resonates to the emotional wave of 
kindness/meanness and brotherhood/sisterhood. It resonates to the awareness field of Corruption. Think 
about this, what it actually means. The fourth line, The Director, is definitely a skill. It is an intuitive 
capacity to work with people in order to be able to survive in the now. 

Mars in detriment. A tendency to be dictatorial rather than directorial. This goes back to the individual not 
wanting to be led. This is an individual that says, "Yes, you do this. If you do not do this, the boat sinks." 
They are interested in being able to stay alive. 

The possible intuitive clarity to master relationships. For the benefit of survival, for the benefit of getting 
to the now, for the benefit of getting the energy of the 34. 

On the other side: With such a gift, the possibility of being intuitively dictatorial. Intuitively dictatorial is 
not being able to say, "Stop thatl" or, "Blame them." It is not a mental concept. Many people who have 
this line may end up feeling very guilty in their life because they hear themselves being intuitively 
dictatorial in the moment, and they wonder why they are like that because they do not really know. 
Everything that you see in the line, you will get. When you have the detriment of this line, you will be 

intuitively dictatorial and that is all subjective. These people are like that because it is not up to them to be 
able to survive. So the whole thing is that they are always convinced that they need others to help them to 
survive, and in that moment they tell people what to do in order that they can survive. The rest may 
survive too but they are only interested in themselves. It is individual. "You keep your finger in the dike." 

57.5 Progression 

In the fifth line, we change from an individual theme to a collective theme and in doing so, we find the 
opportunity to bring survival techniques or survival awareness from the individual to the collective. 
Remember that the individual is always mutating the collective. I know this line intimately because I have 
my personality Earth in there, and I get my grounding there. 

It is called Progression. The natural ability to establish new forms while maintaining the powers of re- 
evaluation and re-examination. This provides the clarity to examine the data and assess the process. This 
is all at the intuitive level. It is at an intuitive level that one can recognize forms that can allow the 
collective to survive. It is what it is rooted in. 

In the detriment: The tendency to keep on keeping on that can end up as a misguided missile. When in 
action, the intuition may become overwhelmed and unable to assess and evaluate its progress. I am a 
single definition doer. What happened to me in my life is that once I got into action, I would forget all 
about where my intuition would guide me because the intuition can be overpowered all the time. I 
watched that with the Moon, when it comes once a month. When the Moon is in this line my intuition 
gets blinded. Whatever my body, my physical process is into gets overwhelmed. That is neither good nor 
bad. In those moments, obviously, it is not for me to know. 

Lines that are positive or negative in terms of the language: that does not mean that they are in reality. 
You live out your own nature and you discover that everything in your own nature is exactly the way it 
should be. Now, I have Pluto sitting there at the other side and I am deeply involved in my intuitive 
process, which is just listening to it. This is the whole thing about understanding the nature of the whole 
intuitive system anyway. This is not a mind system. This is not a mind awareness. This is something that 
you can only witness. You can only experience what your intuition tells you and allow it to guide you, if 
that is your nature, your design. 

57.6 Utilization 

The roof of the house. The line of transition. The acceptance that clarity is a double-edged sword. There 
are situations where understanding cannot lead to rectification. Here, Uranus' innovative quality can 
generally make the best out of an otherwise difficult but rarely permanent situation. The intuition does not 
always give you an answer that is of any value. It does not always help. Your intuition can tell you 
something, it can lead you somewhere (anyone who has the sixth line will know that) but it won't always 
give you the answer. Due to that, it can lead to depression. 

All sixth lines can have this quality because they are looking for something much larger. They are not just 
looking to survive. They want to survive with a quality of life. They want life to be of value. They are 
looking to survive in their Perfected Form. They want to fulfill the nature of their Archetype. They are 
looking to be awake. All of that is part of the nature of the 57th gate. 

Mars in detriment. When clarity points' to a problem one is unable because of circumstances to solve, a 
tendency to anger and frustration that provokes inevitably hftile action. Both the 48th gate and the 57th 
gate carry in them the potential for frustration, the 48th gate much more than the 57th. The sixth line 
recognizes the nature of intuition (it is the completion of the process here in this line) and it knows that it 

cannot answer everything. It can be relied on to be your intuition but it cannot be relied on to be God. It 
does not have all the answers. This is deeply annoying to the sixth line and in those moments when the 
intuition cannot do that, there is this anger about tomorrow. 

Some people go through life angry about what tomorrow is going to be. Here is somebody who is not 
afraid of tomorrow. They are angry and frustrated that they have to deal with tomorrow. They are looking 
for the One-NightStand. They are looking for the magic. They are looking for something very special and 
their intuition cannot always give them that. 

These people are very likely to stop paying attention to their intuitive system. They easily deny that they 
have an intuition. They will tell you that it is their mind. I tell people with the sixth line, "You have a very 
good intuition," and they answer, "Yes, but it is my thinking." They have no idea where this is coming 
from because there is this sense of frustration that the intuition cannot guide them to the Holy Grail that 
all sixth lines are looking for. 

When you get to the next step for this sixth line, it is the 32nd hexagram first line: A life sustaining 
respect to all aspects of a process, the line of Conservation, to not be a failure. What the sixth line is 
ultimately looking towards is an intuition that will never fail it. That is why they get so angry and 
frustrated because the intuition will fail you. Your mind will fail you too. Your emotions will fail you. We 
are limited. 

HEXAGRAM 58 THE JOYOUS 

We are looking at the left side of the root center. Here, we have the root center going over to the splenic 
side. We have the original pressures that fuel our most basic awareness. The splenic system is the most

system. The moment that you look at the splenic system in terms of the capacity of our immune or 
lymphatic system to keep us clean, to keep us alive, to keep us healthy, then these three pressures that 
exist in the root center are of enormous importance to the well-being of what it is to be human. 

When you are moving from the root to the solar plex, the underlying theme beyond the obvious is sexual. 
When you are moving from the root center to the splenic, what you have beyond the obvious themes is 
caring. You have a totally different dimension here in terms of the pressure. It is the pressure to be aware, 
not the pressure to emote, not the pressure to release the emotional wave. It is the pressure to care and not 
the pressure to sexually bond. So it is a different process. 

In looking at the 58th gate, it is important to see that understanding, in the Human Design sense (the 
understanding circuit, the logical system), is universal in life. All life is dependent on order and patterns. 
These things must exist and we see that the understanding process of the logical circuitry is in all different 
forms of life. There is a great irony in the nature of what it is to be human. It is very easy for us to live out 
the experiential wave (the 36 is a motor gate going directly to the throat) but it is not so easy to manifest 
logical awareness. 

One of the most difficult things for human beings to be able to do is to manifest understanding. It is 
obvious when you look at the nature of the circuitry. The three logical gates that come out of the throat 
have no direct access to energy. If you go down the process of the channel of Talent, you come the 18/58 
and to the 58th gate. You come to the gate that is there to fuel the whole logical process, not in the sense 
of the format energy, but in the sense that this is the pure pressure to bring out experimentation. When 
you look at the 58th gate, recognize deeply what that energy is. It is a highly specialized energy available 
for logical experimentation to ensure a safe future for humanity. 

The 58th gate is there to provide a unique energy. It permits repetitive experimentation and without this 
energy, we would not test the formulas. Without this energy, we will never know for sure that a pattern is 
legitimate and can be of value to the totality. That is why the first line of the 58 is one of the loveliest 
lines in the I'Ching. This is the true beauty of life. Real love is the recognition of a pattern that provides 
security for the totality. This is collective love as a fuel that sits in the 58. It is the gate of vitality, the 
vitality or not. The Joyous is a beautiful name for the hexagram. The vitality is the energy to experiment. 
It is not aware. It is the life force which is focused on providing this energy for experimentation. 

58.1 Love of life 

The first line always gives you the foundation, the true nature of the hexagram. Here this line has the

Venus exalted. The very stimulation of the world is the basis of an aesthetic appreciation of its beauty and

There is no 58 that says, "Here is the energy. Let's go and try it." Everyone who is involved in a logical

This first line is the essence of what it is to make sure that humanity will have a viable future. There is no

58.2 Perversion 

Throughout my work in Design I discovered that there are so many people who read lines and find the 
subject of the lines very uncomfortable and think that their client will find the subject very uncomfortable 
too. They are really afraid to say anything and they are trying to figure out how to make it nice in order to 
not to offend their client. The first thing to understand about that is that the moment you think a line is 
negative, you (not your client) have a problem because lines are positive and negative, like all things. It is 
the way it is always going to be. The moment that you cannot see that there is another side, you are not 
seeing it clearly. 

The second thing is that if you have a line which is uncomfortable and you tell your client about this 
uncomfortable line, they will just nod their head because it is them. They know that. It is not that you 
shock them. The fact of the matter is that if you do a reading and you only give people the bad stuff, they 
are very happy. If you only give them the good stuff, they think that there is something wrong. Most 
human beings think that everything about them is at fault somewhere, and they are very happy to have 
negative aspects that they can project on. 

Let's look at a classic line, Perversion. We have our prejudices that are alive in the Maya through 
language, only through language. This is where our prejudices live in all things. Because we are binary 
and dualistic, we are designed to be prejudiced to be this or that. This is our nature. Understand that a 
term like 'perversion' carries with it a heavy negative framework. We have given the word 'perverse' an 

exclusively sleazy sexual connotation. This is part of what we have done to make this word 
uncomfortable. 

We know what second lines are all about. They project outwards. The 58.2 is projecting outwards, "I have 
the energy to enjoy giving this energy to any challenge of authority and any logical experiment." What 
this energy is given to can appear to be very perverse to a lot people. 

I have a friend who was with the German network television for forty years and he made his living doing 
documentaries, and he has the 58.2. During his reading, I got to the 58.2 and told him that this is the line 
of perversion and he started to giggle. He said: "Have you ever seen my documentaries?" He did what 
was considered a fine documentary on Joseph Beuys, who is pretty perverse himself. He loved it. He did 
not want to do documentaries about ordinary people that everybody was interested in. Once he was 
offered to do a documentary on a German politician and he refused it because he considered it boring. He 
was open to giving this energy, to projecting out that he would give energy, to anything because that is 
what the second line is all about. It is always ready to project out its capacity. The 58.2 says, "I will 
provide energy for any kind of process." What happens to these people is that they get offered a lot of 
weird things because they project out that they are open to anything. 

Sometimes they are paper tigers and they do not go through with it; they don't really like giving their 
joyous energy for that. Due to the projection, they often (logical people are desperate for that energy) get 
all kinds of people that never had access to energy before because they do not meet 58.2's every day. 
Thus, the 58.2 ends up providing their energy for unusual different forms of challenge to authority. 

It is our social morals because the collective stream is deeply moralistic. It knows what is right and 
wrong. This is a judgmental channel and, therefore, these people get judged as being perverse. Why do 
you give your energy to buy shoes, when you can feed starving babies? It is not about making a judgment 
about these people because they have this line. The moment that you explain to them what it is doing, 
telling them, "You are projecting out that your energy is available, and you get all kinds of people that 
bring strange things for you to put your energy to," they understand that because that is what their life has 
been about. 

Many of them get hooked on that because they get the outlet, they get their opportunity to see their energy 
move through. All the other logical people that are not getting access to energy start making judgments 
and say, "Why did you do that? You could do this and that with me. Why are you so perverse? I need 
your energy to do this that is so healthy and logical." Don't get caught up in being judgmental about the 
name of a line. Just see it for what it is. There are some great creative forces that are rooted in the 58.2. 
Without them, the collective would be very poor. We would only have committees for building roads.

On the other side of this line is Mars in detriment. The quality of fire is dependent on its fuel and subject

The energy for aliveness that is dependent on others for stimulation. They recognize very early that they

HEXAGRAM 59 DISPERSION 

We are now looking at two gates which are of considerable importance in our lives because they 
condition so much of our behavior. In the Rave chart, we have six different gates that are gates of roles. 
We have four role gates that come out of the G center: the 13, the 1, the 7, and the 10, and we have two 
role gates that come out %J the sacral center. This center acts as our genetic role generator. It is very 
important to understand that genetic roles are about what is necessary to satisfy the genetic need. It has 
nothing to do with the essence of the person, their mind or their feelings. It simply has to do with the 
genes themselves having their own imperative. 

As you will see, when we are looking at both the 59th gate and the 27th gate, we are looking at genetic 
strategies. They do not describe the person. They describe a role. It is very important to keep that in mind 
when you are looking at role gates. Role gates never describe the person, but only the role. 

These two gates out of the sacral center connect on either side to mechanisms that have a deep impact on 
our lives. The waves and the frequencies impact on us. The sixth gate is the solar plex center gate which 
generates what we call the emotional wave: six different archetypes of the emotional waves. The 50th 
hexagram in the splenic system generates six different awareness frequencies. 

These waves and frequencies operate through the lines and because of that, the wave that exists in the first 
line is going to be something that has a resonance to all other first and fourth lines. We have been looking 
at all of these different lines and we have gone through enough hexagrams now that you have this sense 
of what each of these steps is, from the one to the six. 

The thing to recognize is that these roles have a resonance. Every first line which sets the foundation and 
is introspective resonates to the role of pursuer and pursued. Every second line resonates to the wave of 
shyness/boldness. Think about the second line. It is projecting something out but it does not necessarily 
have any way of dealing with somebody who is coining at it. The shy-strategy is projecting all kinds of 
sexuality but still acting out the shyness role and bringing boldness into its life. Each of these roles has a 
resonance in each of these lines, and it does not matter whether you translate that sexually or mentally. 

All third lines are about bonds made and broken. That is the sexual role of coming together and going 
apart. It is also a role, as we have seen, that exists as a resonance in all third lines, where mistakes can be 
made as part of the process of trial and error. The role of the fourth line is the role of the confidante or 
not. This is all about friendship. This is all about being focused, one-directionally in just being able to 
externalize and make friends. The fifth line is the role of the seducer and the seduced. We have seen how 
the fifth line gets projected on. This one is a seducer. When you get to the sixth line and you get to the 
soul mate or not, you get to the theme of all sixth lines which is, "If it is not going to be the most 
wonderful thing in the world, why bother?" 

When we look here at the lines of the 59th gate, keep in mind that underneath lie these quintessential roles 
and they are strategy roles, and understand the nature of strategy. If you have somebody who has, for 
example, the fourth line, confidante or not, what that strategy is saying genetically is, "You are going to 
be restricted in your role to making friends with somebody before you can ever have a chance to make 
love to them." Not only is it saying that that will be the strategy, but what it is also saying is, "If you go 
through that process and first you make friends with that person and then finally become their lover, the 
child that you can produce is the right genetic combination because it is a genetic strategy. " It is not that 
the person themselves like that. I know so many people that have the 59.4, and they are always 
complaining about how it is impossible for them to have a one-night-stand, how it is impossible for them 
to meet somebody and just dissolve into a relationship. They have to go through this process. By being 

somebody's friend first, you have to hear about their lovers and their problems. You have to go through 
all that crap before you can finally get to the point of, "Okay, it is our turn now." 

It is just a strategy. It is not the being. Do not confuse roles with the being. What happens to us is that 
most of us who have produced children look around at the person we have produced the children with and 
say "Why?" The reality is that what our genetics demand, what our genetic say is necessary to produce a 
viable genetic mix for the next generation, may not be what your mind likes, may not be what your heart 
likes, may not be what your identity likes. This is so important when it comes to understanding resonance. 
Through resonance you can really see how you can work those things out in relationships by knowing 
how to meet people through the resonance. That is another story entirely. Anyway, these six roles 
underline the 59th hexagram. 

Above the lines of the 59th hexagram it says: The ability to break down barriers in order to achieve union. 
Every single one of these roles is designed to break down barriers. These are genetic strategies. They 
know exactly how to work. They have this ability to break down barriers. That is what they are there for. 

59.1 The Preemptive Strike 

Every single hexagram (and this is very funny but also sad, but it is how things work) is expressed as an 
essence through its first line. The first line is a foundation. Here we have the foundation of The 
Preemptive strike. 

The authority and vitality that in understanding purpose and direction, can recognize and eliminate 
barriers before they become impregnable. 'Preemptive strike' is a military term. It means that you get 
them before they get you. It also means: You get them before anybody else does. This is what I call the 
caveman line. You know these pictures of the caveman. He sees a beautiful woman, he takes out his club, 
racks her on the head and grabs her by her hair and drags her off to his cave. It is one of the things to 
understand about the nature of human union. The foundation of human union is that the strong 
overwhelms the weak. This is the nature of the basis of the union. It is why women of your generation 
living in this time in the world are confronted with so much hostility the moment that you assert strength 
rather than living out the archetype, the stereotype of yin weakness. This is all about the strong 
overwhelming the weak. 

Mercury in detriment. In this position, the ability and intelligence to recognize, but a deep indecisiveness 
about how and when to act. This is a first line and because of that, it knows that it is fertile. It knows that

resonance to wherever the sexuality is. For example, let's say that you are somebody who has a mind that

to think about partnership, is that it will think about it in this way. It is going to be 'the caveman 
mentality.' It is going to be: when I am strong and they are weak, I can get them. That is the nature of the 
first line. 

It also tells you something very intrinsic about how the human blood line, genetics, survives. It survives 
by the strong and the weak coming together, not the stereotype of strong and weak but the truth of strong 
and weak. This is the basis of keeping the genetic pool alive because if the weak are left to the weak, their 
offspring becomes weaker and weaker and eventually die off. This whole business is that the first line can 
look like violation at one level: there is physical and psychic rape in the first line. There is violation in the
