There can be this enormous imposition of this power on them, but at its core is the protection of the 
species. At the core is this underlying tribal support system that says, "We cannot leave the weak out 
there. We have to integrate the weak with the strong, so that the next generation is healthier." Not to allow 
the weak to continue reproducing without strength. The basis of union is strength and weakness. 

Comment by Jurgen: When the male is doing his dance to attract the woman, when he shows himself to 
overcome the barriers, there is a certain moment where the genetics are right and the woman says, "I got 
so weak." They call that the weakness of the heart. This is a classic syndrome of spring fever. 

59.2 Shyness 

When you are dealing with the first line, you know that they have the recognition that they can break 
down barriers. It is like all foundations. It is introspective, and so it recognizes that within it is the power 
to break down barriers. When you get to the second line, you get to projection and of course, they do not 
know that they can break down barriers. That is just what they project out, but they do not know it 
themselves. So there is no movement from them. It is what we call shyness, but it is not shyness. 

The 'self-imposed barriers' at the beginning of this line are a genetic barrier. This is not like they self- 
impose this from their mental plane. This is a genetic barrier that is there. It is a self-imposed barrier. 
They are not allowed, in that sense, to live out that first line. They have to wait for that to come to them 
because they are projecting that outwards. 

Shyness. Self-imposed barriers. A preferred and natural separateness that protects against the inevitable 
instability engendered by union. Now, remember that the second lines are always getting found out. In 
that moment that they are projecting outwards and somebody picks up that projection and comes into 
them with their boldness, they may find that very uncomfortable. After all, it is not necessarily something 
that is going to work. It can or it cannot. It is part of the process. 

In the Shyness line: The restriction of the sex drive to maintain separateness. It is a way of keeping 
oneself back so that one does not have to deal with what happens. The first to the third line is not well 
equipped to deal with the other side. They are involved in their own process, and yet this is a channel that 
is all about intimacy. There is always an aspect within them that is very uncomfortable because they have 
to deal with the power of the other side because the other side brings the emotional wave. It brings the 
passion and the desire. It brings the up and down of the power. This can be quite a thing to deal with. 

Pluto in detriment. There is a whole generation of people that have Pluto affecting this 59th hexagram, 
people somewhere around 1957-1960. A calculated shyness, rooted in deep psychological barriers, that 
even in dynamic individuals will always resist interaction. These are extreme cases of people in whom 
only boldness will work. Only when someone consistently is coming to break down that barrier can it 
possibly work. This is a deep genetic restriction. When you see someone with the 59.2 in detriment, what 
that says basically is: there are very few people that are their genetic match. Because of that, they can be 
very uncomfortable in that role of being the shy one and they assume that there is something wrong. 
There is nothing wrong. There are only very few people to make that match. 

Infertiliy, rooted psychologically or biologically, that conditions the drive for separateness. The infertility 
lies in the incapacity to be able to initiate union themselves. They cannot break anything down 
themselves. If nobody comes to break it down, it will never get broken down. It does not matter what kind 
of lover they have, until they are getting the right one, until they are getting the right kind of boldness, the 
right genetic mix, there can be no fertility for these people. I have many women I worked with who have 
the 59.2 in detriment, because it is a generation I have a lot of contact with. So many of them are 

concerned that they are truly infertile, that it is not possible for them to have children. It is difficult but it 
is not impossible. The reality is that is has to do with the right genetic mix. Without it, it does not happen. 

By the way, when you get to the fifth line, the line of universalization, you get to what we have in the 
modem world: the enormous expansion of genetic mixes so that people who are limited in that sense no

59.3 Openness 

When we get to the third line, to the line of Openness, we get to the line of bonds made and broken. So 
many people misunderstand this because they put an awful lot of attention on the 'broken' instead of the 
'made'. Bonds made and broken is a genetic strategy to be very open, to achieve union and then to close 
up. That is all. That is the way bonds made and broken works. Bonds made and broken can be a couple 
which does not see each other for a long period of time, and then they come back together again, then 
they separate again. Or somebody who works every day and does not see the partner all day and after 
work, they come back together again. This kind of bonds made and broken can work at many different 
levels. The thing to understand about this is that this is a genetic imperative that says, "We are going to 
have this moment," Remember, this is the resonance to the real One -night-stand, and the three says, 
"Come on, let's do it. Let's try, and tomorrow I don't want to see you anymore." That is the nature of 
bonds made and broken. 

Openness. Where one is empowered through union and intimacy with others, and the other side: Where 
the drive for empowerment can lead to promiscuity. Remember that this is about adaptation. It is saying: 
The search for identity and security can only be achieved through the dropping of barriers, in order to 
define oneself through union. This is the ultimate idea of what union is: to let go, to dissolve yourself into 
a relationship, to define yourself in that union. By defining yourself in that union, to generate, in the 
ultimate sense, the genetic material that can come out of it, but that's it. It does not mean that that 
relationship is meant to survive. It does not mean that this union is meant to survive. It means that that is 
exactly the right strategy to produce the genetic material that will come out of it. 

The women of the generation of 1957-1960 are an enormous generation of single mothers. They are all 
running around saying, "Why do I have this child with that man, and he is gone?" Sometimes the man is 
carrying the third line, and sometimes they carry it. But the moment that that is there, it is reflected and 
lived out and that is part of the process. 

The whole bulge in the divorce rate comes from this kind of energy. The thing to recognize about it is that 
it is not inherently bad. It is not about that. It is literally about defining yourself through union and then 
saying, "Excuse me, but I want to go back to being by myself for a while, okay?" That is really what it is 
saying. It is saying, "I am defining myself through union with you because we can produce something 
here. That is what the genes want, but I don't necessarily want to stay with you. My genes are just 
interested in this experience, to produce this possibility, not necessarily that we are going to stay 
together." 

Third lines can always bring in the whole process of trial and error. This is the nature of the promiscuity, 
that is, the sense that in defining oneself, it does not last. If one is not psychologically balanced or one 
does not have a proper kind of understanding, you keep on going through this process endlessly, trying to 
define yourself through somebody else and constantly going through this breaking down of the bond, and 
thinking finally that all of this is just pointless. 

59.4 Brotherhood/Sisterhood 

When you get to the fourth line, you get to the upper trigram and you get to this process of 
externalization, of being fixed. After all, this whole hexagram is about establishing union. It is not about 
establishing a good sex life. It is not about establishing having children. The overview of that is to 
establish union. The fourth line is fixed on establishing union. It is fixed on establishing friendship. 
Friendship becomes the focus for everybody who carries this line. 

Think about what that means. If you have a mind that is fourth line dominated, the only people that will 
ever pay attention to your mind are your friends. Otherwise it is not going to work. It is all about finding 
the confidante, or not. The fourth line is fixed on this. 

Venus exalted. The dropping of barriers to union to establish a universal union. Mercury in detriment. An 
intellectual understanding that is rarely put into action. In the white book: The power derived from non- 
sexual intimacy. The power is, "Aha, I broke down their barrier. If I try to come at them as a lover, they 
would have rejected me. But I got them. I came in the back door as their friend and I did it." That is the 
power. 

The other side is that, underneath that power, the idea "I broke through, I am their friend now," is not 
enough because it cannot restrain the sex drive. One of the things that happen is that the fourth line 
operates in a wave of kindness and meanness. That kindness is always at work in the friendship phase and 
the meanness is always coming into work the moment that you step into the sexual phase. That is, you 
have a friend for many years and you have a sweet and wonderful relationship and one night you make 
love to each other and the next day you are not very nice to each other anymore. You know too much 
about each other because you have been friends. The moment you become lovers, that is a totally 
different story. Lovers need to have secrets. Friends can't afford to have secrets. This is the other side of 
this. 

The other thing is to keep something in mind on the level of sexual violation that takes place in the world: 
most women are raped by men they know. They are raped by men who are in their families. They are 
raped by friends. The fourth line is the resonance to the first line and it is still about weakness and 
strength, but at another level. At the moment that you know somebody for a very long time, there is often 
this moment that you really can be overpowered by them and there is always this sexual tone that 
underlies all friendship. Be aware of that. 

The moment that somebody is operating on the friendship level does not mean that there is not sexuality 
within them. It means that they are working out an operating strategy and ultimately, by the time they get 
to a certain point, they get to live out the sexuality. It usually turns out that they say, "Why couldn't we 
have stayed friends?" There is also complete sexual rejection in this line. There are also people who have 
this line who become brothers and sisters in monasteries. Or there are people with this line who only want 
someone to cuddle. They only want to feel the warmth of the friendship. 

59.5 The Femme Fatale or Casanova 

We have union, we have sexuality. It is very rare in the 384 lines that you see the word 'love'. If you look

there. It is the only one of these lines that speaks of love. This is the universalization of union and that is

This is one of the lines that are deeply misunderstood because of its name, The Femme Fatale or 
Casanova. The easiest way to understand this is that it is the other that is projecting onto this person that 
they can break down the union. They are the ones that can make it work. So what happens to the fifth line 
is that they are the ones that get loved. They attract all of the love that gets projected on them. Remember, 
they may not be very good as lovers. It is simply a projection, but it is coming from the outside and says, 
"Aha, this one. This is the one that will break down the barrier." They may or may not. It is very easy for 
them to become the femme fatale or the Casanova because people love them but they do not necessarily 
love. This is one of the dilemmas. 

This is one of the common things that you see in literature. We see this endless stream of somebody who 
loves somebody else and that person does not love them. This is the classic theme of the fifth line. The 
fifth line is always attracting love but it does not mean that they love back. It simply means that they are 
attracting that love. 

The power to use love to break down any barrier. Given the Sun's 'lightness,' there is no negative 
connotation inherent in this description. Uranus in detriment. Here the negative potential of this power

is always carrying that global mythology. 

59.6 The One Night Stand 

When we come to the sixth line, the line of transition, we come to the end of this process. This line is

Remember that the sixth line is always looking at the complete circuit and when you take a look at this

In the black book: The tendency, based on the personality or circumstances, to accept only temporary

The power for intimacy, regardless of conditions. The power is always there, but that does not mean that

When you move in this gate to the next line, the 40. 1 , you move deep into the tribe. You go to the part of

By the way, in terms of resonance: If you see someone who has the 59.6 and who has many third lines in

The 60th gate is the gate of acceptance. This is so important to understand. Every single one of the gates

Unless the limitation is accepted, transcendence is never possible. The fuel quality is restrained and it is

It says above the lines: The acceptance of limitation is the first step in transcendence. Nothing is more

The first line is called Acceptance. As we know, the first line forms the foundation. This introspective line

Mercury in detriment. The drive for diversity that when limited, can become restless and agitated. Here

I have my design Mercury in this line. I had a wonderful experience when Neptune came to the 60th

Restless energy when confronted with external limitations. I was the kind of person that whenever there

60.2 Decisiveness 

When we get to the second line, we get to the line of projecting outwards. These people are projecting 
outwards that they can accept limitation. Most of them can suffer a great deal from the pressure in their 
life. Remember that this is just a projection of the nature of this hexagram going out. It does not

accepting the limitation. 

This line is called Decisiveness. Saturn exalted. The understanding of the nature of limitation, to accept 
its restraints when necessary and thus be able to take advantage of opportunities when they arise. In the 
white book: Energy which can adapt to restraint. Basically, these people project outwards that they are 
restrained. They don't know that there is anything at the other end of the channel. So every once in a

people are always going to be restrained and in that restraint, in accepting that limitation as a projection, 
there can also be the deep melancholy inside: Why am I accepting this limitation? Is this limitation really 
of value? Is this limitation the right direction? Is this limitation the mutation that is necessary for me? 

When we come to the other side, to the Earth in detriment, we have: An adaptation to restraint that

will seem like, "Aha, to accept the limitation was the right thing to do." 

On the detriment side of this energy: The energy for adaptation that can get stuck without eventual

There is a deep addiction to the limitation in the second line: people who get addicted to their medicine 
even when they are healthy. 

60.3 Conservatism 

Individuals, by their very nature, get stuck in habits. They eat the same food every day, they go for the 
same walk every day and in accepting the limitation, it is always possible that the mutation can take place 
and something extraordinary happens. Very often, they just get stuck in the very habit itself. 

When you come to the third line, you have the theme of trial and error, of bonds made and broken, and it 
is called Conservatism. Saturn exalted. Enlightened self-interest that naturally handles restrictions and 
limitations, ensuring identity and security. 'Enlightened self- interest...' This is the gate of limitation but 
this is the third line which can always break the bond of the limitation. It does not mean that they 
transcend the limitation. By breaking the bond, they discover that a new limitation comes in their way. 
This is their learning process until they finally can get to the point where they can accept that limitation 
will come and be transcended on its own terms and not on theirs. 

Remember the mystery of mutation. It takes place between the pulses, in the gap between the pulses. It is 
truly a mystery. What goes out old comes back new and one has not participated in that moment of 
transition from one to the other. 

In the white book this Conservatism is: The energy to maintain identity and security despite limitations. 
That identity and security is there in the individual. They say, "I break this bond with this limitation. I will 
not sit here and hold back. I go over there." They hold on to their identity and to the security of who they 
are but at the same time, when they go over there, they will meet another limitation and they have to deal 
with the same thing again. Just because they break the bond does not mean that they transcend the 
limitation. This is their learning process but ultimately, in its resonance, it can lead to wisdom. 

On the other side, we have Mars in detriment. The ego gratifying self-interest that ignores limitations and 
suffers predictably. It ignores the limitations because it can break the bond, but it is not breaking the bond 
hoping to transcend it. It is breaking the bond only to get away from it. In trying to get away from it, one 
will suffer the consequences because you can't. It can lead to the melancholy and the depression that is 
always possible in the 60th gate. 

Energy which ignores limitations and pays the price. Again, do not see these detriments as being negative. 
This is not the case. What appears to be a negative is not. It depends on the nature of your awareness. In 
the individual process, we will always meet individuals who will ignore limitations and are willing to pay 
the price. After all, this is the format for individuality and if you get to the behavior of individuality in the 
10.3, you get to The Martyr. It is built in here to break the limitation and pay the price. So many of us 
honor martyrs. Go to any little town to their square and you will see a statue of someone who has been a 
martyr. They are exalted afterwards. They will pay the price. Everything has a price. This is not negative. 
It is only a mechanic.

This line is called Resourcefulness. It lies in being able to release oneself from the pressure to mutate. In

Mercury exalted. The reasoned and intelligent maximization of potential within limitations. In other

Venus in detriment. A tendency in times of limitations to seek the inner meaning of the restriction rather

the capacity to lead is always projected onto the 60.5. They can lead others into limitations and trying to 
break them when, in fact, once you have broken them, there is still another limitation. 

This is the way they used to punish prisoners in America. They would make them dig a trench, a long 
ditch or a huge hole in the ground. At the end of the day they go to sleep, and the next morning they go 
out to the same place and they have to fill it all back in. You get rid of that limitation, you dig your way 
out of that and then you fill it back in, and you start all over again. This is very depressing. This is the 
nature of this detriment. It can end up being very depressive for whatever value that has, to be guided to 
constantly break the limitation that cannot be broken. 

Limitations cannot be broken, they can only be transcended. When it says in the detriment, 'confusion 
coming from the top', it means it is coming from the leader. The moment that the leader is not accepting 
the limitation but giving others the direction of trying to break that limitation, they are only going to be 
confronted with a new limitation. So the leader, the one at the top, is confusing all the others below, 
guiding them to believe that they can break the limitation when in fact they cannot because another 
limitation will simply replace it. 

All fifth lines are in a dilemma in which they may or may not be equipped to live up to the projection of 
others. You see that the detriment of fifth lines is not able to live up to that. If you are a 60.5, you have all 
these people who are waiting for you to act. You may be under so much pressure that you are depressed 
by not acting because every individual wants to play out that role in which they can provide that guidance 
and direction. 

60.6 Rigidity 

The sixth line is the line of transition and here it is in a mutative gate and a mutative channel. So, it 
represents a mutation that can be quite profound in the nature of what is possible in the mutative field. 
The line itself is called Rigidity, and it has Uranus exalted. 

The intuitive intellect to recognize when absolute rigidity is essential but with innovative applications to 
lessen its severity. A fixed energy that is unusual in its capacity for restraint. One of the things about the 
nature of the sixth line is that it is so clear to it that restraint and limitation is everything because 
remember that all sixth lines are looking at the whole circuit and they are looking at it in order to see 
whether or not they make a commitment to whatever their theme is. This sixth line in its rigidity is saying 
that there cannot be any kind of commitment. "I will be restrained. I will accept any limitation because 

nothing will work unless mutation is present. If the mutation is not there, I will be absolutely rigid in 
restraint." What that means is that these are people who are very rigid in accepting their limitations and 
they will rarely engage at that level. 

When you come to the other side, you have Mercury in detriment. The dogmatic, principled and carefully 
reasoned understanding that is uncompromising in its severity and often coldly brutal in operation. In the 
white book: An uncompromising and severe acceptance of restraint, so uncompromising that the restraint 
may become unbearable and lead to chronic depression. Here is somebody who says, "I have to be 
restrained. I have to accept the limitation. Otherwise, there will never be mutation, but I hate it. It is 
driving me crazy. Why can't there be a mutation? I can't stand it." This is being so unhappy with the 
rigidity and being fixed on it. When you say to these people, "Hey, relax", they get annoyed and 
depressed at you recognizing their rigidity, that they are stuck in that, that they hold on to that. 

What happens to the sixth line here is that, in our genetic terms, very little mutation comes out of the sixth 
line that affects the nature of the genetic material of a human being. It is rare that any genetic material is 
mutated through this line. When it does mutate, it does not bring a mutation that is recent but brings a 
mutation that is deeply recessive. It brings something out from deep down somewhere in the past. That 
can be of enormous value or not, like all things having to do with the nature of mutation. 

What is important to see is that where the 59.6 will refuse to be intimate and may never be fertile because 
it cannot see that intimacy is worthwhile, the 60.6 will not provide any mutation because it is not going to 
engage because of its rigidity. So they will not provide a lot of mutative material. The mutative material 
will only come in those instances where the mutation is so profound that the whole process of the 
individual circuit can be lived out. For the sixth line, the only limitation that can be transcended is a 
limitation that is truly transcended. It is gone, over, finished, onto something new, and until that moment, 
they can suffer a great deal from being forced within their own nature to wait and be restrained, to accept 
the limitation. 

This line always reminds me of a story. There is a monk going to a Zen temple and says, "I want to see 
the master." The gardener brings them inside and tells them to take off their shoes and sit in the garden. A 
couple of minutes later he comes back and says to this man, "I am very sorry, you have to come back in 
20 years. We will call you and we will tell you when you can come." The monk becomes totally rigid in 
this acceptance of the limitation that he cannot see the master, and he comes back every year, takes his 
shoes off, goes into the garden and asks whether he could see the master. That story has a joke to it 
because one day he comes, takes off his shoes and is allowed to see the master. The gardener comes and 
tells him, "The master will see you today." In that moment of the rigid limitation being broken, he is very 
excited and nervous. He goes wandering around in the garden and finally finds the master sitting there. 
The master looks up to him and says, "Where did you leave your shoes?" Of course, he couldn't 
remember. The master sent him away. No mutation took place. 

HEXAGRAM 61 INNER TRUTH 

The collective mind, the abstract and the logic, are so deeply related to each other, they need to be 
fulfilled through each other. Yin and yang, if you will: the basic dualities coming together into some kind 
of Tao. The collective process is rooted in what already is, in what has been taken in during the life 
movement. In other words, as we are alive and moving in space, we interact with the environment as we 
move. The abstract person interacts with that environment in its relative present and reflects on it as a past 
phenomenon. The logical person goes through this movement and takes in the information and projects it 
into the future's path. They are in the same kind of business. They are in the business of relating to what 
they have gone through. But when you come to the individuality of the 61, when you come to Inner 
Truth, none of that exists. This is not a visual mental process. It is acoustic, like everything having to do 
with the individual process. The 61 as an inspiration is not the visions passing through the mind but the 
static noise inside of the mind that keeps the mind occupied. 

Whenever you deal with individual knowing at the mental level, it is very important to understand the law 
of the knower which is to know what is knowable and of value, to know what is knowable and 
unnecessary (you don't necessarily have to know how a jet engine operates to get by in this life) and to 
know what is unknowable. The knower has to leave alone what is unknowable. If you don't know what is 
unknowable and you can't leave it alone, you go mad. 

The 61st gate, Inner Truth, is a wonderful image. You have this yang sandwich with a yin interior, so that 
the inner truth is really penetrating to all this yang propaganda to get to the yin essence. This is the gate of 
mystery. This is the gate of 'my-story'. This is individual knowing which is a spontaneous mutation. 
Because of that, it has no foundation in either the past or the future. It is not a sequence. It is not a pattern. 
It is this spontaneous, mysterious my-story, this mysterious knowing. 

The fuel is the pressure of the unknown or the unknowable. This is what is driving the 61. It must know 
for itself. It must know in the some way that the 28 has to know that life is of value, or that the 55 has to 
know deeply that a spirit exists in this life. The 61 is the inspiration for the whole mental plane of 
knowing. The 61 wants one thing only: silence in the mind. No voices talking, no dialogue, nothing. 
Maybe music. 

The energy mechanic is the struggle for silence. Please recognize, that 'silence' in this sense means that 
you know what you need to know. Whenever I deal with the 61,1 always go to the oracle of Delphi which 
says, 'Know thyself. "Know thyself is the only thing of value to know. Everything else is secondary. If 
you know yourself, the unknowable is you and you do not have to seek the unknowable at all because the 
moment that you truly know yourself, you know the mystery of life because you get to live it, because 
you are designed for your mystery, for your story. 

What the 61 wants to know is: What is my story? Who am I? How does it all work? What does it all 
mean? To get to the inner truth. 

Above the lines in the black book it says: The awareness of universal underlying principles. To know 
what the universal principles are and not to make them up, not to think that they happened in the past and 
believe that they were there, that they knew something that we did not, or that it is in the future somehow. 
You see, the most incredible thing about being human is that the collective is always at the mercy of 
mutation, like the tribe. Mutation is what makes all of this interesting. Mutation is what breaks us out of 
the old abstract cycles. Mutation shatters the pattern and mutation brings us into a new realization, a new 
recognition, a new wonder. It is there all the time. 

61.1 Occult Knowledge 

All first lines give you the essence of a hexagram. It gives you its basic nature. It is its foundation. These 
lines are introspective. Inner truth lies in going inwards, going deeply into this acoustic field. 

This first line is called Occult knowledge. The foundation of all inner truth is in occult knowledge. We 
have another example here of Neptune being exalted in a first line. Thus you know that this is not always 
present. It has been fascinating for me. I have my Design Sun in the 61.1. When Neptune went into the 
61st hexagram and activated the 6 all of the children born with Neptune exalted in this line, and who are 
now six or seven years old, will be great aficionados of the Human Design System. They will be people 
that will bring an enormous value to our society because we only get the activation of the Neptunian side 
of this line once every 165 years, and of course, dealing with the 24 on the other side, you have breaks in 
between which are around 80 years. In other words, there are times when this energy is not available to us 
and it is very important for us to understand that. Most of the time, the Venusian side of this aspect is 
working. 

Neptune exalted. A natural psychic awareness that empowers principles of universalization. This whole 
generation of children that have come into the world with Neptune in this line and their search for inner 
truth can have the validity of recognizing a universal knowing and bringing it into the world. 

In the white book: The pressure to know the mysteries through esoterics. It is keeping that at the obvious 
level: that is the mystery. If you think of the children who have Neptune in 6 Neptune is veiling the 
mystery anyway. They don't know where that knowing comes from. There is still a mystery but the 
answer can come out, the knowing can come out but it comes out very mysteriously. 

Venus in detriment. Where reliance on secret knowledge increasingly demands ascetic withdrawal and 
leads eventually to obscurity. There is so much knowledge that has been lost. Whenever you hear 
somebody saying, "Oh, isn't it a shame that that knowledge was lost," you automatically know something 
about it. It was not universal. Universal inner truth does not get lost. Getting lost is not built into inner 
truth. You have to understand that secret knowledge, knowledge that is not allowed to mutate, will die out 
in the world and is of no value. It is of no value as a universal principle. It is of no value for the totality. It 
is not a knowing that is going to bring an effective mutation. 

Whenever I meet people who have the Venus there, they are always interested in the obscure of the 
esoteric world: how to read somebody's nature in feeling the bumps on their head, or by looking at the 
shape of their toe nails and at the waves on your fingers. I had a student who had Venus in the 24, on the 
other side, and he talked to me about the most outrageous things. I can't imagine anybody being interested 
in that stuff. This is the Venusian aspect. 

Where the pressure can be so strong that one can be eventually incapable of handling the exoteric 
realities. Where a reliance on secret knowledge leads to obscurity and can't bring a universal truth. These 
are people who really think that they know and they are holding on to it because they think that it brings 
them power. 

Please understand something about the nature of knowing. Knowing is of no value unless it is openly put 
out into the world to either be devoured alive or to be a mutation. The moment that somebody has a 
knowing that they do not want to reveal, automatically, up until the point that it is revealed, it cannot be 
of universal value. It cannot mutate unless it goes out into the world. It has to go out acoustically; you 
have to hear it. 

61.2 Natural brilliance 

When you come to the second line, you come to projection. They are projecting out the quality of the 
hexagram. So here you have somebody who projects out that they are naturally brilliant. They are 
projecting out that they know. They are very inspiring. The 61.2 is a very inspiring line. Remember that 
all second lines can be paper tigers. They can project out their brilliance but they may not live up to the 
performance. First, second and third lines, because they are not transpersonal, because they are focused 
on the gate process, they all suffer from the limitation that they are dependent on others. I had nothing to 
do with my 6 Occult knowledge, until I was late into my thirties. I did not have the forces that connected 
up my undefined head center and its 61 to bring out the potential that was lying there inside of me. 
Always look at these things in terms of the nature of the design itself. 

The Moon exalted, and so gifted by this position, a far-reaching, a nourishing influence, free of guile and 
powerfully attractive. In the white book: A gift for inspiration that is both attractive and beneficial to 
others. Here is somebody that is automatically putting out this projection that they know, and their 
knowing is inspiring for others. If what they know does not lead others in the sense that it is inspiring for 
them, that it acts as a role model of inspiration for them, they begin to suffer from the fact that they can't 
live up to everybody else's expectations about themselves, and then they begin to wonder who they are,

Mars in detriment. In early recognition of its influence... (its brilliance, its know-ability) ...becomes ego 
obsessed with maximizing its effects. In other words: The delusion that any inspiration deserves

everything they know deserves to mutate. 

There are a lot of very brilliant people in the scientific community who really have a knowing in which 
they are obsessed with the fact that that knowing will come to some kind of fruition, that it does deserve 
recognition, and that somebody has to see it. All kinds of people on the fringe of science in America who 
have all kinds of knowing about the way things work, such as how plants talk to each other, assume that 
their knowing has to get the same attention as scientific knowing. They assume that whatever it is that 
they know deserves to be considered as something that is of universal value, and everybody is going to 
recognize it. 

The brilliance here is the readiness to release their knowing, their mystery. They are projecting out that 
they know and due to that others can ask what they know, and they either are inspiring or not. 

61.3 Interdependence 

We have seen that when we are looking at the third line and its process of trial and error that belongs to 
every third line, you also see in every third line that these relationships with the other side always come as 
a surprise. The first to the third line is convinced that it is: "I know". They are only within the gate 
process. But the reality is that this line, 

Interdependence, says as a heading: It is exceedingly difficult for truth to stand alone. By the way, it does 
not mean that you can't carry your "I know" all the way to the bank. The reality is that it is exceeding 
difficult because at some point or another, if somebody else does not get to know what you know, it does 
not mutate and therefore is useless. This is the whole thing about being individual and dealing with 
mutation. 

Mutation is very cruel. If you don't know and if you can't explain it, you are really going to suffer; which 
means that, particularly at the mental level, if individuals don't complete the whole knowing circuit 
themselves, they have to find other individuals in their process that they can deal with. It will be very 
difficult for them to deal with people who are mentally collective. For example, I have the 43/23 and the 
61, and JOrgen has the 24. That 24 has to come from somebody who is fundamentally individual, like 
Jurgen. We are both only defined as individuals. It makes it possible to go through that process, but I can 
do it with an individual. It will be very difficult to bring my knowing directly to the collective. It has to go 
through the whole process. 

The Moon exalted. The ability to establish relationships for the actualization of truths, and through their 
nurturing and protective power to ensure a stable environment in which they can continue to grow. 
Remember, this is the frequency of bonds made and broken. You know that it will be very difficult for the 
individual knower to really have relationships that can actualize the truth. It is not impossible, but 
difficult. 

The pressure to know enhanced through collaboration. The thing to recognize is that all third lines, due to 
their resonance to the sixth lines, are breaking the ground for the potential wisdom and peace that lie 
within the sixth lines by going through the mistakes, the trial and error. These third line Inner Truth 
people constantly are dealing with the wrong people. They constantly bang into people that can't help 
them actualize their knowing. Eventually, if they are fortunate, they begin to recognize that there are 
certain people that can be beneficial for them and other people that cannot. 

Mars in detriment. With an abundance of energy and in possession of a truth, the tendency to leave others 
behind or be crushed by their resistance. Impatience with others and the forsaking of relationships. This is 
classic: a third line who breaks the bond. "They can't make my knowing rational the way I want it made 
rational." Remember, you are always trying to be the other side. Everybody who has a question wants to 
bring their own answer. Everybody that has a confusion wants to make sense out of it themselves, and 
everybody that has the inner truth wants to make it rational themselves. It just does not work that way. 
These people are impatient with others. What these people do is: If they do not get their knowing to 
mutate to the next stage, they abandon that relationship and go on to the next one. Other people can be 
quite upset by all that. After all, here is somebody that is inspiring for them and that person simply walks 
away from them. As far as they are concerned, they don't have what it takes. This is their process of trial 
and error. 

61.4 Research 

When you get to the upper trigram, to the fourth line, you are dealing with the single- mindedness. When 
you look at the 43.4, which is part of this stream, you have the One-track mind and this gives you a very 
strong idea about the nature of this fourth line. The fourth and fifth lines are transpersonal; they are able 
to recognize that there is the potential for rationalization. 

What they are looking for, in a sense, is to make music with somebody. They have all the sounds in their 
heads and the rationalization is just taking away the static so that the station comes in clear, so that you 
can really get the acoustic picture, if you will. This line, this being fixed on the knowing, is called 
Research. 

The capacity of concentration to explore the depth of inner truth and maximize its application to 
fundamental principles. They are fixed on this "I must know". In the extreme, these people can really 
seem to be mad in their fixedness to know. They must know. That does not mean that they will only 
research things that are valid to research. They can get fixed on trying to know something that is deeply 
obscure. They get lost for the rest of their lives and they never really know. 

I know somebody with this line who is fascinated by numerology. They will spend the rest of their lives 
trying to figure out what that is all about. They are just lost in that. They have to know it. They are 
obsessed with knowing. They want to win the lottery. 

On the other side, Jupiter in detriment. Where the tendency to expansion and integration leads to 
involving others in the research and may end in a diversity of confusing applications. Here you have the 
two sides of the individual process. The exalted side says, "This is my knowing. This is my way. Don't 
influence me. You can go along with me, you can help me out, but don't influence. Don't get in my way. 
This is my knowing. " On the other side you have what is intrinsic in the individual. On one side they are 
resisting all influence and on the other side, they want to be influential because they want to be mutative. 
The other side is not a negative, like all the detriments. It is simply about seeing the mechanic. These 
people will lose that control in that sense. They will be very fixed in that knowing. Due to the fact that 
they desperately want to get to some kind of rationalization, they will involve others who take that 
inspiration and will go in many directions. That may be of value in terms of all the different directions 
that the other people take, but it is very uncomfortable for the individual knower who started that process. 

The detriment on this side is: The illusion that collaboration will enhance inspiration. My advice for all 
individuals: If you are going to be conditioned in your individual mental process, it is better to be 
conditioned by the planets than to be conditioned by a person. That is clear. It is much easier for the 
individual because they will always have the sense of "that is truly myself". It is not coming from the life 
experience of somebody else that happens to have that particular gate and brings that energy through. 

61.5 Influence 

We know that first lines are the essence of the hexagram and fifth lines are how the hexagram is seen by 
the outside or the totality. The one thing that you can see very clearly about the 61.5 is that the totality 
recognizes the power inherent in Inner Truth. What is projected on the 61.5 is that they have influence. 
Think about the difference between the two projective resonances. We have the second line in which the 
projecting out of Inner Truth results in people saying, "Aren't they clever? This is a smart one. This is a 
brilliant one." When you get to the fifth line and the outside is projecting onto the Inner Truth, they are 
saying, "This is the one that knows. This is the one that really has influence because they can bring about 
and inspire mutation." 

Here in this fifth line, Saturn exalted. The enlightened father-figure whose recognized wisdom and 
powerful assertion can mold a generation by its influence. This is very nice. The pressure to know that 
may result in influence and wisdom. Think about the advantages of being a fifth line. Everybody is 
projecting on the 61.5 that they have the inner truth. If they do, their reputation just continues to grow. 
Ultimately, they are seen as a guiding force and a force of wisdom, which may in fact be so or not. When 
it is projected on them that they are the ones who really know and what they deliver is unknowable, then 
all of that will simply crash. 

On the other side of this, Mars in detriment. A tendency in power to want to enforce compliance to ensure 
lasting influence. The pressure in knowing to resent challenges and demand acceptance. In other words, "I 
am the enlightened one. Don't challenge me. I know and you don't." This is their stance in that. They do 
not want anybody to challenge their knowing. Now, of course, they are going to be challenged. The 
collective would never let them get away with it, and they'd better really know. Otherwise, that challenge 
can be something that is very uncomfortable for them.

It is called Appeal. Pluto exalted. The profound attunement to the collectivity that can lure the public to a

On the Martian side: A reliance on shop-worn cliches and slogans that may be new in their level of

In the 61 st gate we always have potential delusion until there is a way to explain the nature of that

Unless individual knowing can be accepted by collective understanding and sensing, mutation has not

No sixth line standing back there from the distance sees that that is an easy thing to do. They may become

HEXAGRAM 62 PREPONDERANCE OF THE SMALL 

Where the abstract process creates a story, the logical process is actually creating the language, the source 
of what we call language. The key to what language is lies in the 62nd gate because it is the gate of giving 
things their names. After all, this is a channel of organizing humanity at the intellectual level and in order 
to do so, we always have to have common access to meanings. 

The names are actually another word for formula. We have a formula that says 'tree,' and we teach 
everybody that the thing that we see out there, the word that we use for it is 'tree'. Once everybody accepts 
that formula, we have a basis for a form of communication with each other. 

Facts are primary in our life. All these basic formulas are primary for us. It is this detail to make sure that 
everything not only has a name, but the moment that it has a name, we have a clear understanding of what 
that is. I am somebody who spends his adult intellectual life trying to arrive at the correct names for 
things, so that we have a common ground in our ability to understand the nature of the world and to 
project into the future. Everything about the 62nd gate is about the capacity to find the detail in what you 
are expressing, so that others can truly understand. 

We are now looking at the logic side of the mind. On the logic side, you have a different process. In the 
56th gate, I told you that we are dealing with two metamorphic gates that are involved in a process of 
translating what we see in the mind into what we call language. We have seen that the 56th gate is a gate 
of stimulation, of telling the story of humanity, of telling the story of the human way; so that is ultimately 
what human nature is all about. The idea or the conceptual part of the abstract mind is the ability to see 
sequences within the mind which you translate into a story, so you make a movie out of it and tell your 
tale. 

When you come over to the logic side, it operates differently in its conceptual process. Logic is fixed on 
patterns because only out of patterns can logic work. The patterns can then be tested. On the intellectual 
level, we can call these patterns formulas or theories or opinions. They can be presented and then they can 
be tested. The pattern can be tested. The whole process of the logical, intellectual mind is to translate 
these inner patterns and to bring them out into language, to be able to describe them. 

Because of that, the 62nd gate has a different metamorphic quality than the 56th gate. The 56 is there to 
tell a story in order to get a message across about the nature of what it is to be, but the 62 has to name all 
of those things. It has to give them their name. This is a gate of giving things their names and describing 
them so that they can be understood. 

This is a factual voice. This is not the voice that says, "I believe" or "I do not believe". This is a voice that 
says, "I think" or "I do not think." Rather than being about hope or sorrow, it is a voice that is either

When you are dealing with somebody that has the 62nd gate, they are trying to organize their mental

understand them. 

Above the lines in the black book it says: Caution, patience and detail produce excellence out of

This line of Routine has Neptune exalted. This is a funny planet to have as a foundation of coming up

I was trained as a scientist and the first thing you know as a scientist is that the moment that you establish 
any theoretical principle, you'd better be your biggest enemy. Before you tell anybody about that principle

You have to have this process of looking inwards. Remember that this is a foundation. It has to look

work before I can present the facts?" 

In the white book: The ability to organize the detail through fantasy. Or rebellion against doing the very

62.2 Restraint 

When you get to the second line, these people are often caught in a trap. All second lines carry within

It is not their fault. Second lines do not have this ability to look inwards. The first line knows that it can

get there." This is a projected field, and it is not necessarily the truth. The child is not necessarily working 
on that detail. 

This line is called Restraint. The innate restrictiveness and discipline to comply with and exalt restraint. In 
other words, they really stay with the detail but all too often it just looks like that. 

In the white book: The discipline necessary for detail work. But not all the time as a guarantee that the 
detail work is being done. It is there as a projected field, but it does not really mean that it is working. 

On the other side of this, Mercury in detriment. The intellect stymied by severe restraints tends to anxiety 
and restlessness. Think about what this is like for these people. They are projecting outwards that they can 
do the detail work, but they do not know why. They are not the first line. The first line knows that detail is 
essential. The second line just knows, "I am projecting out the detail." But they do not know what is

It is like the 62.2 child that is staring at the book, and they do not know what to stare at. They are just 
looking there. It looks like they are deeply focused and concentrated and taking it all in. Then you say to 
them, "What are you reading?" and they look at you like you are mad. They can't answer the question 
because they do not know what they are concentrating on. They become restless and anxious. 

This is the dilemma of the 62. You do not get a chance very often to live out the experiment. It is so rare. 
When I did the Caring Course last year in Hamburg, I talked about the nature of how this works. You just 
end up with committees that have committees that study a process and maybe one day the process will be

difficult for logic to get access to energy and built into that, because it is difficult, underneath is all this 
restlessness. "Now that I have got it, I want to try it." 

Both the abstract and the logic process are about communicating successfully, and not about doing 
successfully. Only when somebody can properly communicate their story or their theoretical premise or

In collective circuitry we have no social channels. There is one individual social channel and two tribal

62.3 Discovery

This third line is called Discovery. Everyone I have ever met that has this line hates it. They never really 
understand it and they don't like it because all third lines are about trial and error. They are about making 
mistakes. This is the great line of mistake-making. Due to that fact, it is also the great line of discovery. 
This is Pasteur making a mistake and finding something. This is the story of hundreds and thousands of 
inventors, scientists, researchers or explorers who go in the wrong direction by mistake and find

It says Uranus exalted, and for a third time in these collective gates we have the word 'genius' and we 
have Uranus exalting it. A genius for the unusual. The ability to discover valuable information in detail

mistakes, and out of the mistakes, you learn. 

Remember what I have said about the nature of wisdom. In the hexagram structure, we have these 
resonances. This third line is in resonance to the sixth line. There is no way to that wisdom and there is no 
way to logical truth without mistakes being part of the way. Over the last weeks, I have been watching all 
kinds of scientific theories that have been postulated and then you immediately see the scientific 
community coming back from other areas saying, "Wait a minute. I do not see how this works. They 
made a mistake." 

It is all about that. Was there a mistake? Does the mistake lead to something? Does it lead to discovery? 
This is the essence of what this line is all about. Whenever you see a third line in your chart, honor that. It 
is about getting into things and getting out of them, learning from them by getting into them and getting 
out of them. It is not about holding onto them until you really understand. Here in the white book it says: 
The unusual gift of finding and expressing valuable details. 

On the other side: The expression of dissatisfaction and boredom in detail work. Now look, this comes 
out of something else. It is: A dissatisfaction with the monotony of detail work, where what is missed 
may be of great importance and value. Now look what happens to these people. They start doing an 
experiment and it goes wrong. Instead of looking at what happened, instead of looking what went wrong 
and what the result of it going wrong is, they just say, "I am sick and tired of trying to do this. I do not 
want to do it anymore. I am tired of making mistakes. I will never get it right, and that's it." If they had 
gone into the nature of their mistake and what they learned, they would not repeat again. This is the whole 
thing about the third line. If you cannot handle this mistake, if you cannot get into it and see, "Aha, okay, 
well all right. Next time." Remember that we live in a very special age. Please understand that. For 
everybody who carries third lines inside of them. 

In the 25th hexagram in the third line, in the nature of universal love, in the initiating force that is within 
ourselves, we have the capacity to be able to withstand failure and survive it. With Pluto in detriment,

is an era in which mistakes can be deeply rewarding because they can lead to all kinds of discovery. 

This is the nature of this line: to recognize that it is okay to make mistakes because you are only 
communicating, you are not doing. Communicating mistakes is perfect. You have a theory which you 
share; you have your opinion and you start talking about it. The other person says, "Wait a minute. This 
and that is missing. This does not work, you made a mistake." And then you have a chance to go through 

that whole process again, and you have a chance to see whether you should stay with it, whether you need 
to fix it or whether it is time to drop it and move on to the next thing. 

It is a process about accepting that learning is like that. I know what this is like. I have a 43.3/23.3/4.3 
mind which is all unconscious. It is impossible for me in my life process not to have made thousands of 
intellectual mistakes. That is how I learned. It is a learning process, to go through things and learn from

It is called Self-discipline. It has Saturn exalted. A penny saved is a penny earned. Detail as the path to

When you look at the whole logical circuit out of the sixth line, what you are looking at is the capacity to

In the detriment of this: The gift for, but not the discipline, to do the necessary detail work to succeed.

The first line of the 56 is called Quality. Is it really the detail that is of value? For the 62.6, it is very

HEXAGRAM 63 AFTER COMPLETION 

There is a beautiful joke. If you look at the heading above the 64th hexagram it says: Transition, like 
birth, requires a determined strength for the passage through. It refers to the channel of determination and 
thus to the logical format. Determination is necessary to find the way and to get through. Inherent in this

abstract, logic can be very attractive and if you are logical, the abstract can be very attractive. 

When you come to the 63rd hexagram and you look at the heading above the lines, it says: In the spiral of 
life, all ends are beginnings. This is describing the abstract format. So, there is this nice little twist inside. 
Those of you that studied the throat center lines will remember that, by the time the abstract gets to 
manifestation, it wants to be logical and by the time the logic gets to manifestation, it wants to be abstract. 

The 63rd hexagram is the gate of doubt, which is the pressure of suspicious patterns or not. This is the 
whole thing. Where the abstract is trying to realize out of sequences from the past based on what it 
experiences in the present, the logic, with what it experiments in the present, is trying to project into the 
future. It is trying to project out of a pattern. If that pattern does not project into the future, then we have 
doubt and suspicion. 

The mechanic here is mental patterns focused on the future, and it is the question. This is a gate, as an 
inspiration, that is always asking a question, looking for the answer. If you can come up with the 
question, you will get an answer. There is 'nothing new under the sun' for a collective being. Questions 
are deeply inspiring. The best questions I was ever asked in my life came from 63's. The best questions I 
ever asked myself in my whole life came from 63 transits, particularly when the Sun and Mercury transit 
this gate together. 

63.1 Composure 

We have the foundation and the line that is introspective, so it is looking inwards. The nature of doubt is 
to be composed. Composure, as this line is called, is very important. Remember that this is agate that does 
not get to really feel complete, will not see its doubt eliminated, until it can hear the detail come out 
through the 62nd gate. That question not only has to be answered with a formula by the 4th gate. It has to 
generate an opinion out of the 17th gate and become a detailed description out of the 62. 

Sun exalted. The quality of personality where achievement is accepted with equanimity and where 
continued development is allowed to take its natural course. Acceptance of achievement but doubt 
whether continued development will take place. These people are always afraid that their question will 
never be able to be projected out into the future so that it will finally get to the point of detail, and they 
can really let go of their suspicion and doubt. 

Whenever somebody comes to me with the 63rd gate, the most important thing that I tell them is, "Make 
sure that everything in your life that you doubt and are suspicious of, you have to prove yourself. You 
have to get the detail. Only then is it possible to let go of doubt and suspicion. Otherwise it is not. You 
meet somebody and you are suspicious about them, you have to be composed, give them the benefit of the 
doubt and see the whole process through. Wait and see if they will give you the detail. If they give you 
the answer, then you can let go of the suspicion." 

On the other side, Mars in detriment. The tendency in achievement to immediately seek new goals at the 
risk of destabilizing what has already been accomplished. We are trying to see whether a pattern works in 
the future, or not. This whole thing is about recognizing in that moment of inspiration whether there is 
something wrong with the pattern or not. That kind of mind is busy when there is something wrong with 

the pattern. The moment that you discover that there is something wrong with the pattern and you get it 
worked out, you have to let go of that. The Martian side always goes from one doubt and suspicion to the 
next, no matter what is happening. Endlessly. It is always seeking out a new goal, which means that it is 
seeking out a new question, a new doubt. 

It is like the 1 8th gate always being able to point out, very clearly, where something needs to be corrected. 
It is always looking for patterns and the doubt and suspicion in them. These are very suspicious people. 
To be deeply suspicious and untrusting is at the root of what it is to be logical. When people have this, it 
is our morality that says, "This is not nice. Love your neighbor and trust them." If you do that, you are led 
down the primrose path and you end up in ideology, which is on the abstract side. It is very important to 
understand that logic is rooted in suspicion and doubt. If the suspicion and doubt are missing, the logic is 
never going to be challenged, to be tested, proved or disproved. 

63.2 Structuring 

When you get to the second line, remember that second lines are projecting. So, wherever you meet these 
people, they are projecting out that they doubt you and are suspicious of you, whether or not that is true. 
That is something that will always come out because it is the nature of the line. 

It is called Structuring. What this line reveals (remember that the second line is in resonance to the fifth 
line, which is the universalized nature of the hexagram) is that it is interesting, as most people say. It is 
the question and not the answer that rules our future. It is the question that has all the power. The question 
is the inspiration. 

There are two things that can happen to the people that carry the power of the question. Once that 
question is responded to, the 4th gate comes and wants to bring an answer. They hold on to the power of 
being the questioner. "We looked through our spectroscope and we saw that space seems to be 
compressing. How does this come about?" Somebody comes up with a theoretical answer called the 
'black hole.' The question leads to the answer. This will always be the case in the logical process. 

Jupiter exalted. The establishing of a large framework through which achievement can be expanded and 
shared; ... Remember that this person is projecting out that they are full of doubt and suspicion, so people 
automatically come to them and say, "What's the matter?" "I don't really know whether this will work. 
Can it work?" They are automatically seen as the ones that are projecting out their doubt, -compensating 
others for their contributions while maintaining control of direction. There are so many physicists for 
example, who came up with the question and they had hundreds of assistants who developed the answer, 
but they are the ones who are remembered because they had the question. "I have this question. Who does 
this work?" and then they delegate the responsibility. 

The pressure to share one's doubts with others while still maintaining control. "It is my question. I don't 
care if it is your answer. I asked the question." 

On the other side, we have Uranus in detriment. Instability in achievement that when in positions of 
authority leads to arrogance and the desire to keep others away from the center of power. The moment 
that you can ask the kind of question that gets that kind of response for an answer, you have authority. 
This is the scientist that goes out and writes a paper for nature, signs it with his name and he leaves out 
the 116 assistants who did all the work to get it together to that point. They are the ones that are saying, 
"Yes, I have the answer to this. I have this answer to that," and he ends up, as a questioner, taking the 
authority. 

These are the two sides to structuring. These people are always afraid of somebody else coming up with a 
better question. The competition of the collective is incredible. A question is always inspiring to 
someone. It inspires this drive to come up with an answer in the same way that confusion is inspiring, 
because it brings people to try to resolve the confusion for the other. It is all about the other. 

63.3 Continuance 

When you come to this line of trial and error which is called Continuance, and particularly in the wave of 
bonds made and broken, you recognize that certain questions are important at one point in the life and are 
no longer important later; or you recognize questions that are really off the track because a question is a 
question, and not all of them are the same. Every question is unique. 

Jupiter exalted. The dedication to the new beginning that insists on maintaining its achieved principles 
despite having to interact with those who have not attained such a state. What that really means is that 
these people have a question and they are never satisfied with other people's answers. They are looking 
for their own answer but they can't get their own answer. But they are never really satisfied with anybody 
else's answer. 

Doubts that one can maintain one's principles when interacting with others. "Can I really get an answer, 
so that I can get rid of my doubts through others? Every time I ask this question I get answers from them, 
but it does not satisfy me. I still doubt it, and I am still looking for my answer." This is all about trial and 
error. The person with the question is always meeting people who have answers and they learn right away 
that not all of those answers are for them, even though they may seem like they can be the right answer. 

On the other side, Saturn in detriment. Success at any price. Success at any price means insisting that your 
question is answered. The exalted side of this will actually go along with people who say, "Yes, the 
answer is this and this." In that moment, it will make them feel like, "Maybe that is the answer" and in 
that, they begin to lose their principle of getting the answer that is correct for them. The detriment side of 
this is deeply stubborn. In the extreme, every time these people ask a question, nobody's answer is right. 
None of them are right. They are never right. 

The pressure to eliminate the doubt at any cost. "I must have the answer." These are people who go on 
enormous investigating searches. These are the people whose inspiration, their question, may be a 
mistake.. Because the question is an error, the answer may prove to be of enormous value. It is one of the 
jokes of life. Science thrives on trial and error, on mistakes. A question can only be a mistake in the sense 
that the question itself is not properly configured. These people do not really know what they are asking 
for. The answer is always in the question. That is why the questioner has so much power. That is Socrates' 
game. 

Remember where the nature of this pressure is rooted. The head center opens up for us information from 
the deep gray areas of the brain. What that means in the abstract process is that you have all of those 
video clips, and you collect them. It is a moving recollection from the past. When you are looking to the 
logical side, all these patterns are coming through. 

63.4 Memory 

The fourth line is called Memory. The question itself is rooted in the patterns and you have to have

can lead to the powerful detailing of them if it gets to the 62nd gate. We are in the upper trigram and this 
is a line of externalization. So we know that it is very fixed in its doubts. 

Mercury exalted. The detailed accounting of the achievement process whose information base can prepare 
a new order for the future. The fourth and fifth lines are transpersonal. They know that there is a gate at 
the other end of the channel and because of that, they know that their doubts will be answered. The 
answers may be good, bad, right or wrong, but they do know that they are always going to meet an 
answer out there. 

The pressure to explore the doubt in detail as a foundation for eventual formulizing. These are people that 
look at the patterns in detail. It is out of the depth of their patterns that they have as a memory resource 
that they can really ask a very sharp question. They have the background and a lot more to offer than the 
person at the other side. The only difficulty in terms of this being a collective process is that they are very 
fixed in their doubt and suspicion. They are very fixed in getting their question answered. They are very 
fixed in what they are looking for as a response. For other people it can seem that they are really 
obsessive about their pattern. That can be uncomfortable for other people. 

Mars in detriment. A willingness to forget in the glow of victory, with a possible price to be paid later. 
'Glow of victory' is the possibility that you will get an answer if you really have a good question. 
Remember that this line knows that the answer will come. They want to make sure that their question is 
really rich in its pattern detail so that they can get an answer that is appropriate. 

The pressure and risk to forget the details when the doubts have been answered. Here is somebody with 
all the pattern images that they have in that system of theirs. They recognize that there is something 
wrong because of that in another pattern. They ask the question of that pattern, get an answer to why it is 
wrong and they forget all the other stuff they were looking at to get at that point. Because of this, when it 
comes to projecting into the future, they do not have all the information that is necessary for them. They 
won't have all the things that they need for the final detail. What happens to these people is that after a life 
time of getting answers only to that aspect of theirs and leaving out everything else, they have a totally 
different perspective about how things will move into the future. In many ways, they simplify things for 
us because they leave out a lot of detail. 

Throughout this discussion of lines, we have to remember that it is always conditioned by the nature of 
their design. If you have this line without access to the 4th gate in an undefined throat and ajna center, 
that is quite a process. All of that is conditioned, and it is difficult. If you are somebody that processes

kind of logical process. 

For example, you have science writers who are people that understand the science but they leave out vast 
amounts of detail. So they just give you the logical pattern so that the lay person who does not understand 
all the little detail can grasp what that science is about. So these people can be very effective for us in that 
way. Remember that none of these aspects are ever going to be about good or bad. It is not about 
restricting this way of asking a question or that way. It is just about seeing that there are different 
mechanical ways in which those questions will arise, and they bring out different kinds of processes in the 
answers. 

63.5 Affirmation 

When we come to the fifth line, we come to the line of universalization. The first line establishes the

Sun exalted. The authority and sincerity of purpose to pursue the same values in the new beginning that

On the other side, Mars in detriment. Atendency in triumph to pay lip service to such values, and given

come up with their own question. This is very important. It is projected on this line that they are the ones

are under this pressure from the moment that they come into the world, they can get to a point where, on 
the other side, they just pay lip service to that whole process. They say, "Yes, I do have my doubts. I have 
not found an answer yet." 

Due to the fact that others project on them that they do have the answer, they discover very quickly in life 
that nobody wants to hear their question. People with this line who have projected on them that they have

needs to be answered. These people end up controlling the laboratory. Their names will end up in the

until mutation blows that all apart. The logical collective is desperately looking for that. For example, we 
do accept that one and one is two. We don't have to ask anymore whether or not that is valid. You can get 
to a point where there are no more doubts. 

After all, please remember the duality of Human Design. Every channel, every gate, every line has an 
inherent duality within it. The gate of doubt is also the gate of not doubting at all. Doubts are only a 
process. One does not have to identify with doubts. The whole thing about the logical collective is, "Give

63.6 Nostalgia 

When you go to the sixth line, you get to the line of transition. It is looking beyond. It is looking to the

see the whole circuitry fulfilled through its commitment to that. The moment these people have a good 
question that is answered, they always remember it. "I asked my grandma that question when I was six, 
and I got the answer. It is still good for me today. It was the best answer I ever had." Or, "My friend 
Harry, one day when I was on the beach, he walked up to me and answered my question. This was the 
best answer I ever had." It is rare that they get answers that really work for them. They are a sixth line. 

Jupiter exalted. The good sense to avoid turning the previous struggle into an obsession. 'Good sense' is 
already abstract terminology. They have the good sense or not. If they do not have it, they get totally 
involved in that. 

In the white book: The logic of leaving old doubts behind. Either the good sense or the logic to leave it 
behind. You had your question and your answer. Do not keep on going back to "that was great". Think

in the past. It was all better back there. The Egyptians were great. They built these pyramids. They had 
the answer." 

Illogic and the potential obsession with old suspicions and doubt. We have a whole generation of logical 
people who don't get the logical answer for the future but they say, "It was better in the past. Let's go back 
to the farm. Let's go back to rural life. Let's go back to dancing around the fire place. Let's go back to the 
sweat lodge. Let's go back to all these old things because they had the answer." Logical people. It is one 
of the great jokes of our time: logical people being incredible illogical. This is the nature of this sixth line 
and because we have this powerful plutonic field there, all those people are keeping that energy alive. It is 
clear as we move more and more towards Aquarian consciousness, when the last children who were born 
in the late 40's and 50's are dead, we don't have to deal with that for 150 years. You have people who will 
say, "This was crap. It was never better in the past. They had their answer for their time." 

If somebody says something exciting in the news about what is going to happen tomorrow (for example, 
somebody has developed a new medicine), their immediate response for that future is to go into the 
revolutionary nostalgia. They go into the question and say, "Wait a minute. They knew that answer long 
ago." You can look at esoteric magazines which are hilarious. Every time somebody comes up with a new 
scientific thing, there is someone writing an article stating that some tribe had that already. It reminds me 
of the Russians during the communist era who were responsible for inventing everything. I am joking 
about that, but it is very important for us that the logical mind is pointing towards the past. 

My logical mind was pointed towards the past and thus I was able to see the validity in the answers that 
were there. What is unusual for the logical mind, normally, under this Plutonic influence, is that it has led 
a lot of people to look into past patterns, to try to make sense of what could be future patterns. This will 
only come out of the sixth lines. All sixth lines carry this mutative quality because they in themselves are 
transitional. 

When you go from the 63.6 to the next hexagram, you get to the 22. Out of the 22.6 will be the grace that 
releases the mutation that will bring us into spirit consciousness. It is very important for us that we do

I'Ching. I was astonished by being offered those patterns to look at. 

The 63.6 keeps on saying, "Yes, but they had this before." It is waiting for the mutative force in the 61 
which says, "There is something new to know." Then the whole process begins again. The abstract gets

The collective sixth lines are visionary, though I am still not comfortable with any term yet to describe
