HEXAGRAM 64 BEFORE COMPLETION 

When we move to the pressure above, please keep in mind the great irony that is revealed by Human 
Design about the nature of the mind. The pressure below was a motor and the pressure above is not. It is 
only a pressure. It is like recycling. It circulates things and brings them back out, but it is not a motor. It is 
just a pressure. That means whatever that pressure instills in the nature of the ajna center, whatever 
pressure comes into being as a conceptualization within the ajna center carries within it no intrinsic power 
to manifest as action. It is so important to understand that. The mind, the ajna center, is exclusively for 
looking at the nature of being. That is what it is there for. It is not there to decide what to do. It is there to 
examine at the three different levels of mental capability the experience of what it is to be alive in the 
world and it is not about doing. 

In the Rave Reading seminar, in being able to define for people that nature of authority in one's design, 
the moment that you come to authority in your design, where your true authority is, you will discover that 
the mind is obedient to that authority. Always. And the moment that you do not know the authority within 
yourself, the moment that you are not living out your nature, your mind is going to rule your life. This 
will be very disturbing. The nature of inspiration, the nature of the head center and its pressure, in the 
collective sense of the word (that is, both in the abstract and in the logical collective) is that it is there to 
force us mentally to make sense of the past (the abstract process) and to project into the future (the logical 
process) in order for us to see within the continuity, past and future, the nature of what it is to be human. 
Because it is collective, we share that with each other. 

The great law of the collective mind is that there is nothing new. There is this attempt to make sense out 
of the past and there is this projection into the future, all out of a relative present. Here in the 64th 
hexagram, Before Completion, we have the gate of confusion. Confusion, as you can see in the energy 
mechanic, is about cyclical mental images from the past. This is the gate of confusion because there are so 
many cyclical mental images which are all from of the past and they are all jumbled together. When you 
look at its fuel, this is a pressure of mental activity or not. This can be the busiest and most uncomfortable 
mind or not. The moment that the mind is trying to run the life, this is very busy and uncomfortable as a 
pressure. It is confused. The moment the mind is not the authority in the life, this is still streaming with all 
the images but that streaming does not lead to stress at the mental level, and does not lead to discomfort 
with the nature of what is there. 

When you are living out who you really are, you are not covered with all the mental activity of all the 
things you should not be; which is impossible for you to make sense out of because it is not what 
belonged to you in the first place. This gate carries with it everything that you experienced from the past, 
and all of that is coming back to you, streaming back to you. 

Above the lines it says: Transition, like birth, requires a determined strength for the passage through. 
Jiirgen made the allusion to the midwife in the 53/42. I have worked with many midwifes who have this 
channel. Here in the pressure of the abstract from the mental plane, this birthing process is also there. It is 
there in its very language. 

It requires a determined strength for the passage through. To make sense out of anything is quite a process 
because there is no logic. There is only time. The abstract mind is nothing but time: all that time past, all 
those things that can be used to finally bring together some kind of sense, the realization that can wait 
when there is contact with the 47th gate. 

64.1 Conditions 

So we come to the first line, the line of introspection, the line which sets the foundation for the hexagram. 
It is called Conditions. Remember that this is the pressure that will lead to historians and philosophers and 
idealists, to ideologies, to all of the things that are part of the abstract mental stream. It is all about 
conditions: to discover the condition itself in which the sequence takes place, in order to give it a 
framework to understand it. 

Venus exalted. In penetrating to the center, the understanding that instills the necessary harmony to 
survive disorder. In penetrating to the center does not say that it is guaranteed that you are getting to the 
center. It is about getting to the center. If you penetrate to the center, then you can survive the disorder. 
Otherwise, you can't. 

Amongst the confusion, the difficulty in finding the point. This is always the very basis of what it is to 
have abstract inspiration, that it is hard to find the point. Having difficulty in finding the point, you end up 
exploring many things. When you do get the point, which will not happen until you get to the other side, 
to the 47, you suddenly have this light bulb realization, "Aha". That is one side of it. 

The other side is Mars in detriment. The powerful temptation, when having transition in sight, to hasty 
action. When you know where the point is, "I have to get there now." An urge to act when you think you 
have made sense of the confusion. These are the two basic sides of what happens to the abstract being. On 
one side, the abstract being is saying, "I am very confused. I am going from crisis to crisis and from 
change to change, and I cannot make sense out of my life. On the other side is the abstract being who 
says, "Aha, this must be it. And if this must be it, I'll try it." Those are the two sides as the foundation of 
what it is to be inspired abstractly. They are driven, in the detriment sense, to try to act out what they 
come to believe makes sense. They can't know because the 64 is only a pressure which is not aware. The 
awareness is in the ajna. 

64.2 Qualification 

Wte come to the second line, to projection. What is being projected out here is confusion. Somebody who

Venus exalted again. Venus is three times exalted and one time in detriment in the 64. An inner

In the white book: Inner development that can end the confusion over what makes sense. Venus,

Moon in detriment. Constantly in action, it wastes the very qualities and resources that it will need. The

64.3 Overextension 

When we get to the third line, we get to the line called Overextension. This line is about trial and error.

Saturn exalted. The wisdom to recognize when one has not the necessary resources... (you cannot make

experience is that it is dependent on being shared with others, in order to really achieve its fulfillment. 

In the white book: The wisdom to accept confusion as a temporary state that will be resolved in time or 
through others. That is a trial and error process. They are confused because the 64 is a confusing gate. 
They will go through the trial and error of others being able to assist them in that, being able to work with 
them or it will simply come out of a transit. 

Moon in detriment. The risk of a superficially confident personality that when transition collapses, there 
is no one to turn to. Overconfidence that the fates will be kind on demand. In other words, "I don't need 
you to help me with my confusion because I have already learned through my trial and error that you can't 
make sense out of the world for me. I am going to wait for the gods to provide me with that moment of 
satori." Whenever you meet 64.3's, these are people that are always waiting for that moment of 
enlightenment. Somewhere inside of them they know that it is possible. 

64.4 Conviction 

The upper trigram and its theme of externalization. This line is called Conviction. This is a very fixed 
force. It has the Moon exalted. Symbolized by its phases, the Moon is assured of transition, convinced by 
its very process that it will triumph. Every person that has the 64th gate will always get the 47. They will 
get it from transits and people. Because the fourth line is fixed in being there in that process of confusion, 
it also recognizes that regularly that confusion always seems to come to some kind of realization. Those 
with this lunar aspect are people who start off very confused in something, and then go through a process 
where that confusion slowly dissipates. Suddenly the 47 is there, and then there is the opportunity for 
realization. 

On the other side, we have the Mars in detriment. Where force and energy alone cannot overcome doubt. 
No matter how many times the 64.4 gets to realize its way out of a confusion, when the confusion starts in 
its next cycle they are still doubtful that they will be able to get to the realization. The exalted learns that 
lesson and says, "Okay. Ultimately, I will realize." In the detriment: No matter how many times they get 
to realize, there is always this mental anxiety that is generated that they are not able to realize themselves 
out of the next confusion they are dealing with. 

64.5 Promise 

When you come to the fifth line, the way in which this gate of confusion is projected on by others is that 
it represents a great promise. When everybody comes into contact with this 64.5, what they are projecting 
on them is: If the confusion exists and they are active in the confusion, at some point, out of that is going 
to come realization - an idea and stimulation. In other words, what is projected on them is that they will 
somehow come out of that confusion. They may, or may not. 

Venus exalted here, like in the fourth line. The fourth line is already dealing with the other side. That is 
why it can know that realization can come. It knows that there is something at the other side of the 
channel. Here in this fifth line is the deep recognition that there is the 47 over there and what it is all 
about is not whether or not the realization is going to happen. It is whether or not there are the right 
human beings involved in that process, because it is collective. The 64.5 by itself knows that it is going to 
need the 47, the 1 1 and the 56. Otherwise, they will never see how this all comes out. 

This line is about Promise. The promise is that it can manifest in the end as stimulation. The values 
promised in any new order... (the new order is a reference to the process from confusion to realization) 
...are demonstrated through harmonic interaction with others. This strengthens the justification for the 
struggle. The struggle to bring realization into manifestation as stimulation. The struggle not only to make 
sense out of something, but of making sense out of it to come up with an idea which is stimulating to 
others. "This is my idea about what happened yesterday." To get to that point that the confusion can 
finally be clearly discussed. 

Confusion over which values and relationships can bring harmony. The harmony for a 64 is only going to 
come when they hear it articulated out of the 56's voice "I believe". So, they need others. We are dealing 
with a collective process here. 

On the other side, Jupiter in detriment. A tendency in trying to justify the struggle by focusing exclusively 
on the failure of the old order that cannot demonstrate the quality of the new. What happens to these 
people is that they stay stuck in the confusion because as long as they are just the 64, there is no pathway 
to the stream to the 56. It is not there. They do not hear it come out. As long as they don't hear it come 
out, even though they may be able to have somebody that can realize it, it does not mean that it is coming 
out. Until it comes out, they are still stuck in the old confusion. They have not been able to go beyond it. 
All that is about people. It is deeply people oriented. This inspiration is for others and, by inspiring others, 
the nature of what one is inspiring can come out and be revealed. It is all about others. It is very 
collective. 

64.6 Victory 

This line is called Victory. Mercury exalted. The mental assuredness that knew that victory... (to make 
sense, to realize) ...was inevitable, thus making triumph sweet... (you know that the annoyance of being 
confused will always have this sweetness of realization) ...but not reason for excess. The mental gift of 
enjoying the confusion and its diversity of data. This is really the magic that is possible with the 64.6. 
That stream of information from the past will always come through. One can just enjoy the images, the 
stream for what they are. Nothing more and nothing less. It is not up to the 64 to make sense out of it. It is 
up to the 64 to inspire making sense out of it. 

The moment that the 64 lets go of being responsible for the realization, it can enjoy its confusion because 
it is beautiful. It is history. It is the past. There are all the rich things that go through us experientially. It is 
the great dreaming gate. You can't do much with your dreams. It is better not to do anything with them. 
Let them just go through, see them, and watch them. 

On the other side, we have Venus in detriment, only one of the four lines where Venus is not exalted. 
Like the story of the Trojan horse, it can be dangerous to get carried away in celebration, lest one loses 
vigilance and perspective. In the white book: With all that data, it's easy to lose perspective. In other 
words, enjoy the stream going through but if you get stuck only in the enjoyment of the stream, you don't 
get to see the pleasure of the realization of that inspiration. You just get stuck in the confusion and love it. 
I know people with this line who have actually said to me, "Don't try to make sense out of the world for 
me. I like being confused." They will withdraw from all of this. They are sixth lines, after all. The sixth 
line is always ready not to fulfill everybody else's expectation about what that is supposed to be. 

When you meet a 64.6, you do not meet somebody who will give you the impression that they are 
confused. The actual impression that you get from them is that they know something you don't. This is the 
Cheshire smile. It is a very sneaky smile. You have no idea. They may in fact remember something that 
they experienced with you that gives them that sense of that they know something that you don't. It is 
always there. They are standing back. When the 64 reveals their dreams to others, others can form dream 
symbols, not they themselves. They can inspire others to realize out of their dreams.
